date_attribute.weather: In Kunming's winter, the weather is clear and pleasant with a gentle breeze. Sunlight streams through the glass window into the room, bringing a touch of warmth.
date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the New Year's holiday, Sun Yuwei chose a quiet and introspective way to spend her time. She rested at home in the morning and watched a thought-provoking art documentary alone in the afternoon, marking a shift in her cultural taste from mere entertainment to seeking spiritual resonance. After the film, she habitually recorded her inspirations and shared her reflections with friends afar. The day was filled with exploration and fulfillment in her personal spiritual world.

events.name: New Year's Day Rest and Film Viewing
events.description: On New Year's Day, Sun Yuwei rested at home in the morning, enjoying the tranquility at the beginning of the holiday. In the afternoon, following a previous recommendation from her friend Fang Qing (travel companion), she watched the documentary "The Deep Flora of Southern Yunnan" on a video platform. The film's serene and profound narrative style, along with its exploration of the essence of life, deeply captivated her. Throughout the viewing, she remained fully engaged, never fast-forwarding, and was completely immersed in the world of imagery and philosophical reflection constructed by the director.

events.name: Inspiration Recording and Reflection
events.description: After the film ended, Sun Yuwei was deeply moved, with several scenes about the relationship between time, memory, and nature lingering in her mind. She took out the Moleskine notebook she always carried with her, flipped to the "Inspiration Fragments" section, and carefully sketched the outlines of the images that had left a strong impression on her, using her favorite fountain pen. Beside the sketches, she jotted down the fleeting thoughts that arose during the film and her reflections on "existence and documentation." For her, this process was in itself a form of mental organization and creative preparation.

events.name: Online Communication with Distant Book Friends
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei shared her thoughts on the film via WeChat with Fang Qing, who had recommended it, and expressed her gratitude for the recommendation. The two engaged in a brief online discussion about the documentary's aesthetic style, narrative pacing, and several lesser-known books mentioned in the film. Though they were in different places, this intellectual exchange based on shared interests left her feeling enriched. After the conversation, she also posted the film's title and a few reflections on Douban, marking it as 'want to watch/have watched.'

events.name: A brief evening walk and trying a new drink
events.description: As evening approached, to stretch her body after prolonged sitting, Sun Yuwei changed into a comfortable sweater and jacket and took a brief walk of about twenty minutes in the old neighborhood near her home. Breathing in the crisp winter air and observing the New Year decorations hanging in the shops along the street, she felt calm and relaxed. After the walk, she spontaneously decided to try a newly opened milk tea shop, ordering a low-sugar brown sugar pearl milk tea, which tasted good but was slightly too sweet for her liking.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a hint of the laziness and anticipation that marks the beginning of a holiday.

结束状态.心情: Full and tranquil, the heart feels satisfied by high-quality viewing and contemplation.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute walk around the neighborhood in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: The weather will remain sunny and pleasant, with temperatures slightly higher than yesterday, making it suitable for short outdoor trips.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the holiday, Sun Yuwei’s pace of life remained unhurried. In the morning, she engaged in introspection and planning, while in the afternoon, she went out for a long-awaited coffee catch-up with her local close friend, Zhang Jing. This was a typical Sun Yuwei-style social interaction—deep, high-quality conversations with a cherished friend in a familiar, quiet, and culturally rich environment. They shared updates about their lives, discussed their reading and creative pursuits, and drew energy from their spiritual resonance.

events.name: Morning Journal Review and Cultural Taste Self-Reflection
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei brewed a cup of brown sugar bubble tea at her desk and opened her journal to review the previous day's entries. Reflecting once more on her recent film-viewing experience, she realized she was beginning to appreciate slow-paced, thought-provoking visual works more than purely entertaining ones. She started a new page in her journal and wrote, "A Shift in New Year's Film Taste: From Narrative to Philosophy," marking the moment when she became consciously aware of and affirmed the subtle evolution in her personal cultural preferences.

events.name: Head to an independent bookstore cafe
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei set out from home and took the familiar bus to the Mingyuan Bookstore Café on Wenlin Street. She preferred sitting by the window, gazing at the still-green winter scenery of Kunming and the sparse pedestrians outside, feeling relaxed and cheerful. Along the way, she also jotted down a few book topics she wanted to discuss with Zhang Jing in her phone's memo.

events.name: An In-Depth Gathering with My Close Friend Zhang Jing
events.description: Sun Yuwei and Zhang Jing met at a café, where they each ordered their preferred drinks (Sun Yuwei ordered a hot latte). They first shared their experiences from New Year’s Eve (Zhang Jing reunited with her family, while Sun Yuwei stayed home reading). The conversation naturally transitioned to their recent reading. Sun Yuwei shared about a documentary she watched on New Year’s Day, while Zhang Jing talked about an educational essay collection she was reading and new techniques for decorating her planner. They exchanged their planners, admiring each other’s recent pages, with Zhang Jing praising Sun Yuwei’s "Inspiration Fragments" section. The gathering lasted until evening and, as they were engrossed in conversation, extended half an hour longer than planned.

events.name: Expressing Stress and Anticipating Holidays
events.description: During the conversation, Zhang Jing shared interesting anecdotes and challenges she encountered while teaching Chinese at an elementary school, particularly her insights on guiding children in writing. Sun Yuwei expressed her exhaustion from juggling manuscript deadlines and exam preparations at the end of the semester, conveying her anticipation for the upcoming winter break and her goal of completing the first draft of her essay collection. As her closest local friend who knows her best, Zhang Jing offered full understanding and encouragement, and they made plans to explore local spots together during the winter break to seek inspiration for writing.

events.name: Returning Home and Recording
events.description: In the evening, the two concluded their nearly three-hour pleasant conversation and bid farewell at the entrance of the café. Sun Yuwei walked to the bus stop, took the bus home, and spent the entire journey reminiscing about the warmth of reuniting with her good friend and the inspiring dialogue they had shared. After returning home that night, she meticulously recorded the insights and gains from her gathering with Zhang Jing in her daily journal. She carefully affixed the café’s limited-edition coaster and a few dried flowers as mementos, completing a thorough documentation of this social and spiritual recharging activity.

起始状态.心情: Tranquility, tinged with a hint of anticipation for the afternoon gathering.

结束状态.心情: Warm, joyful, and energized by high-quality friendship interactions.

state.今日运动: The total walking time to the bus stop, including the walk from the café to the bus stop, is approximately 25 minutes.

2025-01.daily_overview: After the New Year's holiday, Sun Yuwei returned to her regular routine. Today is her designated yoga day, and she went to the yoga studio to begin her health practice for the new year. However, as someone who has long lacked systematic exercise, the first session focused more on re-establishing the connection between her body and movement. The process was not easy, but it marked the first step toward her goal of "improving posture."

events.name: Attend Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the Jingxin Yoga Life Studio to attend the regular Wednesday class. As it was the first session of the new year, the instructor, He Lu, specially arranged a series of postures focused on awakening and basic stretching. Sun Yuwei tried her best to keep up with the pace, concentrating on the breathing guided by the instructor. She felt her stiff body from prolonged sitting gradually opening up, though her core strength was noticeably insufficient, causing some instability in certain balancing postures. The class aimed to help participants start the new year with a healthy and peaceful mindset.

events.name: A Brief Exchange with He Lu After Class
events.description: After the class concluded, He Lu proactively approached Sun Yuwei, who was slightly perspiring, and softly inquired about how she felt. Sun Yuwei admitted that her body felt quite tight, especially in her shoulders and neck. He Lu gently encouraged her, explaining that this was common for beginners, and reminded her to drink plenty of water after class and to pay attention to her posture in daily life. This brief exchange made Sun Yuwei feel that the coach was very considerate, giving her more confidence to persist with her practice.

events.name: Organize final review materials
events.description: In the evening, considering that the final exam week was approaching next week, Sun Yuwei organized the scattered class notes and reading materials on her desk, sorting the materials for different subjects into categories. This process provided a clear preparation for the intensive review sessions in the coming days and also helped her gradually transition from the relaxed state of the holiday back into a focused study mindset.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to revise the manuscript
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei received a WeChat message from editor Xu Mingyuan inquiring about the revision progress of a manuscript. She made a last-minute decision to stay up for an extra half-hour, quickly revised the manuscript, and sent a reply, which resulted in her going to sleep slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of pressure as the holiday ends and study tasks approach.

结束状态.心情: Physically slightly fatigued yet feeling comfortable, mentally grounded from having completed planned tasks (yoga, tidying up).

state.今日运动: 60-minute yoga class, including basic asanas and stretching

2025-01.daily_overview: Saturday marked the second yoga day of the week. Compared to Wednesday's session, Sun Yuwei's body seemed to have adapted somewhat, but the focus shifted toward more challenging core and strength training. The meditation segment during the class brought her an unexpected sense of calm, prompting her to confront and attempt to manage the anxiety stemming from academic pressure. The practice of health management began to extend from the physical level to a more integrated mind-body approach.

events.name: Saturday Yoga and Meditation Experience
events.description: Sun Yuwei returned to the yoga studio for the Saturday afternoon class. Coach He Lu designed a flow yoga sequence focused on core strength this time, with movements more intense than those on Wednesday. Sun Yuwei struggled to keep up but pushed through with determination. During the final meditation session, He Lu guided everyone to focus on their breathing and release stress. Sun Yuwei tried to shift her attention away from the anxiety of "the final paper still needing revisions," following the guidance to visualize soothing scenes. After the session, she felt her tense nerves relax significantly, and her mood became much calmer.

events.name: Discussing Health Topics with Mother
events.description: During dinner, Mother Li Xiulan asked with concern whether her daughter's shoulders and neck felt uncomfortable from staring at the computer so much lately. Sun Yuwei then mentioned that she had recently started practicing yoga and shared the stiffness in her shoulders and neck as well as her weak core strength that she had noticed during class. Li Xiulan expressed her support and took the opportunity to add, "Just feeling it isn't enough. At your age, you should also get a comprehensive health check-up to systematically understand your physical condition." These words planted a seed in Sun Yuwei's mind.

events.name: Evening Review and Manuscript Revision
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei utilized the relatively focused attention achieved after meditation to review key points of her literary theory course for about two hours, and took the opportunity to revise an essay manuscript to be submitted to editor Xu Mingyuan. She felt that her work efficiency today was somewhat higher than in the previous two days.

events.name: Skipping some yoga exercises due to stress.
events.description: During a yoga class, Sun Yuwei, concerned about her study progress, withdrew early from a high-intensity pose and switched to simple stretching, demonstrating the temporary impact of stress on exercise habits.

起始状态.心情: It's more relaxed because it's Saturday.

结束状态.心情: Physically fatigued yet mentally relaxed, the sense of tranquility from meditation lingers, prompting a more proactive reflection on health.

state.今日运动: A 75-minute yoga class, including Vinyasa yoga and meditation.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday, the final buffer day before the final exam week. Prompted by her mother's reminder the previous day and a budding awareness of her own health, Sun Yuwei made a crucial decision that shifted from "relying on intuition" to "active management": scheduling a comprehensive health checkup. This decision marked the beginning of a transformation in her approach to health management. The rest of her time was devoted to intense preparation for the final exams.

events.name: Determine and inquire about physical examination information
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei recalled her mother's suggestion from the previous day and realized that she had indeed never undergone a systematic health check-up, as her health management had always relied on subjective feelings. She decided to take action and used her phone and computer to look up information about the health examination centers of several top-tier hospitals in Kunming (such as Kunming First People's Hospital and Yunnan University Hospital), comparing the items and prices of different packages. During this process, she also briefly consulted her mother, Li Xiulan, via WeChat about the necessity of certain health check-up items.

events.name: Online Medical Check-up Appointment
events.description: After some comparison and consideration, Sun Yuwei ultimately chose the Physical Examination Center of Kunming First People's Hospital, believing it offered good value for money and had a solid reputation. Through the hospital's official WeChat account, she browsed online and selected a comprehensive health check-up package suitable for young adults. She booked an appointment for 8 a.m. next Saturday (January 12), completed the online payment, and saved the electronic appointment confirmation to her phone after the reservation was successfully made. She also set a reminder for the appointment.

events.name: Focus on reviewing the history of ancient Chinese literature.
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Sun Yuwei entered a state of full preparation for her exams. She went to the library of Yunnan University, where she concentrated on reviewing the history of ancient Chinese literature in a quiet environment. She systematically organized key writers, works, and literary trends from the pre-Qin period to the Ming and Qing dynasties, integrating her class notes, textbook content, and her usual reading insights. She also completed some post-class exercises to reinforce her memory. The intense study atmosphere in the library further motivated her to study efficiently.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to review until the late night.
events.description: Due to the extensive review materials, Sun Yuwei made a last-minute decision to stay up until the early hours of the morning, focusing on the difficult sections, which resulted in a delay in her sleep time.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly stressed, yet maintaining focus due to having a clear plan (reviewing, handling medical examination matters).

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home (Returned from the Library)
结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, having completed the major task of scheduling a physical examination and making significant progress in my review, I feel a sense of control.

state.今日运动: The round-trip walk from home to the library takes approximately 30 minutes.

2025-01.daily_overview: The final exam week officially began. Sun Yuwei's daily routine noticeably accelerated, with her focus shifting entirely to her studies. Following her own review plan, she concentrated on tackling the course of literary theory, which required extensive comprehension and memorization. Intense mental exertion was the theme of the day.

events.name: Reviewing Literary Theory at Home
events.description: Sun Yuwei chose to review in her home study so she could easily access books and materials. Today, she focused on the course of literary theory, sorting out key schools, representative figures, and core concepts in Western literary theory from classical to modern times, while also reviewing important concepts in ancient Chinese literary theory (such as "artistic conception" and "fenggu"). By creating detailed mind maps, she connected scattered knowledge points to help understand their internal logic and developmental context, a process that required considerable effort.

events.name: Short Breaks and Online Communication
events.description: During a break in her afternoon review session, Sun Yuwei felt her eyes growing tired and sore. She got up to make a cup of milk tea, then stood by the window and gazed into the distance for a ten-minute rest. Noticing that her university roommate group chat (Liu Jia, Zhao Xiaowen, Zhou Lin) was buzzing with mutual encouragement and venting about the stress of studying, she joined in for a brief chat. She shared some insights from her own review of theoretical concepts and, in turn, found a sense of comfort in the camaraderie of "fighting side by side" through the conversations with her friends.

events.name: Continue to consolidate and review in the evening.
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei returned to her desk once again. She conducted simulated practice using past exam questions based on the key points of literary theory she had reviewed during the day, aiming to test her grasp of the material and identify any gaps in her knowledge. She continued studying until late at night.

events.name: Irregular eating patterns due to forgetting lunch while being deeply focused.
events.description: During the review period, Sun Yuwei became so engrossed that she missed her regular lunchtime, only snacking briefly, which affected her energy intake.

起始状态.心情: Solemn, tense, and filled with the concentration before an exam.

结束状态.心情: The mental exertion is immense, leading to fatigue, yet there is a certain sense of accomplishment upon seeing the completed review progress.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of exam week, the pressure persisted. Sun Yuwei moved to the library to review Ancient Chinese, a course that demands a solid foundation. Online discussions with classmates became an important way to resolve doubts and alleviate feelings of isolation. Immersed in studying throughout the day, social and leisure activities were almost nonexistent.

events.name: Library Conquers Classical Chinese
events.description: Sun Yuwei arrived at the library of Yunnan University early in the morning, with her focus for the day on Classical Chinese. She concentrated on reviewing the grammar of classical prose, the usage of common function words, the differentiation of word meanings, and the translation of punctuation and sentence structures. Faced with some challenging literary selections and complex grammatical phenomena, she repeatedly read through her textbooks and notes, practicing translations on scratch paper. In the quiet library, only the sounds of turning pages and writing could be heard, creating a solemn atmosphere.

events.name: Online discussion of difficult issues with classmate Zhao Xiaowen.
events.description: While reviewing, Sun Yuwei encountered several issues with difficult-to-understand sentence structures and word meanings. She took photos and sent them to her roommate Zhao Xiaowen, who was also reviewing. The two briefly discussed the problems via WeChat voice call for about ten minutes, inspiring each other and ultimately resolving most of the doubts. This online collaboration based on shared goals made the tedious review process slightly more interesting and alleviated the sense of loneliness from studying alone.

events.name: Review until closing time.
events.description: Sun Yuwei stayed in the library from opening until nearly closing time, hardly leaving her seat except for a quick lunch of the bread and fruit she had brought. She completed all the planned review content for Classical Chinese and compiled a list of her own common mistakes. When she left the library, the sky had already darkened, and she felt a deep ache in her eyes and shoulders.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to revision pressure
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei felt frustrated due to prolonged studying. She briefly confided in her mother, experiencing a slight dip in mood, but alleviated it by listening to music.

起始状态.心情: Fatigue accumulates, but perseverance drives continued study.

结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, yet having completed a day of arduous review tasks, there is a sense of relief as if "another hurdle has been cleared."

state.今日运动: The walk from home to the library and back takes approximately 30 minutes.

2025-01.daily_overview: In the midst of exam week, Wednesday happened to be yoga day. After consecutive periods of intense mental exertion, Sun Yuwei needed physical relaxation and adjustment. She insisted on attending the yoga class, and this session focused more on alleviating physical discomfort. After the class, her review entered the final stage of filling in gaps and launching a comprehensive push.

events.name: Persist in attending the Wednesday yoga class.
events.description: Despite her intense revision schedule, Sun Yuwei still attended the afternoon yoga class as planned. She explained to her coach, He Lu, that her prolonged sitting during revision had worsened the stiffness in her shoulders and neck. During the session, He Lu specifically guided her through some gentle stretches targeting the shoulders, neck, and upper back, reminding her to focus on her breathing and avoid holding her breath due to exam-related stress. For Sun Yuwei, this class was more about physical relaxation and recovery rather than physical training.

events.name: Final Comprehensive Review and Mock Exams Before the Test
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei conducted her final comprehensive review at home before the final exams. Instead of starting new content, she quickly revisited the key points of all subjects (ancient literature, modern and contemporary literature, literary theory, and classical Chinese), along with her self-compiled notes on common mistakes and mind maps. Following this, she retrieved a set of comprehensive mock test questions and completed them within the allotted time to assess her review effectiveness and adjust her exam-taking mindset. After finishing, she briefly checked the answers, which boosted her confidence.

events.name: Adjust Your Mindset and Daily Routine
events.description: After finishing her review, Sun Yuwei consciously stopped thinking about the exam content. She took a hot shower, listened to some soothing modern pop music, and went to bed a bit earlier than in previous days, trying to detach herself from the intense preparation mode and conserve energy for the next day's exam.

events.name: Early bedtime due to anxiety-induced insomnia
events.description: Despite attempting to sleep early, Sun Yuwei tossed and turned in bed due to exam pressure, eventually falling asleep ahead of time to alleviate anxiety.

起始状态.心情: Persistent tension, physical discomfort from prolonged sitting, and a mix of anticipation and anxiety about the upcoming exam.

结束状态.心情: After yoga relaxation and systematic review, the sense of anxiety has decreased, the mindset has become more stable, and I am ready to face the challenges ahead.

state.今日运动: A 60-minute yoga class focusing on stretching and relaxation.

2025-01.daily_overview: The exam day for the final course of the first semester of her junior year. Having completed days of intense preparation, Sun Yuwei walked out of the examination hall with a sense of relief. The semester officially ended, and winter break began. She immediately shifted her focus to her personal development plan, enrolling in an online writing workshop that closely aligned with her creative goals, demonstrating her proactive approach to time management and goal pursuit.

events.name: Complete the final exam for the last course.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei took the final exam for the course "Trends in Modern and Contemporary Chinese Literature," the last one of the semester. The exam paper was of moderate difficulty, and she answered the questions quite smoothly. After handing in her paper and walking out of the teaching building, the winter sunlight shone on her. She let out a long sigh of relief, feeling the heavy academic pressure on her shoulders instantly dissipate, replaced by a sense of ease that comes with completing a phase of her tasks.

events.name: Discover and enroll in online writing workshops
events.description: While resting at home in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei discovered a recruitment notice for an online workshop titled "Nonfiction Writing and Family Memory" organized by a well-known cultural institution in Beijing, posted on a cultural public account she frequently browses. She carefully read the course outline, instructor introductions (one a seasoned nonfiction writer and the other an anthropology scholar), as well as feedback from previous participants. The theme aligned closely with her goal of "completing the first draft of a prose collection" and resonated with the potential interest of her INFP personality in deeply exploring personal and family stories. With little hesitation, she filled out the online application form, paid the course fee, and promptly received a confirmation email along with a package of preparatory materials.

events.name: Preliminary reading of workshop materials
events.description: After successfully enrolling, Sun Yuwei couldn't wait to open the resource package, which contained several excellent non-fiction sample essays, a reading list on "How to Uncover Family Memories," and the preview questions for the first class. She spent over an hour quickly skimming through the materials and began subconsciously thinking about which fragments of her family's stories were worth writing. The first thing that came to mind was her father's occasional mentions of his experiences in western Yunnan during his youth.

events.name: Share the end of the semester with family and gather for a small celebration.
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei announced to her parents that the semester had officially ended. Her mother, Li Xiulan, inquired about her exams with concern and reminded her not to forget the medical checkup on Saturday. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, smiled and said, "You've worked hard. Relax well during the winter break, but don't forget your writing." The warm support from her family made her feel deeply reassured. After the meal, the whole family watched a movie together to celebrate, which led to a late night.

起始状态.心情: The final tension and focus before the exam.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, filled with a sense of relief and anticipation for the winter break and new study plans.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the examination venue takes approximately 20 minutes.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of winter vacation, the pace of life suddenly slowed down. Sun Yuwei first attended to the final tasks of her studies—checking her grades. Then, she began preparing for tomorrow's physical examination, which marked the first step in her proactive health management. In the afternoon, she visited her favorite independent bookstore, where she started planning her winter vacation life in a familiar environment, turning her creative goals into concrete plans.

events.name: Check final exam results
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei logged into the academic affairs system of Yunnan University at home, nervously and expectantly checking the final exam scores that had been gradually released. The results largely met her expectations, with a few pleasant surprises in certain subjects. She breathed a sigh of relief, briefly recorded each subject's score in her phone's memo, and conducted a quick review and summary of her academic performance for the semester, feeling satisfied and at peace with herself.

events.name: Preparing for a Medical Examination
events.description: As required by the physical examination notice, Sun Yuwei began strictly fasting and refraining from water after 8 p.m. She placed her ID card, medical insurance card, and the electronic appointment voucher from her phone in her backpack in advance and set an alarm for an early start the next morning. Her mother, Li Xiulan, specifically reminded her of the precautions again before bedtime, urging her to rest early. Sun Yuwei felt a warm sense of being cared for and harbored a bit of curiosity rather than worry about the upcoming physical examination.

events.name: Planning the Winter Vacation at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore with her backpack. She took her usual seat by the window, ordered a cup of hot tea, and opened her notebook to a fresh page, where she wrote "Winter Vacation Plan." She outlined several clear objectives: 1) Complete and submit at least two column articles; 2) Read the books recommended by the workshop thoroughly and finish the preparatory assignments; 3) Begin preliminary brainstorming for the outline of a prose collection; 4) Maintain a twice-weekly yoga practice; 5) Plan a short cultural exploration trip within the city. She also roughly allocated weekly time blocks for each task. When the bookstore owner, Qin Mingyuan, passed by and saw her focused expression, he smiled knowingly and did not disturb her.

events.name: A small farewell gathering with roommates
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei gathered with her university roommates for a simple farewell at a small café near the school that they often visited. Her roommates included Liu Jia (returning to Sichuan), Zhao Xiaowen (staying in Kunming for an internship), and Zhou Lin (returning to Hunan). They shared their relaxed post-exam moods, joked about their respective winter break plans (Liu Jia preparing for the postgraduate entrance exam, Zhou Lin working on her internship portfolio), and promised to maintain "frequent interactions" in their WeChat group during the break, sharing updates on their lives and reading insights whenever possible.

events.name: Temporarily changed plans to go shopping.
events.description: On her way home, Sun Yuwei made an impromptu decision to visit a nearby mall, where she purchased some stationery supplies and a new book as a reward for herself, resulting in her returning later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and leisurely, enjoying the freedom of the first day of winter vacation without academic pressure.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and well-organized, I have completed grade inquiries and holiday planning. I am slightly curious about tomorrow's physical examination, and my overall state is positive.

state.今日运动: Walking to the bookstore and café, shopping, and returning home, totaling approximately 40 minutes.

2025-01.daily_overview: Saturday was the day for the medical checkup. Sun Yuwei underwent a systematic and standardized health examination process, marking a milestone in her adult health management journey from relying on "subjective feelings" to embracing "objective data." Although the process was somewhat time-consuming and tiring, the feeling afterward was one of reassurance and proactivity. In the afternoon, she rested at home and began preparing for her meeting with her supervisor next week.

events.name: Undergo systematic physical examination on an empty stomach.
events.description: Sun Yuwei arrived at the Physical Examination Center of Kunming First People's Hospital early in the morning according to her scheduled appointment. After fasting, she queued to collect her examination form and barcode, then followed the guidance of the triage nurse to complete over ten items in sequence, including blood drawing, abdominal ultrasound, electrocardiogram, internal medicine, surgical examination, ophthalmology, stomatology, and measurements of height, weight, and body fat. The entire process was orderly but time-consuming, and she encountered many other young people who had also come for physical examinations. She felt somewhat nervous during the ultrasound and electrocardiogram, but the medical staff were professional and patient. By the time all the examinations were completed, it was nearly 12:00 noon, and she felt somewhat hungry and fatigued.

events.name: Breakfast and Rest After the Physical Examination
events.description: After the physical examination, Sun Yuwei found a clean breakfast restaurant near the hospital, where she ate a bowl of hot porridge and steamed buns to replenish her energy. She then took a ride home. Having woken up early and undergone the examination on an empty stomach, she felt somewhat drowsy and took a nap for over an hour.

events.name: Organize materials and prepare for the meeting with the supervisor.
events.description: After waking up in the afternoon, she felt refreshed. Sun Yuwei sat in the study and began organizing her course notes for the semester, drafts of her final papers, and scattered thoughts generated from reading materials for the nonfiction workshop. She particularly revisited fragments of family stories that had emerged during recent casual conversations with her parents, and attempted to record these scattered "emotional threads" and "story seeds." She distilled several preliminary directions that could be used for essay writing, preparing to discuss them tomorrow with her advisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan.

events.name: Communicate with the editor online regarding manuscript progress
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei reported her recent work arrangements to editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat. She informed him that her semester had ended and that she would focus on conceptualizing the framework for her essay collection and writing some in-depth articles during the winter break. She also confirmed the submission deadline for her next article. Editor Xu expressed his understanding and encouraged her to make good use of the holiday for creative accumulation.

events.name: Falling asleep early due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to the physical exertion from the medical checkup, Sun Yuwei went to bed earlier than usual to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit sleepy due to the early morning medical checkup, but maintaining a serious attitude.

结束状态.心情: Fatigue still lingers, but having completed the important task of the medical check-up brings a sense of relief and reassurance, fostering a more concrete focus on health.

state.今日运动: Walking between various hospital departments and going up and down stairs, with a cumulative walking time of approximately one hour.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is a fixed yoga day and also the day for meeting with her mentor. The morning yoga session helped her recover from the fatigue of yesterday's medical checkup. The afternoon discussion with Professor Wu Mingyuan was crucial. Her mentor not only affirmed and guided her academic and creative plans but also encouraged her to transform personal emotional experiences into literary creation. This greatly boosted her confidence and provided clear direction for her core creative project during the winter break.

events.name: Sunday Yoga Recovery Practice
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived at the yoga studio as usual. Coach He Lu noticed that she appeared somewhat fatigued and arranged a restorative and soothing Yin yoga session for her, focusing on deep stretching and relaxation rather than strength training. While holding some gentle poses for extended periods, Sun Yuwei felt that the physical stiffness from her busy day of medical examinations the previous day was significantly alleviated, and her mood gradually settled into a state of calm.

events.name: Meeting with Professor Wu Mingyuan
events.description: After the yoga class, Sun Yuwei went to the office of Professor Wu Mingyuan at the School of Literature, Yunnan University. She provided her supervisor with a detailed report on her academic achievements for the semester, including her satisfactory final grades, and the progress of her revisions to her term paper. Then, with a hint of nervousness but sincerity, she shared her intention to begin working on a collection of essays during the winter break. She also mentioned her enrollment in the "Family Memories" writing workshop and some preliminary ideas about drawing inspiration from daily family conversations.

events.name: Receiving encouragement and guidance from the mentor
events.description: After listening attentively, Professor Wu first affirmed her idea of combining academic training with personal creative work, considering it a highly beneficial practice for students in the Department of Chinese Language and Literature. He particularly encouraged Sun Yuwei not to shy away from writing about personal and family stories, believing that "the most personal is often the most universal." Professor Wu recommended several reference books, such as *The Art of Creative Nonfiction* and *Writing the Life Poetic*, and suggested that she could start practicing with "emotional sketches" or "object writing" (for example, a family heirloom with a story) without rushing to construct a grand framework. This conversation greatly inspired Sun Yuwei, making her creative direction clearer.

events.name: Borrowing Father's Old Diary
events.description: At home in the evening, inspired by her mentor's suggestion of "object writing," Sun Yuwei recalled that there seemed to be some old notebooks in her father's bookcase. She asked her father, Sun Mingyuan, if she could take a look at the things he had written in his youth, hoping to find some creative material. Her father was slightly surprised but readily agreed, pulling out a notebook with a yellowed cover from the depths of the bookcase. He said, "These are just random notes from my time as an educated youth. They aren't very literary, but you can take a look." Sun Yuwei felt as if she had found a treasure. She spent the entire evening in the study quickly browsing through it, deeply captivated by the scattered records of geographical features, labor details, and personal emotions. She used sticky notes to mark many passages that interested her.

events.name: Staying up late to read the diary out of excitement.
events.description: Attracted by the contents of her father's diary, Sun Yuwei stayed up late reading it, which caused her to go to bed late.

起始状态.心情: The relaxation brought by the day off, coupled with anticipation and a hint of nervousness for the afternoon meeting with the supervisor.

结束状态.心情: Feeling uplifted and deeply inspired, she was filled with unprecedented enthusiasm and a clear sense of direction for her prose collection, fueled by her mentor's affirmation and her father's "treasure" diary.

2025-01.daily_overview: Winter break life officially entered a phase centered on creative work. Sun Yuwei began conducting systematic research for new writing topics, demonstrating the professionalism of a freelance writer. In the evening, she engaged in a high-quality online work discussion with her colleague and friend Song Wen, inspiring each other with ideas. Yoga classes continued to serve as a means to alleviate the physical strain caused by desk work.

events.name: Conducting research for article topic selection
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei was in her home study, conducting preliminary preparations for a planned column article on "The Survival Status and Cultural Value of Independent Urban Bookstores." She systematically consulted relevant industry reports, news articles, academic papers, and interviews with well-known bookstore owners through the internet and her university library's database. She categorized useful information, data, and perspectives into separate documents, laying a solid knowledge foundation for subsequent interviews and writing.

events.name: Online communication with fellow writer Song Wen
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a voice call via WeChat with her friend and fellow writer Song Wen, who is based in Chengdu. She shared her research findings from the day regarding independent bookstores, as well as her intention to interview Qin Mingyuan, a local bookstore owner. Song Wen, in turn, discussed the challenges she faced while writing an article on the theme of "slow urban living" and shared some market feedback she had received. The two exchanged ideas, deliberated on writing angles, and also vented about certain industry phenomena. This intellectual exchange and emotional support among peers serve as a vital source of energy in Sun Yuwei's freelance life.

events.name: Wednesday Yoga Class: Targeted Relaxation
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended a yoga class. She had specifically informed her coach, He Lu, in advance that she had recently started spending long hours sitting at a desk to review materials and write. During the class, He Lu intensified the stretching and relaxation exercises for the shoulders, neck, back, and wrists, and taught her several simple movements she could do at home during work breaks. Sun Yuwei felt a noticeable relief from the stiffness after the class.

events.name: Continue studying father's diary.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei took out her father's diary from the educated youth period and carefully reread the passages she had marked during the day. She was no longer reading out of mere curiosity but had begun to examine these details through the lens of a "writer," contemplating how they connected to the broader historical context, regional customs, and universal human nature. She jotted down some fleeting associations and questions in her notebook, intending to find an opportunity to discuss them further with her father.

events.name: Begin short-distance urban cultural exploration (Day 1)
events.description: As part of her winter vacation plan, Sun Yuwei visited a newly opened independent café near her yoga studio after her afternoon class, documenting the ambiance and unique features to gather material for her writing.

起始状态.心情: Calm, focused, and ready to immerse in a day of research and writing.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, with mental work saturated yet orderly, interactions with friends bring joy, and there is satisfaction in the progress of creative projects.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei's life progressed simultaneously across several dimensions: personal creative work, health management, and social relationships. She went to the hospital to collect her medical examination report, obtaining objective data about her own health condition for the first time. In the afternoon, her relationship with her yoga partner, He Lu, deepened through a post-class conversation. In the evening, she conducted a formal and in-depth interview with her father, marking an evolution in their father-daughter relationship from traditional, reserved care to a profound exchange based on a shared topic (family history). This also infused soul into her core creative project.

events.name: Receive the physical examination report and conduct a preliminary review.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei returned to the Physical Examination Center of Kunming First People's Hospital to collect her printed medical report. The report indicated that her overall health condition was good, but her weight and BMI value (17.2) were indeed low, falling within the "underweight" range. It was recommended that she pay attention to balanced nutrition and appropriately increase the intake of high-quality protein and calories. Additionally, the report also indicated a slight deficiency in vitamin D (which may be related to insufficient outdoor activities) and eye strain. These objective data gave her a new understanding of her "slender" physique, transforming her health management goal from the vague "improving body shape" to the more specific "moderate weight gain, nutritional supplementation, and increased sun exposure."

events.name: Post-class Exchange with Yoga Partner He Lu
events.description: After the afternoon yoga class, Sun Yuwei and He Lu chatted in the locker room. Sun Yuwei mentioned the suggestions from her medical report about having a low BMI and needing to build muscle. He Lu offered professional advice, believing that sticking to yoga would help improve core strength and posture, but combining it with some strength training and dietary adjustments would yield better results. She also shared some nutritional recipes. The two agreed that for future Saturday yoga classes, they could arrive early so He Lu could guide her through some basic strength training. Their relationship began to evolve from a simple instructor-student dynamic into a friendship built around shared health goals.

events.name: Conducting the First Formal Interview with Father Sun Mingyuan
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei, with a solemn and expectant heart, invited her father to conduct a formal interview in the study. She had prepared an outline of questions in advance and, with her father’s consent, used a voice recorder. The interview revolved around her father’s years as an educated youth: why he went, where he went (a county in western Yunnan), his initial feelings, his most difficult and happiest memories, his observations of the local landscape and people, the influence of that experience on his later character and outlook on life, as well as earlier family migration stories. At first, her father was somewhat reserved, but as memories unfolded, he gradually spoke more, sharing many vivid details and emotional fluctuations not recorded in detail in his diary. Sun Yuwei listened and took notes, deeply moved within, as she perceived her father’s youth in such a three-dimensional way for the first time. The interview lasted nearly two hours, and both father and daughter felt it ended too soon.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to medical examination reports and interview content
events.description: The physical examination results caused slight anxiety, but the in-depth conversation during the father's interview left her with complex emotions—both moved and pressured. She alleviated these feelings by journaling in the evening.

events.name: Short-distance Urban Cultural Exploration (Day 2)
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei continued her exploration plan, visiting an independent bookstore near Cuihu Park. She briefly conversed with the owner, Qin Mingyuan, to gather material for her article.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat curious and slightly nervous about the physical examination results, but generally calm.

结束状态.心情: Complex and profound. The physical examination data provided concrete health warnings, but the emotional impact and creative wealth brought by the deep conversation with her father left her with an unprecedented, weighty sense of fulfillment and resonance. The father-daughter relationship has entered a new phase.

events.name: Wednesday Yoga Class: Focus on Improving Posture

Coach He Lu designed a series of poses focusing on core strength and flexibility to address her posture issues. events.name: Discuss the medical examination report with the mother and develop a simple nutrition plan.

Sun Yuwei decided to start implementing these changes the next day and planned to record her dietary adjustments in her journal.

events.name: Attending the first session of the online writing workshop
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended the first online session of the "Nonfiction Writing and Family Memory" workshop via video conference. The instructor explained methods for excavating family memories and assigned the first practice task: writing a short essay based on a family heirloom. She listened attentively, took notes, and planned to start brainstorming the next day.

events.name: Evening stroll for relaxation

2025-01.daily_overview: This day revolved around creation and aesthetics. In the morning, Sun Yuwei immersed herself in writing at home, while in the afternoon, she indulged in the winter colors of the flower market with fellow flower arrangement enthusiasts, striking a balance between mental work and sensory pleasure.

events.name: Contributed: Special Feature on Independent Urban Bookstores
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei brewed a cup of brown sugar bubble tea in her home study and focused on writing an article about the survival status of independent bookstores in the city. Combining her in-store experiences with online research, she analyzed the resilience and innovation of independent bookstores, working continuously for about four hours while fully immersing herself in thought.

events.name: Visiting Dounan Flower Market with Su Man
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei and her fellow flower arrangement enthusiast Su Man arranged to meet at the Dounan Flower Market to select materials for the Ikenobo winter study session. They carefully chose wintersweet, silver willow, and holly berries, exchanging insights on flower arrangement. Su Man also recommended suitable fern foliage for the winter season, and the two enjoyed a pleasant conversation.

events.name: Journal Recording and Inspiration Organization
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei trimmed the floral materials and placed them in a water-filled vase for preservation. She then recorded her writing progress, observations from the flower market, and reflections on winter plant aesthetics in her journal, attaching receipts and photographs.

events.name: Supplementary event: Mild headache, early bedtime.
events.description: Due to excessive mental exertion from writing in the morning, Sun Yuwei experienced a slight headache in the evening and decided to rest early to avoid staying up late.

2025-01.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Sun Yuwei participated in the writing workshop online. The intensive theoretical learning on the first day opened up new perspectives for her in nonfiction writing.

events.name: Day One of the Online Writing Workshop
events.description: Sun Yuwei spent the entire day at home participating in an online workshop on nonfiction writing and family memory. In the morning, she learned how to source materials and select topics. In the afternoon, she explored narrative structure and emotional balance. During the post-class practice of crafting stories based on family heirlooms, she thought of her father’s diary.

events.name: Supplementary event: Staying up late to organize workshop notes.
events.description: Inspired by the workshop content, Sun Yuwei stayed up late into the night organizing her notes, integrating new inspirations with the family memory project, which resulted in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Focused and full of anticipation, ready to absorb new knowledge.

结束状态.心情: The mind is activated, but there is a slight sense of fatigue after staying up late.

2025-01.daily_overview: A day of inner impact and reflection. The evening documentary prompted contemplation on dietary ethics, while the daytime workshop concluded with affirmation of methodologies and initiated new actions in health management.

events.name: Reflections on the Film: "The Truth About Food"
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei watched the documentary "The Truth on Our Plates," which exposes the ethical dilemmas of industrial farming and food waste. Deeply impacted, she began to reflect on her personal dietary choices.

events.name: Initial Reflections on Dietary Ethics in Bullet Journal Records
events.description: After watching the film, Sun Yuwei recorded her profound impressions and initial reflections in her journal, addressing the issue of dietary choices and moral responsibility.

events.name: Wednesday Yoga Class: Balance Challenge
events.description: Attended a yoga class in the afternoon, focusing on balance poses. Successfully maintained stability while challenging the Tree Pose through concentration, which enhanced physical confidence.

events.name: Conclusion and Gains from the Writing Workshop
events.description: During the day, the initial draft of the exercise is submitted, and the mentor provides sincere feedback along with revision suggestions. By the end of the workshop, participants gain methodological guidance.

events.name: Online discussion with close friend Zhang Jing
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei shared her thoughts on the documentary with Zhang Jing, who in turn offered tips on reducing food waste, helping to ground ethical reflections in everyday life.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, looking forward to the conclusion of the workshop.

结束状态.心情: Complexity, a sense of fulfillment, and ethical reflection are interwoven.

events.name: First Meatless Day Practice
events.description: Sun Yuwei strictly adheres to meat-free days, having oatmeal for breakfast, stir-fried broccoli and scrambled eggs with tomatoes for lunch, and stir-fried seasonal vegetables with mushroom soup for dinner, while paying attention to her body's reactions.

events.name: Documenting the Meat-Free Day Experience

events.name: Ikenobo Monthly Study: Creating Winter Flower Arrangements

2025-01.daily_overview: The family cleaning day became extraordinarily meaningful due to the discovery of a long-dusty educated youth diary, marking the unearthing of precious family memories and a turning point in creative inspiration.

events.name: Year-end Household Cleaning
events.description: In the morning, I cleaned the public areas with my mother. In the afternoon, I organized my father's study, dusted the bookshelves, and sorted through old items.

events.name: Discovering Long-Forgotten Educated Youth Diaries
events.description: In the corner of the bookshelf, I discovered an old wooden box. Opening it revealed my father's notebook from his educated youth period, documenting labor, life, and reflections in the Dianxi Commune in 1975.

events.name: First Reading of the Diary and Inner Shock
events.description: Reading the diary entries about natural observations, longing for family, and literary attempts, I was profoundly shaken by the image of the young father and his inner world, unable to calm down for a long time.

events.name: Inquire and Preliminary Sharing with the Mother
events.description: Showing the diary to her mother, the mother shared the few fragments she knew, as the diary's content was also new to her.

events.name: Mention of Dinner and Father's Reaction
events.description: During dinner, I mentioned the diary to my father, who responded indifferently, unwilling to discuss it further but not opposed to my reading it.

events.name: The Urge to Create and Document in the Dead of Night
events.description: In the evening, I recorded the discoveries, profound impressions, and fragments of inspiration in the room, as grand creative ideas began to take root.

起始状态.心情: Calm, preparing for household tasks

结束状态.心情: Excited, astonished, and brimming with inspiration

2025-01.daily_overview: Actively engage in deep conversations with my father to gather material, transform impulses into actions, conceive a collection of essays, seek opinions, and set a budget.

events.name: A Profound Intergenerational Dialogue with My Father
events.description: After breakfast, she proactively approached her father, expressing how deeply she was moved by the diary. Her father then shared deeper past experiences, such as shedding tears upon receiving family letters and the anecdote of exchanging writing brushes. This led to a breakthrough in their father-daughter relationship, fostering unprecedented closeness.

events.name: Organizing Materials and Establishing the Project Framework
events.description: After the conversation, record the story details, open a new project page in the journal, tentatively title the essay collection "Years in Western Yunnan," and list chapter directions such as labor and land.

events.name: In-depth Conversation with Fellow Writer Song Wen
events.description: In the afternoon, I had a two-hour voice call with Song Wen, during which we shared diary insights and project ideas. I received suggestions on refining the main narrative and balancing emotional expression with objectivity.

events.name: Determine the Budget for the Essay Collection Creation
events.description: Finalize the project financial budget in the evening, allocate funds for data procurement, field surveys, etc., and record them in the handcraft journal creation fund column.

events.name: Sharing Insights with Mother
events.description: After dinner, I shared insights from conversations with my mother, reflected on my father's experiences, and deepened the emotional bonds within the family.

2025-01.daily_overview: On New Year's Eve, the topic of the family's future was raised amidst the warm reunion, stirring waves of emotion within Sun Yuwei amid the lively New Year celebrations, prompting her to reflect on the position and responsibilities of adult children.

events.name: A Cozy New Year's Eve Reunion Dinner
events.description: In the evening, I enjoyed the New Year's Eve dinner with my parents. My mother prepared hometown dishes and a mushroom hot pot. After the meal, we watched the Spring Festival Gala and chatted about daily life.

events.name: Unexpected Family Future Issues
events.description: In the latter half of the Spring Festival Gala, the mother brought up the idea of considering having another child. The father remained silent, waiting for a reaction, while Sun Yuwei felt inwardly surprised and confused.

events.name: Inner Turmoil and Surface Calm
events.description: Maintaining composure without responding, staying up until midnight to exchange blessings, yet repeatedly pondering the issue, feeling confused and pressured.

events.name: Confiding in My Sister Late at Night
events.description: After returning to the room, she video-called her elder sister Sun Yutong to confide in her. Her sister understood their parents' intentions and reassured her that their relationship remained unchanged, offering her support.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Assisting in Preparing the Labor for the New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: In the afternoon, assist my mother in preparing the New Year's Eve dinner, engaging in light household chores such as washing vegetables and arranging dishes as a substitute for exercise.

结束状态.心情: Complex, bewildering, imbued with contemplation and gratitude.

events.description: In the quiet corner of Mingyuan Bookstore this morning, I used my notebook to sort out how to balance the creation of a prose collection, academic studies, writing assignments, and maintaining a healthy diet, seeking solutions for multitasking management.

2025-02.daily_overview: This was a Saturday defined by dual pressures. With the winter break drawing to a close, Sun Yuwei officially began planning her graduation project, only to feel the weight of her parents' concerns about the future during a family meeting. Amidst the anxiety, a yoga class and a detailed medical examination report provided her with the first moment of respite, prompting her to resolve to shift her health management from a passive to an active approach.

events.name: Dual Launch of Graduation Planning and Family Meeting
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei sat at the desk in her room and began planning her university graduation thesis. She had a preliminary discussion with her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, via WeChat, clarifying the research direction and requirements. Her heart was filled with anticipation for the academic challenge, yet also a hint of unease about the unknown. In the afternoon, the family atmosphere turned solemn. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, and mother, Li Xiulan, called her to the living room for a family meeting about her future career development. Her parents expressed concerns about the stability of her freelance writing career. Though their tone was gentle, the weight of their expectations made her feel noticeably anxious. For the first time, she realized the gap that needed to be bridged between the practical pressures from her family and her personal ideals.

events.name: Breathing in Yoga Class and a Small Gathering of Book Club Friends
events.description: In the afternoon, to relieve the stress from the morning, Sun Yuwei attended the Wednesday class at the Serenity Yoga Life Studio as planned with He Lu. During the basic poses, breathing exercises, and meditation, she made an effort to refocus her attention on her body, temporarily clearing her mind. After the class, they stopped by a quiet book-themed café nearby, ordering two cups of brown sugar bubble milk tea. They exchanged thoughts on several recent books about "memory and writing" they had read, and He Lu's cheerful and encouraging demeanor helped ease her tense nerves slightly.

events.name: Online Confirmation of Research Direction
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei held an online meeting with her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, via video conferencing software. She formally proposed using her father's educated youth diaries as the starting point for her graduation project and integrating it with her future collection of essays. Professor Wu expressed appreciation for this emotionally rich thematic direction and engaged in preliminary discussions with her regarding the research framework, the scope of data collection, and the feasibility of combining the two. This conversation ignited the first clear spark for her subsequent dual-track planning.

events.name: Medical Examination Reports Prompt Health Awareness
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received the electronic version of her comprehensive health checkup report for January in her study. She carefully reviewed each indicator, paying particular attention to her low BMI, body fat percentage, and nutritional status. Combining the doctor's recommendations attached to the report with her awareness of her current "lack of exercise habits," she realized she could no longer rely on "feeling healthy." Consequently, she opened her planner and solemnly set health goals for February: adjusting her diet structure, increasing her weekly exercise frequency, and shifting her health management from passive bodily perception to active planning and execution. This decision marked the initial awakening of her sense of responsibility toward her own body.

events.name: Light Household Chores Before the Spring Festival
events.description: Before the afternoon yoga class, Sun Yuwei participated in a light family cleaning organized by her mother Li Xiulan. She assisted in wiping down the furniture in the study and organizing old books, which lasted about an hour. This served as an alternative form of physical activity, resulting in mild shoulder soreness the following day.

起始状态.心情: A touch of unease before the new semester begins, along with uncertainty about graduation plans.

结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet with a hint of determination, anxiety coexists with planning, feeling compelled to take action.

state.今日运动: Attended a one-hour yoga class and participated in one hour of light household labor.

2025-02.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for harmonizing aesthetics with daily life. Sun Yuwei temporarily set aside academic pressures and immersed herself in the sea of flowers and colors at the Dounan Flower Market with Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast. In the afternoon, she completed her first formal practice of Ikenobo-style flower arrangement in the living room, nourishing her inner world with beauty created by her own hands.

events.name: Material Selection Journey at Dounan Flower Market
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei traveled with Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast, to Dounan Flower Market—the largest fresh-cut flower trading market in Asia. The air was filled with the fragrance of various flowers. Guided by Su Man, an "expert" in the field, Sun carefully selected fresh and beautifully shaped pine branches, camellias, and several stems of dancing-doll orchids that aligned with the theme of "rikka" (standing flowers), following a pre-written checklist from her notebook. As they made their selections, the two quietly exchanged views on the character of different floral materials, color coordination, and seasonal appropriateness, purchasing materials needed for their upcoming practice sessions. For her, this trip was not merely a shopping errand but also a sensory and aesthetic stroll.

events.name: The First Formal Practice of Ikenobo
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei spread out a practice mat on the living room coffee table at home, arranging the kenzan (flower frog) and flower vessel. She put on cotton gloves and, following the standards of the Ikenobo school textbook, carefully handled the floral materials, trimmed the branches and leaves, and attempted to secure and shape them. During the process, securing the pine branch proved particularly challenging, causing her repeated setbacks. She adjusted the angles repeatedly, striving to embody the artistic conception and vitality pursued by the "rikka" style. The practice lasted for over two hours, and by the end, beads of sweat had formed on her forehead. She placed her first, slightly amateurish creation by the window where the light was best. After taking a photo, she meticulously recorded the difficulties encountered at each step, her reflections, and the sense of fulfillment she felt in the "Aesthetic Journal" section of her notebook.

events.name: Evening Journal and Inspiration Quick Notes
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei curled up in the beanbag chair in her room, listening to soothing modern pop music while decorating today’s journal page. She pasted photos of flowers taken at the flower market and jotted down scattered reflections on colors and life. At the same time, fragments of inspiration from her father’s diary during the day were recorded in the form of keywords, planting seeds for future writing.

events.name: Temporarily cancel the evening walk plan.
events.description: I originally planned to take a walk in the residential area in the evening, but due to fatigue from walking a lot during the day, I decided to rest temporarily and switched to listening to music at home for relaxation.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to a day accompanied by flowers.

结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilled, immersed in the joy of creating beauty with one's own hands, yet slightly weary.

state.今日运动: There is a considerable amount of walking involved at Dounan Flower Market, approximately 2 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with comfortable temperatures.
date_attribute.holiday: Make-up holiday (working on January 26 to make up for the holiday)

2025-02.daily_overview: On the Monday following a holiday shift, Sun Yuwei's life unfolded through layers of in-depth conversations, health practices, and academic exploration. She successfully gained her father's support for her creative plans, took the first step in adjusting her diet with a "meatless day," and began searching for theoretical footholds in the vast sea of academic materials, demonstrating remarkable initiative.

events.name: In-Depth Creative Dialogue with My Father
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei had an in-depth conversation with her father, Sun Mingyuan, in the study at home. She formally and solemnly proposed to use his treasured diary from the "educated youth" period as the core material for her graduation project and her future essay collection, *Whispers of Cang'er: The Mountains of Our Fathers*. She elaborated on her creative vision of integrating personal narratives with local history, as well as the special significance this diary held for her understanding of her father's generation and the era. Initially, her father was somewhat surprised, but faced with his daughter’s earnest gaze and clear plan, he ultimately expressed understanding and support, promising his full cooperation. This conversation marked a crucial step in the transformation of their father-daughter relationship into that of "creative partners."

events.name: Implement the first "Meatless Day"
events.description: To carry out her newly set health goal, Sun Yuwei tried her first "meatless day" today. For breakfast, she carefully prepared a fruit and oatmeal bowl. For lunch, she made a colorful vegetable salad with homemade hummus. For dinner, she challenged herself by cooking Mapo Tofu (vegetarian version). Although the cooking process was a bit hectic, the final dish tasted acceptable. On the diet log page of her personal journal, she not only recorded the ingredients and cooking methods but also wrote down her physical sensations: "I felt very full and didn’t feel drowsy in the afternoon." This marked the beginning of her observation of the relationship between diet and her body.

events.name: Preliminary Exploration of Academic Databases
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei opened her laptop and used academic databases such as CNKI and Duxiu to search online for core papers related to "memory studies," "private writing," "microhistory," and "educated youth literature." Faced with a vast amount of information, she first skimmed through the abstracts and conclusions, downloaded over a dozen of the most relevant articles, and preliminarily categorized them by theme for storage. This process made her feel both the rigor and vastness of academic research, while also helping her find a potential theoretical framework for her vague conceptual ideas.

events.name: Procurement of Ingredients for Health Programs
events.description: After speaking with her father in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei headed to a fresh produce supermarket near her home and an organic food store she frequents to make a major purchase for "Meatless Day" and her subsequent dietary adjustments. Her shopping cart was filled with fresh vegetables, fruits, quinoa, chicken breast, salmon fillets, and various soy products. She also spent a long time comparing products on the shelves, carefully selecting several types of low-sodium soy sauce and olive oil. This shopping trip served as the material preparation for putting her health goals into practice.

events.name: Stayed up late organizing materials out of excitement.
events.description: Feeling uplifted after the conversation with my father, I became overly engrossed in exploring academic materials in the evening and inadvertently stayed up until the early hours, resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Filled with determination, ready to embrace a fulfilling day.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment intertwined with fatigue, feeling invigorated by gaining my father's support and launching a new plan, yet also slightly weary from staying up late and information overload.

2025-02.daily_overview: Another adjusted workday, Sun Yuwei spent it between chance and planning. A late-night ASMR experience by chance opened up a new world of relaxation for her, while during the day, she systematically developed a health plan and began setting up a workstation to digitize her father’s diary. Her life transitioned from exploration to systematic construction.

events.name: A Late-Night Discovery: ASMR
events.description: Last night before going to bed, while browsing Bilibili, Sun Yuwei accidentally clicked on an ASMR video titled "Immersive Library Study Session, Only the Sounds of Flipping Pages and Writing." She was drawn in by the video's extreme quiet atmosphere and subtle, realistic sounds, and tried listening to it with headphones for half an hour. The relaxing sensation of a slight tingling on her scalp and a gradually calming mind was something she had never experienced before, which surprised her and left a deep impression.

events.name: Explore ASMR in Depth on Douban
events.description: During the day, driven by curiosity and recent struggles with poor sleep, Sun Yuwei browsed through the "Fighting Insomnia" group on Douban, where she noticed multiple posts recommending ASMR audio as an effective means to aid sleep and relaxation. She carefully read through these experience-sharing posts, learning about the basic concept of ASMR (Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response), common trigger sound types (such as whispering, tapping, and role-playing), and the styles of different hosts. This gave her a more rational understanding of this newfound discovery and sparked the idea of trying it out herself.

events.name: Build a digital workbench
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei decided to begin processing her father’s diaries. She first cleared the desk, connected the long-dusty scanner and digital camera at home, and installed and configured the relevant drivers and image-processing software. She conducted multiple scanning and photography tests using several sheets of white paper and old magazines, continuously adjusting the angle of the desk lamp’s light, the scanning resolution, and the camera’s color mode. She continued until she ensured that the equipment was functioning properly and could clearly and without distortion capture every detail of the paper, including its yellowed hue and the varying shades of the pen’s ink.

events.name: Develop a Monthly Health Management Plan
events.description: In the morning, based on the recommendations from her physical examination report and her contradictory mindset of "aspiring but unable to act," Sun Yuwei outlined a detailed health plan for February in her journal. Regarding diet, she decided to designate Mondays and Thursdays each week as "meat-free days" while increasing her intake of high-quality proteins and vegetables. For exercise, in addition to her regular yoga classes on Wednesdays and Saturdays, she planned to incorporate an outdoor activity (such as walking) on weekends. She decorated the plan with colorful pens and stickers to make it clear and eye-catching, treating it as a commitment to herself.

events.name: Plan a long-term dietary transition
events.description: After finalizing her monthly plan, Sun Yuwei, still feeling inspired, browsed through several books on healthy eating and food culture. She decided to extend this change even further, so she opened a new page in her journal and outlined a six-month dietary transformation plan (until July). This framework included gradually reducing the frequency of takeout orders, learning a few staple homemade vegetarian dishes, and consistently recording daily dietary reflections and physical responses. This reflects the "personal growth orientation" aspect of her INFP personality.

events.name: Slept early to make up for staying up late the night before.
events.description: Due to staying up late last night, I felt drowsy during the day today and decided to rest early in the evening to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Curious, with a sense of ease in exploring new things, yet slightly drowsy.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and full of anticipation, satisfied with discovering new relaxation tools and completing specific plans, while the body is well-rested.
