2025-02.daily_overview: Wednesday was a significant day for planning and discovery. Sun Yuwei completed the "dual-track planning" for her graduation project and essay collection at Mingyuan Bookstore, transforming emotional inspiration into a rational blueprint. In the evening, she proactively tried ASMR for the first time and achieved remarkable results, while the afternoon yoga session and bookstore visit provided a buffer for this day of intense contemplation.

events.name: The Birth of Dual-Track Planning: Mind Map Day
events.description: Sun Yuwei arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore, her most familiar haunt, carrying her laptop and journal. She settled into a corner seat by the window and spent the entire day there. First, she meticulously crafted a mind map for her graduation thesis, "Personal Narratives and Local History: An Investigation Centered on an Educated Youth's Diary," clarifying the core research questions, theoretical approaches (such as oral history and textual analysis), chapter structure, and the historical materials required. Next, on another sheet of paper, she sketched a literary framework map for her essay collection, "Whispers of Cang'er, the Mountains of Our Fathers," outlining the themes of each essay (such as "The Luggage of Departure" and "Letters from the Mountains"), their emotional tones, and their intertextual relationship with her father's diary. The two maps spread out on the table marked the official entry into the systematic construction phase of her dual-track project, balancing "academic research" and "literary creation."

events.name: First Active ASMR Experience
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Sun Yuwei recalled the discovery from the previous evening. She first downloaded a well-reviewed ASMR-specific app from the application store, then retrieved her noise-canceling headphones. With an experimental mindset, she selected a highly popular audio titled "Vintage Barber Shop Scenario." As the simulated snipping of scissors, the rustling of a comb through hair, and the host's whispered imitation of a barber's inquiries filled her ears, that intense, scalp-tingling sensation of deep relaxation washed over her once again, even more powerfully than the night before. She was genuinely astonished, never having imagined that sound could possess such magic.

events.name: Document New Discoveries
events.description: After her first experience, Sun Yuwei used stickers and colored pens to record "Discovering ASMR" in the "Life Exploration" section of her journal. She briefly described her preferred types (trigger sounds, role-playing), noted the sense of tranquility and wonder brought by the initial experience, and marked it as a new tool worth exploring for self-care and relaxation.

events.name: Regular Yoga and Journaling Exchange
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended her regular class at the Serene Yoga Life Studio. Having overexerted her mind during the day, she focused particularly on stretching her body and controlling her breathing during the session to relieve her tense nerves. After the class, she exchanged a few words with He Lu in the changing room about their respective decorative ideas for their bullet journals. He Lu recommended a new brand of washi tape to her.

events.name: To Collect Materials for Creative Work
events.description: Before heading to her yoga class, Sun Yuwei first stopped by Mingyuan Bookstore. In addition to drawing mind maps, she specifically sought advice from the owner, Qin Mingyuan. Based on her research direction, Mr. Qin recommended and helped her find several books on Yunnan local chronicles, oral histories of educated youth, and modern prose writing theory. Sun Yuwei gladly purchased them as references for her future creative work and research.

events.name: Temporary adjustment of dietary plan
events.description: As I was at the bookstore during the day, I had meat-containing Cross-Bridge Rice Noodles for lunch, temporarily breaking the "meat-free day" plan, but I returned to a vegetarian diet in the evening.

起始状态.心情: The objective is clear, and preparations are underway for significant planning work.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment coexists with profound relaxation; the mind is weary from planning, yet the body feels an unusual calmness due to the ASMR experience.

state.今日运动: Attended a one-hour yoga class

2025-02.daily_overview: On Thursday, Sun Yuwei shifted from planning to concrete implementation. She developed a detailed timeline for the dual-track project and solemnly received the original historical diary from her father. Meanwhile, the ASMR experience began to influence her daily life, and she even considered sharing this novel discovery with her close friend.

events.name: Develop a dual-track project schedule
events.description: Based on yesterday's mind map and the advisor's suggestions, Sun Yuwei sat at her desk at home and began to develop detailed phased execution schedules for her graduation project and essay collection, respectively. Using calendar software, she identified key milestones such as data collection (February), first draft writing (March-April), and revision and polishing (May), ensuring that the two projects could proceed in parallel without conflict and even complement each other. The completion of this schedule marked the transition of the projects from the "conceptual" stage to the "executable" stage.

events.name: Borrowing and Preliminary Organization of Father's Diary
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei, with a respectful demeanor, once again requested to borrow the original copy of the educated youth diary from her father, Sun Mingyuan. Her father carefully retrieved the diary, wrapped in kraft paper, from a locked drawer in his study and handed it to her. In her own study, Sun Yuwei put on a pair of prepared cotton gloves and gently opened the diary on her desk. She began by conducting a preliminary sorting and arrangement according to the dates recorded in the diary. As her fingertips brushed over the slightly coarse paper and the somewhat faded blue-black ink, a profound sense of transcending time and space welled up within her. She did not rush to delve into the content but first allowed herself to feel the "presence" of this material.

events.name: Constructing the Preliminary Framework of the Graduation Thesis
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei turned on her computer and, based on her preliminary reading of materials and reflections, used mind-mapping software to create a more detailed preliminary research framework for her graduation thesis. She divided the framework into main chapters such as Introduction, Literature Review, Diary Text Analysis (further subdivided into themes such as labor, emotions, and homesickness), Historical Context Intertextuality, and Conclusion. She also preliminarily filled in sub-arguments for each chapter. This framework would serve as the blueprint for her subsequent research proposal and writing.

events.name: The Urge to Share After an ASMR Experience
events.description: After a relatively restful night's sleep (which she partly attributed to ASMR), Sun Yuwei recorded in her journal in the morning, detailing her first experience with ASMR and its effects. She felt a strong urge to share this novel experience by posting in a Douban group or discussing it with her closest friend, Zhang Jing, who understood her best. She began to seriously consider whether she should incorporate listening to ASMR into her daily relaxation or sleep routine.

events.name: Preparing for the Editorial Meeting
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei organized the data and reader feedback from her previous month's contributions to "Cultural Horizon" in her study, and considered several potential column topic directions based on her father's diary materials. She confirmed the specific time and link for the video conference with editor Xu Mingyuan the following afternoon via WeChat, preparing herself for the professional presentation.

events.name: Went to bed early to rest due to a mild headache.
events.description: Experiencing a mild headache in the evening, likely due to prolonged eye strain and stress, I decided to go to bed early to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Proceeding in an orderly manner, prepared to execute the plan, but feeling slightly unwell.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and slightly excited, touching the historical artifacts made her feel a profound sense of responsibility, while she was also eager to share the new discoveries. Her headache had eased.

2025-02.daily_overview: Friday was a day of gaining professional feedback and in-depth exploration. Sun Yuwei's creative plan received dual approval from both her mentor and editor, which greatly boosted her confidence. Simultaneously, her exploration of ASMR shifted from accidental encounters to active searching and establishing personal preferences, as new lifestyle habits began to take shape.

events.name: Reporting on the Dual-Track Plan to the Supervisor
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei, carrying the completed mind map and schedule, went to the office of Professor Wu Mingyuan, her supervisor at the School of Literature of Yunnan University. She presented her dual-track plan of integrating her graduation project with the creation of a prose collection to her supervisor in a somewhat nervous yet well-organized manner. After listening, Professor Wu affirmed the innovativeness and emotional value of this "academic and creative interaction" model and provided very specific suggestions on academic standards, research depth, and how to balance the two in terms of time and energy. This meeting eased her anxious mind and provided her with crucial academic support.

events.name: Online Topic Selection Meeting: Approved by the Editor
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei held an online monthly meeting with editor Xu Mingyuan via video conferencing software in her home study. Editor Xu provided positive feedback on the data from last month's manuscripts and proactively suggested that she consider creating a series of columns based on her father's experiences as an educated youth and family memories, believing it would be highly distinctive. This aligned perfectly with Sun Yuwei's own plans, and the two engaged in an in-depth discussion regarding the direction of the March manuscripts, the writing perspective (how to reflect the era through personal stories), and the submission deadlines. Receiving external professional recognition for her career development direction greatly inspired her.

events.name: Record Meeting Key Points and Inspirations
events.description: As soon as the online meeting ended, Sun Yuwei immediately opened a new page in her notebook, meticulously recording the topic directions discussed with Editor Xu, specific suggestions, and the sparks of inspiration that emerged during the conversation. She also listed the key action points to follow up on, establishing a clear framework for transforming academic research into column articles.

events.name: Actively Explore the Diversity of ASMR
events.description: During her evening rest, Sun Yuwei deliberately searched for "ASMR" on Bilibili and NetEase Cloud Music with a clear purpose. She browsed various types with great interest: role-playing scenarios (such as doctor consultations, librarian interactions), pure trigger sound compilations (tapping and friction sounds from various materials), and natural white noise (rainfall, crackling campfires, ocean waves). She gained a preliminary understanding of the breadth and diversity within this field.

events.name: Build a Personal ASMR Collection
events.description: After some listening and comparison, Sun Yuwei found several ASMR creators whose gentle vocal styles and content themes (such as reading, writing, and café ambiance simulations) aligned well with her quiet personality. She subscribed to their channels and saved several audios she found particularly relaxing to her playlist, initially establishing her personal preference library.

events.name: Staying up late for an online gathering with friends.
events.description: I had a video chat with fellow writer Song Wen in the evening, discussing the pressures of creative work. We talked late into the night, which led to me staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous before the presentation, but well-prepared.

结束状态.心情: Feeling uplifted and confident, having received dual recognition from both academia and industry, with curiosity for exploring new things satisfied, yet slightly drowsy.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Saturday, Sun Yuwei proactively initiated a journey of self-breakthrough. Inspired by her father's walking habit, she resolved to break the contradiction of "desiring but not acting" and completed her first morning power walk alone at Cuihu Park. Meanwhile, she formally incorporated ASMR into her bedtime ritual and carried out her second flower arrangement practice. The day was filled with the establishment and reinforcement of new habits.

events.name: First Experience of Power Walking at Cuihu Park in the Morning
events.description: On Sunday morning, Sun Yuwei got up early as planned, put on comfortable sneakers and a jacket, and took the bus from home to Cuihu Park. Along the way, she felt both anticipation and a hint of nervousness—this was her first attempt at outdoor exercise, a proactive step to improve her sedentary writing lifestyle. Upon arrival, she began power walking along the familiar lakeside path. In the morning light, she observed elderly people practicing Tai Chi, children playing, and red-billed gulls skimming the water’s surface, using her phone to capture the sight of willow trees budding in early spring. The power walk lasted about 40 minutes, leaving her breathless but with a flushed face. The fresh air and the vitality brought by the exercise filled her with an exceptional sense of joy.

events.name: Post-Exercise Rewards and Plan Consolidation
events.description: After her brisk walk, Sun Yuwei rested on a bench by the lake, savoring the physical relaxation and mental clarity that followed the exercise. On her way home, she stopped at her regular breakfast shop and bought a small cup of brown sugar pearl milk tea and a flower pastry as a reward for herself. Upon arriving home, she transferred the photos of the morning scenery at Cuihu Lake from her phone to her computer and saved them to her journaling material library. Later, on the health plan page of her journal, she solemnly wrote: "New Monthly Goal: At least one morning brisk walk at Cuihu Park per month." This marked her successful transformation of a single attempt into a long-term plan.

events.name: Incorporate ASMR into the bedtime routine
events.description: After the positive experiences of the previous few days, Sun Yuwei decided to formally incorporate listening to ASMR into her bedtime routine. After washing up in the evening, she dimmed the bedroom lights, put on noise-canceling headphones, selected a rain sound white noise ASMR, and set it to automatically turn off after 30 minutes. She attempted to replace her old habit of scrolling through her phone before bed with this new ritual, aiming to help herself relax and fall asleep more quickly.

events.name: Second Floral Arrangement Practice with Remote Consultation
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei conducted her second practice session of Ikenobo flower arrangement, this time attempting a more complex combination of floral materials and form. During the process, the issue of floral materials being unstable on the kenzan resurfaced. She paused and sent photos via WeChat to Su Man to seek advice on techniques. After referring to Su Man’s suggestions and the illustrations in the textbook, she patiently adjusted the insertion angles and support methods of the floral materials, ultimately completing the work. This process allowed her to appreciate the importance of practice and communication.

events.name: Evening yoga class temporarily canceled
events.description: I had originally planned to attend a yoga class in the afternoon, but due to fatigue from brisk walking in the morning, I notified He Lu at short notice to cancel and opted to rest at home instead.

起始状态.心情: Make up your mind and prepare to embrace a small self-challenge.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, calm, and filled with a sense of accomplishment, feeling proud of completing an outdoor brisk walk and establishing a new habit, with the body slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: 40-minute brisk walk at Cuihu Park in the morning

2025-02.daily_overview: On Sunday, Sun Yuwei returned to her study and devoted herself fully to organizing core materials and making academic preparations. She systematically sorted through her father's diaries and further clarified the direction for literature retrieval, laying thorough groundwork for the upcoming intensive research work.

events.name: Systematically Organize Father's Diary
events.description: Sun Yuwei began systematically organizing the diaries of educated youth provided by her father, Sun Mingyuan, in her home study. Wearing gloves, she carefully turned the pages one by one, categorizing them based on thematic content (such as arrival in the countryside, daily labor, homesickness, interactions with peers, etc.) and making brief annotations in her notebook. For key sections, she took photographs as backups, establishing a preliminary archive for subsequent textual analysis and creative references. Touching these words that bore the marks of their era deepened her emotional investment in the research topic.

events.name: Sorting out Keywords for Literature Search
events.description: In the afternoon, after initially organizing her diary, Sun Yuwei began systematically sorting out the academic research section. Based on the established themes of the essay collection and her graduation thesis, she listed the core academic fields requiring research in her notebook, such as "History and Memory of Educated Youth," "History of Borderland Construction in Yunnan," "Methodology of Oral History Research," and "Private Writing and Public Narrative." For each field, she detailed relevant Chinese and English keywords. This foundational work will significantly enhance the efficiency and precision of subsequent database searches.

events.name: Enable background information access
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei began consulting academic materials and classic literary works related to the history of educated youth, personal memory, and public narratives (such as relevant works by Shi Tiesheng and Wang Anyi) using the electronic resources at Yunnan University Library and her own collection of books. As she read, she combined the material from her father's diaries to preliminarily conceptualize in her mind the possible angles and core viewpoints for a series of articles, allowing emotional material and rational understanding to begin to collide.

events.name: Weight gain caused by family gatherings
events.description: In the evening, I enjoyed a hearty mushroom hot pot dinner with my family. Overeating led to a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to enter a state of deep work.

结束状态.心情: Immerse yourself in history and texts, feeling the weight of research and the increase in personal responsibility, accompanied by a slight fatigue and sense of fullness after absorbing information.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Monday, Sun Yuwei balanced her life among academics, finances, and family dietary discussions. She conducted an efficient literature search at the school library and received last month's manuscript fee, engaging in simple financial planning. Her practice of "Meatless Day" also gained understanding and support from her mother.

events.name: Go to the library for literature search.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei carried her laptop to the library of Yunnan University. In the electronic reading room, she used the campus network to log into Chinese and international academic databases such as CNKI, Wanfang, and JSTOR, conducting cross-referenced searches based on the keywords she had organized the previous day. As relevant paper titles appeared on the screen one after another, she quickly skimmed through the abstracts, preliminarily selecting dozens of highly relevant core journal articles, dissertations, and e-books, and downloaded their tables of contents or full texts. This process gave her an initial sense of the structure of academic research.

events.name: Receiving the Manuscript Fee and Planning
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei checked her mobile banking app and confirmed receipt of the January writing fee of 4,500 yuan, transferred via bank transfer by Xu Mingyuan, an editor at *Cultural Horizon* magazine. This constitutes her primary source of income as a freelance writer. She meticulously recorded this income on the financial page of her personal journal and briefly outlined its allocation: a portion was transferred to her frequently used payment account to cover daily expenses and book purchases for the month, while the remainder was kept in her savings card as a reserve for a future graduation trip or emergency funds.

events.name: "Meatless Day" Practice and Family Communication
events.description: Today is the "Meatless Day" of this week. Sun Yuwei attempted to make mushroom vegetarian soup and stir-fried three shredded vegetables. During dinner with her mother, Li Xiulan, in the evening, she explained to her mother the reasons behind starting "Meatless Day" (for health and light environmental efforts) and shared her experiences over the past week. Her mother, a liberal-minded Chinese language teacher, expressed understanding after listening. Not only did she not blame Sun Yuwei for being "picky with food," but she also enthusiastically shared several of her signature homemade vegetarian dishes, such as cold long beans with sesame sauce and braised eggplant without meat. This made Sun Yuwei feel deeply warmed and supported.

events.name: Working late into the night consecutively
events.description: Due to library research during the day and organizing materials at night, I worked late, resulting in staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a calm mindset and prepare to handle daily affairs.

结束状态.心情: Steady and down-to-earth, feeling a small sense of satisfaction from completing the literature search, receiving income, and gaining support from my mother, but with a slight sense of fatigue.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Sun Yuwei embarked on the time-consuming yet crucial project of digitizing her diary and experimented with using ASMR to regulate her emotions in different scenarios. Simultaneously, she established a dedicated savings plan for her graduation trip, demonstrating the budding awareness of financial planning.

events.name: Initiate the digital scanning of educated youth diaries
events.description: Throughout the day, Sun Yuwei focused on digitizing her father's diary. She set up a temporary workstation in the study, carefully flattening each page of the first half (approximately the first third) of the diary on the scanner and conducting high-precision scans page by page, saving them as high-resolution TIFF image files. The entire process required immense patience, as she handled the fragile, aged paper gently, avoiding direct strong light and excessive pressure. In the afternoon, for pages with difficult-to-scan binding areas or slight curling, she used a camera mounted on a tripod for supplementary photography. After completing the day's work, she backed up all the scanned files to both an external hard drive and a cloud storage service, finishing the foundational work of the first phase.

events.name: Testing the Multi-Scenario Applications of ASMR
events.description: During breaks from scanning diaries, to alleviate the restlessness brought on by prolonged repetitive work, Sun Yuwei tried listening to an ASMR recording simulating the ambient sounds of a café during the day. The faint background conversations and the hum of the coffee machine made her feel as if she were somewhere else, significantly soothing her mood. Before going to bed at night, she also tried a soft-spoken "bedtime story" role-playing audio, comparing the different effects of ASMR on her emotions and sleep preparation in these two distinct scenarios.

events.name: Plan a Graduation Trip Savings Plan
events.description: During her evening rest, Sun Yuwei thought about her goal of "taking a domestic cultural trip within the next year," particularly the planned trip to Dali, which would be integrated with her graduation project. She meticulously outlined the preliminary budget for this trip in her planner and decided to set up a dedicated savings fund. She set a total goal of 15,000 yuan, planning to allocate a fixed percentage (such as 40%) of her future manuscript earnings each month into a specialized bank savings account. This marked her first attempt at financial planning with a clear objective.

events.name: Early bedtime due to shoulder and neck discomfort from prolonged sitting.
events.description: All-day scanning work caused stiffness in the shoulders and neck, so I decided to go to bed early in the evening to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for work that requires patience.

结束状态.心情: The body felt somewhat stiff from prolonged sitting during the scanning process, but there was a sense of fulfillment in having completed an important foundational task. New ideas about financial planning emerged, accompanied by slight soreness in the shoulders and neck.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Sun Yuwei completed the digitization of the diary and returned it to her father, marking not only the conclusion of her work but also an emotional handover. She engaged in an in-depth discussion with her mentor regarding the research framework, receiving crucial academic affirmation. Meanwhile, she began sharing the little secret of "ASMR" she had discovered with her closest friends.

events.name: Complete the digitization and archiving of diaries
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei reviewed the scanning results from the previous day and retook several pages that were affected by glare or blurriness. In the afternoon, she began establishing a systematic naming convention for all digitized files, renaming them according to the format "YYYYMMDD_Serial Number." She then created a directory structure on her computer with the main folder titled "Digitized Archives of Father's Educated Youth Diaries," which included subfolders such as "High-Resolution Scans," "Supplementary Photos," and "To Be Proofread," organizing the files accordingly. In the evening, she carefully arranged all the precious original diaries in their original order and solemnly returned them to her father, Sun Mingyuan. She briefly shared her discoveries during the organization process, such as records of severe cold in a particular winter, as well as her personal reflections. Her father looked at the well-handled diaries with a gratified expression in his eyes.

events.name: Engage in in-depth discussions with the mentor regarding the research framework.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei brought the detailed mind map of her graduation thesis to meet with her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, at the School of Literature of Yunnan University. She elaborated in detail on her research approach, which centers on her father's diary as primary material and combines personal micro-narratives with the historical context of Yunnan. Professor Wu highly praised the unique emotional value and academic potential of the topic and provided very specific and valuable suggestions for revision, including the selection of a theoretical framework (recommending the introduction of the "lieux de mémoire" theory), methods for cross-referencing historical materials, and how to balance academic objectivity with personal emotional expression. This discussion transformed her research framework from "clear" to "solid and feasible."

events.name: First Social Sharing ASMR Experience
events.description: After nearly a week of trying, Sun Yuwei felt that listening to ASMR before bed indeed helped her relax and fall asleep more quickly. In the evening, she briefly shared this small discovery with her closest friend, Zhang Jing, who was also the most understanding of her niche interests, via WeChat: "Jingjing, I recently discovered a sleep aid called ASMR..." She casually recommended a reading-themed ASMR video link that she found particularly soothing. This completed the process from personal exploration to initial social sharing.

events.name: Relaxing Yoga Class Before the Spring Festival
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended a class at the Serenity Yoga Studio. As the Spring Festival approached, the atmosphere in the class was more relaxed than usual, and the instructor incorporated some festive greeting poses. After the class, she chatted with He Lu, and they agreed to visit a newly opened independent bookstore in Kunming together after the Spring Festival holiday.

events.name: Weight Gain from Family Dinner Gatherings
events.description: Having dinner with family in the evening, the rich diet led to continued weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Rigorous and meticulous, preparing to complete the final tasks and deliver an important report.

结束状态.心情: With a sense of relief and confidence, the digital engineering project was successfully completed and received high recognition from the mentor. Sharing the secret brought a lighthearted joy, yet there was a strong feeling of satiety.

state.今日运动: Participated in a one-hour yoga class.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Thursday, Sun Yuwei entered the phase of intensive literature review and deep reflection. At home, she carefully studied and organized notes on the selected core literature while making arrangements for a gathering with her close friends the following day. ASMR had become a reliable tool for her to cope with evening anxiety.

events.name: Intensive Reading of Core Literature and Construction of Notes
events.description: Sun Yuwei spent the entire day in her home study, conducting a close reading of several core academic articles she had selected from the library a few days earlier. She employed a dual-track approach using Notion note-taking software and her personal journal: on Notion, she meticulously excerpted key viewpoints, theoretical frameworks, important arguments, and historical source citations; in her journal, she recorded fleeting inspirations, questions that arose during reading, and preliminary reflections on how these theories might connect with the content of her father's diary. This process was slow but solid, gradually laying the groundwork for the "literature review" and "theoretical analysis" chapters of her thesis.

events.name: Relieving Evening Anxiety with ASMR
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei felt a wave of anxiety rising due to her deep contemplation during the day and concerns about the arrangements for the coming days. She put on her headphones and selected a one-hour ASMR audio of forest rain. Accompanied by the continuous, gentle, and realistic sound of raindrops, distant rumbles of thunder, and occasional calls of nocturnal birds from the headphones, her breathing gradually steadied. Her chaotic thoughts were enveloped and settled by the rain sounds, and she soon drifted into a peaceful sleep.

events.name: Planning a small gathering for best friends after Valentine's Day
events.description: During a break, Sun Yuwei confirmed the gathering for the day after Valentine’s Day (Saturday) with her close friends Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi on WeChat. They settled on the time and the independent café on Culture Lane, which exudes an artistic vibe, and casually discussed possible conversation topics—recently read books, bullet journal materials, and Spring Festival plans. She looked forward to this gathering as an opportunity to share the recent pressures she had been facing.

events.name: Insomnia and late nights due to stress.
events.description: High reading pressure during the day and chaotic thoughts at night lead to difficulty falling asleep, resulting in staying up later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Focused, preparing to immerse in reading and contemplation, yet with a slight sense of anxiety.

结束状态.心情: The mind is enriched by deep reading, slightly fatigued, anxiety alleviated through ASMR, yet looking forward to tomorrow's social time.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Valentine's Day, Sun Yuwei made a bold attempt at self-breakthrough—she secretly attended a vocal music trial class without informing her family. Although the process was nerve-wracking and did not cultivate her interest, the significance of the challenge itself outweighed the outcome. Meanwhile, she continued to explore the fun of ASMR and prepared for the creative discussion session scheduled for the following day.

events.name: Vocal Training Class Taken Without Family's Knowledge
events.description: Driven by curiosity to step out of her comfort zone and a desire to explore forms of expression beyond writing, Sun Yuwei quietly searched online and booked a local vocal music trial class in Kunming a few days ago. Before the class, she felt both excited and nervous, picking out comfortable clothes and repeatedly checking the studio’s address. During the session, singing aloud in an unfamiliar environment under the instructor’s guidance posed a significant challenge for someone as introverted as her. Though her palms were sweaty with nervousness and her pitch wavered, she persevered and completed the class. Afterward, she realized she did not have a passion for vocal music, but the "secret mission" itself served as a successful exercise in courage. She decided to keep it from her family for now, tucking this small adventure away in her heart.

events.name: Exploring the Fun of ASMR
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei searched for and tried a role-playing audio titled "Vintage Librarian Organizing Books" on an ASMR platform. The simulated sounds of sorting cards, gentle dusting, and the tapping of an old-fashioned typewriter in the video felt novel and intriguing to her, offering an experience entirely different from sleep-aid content.

events.name: Best friend prepares a small surprise for the gathering.
events.description: Knowing that Sun Yuwei had recently started planning her essay collection and was under considerable pressure, Chen Sisi specifically went to a flower shop after work. She carefully selected and arranged a small bouquet with warm tones as the main theme, containing sunflowers and champagne roses, and wrapped it in kraft paper. She planned to present it to Sun Yuwei at the gathering the next day as a celebration and encouragement for her embarking on this new creative endeavor.

events.name: Organize materials in preparation for a meeting with the supervisor
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei continued her work in the study at home. Based on her intensive reading notes from the previous days, she began systematically constructing a data index for her thesis. She categorized the notes according to the preliminary chapter themes and started organizing an initial list of references, ensuring that the citation formats were standardized. This laid a solid foundation for subsequent discussions with her supervisor on the research proposal and the formal writing process.

events.name: Excited and staying up late after vocal music class
events.description: Due to the novel experience of vocal lessons during the day, I felt excited in the evening and went to bed later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Intertwined with nervousness about unknown challenges and a hint of concealed excitement

结束状态.心情: With a slight sense of exhaustion after completing the challenge, but more so a confirmation of self-breakthrough, the mind is calm, and the excitement gradually fades.

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday was a day filled with emotional support and family warmth. The morning coffee gathering with her close girlfriends recharged her, while the afternoon yoga class helped maintain her exercise routine. In the evening, her sister’s return home brought a strong festive reunion atmosphere. Sun Yuwei drew strength from intimate relationships and used ASMR to clear the cluttered thoughts accumulated during the day.

events.name: A Heartwarming Get-Together with Girlfriends After Valentine's Day
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei, Zhang Jing, and Chen Sisi met as scheduled at that independent café filled with an artistic atmosphere. The three of them ordered drinks and snacks, then sat by the window on a sofa seat to share updates on their recent lives. Zhang Jing talked about amusing anecdotes from her elementary school classroom, while Chen Sisi shared information about a recent contemporary art exhibition in Kunming. Sun Yuwei opened up about her feelings after a family meeting, the progress of her dual-track graduation project, and the confusion she was experiencing. Chen Sisi presented the prepared flowers, and everyone listened, vented, and encouraged one another, creating a warm and relaxed atmosphere. This gathering felt like a precise emotional recharge, giving her the strength to continue moving forward.

events.name: Continuation and Gratitude After the Gathering
events.description: After the afternoon tea, the three of them bid farewell and headed home. Upon returning home, Sun Yuwei placed the flowers in a vase on her desk. She then sent another message in her close friends' WeChat group, expressing her gratitude for everyone's company and Sisi's surprise. She also shared some additional thoughts about her father's diary that she hadn't had time to discuss in detail during the gathering. This online continuation allowed the warmth of the occasion to linger even longer.

events.name: Regular Saturday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended the Saturday yoga class at the Serenity Yoga Life Studio as scheduled. During the session, she focused on asana practice to alleviate recent stress, but felt that her progress in posture had slowed due to the disrupted routine over the Spring Festival holiday. After the class, she briefly discussed a recovery plan with He Lu.

events.name: Sister Sun Yutong returns home for a family reunion.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yutong returned home to Kunming from Shenzhen. The family reunited and had dinner together. At the table, Sun Yutong shared her experiences and challenges in Shenzhen's internet industry over the past year. Her parents inquired with concern about her life, while Sun Yuwei listened quietly, savoring the warmth of the family reunion. Sun Yutong's return brought a different energy and a broader external perspective to the household.

events.name: Clearing Your Mind with ASMR
events.description: In the evening, perhaps due to the overwhelming amount of information from daytime conversations or the excitement of her sister's return, Sun Yuwei felt her thoughts were somewhat jumbled while writing. She deliberately selected an ASMR compilation featuring a variety of delicate trigger sounds, such as the brushing of a comb through hair, gentle tapping on different wooden blocks, and the rustling of crumpled paper. She listened intently for twenty minutes. Those subtle, rhythmic sounds seemed to gradually untangle the knots in her mind, helping her clear away distractions and regain a sense of calm.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to enjoying some relaxing time with my best friend.

结束状态.心情: Warm, relaxed, and full of strength, nourished by friendship and family affection, with a peaceful heart, and the body feeling slightly tired after exercise.

state.今日运动: Participated in a one-hour yoga class

2025-02.daily_overview: On the Sunday of the Spring Festival holiday, the entire day revolved around family reunions and the deep bond between sisters. However, the prolonged task of organizing my father's diary materials over several consecutive days has led to the initial onset of shoulder and neck discomfort.

events.name: Morning New Year Greetings and Family Activities
events.description: In the early morning, the whole family exchanged New Year's greetings according to tradition, with the parents giving red envelopes to Sun Yuwei and her elder sister Sun Yutong. In the morning, the family of four took a walk in the nearby Cuihu Park, enjoying the early spring atmosphere, and on the way, they met their neighbor Auntie Xie, exchanging New Year's greetings. In the afternoon, they rested at home. Sun Yuwei accompanied her mother Li Xiulan in the living room watching TV and tasting the flower cakes she had made herself, while her father Sun Mingyuan brewed tea nearby, enjoying a leisurely holiday family time.

events.name: Continuously organizing the diary materials of my father
events.description: During the afternoon break, Sun Yuwei took some time to continue organizing her father’s educated youth diary materials in preparation for her graduation project. Due to prolonged desk work over several consecutive days, she began to feel slight soreness in the muscles of her right shoulder and neck but did not pay much attention to it.

events.name: Preparing and Enjoying the Reunion Dinner
events.description: In the evening, mother Li Xiulan was busily preparing the New Year's Eve dinner in the kitchen, handling mushrooms and marinating fish. Sun Yuwei helped by picking vegetables and arranging plates nearby, while her elder sister Sun Yutong also joined in to assist. Father Sun Mingyuan took charge of tidying the tea set and preparing his treasured Pu'er tea. The family gathered in the dining room to enjoy a sumptuous New Year's Eve feast, with the table laden with hometown dishes such as mushroom hot pot, steamed fish, cross-bridge rice noodles, and flower cakes. During the meal, everyone reminisced about the highlights of the past year, sharing updates on their lives, studies, and work in a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Staying Up Late on New Year's Eve and Family Communication
events.description: After dinner, Sun Mingyuan brewed some aged Pu'er tea. The family moved to the living room, where they enjoyed the tea while watching the Spring Festival Gala, savoring the traditional New Year's Eve celebration. As midnight approached, the parents gave their two daughters New Year's blessings and red envelopes containing lucky money, expressing their love and hopes for their daughters in the coming year. Sun Yuwei and her elder sister also expressed their gratitude and blessings to their parents.

events.name: Sister's New Year Red Envelope and Encouragement
events.description: During the New Year's Eve vigil, Sun Yutong privately gave her younger sister Sun Yuwei a red envelope containing 2,000 yuan in cash. The elder sister explained that this was not only a traditional blessing but also a concrete gesture of support and encouragement for her younger sister's persistence in pursuing her writing dream. She hoped that her sister could use the money to do something she enjoys or that would benefit her creative endeavors.

events.name: Late Night Sisterly Heart-to-Heart
events.description: In Sun Yuwei's bedroom, the two sisters changed into their pajamas and began a late-night heart-to-heart conversation. Occasional sporadic firecracker sounds could be heard outside the window. Sun Yuwei confided in her elder sister about the subtle pressure she felt from her parents' indirect hints about marriage, her hesitation regarding the career path of a freelance writer, and her anxiety over the slow progress of her graduation project due to the overwhelming amount of materials. Her elder sister, Sun Yutong, with the rational perspective of a product manager, listened patiently and helped her younger sister analyze the pros and cons of various choices, the resources required, and potential risks one by one. She advised Sun Yuwei not to dwell on empty thoughts but to try creating a detailed "One-Year Personal Development Roadmap" to clarify her thinking, breaking down grand goals into actionable steps. The soft lighting in the room filled the space with trust and support.

events.name: Organize Sleep Aid Audio Collection
events.description: After their late-night conversation, Sun Yuwei felt much more settled in her heart despite her tangled thoughts. Recalling the sleep aid methods she had been using recently, she opened her usual audio platform and organized the effective sleep-inducing audio clips she had discovered over the past few days into a collection titled "Sleep Tunes Library." This would make it easier for her to access them quickly in the future, serving as a ready tool to cope with anxiety. The soreness in her shoulders and neck had slightly intensified.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to warmth, feeling happy because my sister is coming home, but experiencing slight discomfort in the shoulders and neck.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and understood, with clear thoughts but a slight sense of fatigue, accompanied by noticeable soreness in the shoulders and neck.

state.今日运动: Took a 40-minute morning walk with family at Cuihu Park.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first Monday after the Spring Festival holiday, which coincided with the school registration day, life gradually transitioned back to the academic routine. Persistent discomfort in the neck and shoulders continued to affect daily activities.

events.name: School Registration and Class Schedule Viewing
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei went to Yunnan University for the new semester registration and reviewed the course schedule for the term. She noticed that the mandatory courses for this semester were concentrated on Monday and Wednesday mornings, which gave her a preliminary idea of how to allocate time for writing and her graduation project. She marked important course dates and assignment deadlines in her planner. The soreness in her shoulders and neck made it uncomfortable for her to carry her backpack.

events.name: Lunch gathering with my close friend Zhang Jing
events.description: At noon, Sun Yuwei met with her close friend Zhang Jing at a literary café they often frequented. Considering her meat-free day plan, she deliberately chose the vegetarian light meal offered there. As they dined, the two shared their experiences during the Spring Festival. Sun Yuwei mentioned her sister's support upon returning home and the discomfort in her shoulders and neck, to which Zhang Jing suggested she apply more heat therapy and get adequate rest.

events.name: Shopping at independent bookstores
events.description: After lunch, Sun Yuwei and Zhang Jing visited an independent bookstore near the café. Sun Yuwei was drawn to a book about sustainable lifestyles and local culture, which reminded her of her graduation project and the theme of her essay collection. She purchased it as supplementary reading material. Due to discomfort in her shoulders and neck, she avoided carrying heavy items.

events.name: Pre-Class Preparation for Vocal Lessons
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei prepared for her evening vocal lesson. She reviewed the notes from the first lesson in advance, practiced basic breathing techniques in front of the mirror, and selected a segment of a modern pop song she liked to try during the class. The soreness in her shoulders and neck affected her ability to relax, so she noted in her journal, "Discomfort in the shoulders and neck may impact the vocal lesson."

events.name: Second Vocal Experience Class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei arrived at the vocal music classroom. Under the teacher's guidance, she continued to study basic vocalization and breath control. When it was her turn to attempt singing the prepared song segment, she initially felt somewhat restrained, with a trembling voice, and the tension in her shoulders and neck exacerbated her discomfort. However, with the teacher's patient encouragement and technical guidance, she gradually relaxed and began to focus on expressing the emotions in the song through her voice. Although she still felt shy in front of the teacher and classmates, she was much more at ease compared to her first lesson.

events.name: After-Class Consultation and Appointment
events.description: After the lesson, Sun Yuwei consulted the teacher about the stability of her vocal projection and the emotional expression in her songs. The teacher first acknowledged her progress and musical sense, then provided targeted suggestions on relaxing her throat and utilizing abdominal support, while also reminding her to relax her shoulders and neck. Sun Yuwei felt she had gained a great deal from the session and scheduled the time for her next lesson.

events.name: Record Course Impressions and Share
events.description: After returning home, Sun Yuwei meticulously recorded her reflections on the lesson, the techniques she had learned, and the teacher’s encouragement in her journal. She reflected on her progression from nervousness to gradually finding her rhythm, considering it a valuable experience of self-challenge. However, the discomfort in her shoulders and neck led her to decide to reduce her desk time the following day. Before going to bed, she shared her experience of attending the vocal lesson and her shoulder and neck issues with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat. Zhang Jing suggested that she try applying a warm compress.

events.name: A hastily written segment from an all-nighter.
events.description: Due to last-minute editorial requests for revisions on a manuscript, Sun Yuwei stayed up until 23:30 to complete the modifications and send them, disrupting her original plan to go to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of adjustment before the start of the school term, accompanied by discomfort in the shoulders and neck.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and somewhat accomplished, with mixed feelings about vocal lessons, and persistent shoulder and neck soreness.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the second day of the new semester, life gradually returned to its normal routine. Sun Yuwei began planning for the future, and due to discomfort in her shoulders and neck, she reduced prolonged sitting and tried using warm compresses for relief.

events.name: Establishing a Fixed ASMR Bedtime Ritual
events.description: After several days of intermittent practice during the Spring Festival holiday, Sun Yuwei decided to re-establish the habit of listening to 15–20 minutes of ASMR audio before bed as a stable nightly ritual. Tonight, as usual, she put on her headphones and immersed herself in the gentle simulated sounds of a bookstore environment. The subtle stress accumulated throughout the day—stemming from the start of the new semester and thoughts about the future—gradually dissipated. This habit had already become her nightly source of comfort.

events.name: Plan the use of New Year red envelopes
events.description: Sun Yuwei recorded the New Year's red envelope money from her sister separately on the financial page of her journal. After carefully reflecting on her sister's encouragement, she planned to use the funds to purchase professional books related to her graduation project, participate in an online writing workshop, or set it aside as seed money for a future graduation cultural trip. This was the first time she had planned the use of an "extra income" in such a specific manner.

events.name: Formulate a Personal Development Roadmap
events.description: Inspired by her sister's suggestion of "creating a roadmap," Sun Yuwei did not start writing immediately in the afternoon. Instead, she took out a new notebook and began drafting the framework for her "Personal Development Roadmap for the First Year After Graduation." She outlined several main sections: academics (graduation project timeline), career (expansion of writing projects, progress on essay collection), personal life (health management, travel plans), and family communication strategies. Due to discomfort in her shoulders and neck, she stood up and moved around every 30 minutes.

events.name: Submit graduation project outline via email
events.description: In the study, Sun Yuwei conducted a final review of the overall framework and detailed outline of her graduation project, which had been revised based on her supervisor’s suggestions and her father’s interview content. She then sent it via email to her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan. In the email, she included a brief explanation and politely requested the professor to review it and provide guidance for the next steps. After sending it, she felt that an important academic task had temporarily come to an end.

events.name: Video call with sister to discuss future plans
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a video call with her sister Sun Yutong, who had already returned to Shenzhen. She showed her sister the preliminary framework of the route map she had conceived and focused on discussing the feasibility of incorporating her dream cultural trip into her pre-graduation goals. Her sister suggested that she could start with budget research and encouraged her by saying, "Breaking down dreams into numbers and steps makes them feel less distant." After the call, Sun Yuwei decided to begin seriously researching travel destinations and budgeting.

events.name: Heat Application for Shoulder and Neck Relief
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei applied a hot towel to her right shoulder and neck, feeling some relief from the soreness. She decided to reduce her desk time and move more the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the determination to implement the plan, experiencing neck and shoulder discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Clear thinking, enhanced sense of purpose, slight execution pressure, slightly improved shoulder and neck condition.

state.今日运动: None, but got up and moved around multiple times.

2025-02.daily_overview: Wednesday Yoga Day: Release stress through regular yoga practice, but shoulder and neck discomfort affects the asanas; adjust the intensity of practice after class.

events.name: Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei came to the Serenity Yoga Life Studio for her regular class. Due to shoulder and neck strain, she experienced pain in certain poses, and the instructor advised her to avoid challenging movements and focus on gentle stretching instead. After making adjustments, she was able to calm her mind more quickly during the meditation session, though the overall practice remained focused on recovery.

events.name: Post-Class Communication with Yoga Partner
events.description: After their yoga class, Sun Yuwei and her friend He Lu, as usual, sat for a while at a nearby café. He Lu ordered the new milk tea, while Sun Yuwei opted for hot fruit tea. The two exchanged their experiences from nearly a month of adhering to health management. He Lu shared more insights on alleviating shoulder and neck strain and encouraged Sun Yuwei to continue with hot compresses and moderate exercise.

events.name: Inspired to Explore Vocal Lessons
events.description: During her conversation with He Lu, Sun Yuwei was inspired by the other's positive attitude toward trying new things, which reminded her of her own habit of "only listening without singing." After returning home, she searched online for short-term vocal courses for adults in Kunming, gaining a preliminary understanding of the course content, schedule, and locations. Upon seeing terms like "small class sizes" and "trial lessons," her inner resistance diminished somewhat.

events.name: Decided to sign up for the vocal music trial class.
events.description: After an internal struggle—torn between the fear of speaking in front of strangers and the desire to step out of her comfort zone—Sun Yuwei ultimately decided to challenge herself. Without informing her family, she quietly enrolled online in a 12-week, once-a-week small vocal training experience course and completed the payment for the first session. Throughout the process, she felt a mix of nervousness and excitement, as if she had secretly done something "unconventional" yet courageous.

events.name: Impromptu Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei's parents invited relatives over for an impromptu dinner gathering at home. She assisted with the preparations and enjoyed a hearty mushroom hot pot, which led to her going to bed later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, looking forward to regular yoga practice, experiencing shoulder and neck discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed, with a subtle thrill from the decision to try something new, and a slight relief in the shoulders and neck.

state.今日运动: 1-hour yoga class (primarily focused on gentle movements)

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first Thursday after the start of the semester, I handled writing tasks, refined my personal plans, experienced persistent neck and shoulder discomfort, and attempted to adjust my daily routine.

events.name: Try ASMR with no human voice, only ambient sounds.
events.description: To achieve a more pure relaxation experience before sleep and avoid the sometimes overly anthropomorphic whispers, Sun Yuwei tried a no-voice café ambient sound ASMR. The faint sounds of a coffee machine, pages turning, and distant murmurs in the background made her feel as if she were in the familiar corner of Mingyuan Bookstore. This sense of immersion delighted her so much that she decided to add it to her regular listening list.

events.name: Reflecting on the Balance Between Social Interaction and Solitude
events.description: During the day, while reading and organizing her journal, Sun Yuwei recalled the night after the Spring Festival when she had a long, late-night conversation with her sister. Due to emotional intensity and lingering thoughts from the discussion, she temporarily "forgot" her ASMR habit. She began to reflect on how to better integrate and transition between the emotional fulfillment brought by deep social interactions and her personal relaxation habits during solitude, rather than treating them as mutually exclusive. She noted this observation in her journal.

events.name: Submit the initial draft of the manuscript
events.description: Sun Yuwei focused her efforts and completed the first drafts of two March column articles for the magazine "Cultural Horizon." One is an essay on the transformation of Kunming's Old Street, while the other incorporates her recent reflections on family history. She sent the manuscripts to editor Xu Mingyuan via email, attaching her creative ideas and a few questions, and awaited the editor's initial feedback. Due to discomfort in her shoulders and neck, she stood up to move around every 45 minutes.

events.name: Research Cultural Travel Budget
events.description: Following her sister's advice, Sun Yuwei began earnestly searching online for domestic cultural travel destinations. She focused on in-depth tours of Dali and Lijiang in Yunnan, and also browsed information about several ancient towns in the Jiangnan region. She meticulously researched estimated costs for airfare, youth hostels or unique homestays, local transportation, and experiential activities (such as handicraft workshops). After a preliminary calculation of the total budget required for a 7–10 day in-depth cultural trip, the figure made her realize the necessity of saving money.

events.name: Early sleep for rest and recuperation
events.description: Due to shoulder and neck strain and fatigue, Sun Yuwei decided to go to bed early tonight, reduce screen time, and listen to ASMR to aid sleep.

起始状态.心情: Focus, preparing to handle work matters, experiencing neck and shoulder discomfort.

结束状态.心情: A sense of satisfaction from making progress, a more concrete understanding of the travel plan, and slight improvement in the shoulder and neck.

state.今日运动: None, but stood up and moved around multiple times.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Friday, Sun Yuwei summarized new habits, devoted herself to planning the essay collection, continued recovering from neck and shoulder strain, and experienced emotional fluctuations due to creative pressure.

events.name: Summary of ASMR Habit Formation
events.description: The approximately two-week ASMR habit formation period has come to an end. Sun Yuwei dedicated a page in her journal to summarize the experience, noting the positive effects of this habit in alleviating evening anxiety and aiding sleep, while also objectively acknowledging its tendency to be easily interrupted during deep social evenings. She plans to incorporate it as one of the optional relaxation tools in the future, rather than a mandatory ritual, allowing for greater flexibility.

events.name: Systematically Organize the Planning of the Prose Collection
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Sun Yuwei devoted considerable time in her study to systematically outline the core themes, potential chapter titles, and planned content summaries for each chapter of the essay collection *Whispers of Cang’er, the Mountains of Our Fathers*. She integrated previous interview records, excerpts from personal diaries, travel notes, and reference books, utilizing mind-mapping software and document tools. This process provided her with unprecedented clarity regarding the overall structure of the work, though prolonged desk work caused her shoulder and neck pain to resurface.

events.name: Remote Communication with Fellow Writers
events.description: While grappling with questions about balancing personal perspective and historical objectivity in nonfiction writing while outlining her essay collection, Sun Yuwei had a lengthy voice call via WeChat with fellow writer Song Wen in Chengdu. She shared her plans, and Song Wen offered encouragement and practical advice based on his own experience, such as "start from a small entry point and let the details carry the weight of broader history." This exchange provided her with support from a peer, though she felt exhausted after the call.

events.name: Emotional Fluctuations and Adjustments
events.description: Due to creative pressure and discomfort in her shoulders and neck, Sun Yuwei felt somewhat down in the evening. She adjusted her mood by listening to music and taking a brief outdoor walk, which made her feel slightly better.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for summarization and deep contemplation, with discomfort in the shoulders and neck.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, with a clearer creative direction and slight emotional fluctuations.

state.今日运动: A brief 15-minute walk in the evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday Flower Arranging Practice Day. Experiencing mild cold symptoms but persisted through the activity. Neck and shoulder strain continues to recover.

events.name: Persisting in flower arrangement practice despite having a cold.
events.description: The afternoon was dedicated to Ikenobo flower arrangement practice. Sun Yuwei felt slightly congested and dizzy but still made her way to the practice room. Considering her condition, the teacher adjusted the lesson content, focusing on gentle exercises that emphasized observing and appreciating the forms of the floral materials. In the quiet atmosphere, Sun Yuwei trimmed the flower stems and found her mind growing calmer. The discomfort from her cold eased slightly, and her shoulders and neck relaxed through the activity.

events.name: The yoga class focuses on recovery.
events.description: In the evening yoga class, Sun Yuwei explained her physical condition to the instructor. The session focused on very gentle stretching, restorative poses, and deep meditation, aiming for relaxation rather than exercise. After the class, her yoga partner He Lu reminded her to drink plenty of water and rest early, and also shared some dietary remedies to help alleviate cold symptoms.

events.name: Confirm Vocal Lesson Registration
events.description: Feeling a bit more energetic, Sun Yuwei contacted the teacher of the vocal music trial class she had previously browsed via WeChat to reconfirm the course details, schedule, and location. She then completed the online registration form and paid the first installment of the course fee via mobile payment. After finishing all of this, she looked at the confirmation email, feeling both somewhat nervous and a little excited about taking this step.

events.name: Early to bed for rest and recuperation
events.description: To recover as soon as possible, Sun Yuwei did not schedule any mentally demanding activities for the evening. She washed up early, listened to some soothing ambient music for a while, and then went to bed ahead of time.

events.name: Temporarily Missed Meatless Day
events.description: Due to a loss of appetite from a cold, I had a simple dinner of noodles and did not strictly adhere to the meatless day, but overall, the diet was light.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat lethargic due to physical discomfort, with neck and shoulder pain.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, the body needs rest, and the shoulder and neck have slightly improved.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Sunday, the cold symptoms had largely subsided. I completed my flower arrangement practice and refined the travel itinerary. The strain in my shoulders and neck continued to improve.

events.name: The last flower arrangement practice of this month.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei conducted her final Ikenobo flower arrangement practice for February. Integrating the techniques she had learned in previous sessions, she attempted to complete a relatively comprehensive work imbued with the essence of early spring, focusing particularly on spatial composition and the use of negative space. Upon completion, she felt satisfied with her concentration and grasp of form. She carefully organized the remaining floral materials and tools, and shared a photo of her creation with fellow flower arrangement enthusiast Su Man and her university roommate Zhao Xiaowen, both of whom provided positive feedback.

events.name: Refine Travel Budget and Destination
events.description: After the practice session, Sun Yuwei continued with the travel planning she had started the previous week. She created a simple budget spreadsheet on her computer, comparing estimated costs for flights (or high-speed rail), accommodation (hostels/homestays), daily meals, local transportation, and activity experiences across different destinations such as Dali and Lijiang. This allowed her to arrive at a more precise budget range. She realized she was more inclined to visit Dali for an in-depth, slow-paced journey centered around Cangshan Mountain, Erhai Lake, ancient towns, and local culture.

events.name: Formulate a Savings Plan
events.description: Based on the results of the budget research, Sun Yuwei set a specific savings target amount. She assessed the stability of her monthly income from writing (approximately 6,000–7,000 yuan) and decided to deposit 800 yuan each month as a "Travel Fund." She calculated that if she starts now until graduation in June, she can accumulate a substantial amount of startup capital. This idea made her feel that her "dream is one step closer to reality."

events.name: Outdoor walking for relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei took a 30-minute walk alone in the park near her home, breathing fresh air and observing nature. She felt that the strain in her shoulders and neck had largely recovered, leaving her in a pleasant mood.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed after physical recovery, looking forward to weekend activities, with improved shoulder and neck condition.

结束状态.心情: Feeling content, reassured about travel plans and savings arrangements, with minimal discomfort in the shoulders and neck.

state.今日运动: Flower arrangement practice for approximately 1.5 hours, outdoor walk for 30 minutes.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the Monday of the second week of the new semester, classes and personal affairs intertwined. I completed the vocal experience class, strictly adhered to the meatless day, and my shoulder and neck strain has recovered.

events.name: Third Vocal Experience Class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended her third vocal music trial class. With the course content becoming more advanced, she further practiced her singing techniques and attempted a simple two-part harmony for the first time with another equally shy participant. She felt herself gradually adapting to the classroom atmosphere, no longer as nervous as she had been initially, with no discomfort in her shoulders or neck. However, she did not develop a strong passion for vocal music itself or a desire to delve deeper into it, viewing it more as a "task-oriented" challenge.

events.name: Post-Class Self-Assessment and Sharing
events.description: On her way home after the class, Sun Yuwei shared her feelings about the vocal lesson with her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat. She admitted that she seemed to have only "adapted to" rather than "fallen in love with" singing, but completing the three sessions itself brought a peculiar sense of accomplishment. Zhang Jing replied that trying and figuring out whether one likes something is valuable in itself.

events.name: Execute the last meatless day of this month.
events.description: Today is Monday, which is also Sun Yuwei's designated weekly meatless day. For dinner, she tried a new vegetarian recipe and made a pasta with black truffle flavor (using a vegetarian sauce), which turned out to be surprisingly delicious.

events.name: Summary of Meat-Free February Practice
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei systematically summarized her experiences from the four meat-free days practiced throughout February in her journal. She documented the new recipes she tried, her physical sensations (such as feeling lighter in the digestive system), the challenges encountered (like making choices during social dining out), and her new reflections on sustainable living. She found that this habit had become easy to maintain and decided to solidify it as a long-term weekly routine.

events.name: Staying up temporarily to handle academic tasks
events.description: Due to a course assignment deadline tomorrow, Sun Yuwei stayed up until 23:45 to complete it, disrupting her plan to go to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Calmly welcome the new week, with shoulder and neck recovery.

结束状态.心情: Serene, I have gained a clearer understanding of vocal lessons and feel satisfied with maintaining healthy habits.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Tuesday, made the decision for vocal lessons, initiated a travel savings plan, experienced a shift in financial management awareness, and achieved full recovery of the shoulders and neck.

events.name: Decided not to renew vocal lessons.
events.description: After three trial lessons, Sun Yuwei calmly assessed her interest and energy. She confirmed that she did not have a lasting passion for vocal music, and her current focus should be on her graduation project and writing. Consequently, she decided not to enroll in the subsequent formal courses. However, she believed that the attempt itself was valuable—a successful exploration of her own boundaries, which enhanced her courage to face unfamiliar fields and the gaze of others.

events.name: Launch the "Cang Er Travel" Savings Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei opened her mobile banking app and located the fixed deposit by installment function. She created a new savings plan, naming it 'Cang Er Journey,' and set it to automatically deduct 800 yuan from her linked account on the 25th of each month, with the deposit period tentatively set for one year. After completing the setup, she looked at the newly created plan on the screen and felt a sense of grounded assurance that her goal was now taking shape—her dream was no longer floating in the air but was beginning to be nurtured by a fixed monthly action.

events.name: First Savings Confirmation Received
events.description: Shortly after setting up the savings plan, Sun Yuwei received a text message notification from the bank confirming that the first 800 yuan had been successfully transferred from her current account to the "Cang'er Travel" special account. She checked her account balance and the plan details to ensure everything was running smoothly. This small increase in numbers brought an inexplicable sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Register for the Online Vegetarian Cooking Workshop
events.description: While browsing an online learning platform, Sun Yuwei discovered a four-week online workshop titled "Mindful Eating and Basic Vegetarian Cooking." The course description, which covered dietary philosophy, the connection between food and emotions, and the healing power of simple cooking, deeply resonated with her. She felt it aligned closely with her health goals and spiritual pursuits. Consequently, she promptly completed the online registration and payment, adding a new element to her health management plan for the following month.

events.name: Brainstorming March Column Topics
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei was in her home study browsing the internet, researching information on old streets in Kunming, the evolution of local dialects, and traditional crafts on the verge of disappearing. She also flipped through her personal journal for inspiration. She tentatively decided on the theme for her March column: focusing on the "subtle, vanishing voices and traces" amid urban renewal.

events.name: Returning late from a gathering with friends.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei was invited to a small gathering with her college roommates Zhao Xiaowen and Chen Sisi. They chatted late into the night, and she did not fall asleep until 23:50 after returning home.

起始状态.心情: Clear, prepared to handle multiple decisions and plans, shoulder and neck recovery

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction derived from being action-oriented, coupled with anticipation for future savings plans.

2025-02.daily_overview: Wednesday Yoga Day, incorporating monthly reflections, receiving a book club invitation, maintaining a healthy balance of life, creativity, and social engagement.

events.name: Received an invitation to the Lantern Festival Reading Club.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received a WeChat invitation from Mr. Qin, the owner of Mingyuan Bookstore, inviting her to attend a Lantern Festival-themed book club at the bookstore on Friday evening (the 28th) and asking if she would be willing to share a book she had recently read related to "reunion," "memory," or "tradition." Sun Yuwei gladly agreed and immediately thought of a historical essay collection she had just finished, which deals with family memories and fits the theme perfectly.

events.name: The last yoga class of this month
events.description: The afternoon yoga class was the last one in February. During the practice, Sun Yuwei reflected on her progress over the month, feeling improvements in her core strength, posture, and the sense of calmness both before and after class. Her shoulder and neck strain had fully recovered. After the class, she and He Lu briefly planned the schedule for the next month, agreeing to continue practicing together.

events.name: Organize Notes for the Book Club
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei retrieved that collection of historical essays and her reading notes from the study at home. She revisited the key chapters and, drawing on insights from her research into her family history, began to outline the main points she could share at the book club, striving to integrate her personal reflections with the content of the book.

events.name: Sharing Savings Plans with Close Friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei chatted with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat and casually mentioned her "Cang'er Journey" travel savings plan. Zhang Jing was delighted that she had taken concrete steps toward her dream. The two briefly discussed some independent bookstores and niche attractions worth visiting in Dali, and they agreed to travel together for part of the journey if the opportunity arises in the future.

events.name: Temporary dietary adjustment
events.description: As the family had prepared a lavish dinner, Sun Yuwei did not strictly adhere to a light diet but controlled her portion sizes.

起始状态.心情: Stable, looking forward to regular yoga practice, shoulder and neck recovery

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, with a slight anticipation for the weekend book club.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Thursday, I efficiently completed the first draft of the column, visually recorded the savings plan, experienced no discomfort in the shoulders and neck, and maintained a regular routine.

events.name: Complete the first draft of the March column.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei concentrated in her home study and completed the first draft of her March column article, "Echoes of the Alleys: Recording the Vanishing 'Whispers' of a City," based on the theme established in previous days and the materials she had gathered. This is an essay-style observation that attempts to capture the sounds, scents, and neighborhood relationships on the verge of being erased during the renovation of Kunming's old streets.

events.name: Submit the initial draft of the column via email.
events.description: After carefully reviewing and revising the draft, Sun Yuwei sent it via email to editor Xu Mingyuan, attaching her creative ideas and several questions regarding the article's angle of approach, while awaiting the editor's initial feedback.

events.name: Bullet Journal Entry for the "Cang'er Travel" Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei took out her personal journal and dedicated two pages specifically for recording the 'Cang Er Travel' plan. She pasted a printed screenshot of the successful setup of her mobile banking savings plan, decorated the pages with tape and stickers, and wrote down travel inspirations, a preliminary destination list, and must-do activities. She also drew a simple savings progress bar. Through this visual and ritualistic approach, she deeply embedded this financial goal into her daily life.

events.name: Short outdoor walk
events.description: In the evening, to relax her body and eyes from prolonged sitting, Sun Yuwei took a half-hour walk alone through the quiet old neighborhood near her home. She intentionally observed the street scenes and passersby, listened to the sounds of the city, and sought more authentic sensory details for her column.

events.name: Preparing for an Early Bedtime
events.description: To conserve energy for tomorrow's book club, Sun Yuwei went to bed early tonight, listening to ASMR to aid sleep.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare for writing.
