2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of February, I wrapped up work, attended the Lantern Festival reading session, fully recovered from neck and shoulder strain, maintained a regular routine, and brought a warm conclusion to the month.

events.name: Submit the revised column draft
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received feedback from editor Xu Mingyuan via email regarding the first draft submitted the previous day, which included suggestions for minor structural adjustments and additional details. She spent an hour revising and refining the draft before formally submitting the final version to *Cultural Horizon* magazine and sending a confirmation email to the editor. After completing this month's writing assignment, she briefly noted her reflections on this creative process in her journal.

events.name: Organize the February Flower Arrangement Records
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei sorted through all the photos and journal entries from her four Ikenobo flower arrangement practice sessions in February in her study. She reviewed her learning journey and progress throughout the month, summarizing her insights into flower material handling, color coordination, and form comprehension. Looking at the gradually refined works in the photos, she felt a quiet sense of satisfaction and began mentally planning the focus of her practice for March.

events.name: Finalize the Planning of the Essay Collection
events.description: After repeated deliberation and discussions with peers, Sun Yuwei finalized the detailed chapter outline and overall stylistic approach for the essay collection *Whispers of Cang’er, Mountains of Our Fathers*—centering on personal narrative while integrating local historical records and family archives—and established a preliminary, flexible timeline for the upcoming first-draft writing phase.

events.name: Participate in the Mingyuan Bookstore Lantern Festival Reading Event
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended the Lantern Festival-themed book club at Mingyuan Bookstore. The bookstore was decorated with lanterns and streamers, filled with a festive atmosphere. She shared her insights from reading that collection of historical essays and, drawing on her own research, discussed her reflections on "how family memories become folds in history." Her speech was sincere and moving. Afterwards, she listened to other book club members share their thoughts on festivals, hometowns, and personal growth. Owner Qin prepared sweet-scented osmanthus glutinous rice balls for everyone, and the group engaged in pleasant conversation amid the aroma of books and sweetness.

events.name: Afterthoughts Following a Book Club Meeting
events.description: After the book club ended, Sun Yuwei exchanged a few more words with familiar participants such as Mr. Qin and Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast, before reluctantly leaving. On her way home, the gentle spring night breeze brushed against her face. She reflected on the various stories and viewpoints she had just heard, feeling a sense of richness and tranquility within. It was a high-quality cultural and social experience.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to complete the month-end closing tasks.

结束状态.心情: Enriching and heartwarming, imbued with the joy and fulfillment that comes from cultural exchange.

2025-03.daily_overview: On a weekend morning, Sun Yuwei awoke in the quiet atmosphere of her home, still lingering in the afterglow of the previous day's book club. She spent the morning organizing her thoughts and engaging in personal exploration, while the afternoon was dedicated to preparing for the upcoming online course. At night, a bout of unexpected insomnia prompted her to engage in deep reflection on her recent lifestyle habits.

events.name: Organizing Book Club Insights and Inspiration Records
events.description: In the early morning, Sun Yuwei sat at her sunlit desk, opened her journal, and carefully recorded the insightful viewpoints she had heard at the Yuanxiao Reading Salon held at Mingyuan Bookstore the previous day, the new book recommendations that had inspired her, and the fleeting ideas for articles that had crossed her mind at the time. She deliberately decorated the page with colorful tapes and stickers, giving tangible form to the sparks of thought within her journal.

events.name: Preliminary Exploration of Father's Old Belongings Box
events.description: In the afternoon, with the permission of her father, Sun Mingyuan, Sun Yuwei opened the long-sealed old leather suitcase in the family study. Inside, diaries, meeting notes, and some yellowed work documents from his early years at the Cultural Bureau were neatly arranged. With curiosity and reverence, she carefully sorted them roughly by year and recorded her first impressions in her inspiration notebook: the handwriting was neat, the entries mostly documented daily trivialities, but occasionally interspersed with brief reflections on the changing times. This opened the first door for her subsequent research.

events.name: Preparing and Procuring for Online Courses
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received the course notification and the first-week materials package for the Mindfulness Eating and Basic Vegetarian Cooking Workshop. She carefully reviewed the course syllabus and ingredient list, developing a strong interest in the concept of "mindful eating." Subsequently, she used her regular fresh produce app to place an order for the required seasonal vegetables, chickpeas, and basic seasonings for the course. She also checked whether her kitchen utensils at home were complete, feeling eager anticipation for the course starting the following week.

events.name: Reflect on and Discontinue the ASMR Sleep Aid Habit
events.description: Late at night, Sun Yuwei put on her headphones as usual, preparing to listen to ASMR audio to help her fall asleep. However, the deliberately crafted whispers and chewing sounds in the audio today sounded particularly abrupt and contrived. Instead of relaxing her, they added a touch of irritation. She removed her headphones, realizing that she might have been mechanically repeating a habit that was "supposed to be effective" rather than truly finding peace from it. She decided that starting tonight, she would stop using such audio and instead seek more natural ways to unwind.

events.name: Attend Saturday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the Serenity Yoga Lifestyle Studio to attend the weekly group class on Saturdays. As her shoulder and neck strain had recovered, she focused on gentle stretching, feeling the relaxation of her body during the exercise. After the class, she briefly exchanged recent health insights with her partner He Lu.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of fulfillment from yesterday's book club and a faint anticipation for the new week.

结束状态.心情: Slightly puzzled and reflective, questioning sleep habits, yet with a subtle sense of relief in the heart at the decision to make a change.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Sunday, Sun Yuwei immersed herself in a deep reading of her father's diary, striving to comprehend the youth of her father's generation through the lines. Simultaneously, she methodically handled her writing assignments and took a significant step in her academic pursuits, laying the preliminary framework for her collection of essays. It was a day dedicated to focused introspection and creative planning.

events.name: Read deeply into father's early diaries
events.description: Throughout the entire morning, Sun Yuwei immersed herself in her father's diaries from the 1980s and 1990s. She focused on the sections from the early days of his work at the Cultural Bureau, using highlighters of different colors and sticky notes to mark passages about daily work procedures, interactions with colleagues, and simple observations on the cultural policies of the time. She discovered that her father's youthful writing was more nuanced than she had imagined, and though his feelings about certain social changes were not explicitly stated, they were subtly conveyed between the lines.

events.name: Receive and process editorial feedback on manuscripts
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei received an email reply from editor Xu Mingyuan regarding the March column manuscript. Sitting at her desk, she read through the structural optimization and detail supplementation suggestions proposed by Editor Xu word by word, finding these comments very pertinent. She immediately opened the document and began the first round of revisions based on the feedback, primarily adjusting the logical sequence of several paragraphs and adding a detailed description about the scents of the old streets in Kunming.

events.name: Outline the overall framework for the initial draft of the essay collection
events.description: During a break in revising the manuscript, Sun Yuwei’s thoughts drifted toward her more ambitious project—the collection of essays. She opened a new document and, drawing on her previous discussions with her mentor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, as well as insights gained from reading her father’s diary that day, began outlining the book’s structure. She tentatively proposed several core chapter themes, such as “Silent Archives: The Daily Work of a Father’s Generation,” “The Four Seasons of Spring City and Family Memories,” and “From Green Lake to Dian Lake: A Personal Map of a City,” and wrote a core summary for each theme.

events.name: Online discussion with fellow writer Song Wen about writing challenges
events.description: During the evening break, Sun Yuwei exchanged a few words on WeChat with Song Wen, a fellow writer based in Chengdu. She shared the "sweet burden" of simultaneously handling column articles and the outline for a collection of essays. Song Wen also shared his own experience in multitasking, and the two encouraged each other.

events.name: Impromptu Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, the parents invited several old friends for a small gathering at home. Sun Yuwei assisted her mother in preparing dinner, enjoying a rich mushroom hotpot and flower cakes. The social atmosphere was warm but slightly tiring.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to engage in deep reading and writing.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, yet feeling somewhat fatigued after social interactions, with a sense of having made clear progress in both research and creative endeavors.

2025-03.daily_overview: With the official start of the spring semester at Yunnan University, Sun Yuwei's daily routine suddenly accelerated. In the morning, she returned to campus for classes, and in the afternoon, she mustered the courage to attend a vocal music trial class she had long been curious about, embracing a brand-new challenge. The first day of the semester marked the resumption of her dual role as both a "student and writer," a mode characterized by both routine and challenges.

events.name: Courses on the First Day of the Spring Semester
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei went to Yunnan University to attend her first classes of the new semester. As a junior student majoring in Chinese Language and Literature, she has enrolled in specialized courses such as "Studies in Contemporary Prose" and "Introduction to Folklore" this term. Sitting in the familiar classroom, she needs to readjust her daily routine and balance her time between attending classes, self-study, and her personal writing projects.

events.name: First Vocal Training Experience Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived at the vocal experience class, held in a quiet studio located in the city center, as per her appointment. Including her, there were only five or six people in the classroom. When the teacher led everyone through basic vocalization and breathing exercises, the introverted Sun Yuwei felt an unprecedented level of nervousness and shyness, her voice so faint it was almost inaudible. The teacher noticed her unease and gently encouraged her to relax, focusing on her breath rather than the volume. By the end of the class, though she had not fully opened up, she experienced a different sensation of breathing from her abdomen.

events.name: Organizing Class Notes and Vocal Lesson Reflections
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei first organized her notes from the day's professional courses. Then, in the "New Attempts" section of her journal, she recorded the awkwardness of her first vocal lesson and a small new discovery with a slightly self-deprecating yet earnest tone: "It seems the voice doesn't come from the throat but from the belly? A fascinating experience, though I was so embarrassed I wanted to crawl into a hole."

events.name: Try reading before bed as an alternative to ASMR.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei did not turn on any audio but instead picked up a collection of Shen Congwen's prose essays and read for about twenty minutes. After closing the book, drowsiness naturally set in, and she felt much calmer than she had in the previous days when she had forced herself to listen to ASMR.

events.name: Mild insomnia due to academic pressure at the start of the school term.
events.description: Late at night, Sun Yuwei tossed and turned due to anxiety over her new semester schedule and difficulty adapting to vocal lessons, falling asleep later than planned, which affected her sleep quality.

起始状态.心情: I feel a bit nervous about the new semester, yet also filled with unknown curiosity about the vocal music class.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, having undergone the dual baptism of the new semester and fresh challenges, there is a sense of relaxation from completing tasks within, but tinged with the irritation of slight sleep deprivation.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the second day of the school term, Sun Yuwei settled into a more structured routine of study and research. She moved between classrooms and the library, on one hand delving into historical contexts to better understand her father’s diary, while on the other hand efficiently completing the writing tasks for this month’s column, demonstrating exceptional multitasking abilities.

events.name: Researching Historical Background Information for Father's Diary
events.description: After the morning classes ended, Sun Yuwei stayed in the school library to search academic databases for materials related to the era of her father's diary. She looked up local cultural policies, news reports, and sociological studies from the late 1980s to early 1990s in Yunnan, attempting to contextualize events mentioned in the diary, such as "cultural performances" and "field research trips to rural areas." Her goal was to create a dialogue between the private record and public history.

events.name: Complete and submit the final draft of the March column
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei was at home, putting the final touches on the revised March column manuscript. She read it aloud sentence by sentence, checking for fluency, correcting a few slightly awkward phrases, and once again verifying all factual details. After confirming everything was correct, she solemnly sent the final version via email to editor Xu Mingyuan, attaching a brief note of thanks. Completing this monthly routine task brought her a sense of relief.

events.name: Online discussion with university roommates about group assignments
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei held a brief meeting with her roommates Liu Jia, Zhao Xiaowen, and Zhou Lin in their four-person group chat to discuss the division of tasks for a group assignment in the new semester. As an INFP, she did not particularly enjoy taking the initiative to organize things but was more than willing to take on the responsibilities of collecting materials and polishing the text.

events.name: Staying up late to organize research materials
events.description: In order to catch up with the schedule, Sun Yuwei continued organizing research notes from her father's diary after submitting the manuscript, working until late at night, which delayed her sleep time.

起始状态.心情: Calm, having adapted to the rhythm of the new semester, ready to advance all matters according to plan.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and satisfied, having completed an important writing task with progress in research, yet feeling slightly fatigued.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday evening was filled with warm exchanges and the opening of new knowledge. Sun Yuwei engaged in a precious informal interview with her father, listening to the vivid stories behind the diary. Subsequently, she eagerly attended the opening ceremony of the mindful eating workshop and practiced "mindful vegetable chopping" for the first time. Before bed, she also shared recent troubles with her close friend, gaining emotional support.

events.name: Informal Interview with Father
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei did not return to her study immediately. Instead, she brewed a pot of Pu'er tea and sat in the living room with her father, Sun Mingyuan. She took out her diary and pointed to several entries she did not fully understand, such as a certain "important meeting" or the name of a colleague, asking her father to recall the details from that time. Gradually, her father opened up, sharing many anecdotes and reflections that were not recorded in the diary. Sun Yuwei secretly recorded the conversation on her phone, feeling that her father's image became more vivid and three-dimensional through his storytelling.

events.name: Attending the Opening Ceremony and First Session of the Mindful Eating Workshop
events.description: At eight o'clock in the evening, Sun Yuwei logged into the online meeting on time. The workshop instructor elaborated on the core of mindful eating—not about restriction, but about experiencing the process of food, cooking, and eating with awareness. The instructor then demonstrated how to handle vegetables safely and attentively. After the session, Sun Yuwei followed the guidance in her kitchen and tried "mindful vegetable cutting" for the first time. She slowed down her movements, feeling the cool skin of the cucumber, the plump juiciness of the tomato, and the subtle sensation of the knife blade slicing through the ingredients. This simple process unexpectedly brought her a sense of calm.

events.name: Discussing Sleep Issues with Close Friend Zhang Jing
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei chatted with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat, mentioning that she was searching for new sleep aids after giving up ASMR. Zhang Jing recommended several episodes of gentle cultural podcasts and a pure music playlist, comforting her by saying, "Just let it be." The resonance from her friend made Sun Yuwei feel that her inner conflict was understood.

events.name: Implement a Travel Savings Plan
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei checked her mobile banking app and noticed that the 3,000-yuan payment for her article in *Cultural Horizon* had been deposited. She skillfully opened the app, transferred 40% (1,200 yuan) into the savings account she had set up for her graduation trip, and took a screenshot as a record. Seeing the accumulated amount grow once again, she felt a more tangible sense of anticipation for her upcoming trip to Dali.

events.name: Attend Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended the group class at the Mindful Yoga Life Studio as usual, focusing on relieving back-to-school stress. After the class, she discussed her experience with mindful eating with He Lu.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation encompasses both curiosity about the evening interview and course, as well as a subtle sense of ceremony from completing the savings plan.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, I have gained family memories, new life philosophies, and the care of friends, leaving my heart enriched.

2025-03.daily_overview: It was an efficient and fruitful day. Sun Yuwei's mind was actively engaged across multiple dimensions, including historical research, literary creation, and financial planning. She integrated the research insights gathered over the past few days to distill the core themes for her essay collection. Simultaneously, she conducted on-site investigations and collected materials for a new column article. Even the trivial financial matters were handled in an orderly manner, with a clear sense of purpose.

events.name: Integrate research materials and refine the theme of the essay collection
events.description: With no classes in the morning, Sun Yuwei sorted through her recent findings in her home study. She spread out excerpts from her father’s diary, transcribed texts from interview recordings, and historical materials she had consulted, then sketched a large mind map in her notebook. Several core themes gradually emerged: "Youth and Idealism Within the System," "How Silent Paternal Love Is Expressed," and "A Family’s Micro-History Through a City’s Transformation." For each theme, she jotted down several possible angles and story fragments.

events.name: Conduct field research and investigation for the new column 'Spring in Kunming'
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went out with a canvas bag on her back. She first went to the library of Yunnan University to consult books and papers related to Kunming's flower culture and urban history, taking extensive notes. Afterwards, she walked to Cuihu Park, not merely passing by in haste, but deliberately observing the early spring willow buds, the elderly basking in the sun, and the children at play. Using the memo app on her phone, she recorded the colors she saw, the sounds she heard, and the scents she smelled, accumulating sensory 'urban textures' for her article.

events.name: Verify the manuscript fee and update the savings progress
events.description: After returning home in the evening, she checked the text message confirming the arrival of her manuscript fee once again. After completing the transfer, she opened the "Dream Savings" page of her journal, filled in another section of the progress bar, and wrote beside it: "4,800 yuan achieved! One step closer to Cangshan Mountain and Erhai Lake. Thank you for sticking with writing."

events.name: Prepare briefly for tomorrow's lessons.
events.description: In the evening, she previewed the chapter on 'Introduction to Folklore' for the next day and organized the notes from today's fieldwork, preliminarily integrating academic theory with on-site observations.

events.name: Temporary physical discomfort, resting early.
events.description: Due to extensive walking during the day, Sun Yuwei experienced a mild headache and decided to rest early, suspending some of her plans.

起始状态.心情: With an active mind, ready to integrate and elevate the complex research materials.

结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement is notable, while clarity has been achieved in creative endeavors, and financial goals are steadily advancing. Everything feels under control, with only slight physical discomfort.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, Sun Yuwei spent her day balancing academic guidance and preparations for friendship. She sought advice from her mentor regarding the challenges in her creative work and received valuable insights. Meanwhile, she joyfully prepared for a Women's Day gathering with her close friend the following day, selecting a gift that would convey her heartfelt sentiments. Work and life, rationality and emotion, found a harmonious balance on this day.

events.name: Seeking advice from mentor Wu Mingyuan on creative transformation issues.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei brought her notebook and preliminary thematic ideas to Professor Wu Mingyuan's office. She candidly expressed her core dilemma: how to transform her father's private diary, a form of "historical material," into a literary work that could resonate with ordinary readers? Professor Wu praised her unique topic and advised her to "not be confined by the historical material, but to find the intersection between personal emotion and public history, using details and scenes to make history breathe." He also recommended several excellent non-fiction works as references.

events.name: Selecting Gifts for a Women's Day Gathering with Close Friends
events.description: After the consultation ended, Sun Yuwei did not go directly home. Instead, she went to a cultural and creative shop near the school that she often visited. She chose a simple and elegant bullet journal for Zhang Jing, and a handcrafted ceramic brooch for Chen Sisi. The gifts were not expensive, but each suited her best friends' tastes. Afterward, she reserved a quiet window seat in advance via WeChat at the independent café they often frequented.

events.name: Organize the study to create a writing atmosphere
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei spent some time tidying up her slightly messy desk. She jotted down the book titles recommended by Professor Wu on sticky notes and placed them beside her computer, then wrapped the gift for her close friend. A clean and organized environment made her feel more able to focus.

events.name: Stayed up late due to excitement from the gathering.
events.description: Thinking about tomorrow's gathering, Sun Yuwei was in high spirits. Before going to bed, she had a video chat with her sister to share recent updates, which caused her to fall asleep later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous but full of anticipation, ready to present my ideas to my respected mentor.

结束状态.心情: Suddenly enlightened and delighted, I received professional guidance and prepared for tomorrow's gathering, though feeling slightly excited.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the Saturday of Women's Day, Sun Yuwei spent a profound and heartwarming afternoon with her close friends. After sharing an important family decision, she received steadfast support, and their friendship deepened. Upon returning from the gathering, she further refined her creative plans and ultimately bid farewell to old habits that were no longer suitable, resolving to embrace a more authentic and natural way of life.

events.name: Refine the Outline for the Essay Collection and Establish a Material Repository
events.description: In the morning, incorporating Professor Wu's suggestions, Sun Yuwei further refined the outline of the essay collection on her computer, finalized the first three chapters to begin writing, and created separate folders for each chapter. She organized the previously scattered diary excerpts, interview transcripts, and historical reference images by dragging them into their corresponding folders, establishing a preliminary digital resource library. This process made the creative path feel much clearer.

events.name: Celebrating Women's Day with Best Friends and Sharing Family Updates
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei gathered with Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi at an independent café filled with the aroma of coffee. After exchanging gifts, their conversation naturally deepened from catching up on recent events. Sun Yuwei hesitated for a moment before softly sharing the news that her parents had decided not to have a second child. As soon as she finished speaking, Zhang Jing took her hand, while Chen Sisi conveyed her support with a gentle yet firm gaze. Instead of probing further, they shared stories from their own families about choices, responsibilities, and love. This conversation made Sun Yuwei feel that, after sharing this secret, the last trace of invisible pressure in her heart had dissipated, replaced by the warmth of being fully accepted by her close friends.

events.name: Formally decided to cease ASMR and seek new approaches.
events.description: In the quiet of the night, reflecting on the day, especially the deep conversation with her close friend in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei felt even more certain about her feelings. She wrote in her journal: 'The contrived nature of ASMR runs counter to the authentic experience I seek. Stopping is not a failure, but the beginning of a deeper understanding of my own needs. Starting tomorrow, I will try a combination of reading, meditation, and fixed light music.'

events.name: Attend Saturday yoga class
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei attended her yoga class as usual, focusing on relaxation and posture improvement. After the class, she briefly discussed the gathering plans with He Lu.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed, looking forward to the afternoon gathering, and satisfied with the well-organized creative plan.

结束状态.心情: Emotionally, there is a profound sense of fulfillment and warmth, accompanied by a deepening of trust. Simultaneously, there is an inner firmness, signifying the completion of a farewell to old habits. However, social gatherings and dining have led to a slight increase in weight.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for introspection and planning. Sun Yuwei sorted through the emotional fluctuations brought by the gathering, transforming them into precious memories in her journal. She systematically planned a new bedtime routine and weekend exercise habits, extending the concept of health from diet to daily routines and physical fitness. This demonstrates a more proactive and comprehensive approach to self-management.

events.name: Organize reflections on the gathering and strengthen friendships
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei printed out the photos taken during yesterday's gathering and pasted them onto a new page of her journal. Next to them, she wrote down snippets of the conversation and her own reflections: "The feeling of being deeply understood and supported is like spring sunlight shining into my heart. Jing and Sisi are my eternal anchors." After writing, she sent messages of gratitude to Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi on WeChat, and the group chat among the three of them was once again filled with warm and heartfelt interactions.

events.name: Develop and trial a new pre-sleep relaxation routine.
events.description: After the lunch break, Sun Yuwei meticulously planned a new bedtime ritual: 1. 30 minutes of reading physical books (away from electronic screens); 2. 10 minutes of mindfulness meditation or diaphragmatic breathing; 3. Playing a fixed playlist of soothing piano music to aid sleep. That evening, she followed this routine for the first time. She became deeply engrossed while reading, experienced slight distraction during meditation but persisted, and fell asleep faster than in previous days with the help of the music. In her journal, she simply marked a check and noted, "Initial trial successful."

events.name: Plan the Weekend Brisk Walking Habit at Cuihu Park
events.description: In the evening, reflecting on her "aspired yet unattainable" state of outdoor activity and her goal to improve her posture, Sun Yuwei decided to make a change. She checked the weather forecast app on her phone and selected the mornings of the next three Sundays (the 16th, 23rd, and 30th) as her fixed brisk walking times. She planned a route on the map that would take about 40 minutes around Cuihu Lake and decided to stop by the Zhuanxin Farmers' Market after her walk to purchase fresh ingredients, combining health, inspiration, and daily shopping. This plan filled her with positive anticipation for the upcoming weekends.

events.name: Temporary Cancellation of Meatless Day
events.description: Due to leftover food after the gathering, Sun Yuwei temporarily adjusted her diet plan, consuming the family leftovers and focusing on moderation rather than strictly adhering to her usual habits.

起始状态.心情: Calm and still immersed in the lingering warmth of yesterday's friendship, with an open mindset.

结束状态.心情: Calm and hopeful, I feel that I am methodically building a healthier and more autonomous life order, with a slight decrease in body weight.

2025-03.daily_overview: In the new week, Sun Yuwei received crucial positive feedback and new opportunities across multiple areas. Her mentor gave high praise to her research proposal and established a regular guidance mechanism; she enrolled in a floral arrangement workshop that interested her; her new bedtime routine began to show initial results; and she gained creative inspiration from fellow enthusiasts. On this day, both her professional pursuits and personal interests were nurtured.

events.name: Report the research plan to supervisor Wu Mingyuan and receive affirmation.
events.description: In the afternoon, in Professor Wu Mingyuan's office, Sun Yuwei provided a detailed report on her research and essay collection project centered around her father's diary. Professor Wu was highly appreciative after listening, describing it as a topic with "significant humanistic warmth and academic potential." He not only offered specific suggestions on how to balance historical objectivity with literary appeal but also proactively proposed meeting with her every two weeks to follow up on her progress. This was a tremendous encouragement for Sun Yuwei.

events.name: Visit Mingyuan Bookstore to purchase books and gain inspiration
events.description: After leaving school, Sun Yuwei went straight to Mingyuan Bookstore. She explained her ongoing writing project to the owner, Qin Mingyuan, and asked for book recommendations on personal history writing. Mr. Qin precisely selected two collections of non-fiction essays by renowned authors and a writing guide from the shelves to recommend to her. While checking out, the two briefly exchanged a few words on "how to write the history of ordinary people," and Mr. Qin's insights offered her a fresh perspective.

events.name: Sign Up for the Traditional Flower Arranging Experience Workshop
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received a link recommended by her close friend Chen Sisi—the Kunming Botanical Garden would be hosting a traditional Chinese flower arrangement workshop. Having long studied the Ikenobo school of Japanese ikebana, she was curious about the aesthetic concepts of Chinese flower arrangement. She immediately clicked the link to browse the details, completed the registration and payment online, and looked forward to her aesthetic exploration over the weekend.

events.name: New Bedtime Routine Shows Initial Results
events.description: Before going to bed, she once again followed the routine of reading + meditation + music. During meditation, there were still some distracting thoughts, but overall, she felt much calmer inside compared to when listening to ASMR. She briefly noted in her journal: 'Sleep quality was acceptable, with no waking up during the night. Inner peace has improved.'

events.name: A small gathering and exchange with Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei arranged to meet Su Man at their usual café. She showed Su Man the information about the botanical garden workshop stored on her phone, and the two excitedly discussed the similarities and differences between Chinese and Japanese flower arrangement. Sun Yuwei also shared her recent experience of starting mindful eating. Su Man, drawing from her sensitivity as a florist to color and form, talked about the aesthetics of food plating, giving Sun Yuwei the inspiration that "eating can also be as refined as flower arrangement, emphasizing artistic conception."

起始状态.心情: Feeling motivated and ready to embrace the challenges and opportunities of the new week.

结束状态.心情: Feeling inspired and excited, I have gained authoritative recognition, new learning opportunities, and the spark of inspiration from friends, which has boosted my confidence.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Sun Yuwei spent her day in reflection and integration. She refined her research framework in a quiet corner of a bookstore, organized the inspirations gathered from her fieldwork at home, engaged in in-depth discussions on aesthetic reflections with like-minded peers, and once again visited the verdant Cuihu Lake in spring, immersing herself in the city's atmosphere with both body and mind. This was a crucial day for transforming external inputs into internal creative nourishment.

events.name: Refining the Research Framework at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: After the morning class, Sun Yuwei took her laptop to Mingyuan Bookstore and settled into a quiet seat by the window. Reflecting on Professor Wu’s suggestions from the previous day and the books recommended by Manager Qin, she began revising and refining her research framework and creative outline. She clarified the emotional threads to be emphasized in her subsequent writing and identified the pitfalls of excessive academic jargon to avoid.

events.name: Organize the Materials and Inspiration from the Cuihu Lake Field Trip
events.description: Upon returning home in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei imported the text and photos she had recorded with her phone a few days earlier at Cuihu Park into her computer. She then began systematically organizing them by cross-referencing the hastily jotted keywords from her notebook at the time. From these fragmented observations, she attempted to outline the logical structure of her article "Spring in Kunming": starting from natural scenery (willows, flowers, lake reflections) to human activities (elderly people, children, tourists), and finally to the connections these evoked between personal and urban memories.

events.name: Discussing Flowers and Urban Culture with Su Man
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei and Su Man met as scheduled at the café. This time, their conversation delved deeper, moving from specific flower arrangement techniques to how flowers shape the character of a city (such as Kunming’s image as the "City of Flowers"), and then to how a bouquet carries emotions and memories in personal life. As a botanical garden staff member, Su Man provided insights into the cultural symbolism of local flowers, which could serve as highlights in Sun Yuwei’s article.

events.name: Second Stroll by Cuihu Lake to Experience Spring
events.description: After parting ways with Su Man, as it was still early, Sun Yuwei did not head home immediately. Instead, she detoured once more to Cuihu Park. This time, she walked even more slowly, deliberately trying to detect any floral fragrance in the air, listening to conversations in different dialects, and observing the shifting colors of the sunset on the lake's surface. Using her phone's recording function, she captured the gentle sound of the lake water lapping against the shore, intending to use it as background audio while writing.

events.name: Start a cross-day writing project
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei initiated a new writing project, planning to complete a short essay on urban memory within three days, with a focus on incorporating recent observations into the creative process.

起始状态.心情: Calm and poised, ready for in-depth processing of recent thoughts and materials.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and fulfilled, I feel inspiration continuously emerging through organization and communication, with an enhanced sense of connection to the city.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Sun Yuwei was fully immersed in the theme of "Flowers and Food." In the morning, she attended an online class to learn how to make healthy plant-based sauces. In the afternoon, she embarked on an intensive field study of spring flowers, experiencing the pulse of Kunming as the "City of Flowers" from the serene beauty of the botanical garden to the bustling atmosphere of the Dounan Flower Market. This provided her with a wealth of vivid firsthand material for her creative work.

events.name: Attend the second session of the mindful eating workshop: Making hummus
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei attended the second week of the online workshop. This week's theme was making healthy plant-based sauces. Following the live stream, she placed cooked chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and other ingredients into a food processor and personally prepared a bowl of smooth hummus. Before tasting it, she followed the instructor's guidance, closed her eyes for a brief gratitude meditation, and then enjoyed it with carrot and cucumber sticks. Simple food, infused with focus, tasted exceptionally pure.

events.name: Visit Kunming Botanical Garden to observe native flowers
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei traveled by car to the Kunming Botanical Garden. Carrying a camera and a notebook, she wandered through the garden, focusing on observing and photographing native flowers in full spring bloom, such as camellias, azaleas, and magnolias. She not only recorded the forms and colors of the flowers but also paid attention to how they were arranged alongside garden elements like pavilions and ponds. She contemplated how this "artificial nature" reflects Chinese aesthetic sensibilities, jotting down metaphors and associations as they came to mind.

events.name: Visiting Dounan Flower Market to Experience the Vitality of the Flower Trade
events.description: After leaving the botanical garden, Sun Yuwei made her way to Dounan Flower Market, Asia's largest fresh-cut flower trading hub. Evening was the peak trading time, with crowds surging, floral scents mingling in the air, and the constant sounds of vendors hawking their goods and buyers haggling over prices. In stark contrast to the tranquility of the botanical garden, this place was brimming with raw vitality. She moved through the sea of flowers, using her camera to capture the busy figures of flower merchants, piles of roses, and the satisfied smiles on buyers' faces. She also attempted brief conversations with a few approachable vendors to learn about the origins and destinations of these flowers.

events.name: Attend Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended a yoga class, focusing on alleviating the fatigue from the day's explorations. After the class, she shared her experiences from the flower market with He Lu.

起始状态.心情: Curious and focused, ready to learn new recipes and embark on a sensory-rich outdoor exploration.

结束状态.心情: The senses returned fully laden, slightly fatigued yet intensely exhilarated, the mind brimming with colors, fragrances, and vivid imagery, a strong creative urge surging within, though outdoor activities have led to a slight weight gain.

state.今日运动: Long walking exploration in botanical gardens and flower markets (approximately 2.5 hours), 1 hour of yoga.

2025-03.daily_overview: Thursday's theme was "Preparation" and "Creation." Sun Yuwei prepared knowledge for tomorrow's Chinese flower arrangement experience, completed the first draft of her column article in a familiar corner of the bookstore, and unearthed precious family floral memories from her mother. Efficient and focused writing condensed the days of field research and reflection into a cohesive piece.

events.name: Preparing for a Traditional Flower Arrangement Workshop
events.description: With no classes in the morning, Sun Yuwei browsed online for introductory articles on traditional Chinese flower arrangement (literati flower arrangement and Zen-style flower arrangement). She learned about its core concepts, such as "following the laws of nature" and "emphasizing artistic conception over form," which differ from the Japanese Ikenobo school. She noted the key points in her journal and prepared the notebook and drawing pens she would need for the next day, feeling eager anticipation for this new aesthetic experience.

events.name: Completed the first draft of the column article at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei returned to Mingyuan Bookstore once again. Amidst the quiet ambiance and the faint scent of books, she skillfully wove together her recent observations from Cuihu Lake, the botanical garden, and the flower market, the family stories recounted by her mother, and the relevant literature she had consulted. With her fingers dancing across the keyboard, the first draft of a column article titled "Spring in Kunming: The Fragrance of Flowers Heralds the Warmth of Day" gradually took shape.

events.name: Inquire with Mother about Family Floral Memories
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei deliberately brewed her mother's favorite rose tea, and they chatted while drinking in the living room. She asked her mother, "Mom, do you remember what flowers we used to buy at home in Kunming during spring when I was little? Or were there any flower-related customs at Grandma's house?" Her mother, Li Xiulan, recalled many details: the camellias planted in her grandfather's yard, the wild flowers arranged in canned jars during the earlier years when resources were scarce, and the gladioli sent by relatives and friends when Sun Yuwei was born... These vivid family narratives infused the article with a more intimate and touching emotional layer.

events.name: Read through and make preliminary revisions to the initial draft of the article.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei read through the draft she had written in the afternoon, rearranged the order of several paragraphs, polished some descriptive sentences, and ensured that the article flowed smoothly and aligned with the literary tone of the magazine Cultural Horizon.

events.name: Continue the cross-day writing project
events.description: She took time to advance the writing of her urban memory essays, focusing on emotional expression, with good progress.

起始状态.心情: With a clear objective, ready to transform accumulated materials into written text.

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat accomplished, having completed significant writing output, and also having gained warmth and nourishment from family interactions, with weight slightly decreasing due to dietary adjustments.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, Sun Yuwei immersed herself in the practice and appreciation of Eastern aesthetics. At a workshop in the botanical garden, she personally created a Chinese-style floral arrangement, experiencing the philosophy of "following the way of nature," which differs from the Ikenobo school. This experience not only enriched her aesthetic sensibility but also opened new perspectives for her future creative work. Art and friendship converged on this day.

events.name: Participate in a Traditional Chinese Flower Arrangement Experience Workshop
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived punctually at the activity room in the Kunming Botanical Garden. The workshop instructor first explained the characteristics of Chinese-style flower arrangement, which emphasizes natural lines, artistic conception, and close integration with the seasons and vessels, and compared it with the Japanese Ikenobō school she was familiar with. During the practical session, Sun Yuwei received a sturdy plum branch, several camellia flowers, and some holly. Under the instructor’s guidance, she set aside the rigid fixing techniques of the Ikenobō school and attempted to more freely express the beauty of the plum branch’s slanting form. When she completed her arrangement and placed the vase by the window, sunlight filtered through the flowers and branches, casting dappled shadows. At that moment, a sense of tranquil joy, akin to a dialogue with nature, welled up in her heart.

events.name: Record and share floral arrangement experiences with friends
events.description: After the workshop concluded, Sun Yuwei took photos of her Chinese-style floral arrangement from various angles. She promptly sent the photos and her reflections to recommender Chen Sisi and fellow enthusiast Su Man, sincerely thanking Sisi for the recommendation. She then engaged in a lively online discussion with Su Man about the similarities and differences between Chinese and Japanese floral art in expressing a "sense of the seasons."

events.name: Submit the first draft of the column article to the editor
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei conducted a final review of the article she had revised the previous day. After confirming its accuracy, she emailed the draft of her painstakingly crafted piece, "Kunming in Spring: The Scent of Flowers Heralds the Warmth of Day," to editor Xu Mingyuan. In the body of the email, she briefly outlined her creative approach and the theme of city and memory she hoped to explore.

events.name: Complete Cross-Day Writing Projects
events.description: She has completed the first draft of her urban memory essay, feeling another breakthrough in her creative work, and plans to revise it over the weekend.

起始状态.心情: Eager and slightly excited, ready to embrace a brand-new aesthetic baptism.

结束状态.心情: Tranquil and joyful, filled with a sense of fulfillment after artistic practice, with a deeper appreciation for the aesthetics of different cultures, and maintaining a stable weight.

2025-03.daily_overview: The first half of March concluded on a culturally rich Saturday brimming with new opportunities. Sun Yuwei internalized the new aesthetic experience as personal reflection, learned about a valuable volunteer project from her father, and deeply felt the tranquility brought by returning to her genuine pre-sleep routine. She began sowing new seeds for the latter half of the month and beyond.

events.name: Deepening the Understanding of Chinese Flower Arrangement in a Journal
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei opened the "Aesthetic Exploration" column of her journal and meticulously recorded yesterday's experience with Chinese-style flower arrangement. She not only attached photos of the workshop and her work but also wrote down her comparative reflections: "The Ikenobo school is an exquisite 'art of subtraction,' executed with precision; Chinese-style flower arrangement is more like a 'dance' with natural materials, prioritizing spirit and essence over formal resemblance. 'Following the way of nature' might also be an attitude worth drawing upon in life and writing."

events.name: Learned about the oral history volunteer project from my father.
events.description: During a casual conversation after lunch, her father Sun Mingyuan mentioned that a unit under the Cultural Bureau where he used to work was recently recruiting volunteers for a project aimed at documenting and preserving the oral history of Kunming’s old streets and alleys. Believing that Sun Yuwei’s writing skills and interest in local culture made her a suitable candidate, her father elaborated on the project’s background. Upon hearing this, Sun Yuwei was deeply intrigued. She felt that participating would not only allow her to gain a deeper understanding of Kunming but also provide valuable firsthand material for her writing. She immediately expressed her desire to sign up.

events.name: Enjoy the natural drowsiness brought by reading.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei continued her new routine. As she immersed herself in Wang Zengqi’s essays and wandered through the words, drowsiness naturally set in. Compared to the anxiety of "waiting to relax" when she previously relied on ASMR, she now preferred the feeling of being drawn in by the content, followed by the natural relaxation of both body and mind. This further convinced her that she favored genuine, unforced experiences.

events.name: Learn about the upcoming reading sharing session at Mingyuan Bookstore.
events.description: In the afternoon, while browsing WeChat, Sun Yuwei saw a local culture public account she followed had posted an event announcement for Mingyuan Bookstore: a reading and sharing session on "Local Narratives and Personal Memory" would be held on the evening of March 21. The theme closely aligned with her recent research, so she immediately added the event to her phone calendar and decided to attend.

events.name: Plan the first brisk walk at Cuihu Lake tomorrow.
events.description: Thinking that tomorrow would be the first planned Sunday for brisk walking, Sun Yuwei checked the weather forecast (sunny), set the alarm for 8 a.m., and placed her sports shoes and lightweight jacket by the bedside, making active preparations to cultivate this new habit.

events.name: Attend Saturday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended a yoga class, focusing on maintaining flexibility and relieving stress. After the class, she discussed her new experiences in vocal lessons and mindful eating with He Lu.

起始状态.心情: Relax, weekend mornings are always delightful, allowing thoughts to wander freely.

结束状态.心情: With a fulfilled heart and a clear direction, there is both a consolidation of recent gains and a subtle anticipation for the upcoming new endeavors (brisk walking, volunteer projects, book clubs), perfectly aligning with the conclusion of a healthy state.

2025-03.daily_overview: A planned Sunday. Sun Yuwei attempted to kickstart a new outdoor exercise routine by going for her first brisk walk at Cuihu Park. Afterward, she purchased fresh ingredients for the upcoming vegetarian week, marking the beginning of a healthy and fulfilling lifestyle for March.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walking at Cuihu Park
events.description: On a clear and breezy Sunday morning, Sun Yuwei arrived at Cuihu Park at 8 a.m., following the "mind-body management" goal she had set the previous week. She embarked on a brisk walk along the lakeside trail for about 40 minutes. The early spring crabapple blossoms were just beginning to bud, and morning exercisers were scattered here and there. As an INFP personality type who typically lacks regular physical activity, the brisk walk made her feel gently awakened, as if the accumulated fatigue from the week was gradually released with each breath and step. Focusing on the rhythm of her footsteps and breathing, she regarded this attempt as her first practical breakthrough in addressing the contradiction between her "yearning for nature but failing to act on it."

events.name: Zuanxin Farmers' Market Procurement
events.description: After the brisk walk, Sun Yuwei felt refreshed both physically and mentally. Following her plan, she walked to the nearby Zhuanxin Farmers’ Market. Influenced by her recent mindful eating course, she had a clear goal for this shopping trip: to stock up on ingredients for her upcoming week-long ‘Weekday Vegetarian’ plan. She carefully selected fresh pea shoots, zucchini, tomatoes, along with some dried mushrooms and local tofu, already envisioning how to turn them into delicious vegetarian dishes.

events.name: Organizing Journals and Planning
events.description: Upon returning home in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei sorted the purchased ingredients into their respective categories. She then sat at her desk and opened her journal. On the opening page of the "Mind-Body Awareness" section, she solemnly recorded her experience of her first brisk walk around Cuihu Lake that day: the morning air, the slight physical fatigue, and the subsequent sense of relaxation. Next, based on the ingredients she had bought, she sketched out a simple vegetarian menu for the next three days. She also pasted the market receipt and a dried flower into her journal as decoration.

events.name: Evening Reading and Rest
events.description: After dinner (a simple bowl of vegetable noodle soup), Sun Yuwei attended to some scattered writing tasks. Before bed, following her new nighttime ritual, she picked up Shen Congwen’s *Random Notes on a Trip to Hunan* and read for about half an hour. Unlike her previous reliance on ASMR, the tranquility brought by reading felt more genuine and satisfying to her. She briefly noted in her journal, "Reading aids sleep, mind at peace," before drifting off with a slight sense of contentment.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the plans of the new day.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and serene, with a sense of accomplishment for having adhered to the plan.

2025-03.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Sun Yuwei’s life returned to the dual tracks of being a student and a writer. She handled administrative tasks such as volunteer registration and manuscript revisions, while continuing to solidify her new bedtime routine, maintaining a tight yet orderly pace of life.

events.name: Online Volunteer Registration
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei carefully completed the online volunteer application form for the Oral History Recording Project of Kunming's Old Streets and Alleys, using the contact information provided by her father, Sun Mingyuan. In her personal statement, she particularly highlighted her experience as a freelance writer and her interest in local culture, expressing her hope to contribute her writing skills to the documentation work. Following this, she had a brief online conversation with the project coordinator to confirm her participation in both phases of the activity—field visits and archival organization. She felt a sense of anticipation for this upcoming social practice.

events.name: Handling Manuscript Feedback
events.description: Before her lunch break, Sun Yuwei received a detailed feedback email from her editor, Xu Mingyuan. The email acknowledged the strengths of her column article "Spring City Alleys" and provided several professional suggestions for improving the article's structure and enhancing its resonance with readers. After carefully reviewing the feedback, she found the suggestions thoughtful and decided to allocate time in the afternoon to start making revisions.

events.name: University Courses and Self-Study
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended classes at Yunnan University. Two sessions on contemporary literary trends immersed her deeply. After class, she did not return home immediately but went to the library instead. Taking advantage of the quiet environment, she began preliminary reflections on the feedback received for her morning manuscript and noted several directions for revision in her notebook.

events.name: Strengthen the bedtime routine
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei first completed the preliminary revision of her manuscript. To reinforce her new bedtime ritual, she deliberately tidied up her nightstand, placing several favorite collections of essays and a poetry anthology within easy reach. She also deleted most of the ASMR apps on her phone, retaining only a pure natural white noise application. She hoped that by creating such an environment, reading would become a fixed part of her pre-sleep routine.

events.name: Reading and Recording Before Sleep
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei practiced reading for the second consecutive night. She selected a passage from Mu Xin's "Memoirs of Literature" and read for about half an hour, after which drowsiness naturally set in. Closing the book, she briefly recorded her reflections in her journal: "Words calm me more than sounds. Mu Xin's wit brings a knowing smile, and as my thoughts drift away, sleepiness naturally follows." She also compared this experience with her previous feelings while listening to ASMR, further confirming the deeper sense of satisfaction that reading brings.

events.name: Design the 'Mind-Body Awareness' Section of the Planner
events.description: Before recording her pre-sleep reflections, Sun Yuwei meticulously designed and established a formal "Mind-Body Awareness" section in her journal. She structured the format to include date, weather, sleep quality, morning energy levels, physical sensations, emotional fluctuations, dietary records, and exercise status. She believes that systematic documentation can better assist her in observing the changes brought about by her habits.

起始状态.心情: Stay alert and be prepared to handle various tasks on Monday.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a clear mind, having completed multiple planned tasks.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from school and for on-campus activities

2025-03.daily_overview: Tuesday was interwoven with deep work and intimate social interactions. Sun Yuwei engaged in profound professional exchanges with her editor, gaining valuable career guidance. Simultaneously, she proactively shared life updates with her close friend and roommate, maintaining an essential emotional support network.

events.name: Deep Revision of Manuscript
events.description: With no classes in the morning, Sun Yuwei focused on revising her column article for Cultural Vision in her home study. She carefully studied each suggestion from editor Xu Mingyuan, adjusted the article’s structure, and enhanced the logical flow of the narrative as well as the emotional resonance. The revision process deepened her understanding of how to balance personal expression with reader engagement.

events.name: Voice communication with editor Xu Mingyuan
events.description: In the afternoon, after Sun Yuwei sent back the revised draft, editor Xu Mingyuan proactively invited her for a WeChat voice call. The call lasted nearly an hour, covering topics far beyond the manuscript itself. Editor Xu not only provided more professional feedback on the details of the article but also shared his observations on local cultural writing, encouraging Sun Yuwei to integrate personal narratives with social observations more deeply. This exchange greatly inspired Sun Yuwei, making her feel that her professional relationship had taken a step forward.

events.name: Temporary Pressure Relief
events.description: In the evening, feeling somewhat stressed from revising the manuscript, Sun Yuwei couldn't resist buying a cup of brown sugar pearl milk tea when she passed by a bubble tea shop. She realized this was a slight deviation from her healthy diet, but she recorded this "noise event" in her journal and reflected on how to manage stress more effectively.

events.name: Share with my best friend Zhang Jing
events.description: In the evening, while chatting with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat, Sun Yuwei proactively shared her insights on resuming her bedtime reading ritual. She described the "sense of authenticity" and "naturalness" brought by reading, to which Zhang Jing expressed understanding and shared her own habit of listening to audiobooks before sleep. The two engaged in a lighthearted discussion about different methods of mental relaxation, leaving Sun Yuwei feeling heard and understood.

events.name: Planning a dinner gathering with roommates
events.description: With graduation approaching, Sun Yuwei contacted her university roommates Zhao Xiaowen and Zhou Lin, who were also in Kunming, via WeChat group chat, suggesting they meet up soon. After discussing, the three of them finally decided to gather on the evening of March 20th (Thursday) at "Hongdou Yuan," a Yunnan cuisine restaurant on Wenlin Street they used to frequent.

events.name: Inviting Mother to Go to the Market Together
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei suggested to her mother Li Xiulan that they visit the Zhuanxin Farmers' Market together the following afternoon. She shared her recent insights from a mindful eating class and her newfound interest in local ingredients, inviting her mother to guide her in selecting authentic mushrooms and wild vegetables. Her mother gladly agreed, and they settled on a specific time.

events.name: Record Mind-Body Awareness
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Sun Yuwei carefully recorded in the "Mind-Body Awareness" section of her journal: her sleep quality from the previous night (relatively good), her energy level upon waking (moderate), and whether there was slight stiffness in her shoulders and neck. She also briefly described how the sunny weather that day lifted her spirits.

events.name: Reserve time for book club
events.description: While reviewing the weekly schedule in her planner, Sun Yuwei noticed that Mingyuan Bookstore was hosting a reading and sharing session on Kunming folk customs this Friday evening. After confirming she had no other plans for Friday night, she marked it in her planner and decided to attend.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, prepared for today's deep work.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and inspired, the interactions with both the editor and family have brought positive energy, though the milk tea incident has caused a slight sense of guilt.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday's theme is the integration of learning, family affection, and daily life. Sun Yuwei honed her skills in a vegetarian cooking class, while her afternoon visit to the Zhuanxin Market with her mother seamlessly blended the practice of healthy eating into warm family interactions.

events.name: Mindful Eating Cooking Class (Week 3)
events.description: The theme of the morning online class was 'Asian Flavored Vegetarian Cuisine,' with a focus on Thai vegan curry. Sun Yuwei followed the instructor's steps to learn how to build rich yet mild layers of flavor using coconut milk, lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves. Throughout the cooking process, she deliberately slowed down her pace, focusing on the complex aromas released by the spices in the hot oil and the gradual thickening of the broth. She regarded cooking entirely as a creative mindfulness healing experience.

events.name: Visiting Zhuanxin Market with My Mother
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei and her mother Li Xiulan went to the Zhuanxin Farmers' Market together. Her mother became an enthusiastic guide, introducing to her daughter in detail the selection techniques, storage methods, and classic cooking approaches for various seasonal mushrooms (such as *Jian Shou Qing* and porcini) and wild vegetables (such as broom flower and stink vine). Sun Yuwei listened attentively and shared the concepts she had learned in her mindful eating class, such as "gratitude for ingredients" and "eating slowly and chewing thoroughly." The atmosphere was warm and harmonious.

events.name: Procurement of fresh ingredients
events.description: Following her mother's advice, Sun Yuwei carefully selected and purchased fresh pea shoots, a small basket of fresh porcini mushrooms, firm tofu, and several seasonal vegetables. Her mother occasionally added selection tips, such as how to determine the freshness of mushrooms and which type of tofu is more suitable for stewing, ensuring her daughter obtained ingredients of the best quality.

events.name: Mother and daughter collaborate to prepare a vegetarian dinner.
events.description: Upon returning home, Sun Yuwei and her mother busied themselves together in the kitchen. Her mother guided her daughter on how to safely clean and handle porcini mushrooms and demonstrated the proper timing for stir-frying pea shoots. Sun Yuwei, meanwhile, applied her newly learned skills to prepare a vegetarian version of mapo tofu. As they cooked, the two exchanged culinary insights, filling the kitchen with laughter and the aroma of food.

events.name: Shared Family Dinner
events.description: Sun Yuwei, her mother Li Xiulan, and her father Sun Mingyuan, who had just returned home from work, enjoyed this thoughtful vegetarian dinner together. At the table, Sun Yuwei shared her experiences from the market trip and her new understanding of diet. Her mother expressed her delight in seeing her daughter’s dedication to life, while her father praised the deliciousness of the dishes. The family engaged in a pleasant conversation.

events.name: Bullet Journal Records Heartwarming Moments
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei helped her mother clear the dishes and then returned to her room. She opened her journal, where she not only recorded the Thai curry recipe she had learned that day but also used delicate text and stickers to document the heartwarming experience of exploring the market with her mother, the knowledge about ingredients she had gained, and her personal reflections: "Food is not just about health; it is also a bond that connects emotions."

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, as there is a favorite class in the morning and a special arrangement with my mother in the afternoon.

结束状态.心情: Warm and content, family interactions bring a profound sense of happiness.

2025-03.daily_overview: By day, she is a focused academic planner, and by night, a relaxed social participant. Sun Yuwei spent her daytime at school organizing ideas for her graduation project and essay collection, while in the evening, she shared a precious pre-graduation dinner with her roommates. Over delicious food and heartfelt conversations, they exchanged their hopes and uncertainties about the future.

events.name: Library Writing Plan
events.description: With no classes in the morning, Sun Yuwei went to the library of Yunnan University. She found a quiet seat by the window, spread out her notebook and materials, and began drafting a detailed writing plan. Her goal was to integrate the themes of the first chapter of her graduation thesis with the introductory chapter of her essay collection. She decided to weave together the descriptions of western Yunnan from her father’s diary and her own personal travel experiences in Dali as the main narrative threads. She also compiled a list of reference materials to consult, including local chronicles, early travelogues, and other relevant documents.

events.name: Curriculum and Bodily Awareness
events.description: After two consecutive classes of literary theory in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei felt some stiffness in her shoulders and neck from prolonged sitting. During the break, she quietly opened her notebook and recorded in the "Mind-Body Awareness" section: "Tension in the shoulders, neck, and upper back after maintaining a fixed sitting posture for an extended period." She tried to recall which listening posture was most likely to cause discomfort, reminding herself to pay attention to adjusting it in the future.

events.name: Lunch Experience and Documentation
events.description: During lunch, Sun Yuwei tried a newly opened cross-bridge rice noodle restaurant near the school. When writing in her journal that evening, she specifically recorded her physical sensations after the meal: a moderate sense of fullness, good digestion, and no greasy or heavy feeling. She compared this with her dining experiences in the cafeteria over the past few days and found that light, broth-based foods seemed to make her body feel more comfortable.

events.name: Preparations Before Roommates' Dinner Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei returned home to freshen up a bit. She changed into a comfortable knit sweater, organized her handbag, and brought along her notebook and pen, planning to perhaps jot down interesting conversations during the dinner. She left a little early, taking the bus to the agreed-upon restaurant.

events.name: Pre-graduation roommate dinner gathering
events.description: Sun Yuwei, Zhao Xiaowen, and Zhou Lin met up at "Hongdou Garden." They ordered their familiar dishes: douhua mixian (bean curd rice noodles), laonai yangyu (mashed potatoes with pickles), and several side dishes. During the meal, the three engaged in an in-depth discussion about the progress of their respective graduation projects and their future career plans (Zhao Xiaowen intends to stay at Kunming Publishing House, while Zhou Lin is determined to join an internet company in Shenzhen). They also shared experiences and challenges from their internships and freelance writing work. The atmosphere was warm and supportive, with everyone cherishing such candid conversations before graduation.

events.name: Farewell and Reflection After the Gathering
events.description: After dinner, the three of them took a short walk along Wenlin Street, continuing to discuss future possibilities before parting ways at the subway station entrance. Upon returning home, Sun Yuwei recorded the insights and inspirations from the evening's conversation in her journal and sent WeChat messages to Zhao Xiaowen and Zhou Lin to inform them of her safe return and express her gratitude.

起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to immerse in the intense writing planning.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet in a pleasant mood, friendship and heartfelt conversations have dispelled the academic pressure, though the gathering may lead to a slight weight gain.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Fridays, she shuttles between the dusty archives of historical documents and the vibrant scenes of contemporary culture. During the day, Sun Yuwei immerses herself in the library, seeking contextual support for her creative work, while in the evenings, she loses herself in the book-sharing sessions at independent bookstores, drawing inspiration and receiving encouragement from her predecessors.

events.name: Searching historical materials in the library
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei returned to the library of Yunnan University, this time heading straight to the history and geography section. She consulted academic monographs, local chronicles, and travelogues from the Republican era concerning the western Yunnan region, particularly the areas of Dali and Lijiang. She focused on recording key historical events, unique geographical features, and significant cultural customs to build a solid foundation of historical and cultural context for her collection of essays.

events.name: Discussing Revision Insights with the Mentor
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei scheduled a brief meeting with her advisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan. She reported to Professor Wu on the recent revisions to her column articles and relayed some professional suggestions from editor Xu Mingyuan. Professor Wu affirmed the value of these suggestions and encouraged her to incorporate these industry perspectives into her academic thinking as well. Sun Yuwei recorded these valuable recommendations on the "Career Development" page of her notebook.

events.name: Optimize Your Bedtime Ritual Combination
events.description: After persisting with pure reading for several days, Sun Yuwei made a slight adjustment tonight: she set the pure rain white noise saved on her phone to a low volume as background sound while reading an essay on Japanese wabi-sabi aesthetics, "Tsurezuregusa." She found that this combination could create a gentle, enveloping sense of tranquility without distracting her from the text like complex ASMR, feeling that her bedtime ritual had been further optimized.

events.name: Go to Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei set out from home and took a bus to Mingyuan Bookstore on Wenlin Street. She preferred to arrive before the event began, as it allowed her some quiet time to browse the newly arrived literary books in the bookstore. Occasionally, she would also run into the owner, Qin Mingyuan, and exchange a few words with him.

events.name: Attend the "Kunming Memory" Book Sharing Session
events.description: At 7 p.m., the book-sharing session began on time. Hosted by bookstore owner Qin Mingyuan, it featured a local writer and a folklorist who shared their insights respectively. Sun Yuwei sat on a floor cushion in the corner, listening quietly and occasionally jotting down key points in her notebook. The folklorist's vivid account of field research in Kunming's old streets and alleys particularly resonated with her, as it reminded her of the oral history project she was about to participate in, offering her many methodological inspirations.

events.name: Post-Meeting Exchange and Inspiration
events.description: After the sharing session concluded, Sun Yuwei mustered the courage to approach the stage and engaged in a brief conversation with the local writer. She briefly mentioned the theme of her ongoing essay collection, which blends family memories with local history. The writer offered encouragement and advised her to "walk more, observe more, and listen more, letting the details speak for themselves." Subsequently, she bid farewell to Manager Qin and walked home in the pleasant spring night, her mind brimming with new sparks of inspiration.

起始状态.心情: Filled with intellectual curiosity, ready for a day of data collection and learning.

结束状态.心情: Inspired and invigorated, the threads of culture and history become clearer in the mind.
