2025-03.daily_overview: A family day with a turning point. During the day, Sun Yuwei immersed herself in her father's historical diaries to trace the creative threads, while in the evening, an honest family conversation completely dispelled the long-standing invisible pressure that had lingered in her heart, ushering family relations into a brand-new stage.

events.name: Studying Father's Diary Manuscript
events.description: On Saturday daytime, Sun Yuwei spent a quiet time in her home study. She carefully perused the handwritten diaries of her father, Sun Mingyuan, from his early years working at the Cultural Bureau, which documented his cultural investigations in western Yunnan. The faded handwriting recorded detailed observations of local customs and traditions, personal reflections, and some work-related anecdotes. As she read, she took notes, attempting to find the intersections and differences between the perspectives of her father's generation and the travel experiences of her own generation, aiming to infuse her essay collection with a deeper sense of temporal layers.

events.name: Family Collaboration in Preparing Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei and her mother Li Xiulan were preparing dinner together in the kitchen. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, had also returned home early for a change and was helping with the ingredients nearby. The family chatted while cooking, with the mother sharing amusing stories from school and the father occasionally chiming in with comments on current affairs, creating a relaxed and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Shared Weekend Dinner
events.description: A family of three enjoyed a lavish dinner prepared by the mother at the restaurant (several dishes featured mushrooms from the previous grocery shopping). The conversation flowed naturally during the meal, with each sharing their experiences from the past week. Sun Yuwei also talked about her takeaways from the book club and the progress of her essay collection.

events.name: Important Family Conversations
events.description: After dinner, the family moved to the living room for tea. Father Sun Mingyuan set down his teacup and calmly yet solemnly announced that, after in-depth discussions with their mother and comprehensive consideration (including factors such as age, physical condition, and future plans), they had decided not to pursue the plan of having a second child. He patted his daughter Sun Yuwei on the shoulder beside him and said in a gentle yet firm tone, "Having an outstanding daughter like you is more than enough for us. You should not feel any burden and should bravely pursue what you want to do."

events.name: Mother's Supplement and Support
events.description: Mother Li Xiulan nodded beside her, her eyes filled with affection, and added, "Weiwei, Mom and Dad are proud of you. Our little family is complete. From now on, it will be just the three of us, supporting each other and living happily and meaningfully together." These words completely dispelled the last trace of doubt in Sun Yuwei's heart.

events.name: Emotional Release and In-depth Communication
events.description: Upon hearing her parents' candid and loving words, the invisible pressure that had long weighed on Sun Yuwei's heart due to her perception of their expectations regarding childbirth instantly dissipated, and her eyes grew warm with emotion. She nodded vigorously, momentarily unable to speak. Subsequently, the family engaged in a deeper conversation, sharing their respective hopes for the family and the future, making the atmosphere at home more intimate, relaxed, and mutually supportive.

events.name: Bullet Journal Records Significant Transformation
events.description: After the conversation ended, Sun Yuwei returned to her room, her emotions unable to settle for a long time. She opened her journal and, under the sections labeled "Mind-Body Awareness" and "Family," recorded her feelings from the evening with an unprecedented lightness of touch: "An invisible mountain has been moved. The air feels fresher than ever. My parents' love is so clear and profound, giving me a solid foundation." She realized that this honest conversation would become an important emotional cornerstone in both her life and her creative work.

events.name: Record Physical Signals Under Stress
events.description: Earlier, Sun Yuwei felt a wave of anxiety due to a slight disagreement with an editor over revisions to a manuscript. In her journal, she objectively recorded her physical reactions under this emotional state: a slightly accelerated heartbeat, somewhat short breaths, and a mild tightening sensation in her stomach. This made her realize the direct connection between emotions and the body.

起始状态.心情: Relax, enjoy the leisure of the weekend, and prepare to conduct some personal research.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relieved, filled with gratitude and a profound sense of security, emotionally nourished to the core.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Sunday, the health ritual was once again observed, and for the first time, I immersed myself in the city's fabric as a volunteer. Sun Yuwei became more adept at brisk walking around Cuihu Lake, while in the afternoon, her participation in an oral history project allowed her to step out of the study and, through real-life interviews, touch the memories and warmth of the city.

events.name: Second Brisk Walk at Cuihu Park
events.description: Another clear Sunday morning. Sun Yuwei arrived at Cuihu Park again around 8:30. Compared to the novelty and deliberateness of her first visit, her steps were steadier and more composed this time. The cherry blossoms by the lake were in fuller bloom than last week, making the scenery even more beautiful. She still engaged in 40 minutes of brisk walking, focusing on the coordination of her breathing and pace, enjoying the release of endorphins and the state of mental clarity brought by exercise.

events.name: Participate in the Oral History Volunteer Project (Phase I)
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei, as a volunteer, accompanied the research team from Yunnan University and several long-term residents to conduct field visits and oral history interviews on the ancient Xunjin Street in Kunming. She was responsible for assisting in recording key points from the interviews and taking photographs of historically significant environmental details. During the activity, she engaged in an in-depth conversation with an eloquent elderly woman in her eighties, listening to many vivid stories about the street's past shops, neighborhood relationships, and festive activities, which deeply moved her.

events.name: Organizing Interview Materials and Sparking Inspiration
events.description: After the event, Sun Yuwei returned home and eagerly began organizing the interview notes and photos from the day, transcribing parts of the audio recordings into text. Combining her own observations, she meticulously recorded her reflections on the event in her journal, contemplating the value of individual memories and the methods of preserving them amid the city’s rapid changes. As she listened to the elderly woman’s stories, an idea sprouted in her mind to write an essay on this theme, tentatively titled "An Afternoon on Xunjin Street."

起始状态.心情: I look forward to both the brisk walk that follows my routine and the meaningful volunteer activity in the afternoon.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and profoundly moved, her firsthand encounter with history has provided her creative work with a more solid foundation and more vivid emotions.

state.今日运动: 40 minutes of brisk walking in Cuihu Park, followed by approximately 2 hours of volunteer activity participation in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: The start of the new week was accompanied by significant planning and dialogue. Sun Yuwei established a detailed framework for her graduation project and essay collection, with her pre-sleep ritual now a natural habit. During a meeting with her advisor, she formally raised concerns about her career planning for the first time.

events.name: Detailed Planning of Writing Framework
events.description: Taking advantage of her free morning without classes, Sun Yuwei worked in her study to meticulously plan the core arguments, chapter structure, and desired writing style for the first chapter of her graduation thesis and the preface of her essay collection. She based her work on the previous guidance from her supervisor, Wu Mingyuan, integrating literature she had gathered over the weekend, her father’s diary, and her initial impressions from oral history research. By creating a mind map, she established a solid logical foundation for the intensive writing that would follow.

events.name: Bedtime rituals become habits.
events.description: After more than a week of practice, Sun Yuwei no longer needs to consciously remind herself of the bedtime ritual of reading (occasionally accompanied by minimalist white noise). Every night before sleep, she naturally picks up a book. She feels that this change has not only tangibly improved her sleep onset time and sleep quality, but the tranquil moments of pre-sleep reading often quietly emerge in her daytime writing, becoming one of the sources of inspiration.

events.name: Progress of Community Vocal Music Classes
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended a vocal music experience class at the community center. During the fourth session, while practicing group singing, she was finally able to produce sounds more naturally and barely keep up with the rhythm of the group. Although her singing was not outstanding, after the class, she felt a small sense of accomplishment from breaking through her own limitations. She recorded this experience of "daring to make a sound" in her journal, reflecting on her mental journey from resistance to tentative acceptance when facing unfamiliar fields.

events.name: Organize Book Club Inspiration
events.description: She took the time to systematically record the interesting perspectives she heard, the encouragement she received, and the inspiration that sparked during the reading sharing session at Mingyuan Bookstore last Friday in the "Inspiration Library" section of her journal. She also contemplated how to more skillfully integrate these observations on Kunming's folk customs and urban changes into her essay collection creation and her continued involvement in the oral history project.

events.name: Prepare for career planning questions
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei was organizing her recent notes on post-graduation plans in her home study. She had listed several specific questions she wanted to consult her mentor, Wu Mingyuan, about, such as: How sustainable is freelance writing as a long-term career? What preparations are needed to enter cultural institutions or media organizations? How can academic pursuits be combined with professional writing?

events.name: Discussing Career Planning with the Mentor
events.description: As scheduled, Sun Yuwei held a routine meeting in the office of Professor Wu Mingyuan from the School of Literature at Yunnan University in the late afternoon. She proactively raised concerns about her career planning, sharing her strong interest in the field of cultural writing while also expressing worries about unstable income and an unclear career path. Drawing on his academic insights and cases of former students, Professor Wu analyzed the pros and cons of various paths for her, such as entering cultural institutions, commercial media, pursuing further studies, or persisting in freelance writing. He particularly encouraged her to develop the essay collection she is currently working on into a unique "professional calling card."

events.name: Record Advisor Suggestions
events.description: After the meeting, Sun Yuwei did not go home immediately. Instead, she ordered a brown sugar pearl milk tea at the campus café and sat down to meticulously record her supervisor’s suggestions and key discussion points in her notebook. She began to weigh the pros and cons of different career paths, feeling as though some of the fog before her had cleared.

起始状态.心情: With a clear mindset, ready to begin a week of intensive creative work.

结束状态.心情: Inspired and with a heightened sense of direction, career contemplation shifts from vague anxiety to concrete exploration.

2025-03.daily_overview: Tuesday revolved around life practices, neighborly warmth, and wrapping up work. Sun Yuwei implemented her savings plan, attempted to make healthy snacks and shared them with neighbors, while properly concluding her previous phase of writing work and receiving an inspiring manuscript fee.

events.name: Execute the 'Cang Er Travel' Savings Plan
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received a bank deduction notification on her phone, confirming that 800 yuan had been successfully deducted from her account and transferred to the "Cang'Er Travel" (Graduation Trip Fund) account as per the special savings plan established in February. She made a brief entry in her budgeting app, feeling reassured by the smooth execution of the savings plan and noting that she was one step closer to her goal.

events.name: Try making hummus
events.description: Inspired by a mindful eating class, Sun Yuwei tried making healthy hummus in her home kitchen at noon. She blended cooked chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil into a smooth paste using a food processor, and served it with fresh cucumber and carrot sticks bought from the Zhuanxin Market. Though the flavor was simple, the sense of accomplishment from making it herself was deeply satisfying.

events.name: Preparing to visit the neighbor
events.description: Sun Yuwei packed the freshly made hummus into an elegant small glass jar and selected a handful of fresh pea shoots, planning to visit her neighbor across the hall, Aunt Xie Xiulan, in the afternoon. She wanted to share her recent culinary experiments with this elder who had watched her grow up.

events.name: Sharing and exchanging with neighbor Auntie Xie
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei knocked on Aunt Xie's door and received a warm welcome. The two sat down in the living room, sharing hummus and vegetables. Sun Yuwei shared her experiences of learning mindful eating and vegetarian cooking with Aunt Xie. Aunt Xie listened with great interest, recalling her own experiences of eating vegetarian meals in the countryside during her youth. She also taught Sun Yuwei a few traditional Kunming-style home-cooked vegetarian dishes, such as stewed green beans with rice and stir-fried pear blossom. The two, one old and one young, chatted for nearly an hour in a warm and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Documenting Neighborhood Warmth
events.description: After the pleasant conversation, Sun Yuwei returned to her home. She carefully recorded the insights gained from the exchange, the recipes shared by Aunt Xie, and the intergenerational warmth of neighborly affection in her journal, feeling that even ordinary life was filled with warm details worth documenting.

events.name: Submit the final manuscript and express gratitude.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei sent the finalized version of her column article "Alleys of Spring City" to editor Xu Mingyuan after multiple revisions. In the email, she sincerely thanked Editor Xu for his valuable professional guidance and generous time, specifically mentioning that this exchange had a significant impact on her thinking about writing direction and career growth.

events.name: Mild discomfort in the right wrist begins.
events.description: In the evening, while organizing notes from oral history interviews, Sun Yuwei felt soreness and slight pain in her right wrist due to prolonged handwriting over several consecutive days. She recorded this first instance of discomfort in her journal and decided to reduce handwriting and increase rest.

events.name: Received column manuscript fee
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei received a notification that the advance payment for her column article from the online magazine "Cultural Horizon" had been deposited into her account. The amount was considerable, exceeding her expectations. This income not only served as recognition for her writing but also prompted her to think more seriously about how to manage her finances more effectively and plan her financial future as a freelance writer.

起始状态.心情: Calmly planning the day's routine matters.

结束状态.心情: Warm and content, interactions with neighbors bring simple joys, while the arrival of the manuscript fee adds a sense of security, though slight concern arises from wrist discomfort.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday marked an efficient sprint in writing while bringing the health course to a successful conclusion. Sun Yuwei seamlessly switched between her graduation thesis and prose creation, reflected on her personal growth during the mindfulness eating course sharing session, and actively gathered information for her career future in the evening.

events.name: Focus on drafting the initial version of the graduation thesis.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei blocked out all distractions and focused on writing the first chapter of her graduation thesis in her home study. By closely integrating the previously collected literature, theoretical frameworks, and her own analysis, she completed the initial draft of the research background, problem statement, and preliminary theoretical framework for her study on "The Intergenerational Transmission of Memory in Local Writing: A Case Study of Western Yunnan" in rigorous and clear academic language.

events.name: Switch to prose creation
events.description: In the afternoon, after a brief rest, Sun Yuwei shifted into a literary creation mode. She opened a new document and began writing the prologue to her essay collection with a more emotional and personal touch. She attempted to weave the framework of her morning academic reflections into the flesh-and-blood observations of Kunming's urban scenery, family routines, and fragments of personal growth, completing the first draft. The theme focused on the enduring warmth of "unchanging" elements amidst urban transformation.

events.name: Mindful Eating Course Concluded
events.description: In the evening, I attended the final session of the online mindful eating course. The instructor guided everyone through a deep mindful eating exercise (tasting a raisin) and invited participants to share their reflections from the four weeks of learning. Sun Yuwei shared her transformation from "task-oriented eating" to "enjoying the process of cooking and eating," as well as how mindfulness helped her calm her emotions when experiencing writing anxiety. The course concluded successfully with everyone expressing gratitude and offering blessings.

events.name: Record Periodic Physical Sensations
events.description: Sun Yuwei noticed some subtle premenstrual signs, such as mild lower back soreness and heightened emotional sensitivity compared to usual. She objectively recorded these physical sensations in the "Mind-Body Awareness" section of her journal, noting whether they affected her focus and efficiency in writing that afternoon (the conclusion was a slight impact, which was alleviated through rest).

events.name: Collect recruitment information from cultural institutions
events.description: After the class ended, Sun Yuwei did not take a break. She opened her computer in the electronic reading room of Yunnan University Library (connected via VPN) and focused on browsing the official websites and recruitment social media accounts of target cultural institutions such as *Cultural Horizon* magazine, Kunming Contemporary Art Gallery, and the Provincial Museum. She meticulously recorded the job requirements, necessary skills, and portfolio submission methods for positions like new media editor, content planner, and event coordinator.

events.name: Reporting Progress to the Supervisor
events.description: In the late afternoon, Sun Yuwei had a brief face-to-face meeting with her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan. She reported to Professor Wu some preliminary ideas she had developed over the past few days regarding career information gathering and the optimization of the framework for her essay collection. From the perspective of combining academic rigor with creative appeal, Professor Wu offered affirmation and provided several key suggestions for revisions, focusing on how the essay collection could avoid slipping into sentimentality and enhance its intellectual depth.

events.name: Persistent wrist discomfort
events.description: Due to intensive writing, the discomfort in the right wrist has slightly intensified. Sun Yuwei reduced handwriting, switched to voice input for organizing some notes, and applied warm compresses before bedtime in hopes of alleviating the symptoms.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare for high-intensity writing work.

结束状态.心情: Fatigue and a sense of accomplishment intertwine after a period of high productivity, leading to more concrete actions in career exploration, yet discomfort in the wrist brings ongoing trouble.

2025-03.daily_overview: Thursday was dedicated to refining completed work and delving into future paths. Sun Yuwei polished the initial draft, experimented with meditation, and extensively researched further education and career information. An evening conversation with a fellow professional friend provided her with greater clarity about the road ahead.

events.name: Read and polish the initial draft
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei thoroughly reviewed the two initial drafts she had completed over the past two days: the first chapter of her graduation thesis and the preface to her collection of essays. She marked sections where the logical flow was insufficiently smooth, the expression was somewhat rigid, or additional details and examples were needed. After making preliminary revisions and adjustments, she developed both manuscripts into relatively complete and readable initial drafts within their respective fields.

events.name: Share and exchange with fellow copywriters
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei chatted online with her fellow writer and friend Song Wen, who is based in Chengdu. She shared the insights and reflections she gained from her recent in-depth exchanges with editor Xu Mingyuan. The two engaged in a lively discussion on topics such as the career growth bottlenecks faced by freelance writers and how to find a stable writing direction, offering each other encouragement.

events.name: Attempt meditation and record physical changes.
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Sun Yuwei attempted a 15-minute mindfulness meditation session (guided by an app). After finishing, she carefully recorded the physical sensations experienced during the meditation in her journal: starting from the initial tension in her shoulders and neck, gradually becoming aware of it and relaxing, to feeling her muscles loosen and her breathing become deeper and slower afterward. She developed an interest in this proactive method of regulating her body and mind.

events.name: Inquire about Graduate Admissions Information
events.description: Considering the "further study" path suggested by her advisor, Sun Yuwei sat in her home study and meticulously researched the postgraduate admissions brochures for Chinese literature, creative writing, or cultural studies programs at several prestigious domestic universities, such as Peking University, Fudan University, and Nanjing University. She focused on key details including application deadlines, examination subjects, recommendation letter requirements, and submission specifications for portfolios (or personal statements), and compiled detailed comparative notes.

events.name: Engage in an in-depth discussion about the profession with colleague Song Wen
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a lengthy voice call with Song Wen via WeChat. They not only exchanged information about internal recruitment situations at cultural media organizations they were aware of and discussed potential pathways for freelance writers to transition into full-time content planning roles, but also delved into how to package Sun Yuwei's ongoing personal essay collection project into a 'work' that is profound, distinctive, and capable of standing out in job applications or admissions processes. From her more lively and outgoing perspective, Song Wen provided many practical suggestions.

events.name: Wrist Discomfort Relief
events.description: Through rest, applying heat, and adjusting writing posture, the discomfort in the right wrist has significantly decreased. Sun Yuwei recorded the recovery progress in her journal and decided to continue being mindful of avoiding prolonged handwriting.

起始状态.心情: Meticulous, preparing to refine the work with great care.

结束状态.心情: Broadened perspectives and exchanges with peers have brought much new information and confidence, while the recovery of the wrist provides reassurance.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday was spent wrapping up the manuscript, reflecting on physical and mental well-being, and enjoying family warmth. Sun Yuwei completed the final compilation of the first draft, reviewed patterns of physical and mental awareness, and unexpectedly received a birthday travel fund from her sister, which accelerated her savings plan and highlighted the remarkable strength of her family support network.

events.name: Final Arrangement and Formatting
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei conducted a final review of the two polished drafts, correcting a few scattered typos and adjusting the fluency of certain sentences. She then strictly adhered to the formatting requirements set by the university, typesetting the sections of her graduation thesis and generating a complete PDF document, marking the official conclusion of the initial draft stage.

events.name: Review the Principles of Mind-Body Awareness
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet time before the weekend, Sun Yuwei reviewed all the records in the "Mind-Body Awareness" section since March. She attempted to identify some patterns, such as: typically experiencing peak concentration between 9 and 11 a.m.; feeling drowsy in the afternoon after consuming excessive oily food; experiencing more emotional fluctuations and lower back soreness during the week before menstruation; and generally having better energy levels on Monday mornings after brisk walks every Sunday. She summarized these observations on the monthly summary page of her planner.

events.name: Received a birthday travel fund from my sister.
events.description: In the afternoon, while using her phone at home in Kunming, Sun Yuwei received a WeChat transfer notification from her elder sister Sun Yutong in Shenzhen, amounting to 2,000 yuan, with a note: "Weiwei, an early birthday gift—add it to your travel fund and go see the wider world!" This sudden yet deeply understanding and supportive gift filled her with surprise and a profound sense of warmth. She immediately took a screenshot to preserve the message.

events.name: Deposit into a special savings account
events.description: After confirming the receipt on her phone, Sun Yuwei logged into her mobile banking app. She first withdrew the 2,000 yuan from WeChat to her linked bank card, then immediately transferred the money into a dedicated savings sub-account she had opened for her graduation trip—the "Cang Er Travel Fund."

events.name: Update Travel Savings Progress
events.description: After the transfer was successfully completed, Sun Yuwei opened the spreadsheet on her computer (which was also synchronized with the financial section of her bullet journal) and updated her graduation trip savings progress tracker. She solemnly recorded the 2,000 yuan "birthday gift income" from her sister, recalculated the total amount and the difference from her target amount (which she had preset at 10,000 yuan), and found that the progress had significantly accelerated.

events.name: Thanking Sister and Sharing Joy
events.description: Sun Yuwei contacted her sister Sun Yutong via WeChat voice call, sincerely expressing her gratitude for the special birthday gift. The sisters chatted for nearly half an hour, during which Sun Yuwei shared her joy upon receiving the money, the latest progress of her travel savings, and the recent positive changes in the family atmosphere. Her sister was also delighted for her on the other end of the call.

events.name: Share with parents during dinner
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei mentioned to her parents that her sister had transferred money to support her travel fund. Both her father, Sun Mingyuan, and her mother, Li Xiulan, smiled with satisfaction. They were delighted by the close bond between the sisters and discussed preliminary ideas for the travel plan with Sun Yuwei, such as considering a visit to Shenzhen, where her sister is located, and its surrounding areas.

events.name: Contemplating the Optimization of Essay Collections in a Bookstore
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei went to the familiar Mingyuan Bookstore. In her usual corner, she browsed through her collection of past column clippings and prose manuscripts while organizing the existing thematic framework of her prose collection in a notebook. She contemplated how to more deeply and skillfully integrate cultural observations, family history, and personal growth, based on the suggestions from her mentor and editor, in order to enhance the uniqueness and intellectual depth of the entire project.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, wrapping up the week's work with a mindset of organizing and summarizing.

结束状态.心情: Happy and grateful, the support of her family fills her with strength, and her financial goals have drawn closer.

2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday was a day for sharing, organizing, and sparking inspiration. Sun Yuwei shared her creative achievements with her father and close friend, organized the learning gains from the past month, and unexpectedly captured the creative inspiration bestowed by spring during her third brisk walk around Cuihu Lake.

events.name: Share the first draft of the prose with my father.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei sent the electronic document of the prologue to her essay collection to her father, Sun Mingyuan, via WeChat. She attached a lengthy explanatory note, detailing her creative intent—to bridge the perceptions of two generations toward Yunnan—and specifically pointed out which parts of the text quoted or adapted content from her father's diary. With a mix of anticipation and slight nervousness, she awaited her father's feedback.

events.name: Finding Relief by Sharing Family Conversations with a Close Friend
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei met with her close friend Zhang Jing at their usual independent café as per their routine. She shared the detailed process of her parents announcing their decision to abandon their family planning during the family dinner last Saturday, as well as the immense sense of relief she felt inside. As a long-time friend, Zhang Jing fully understood the significance of this lifted pressure for her, offering warm understanding and support. The two engaged in a deep and heartfelt conversation.

events.name: Organize the Outcomes of the Mindful Eating Course
events.description: After returning home, Sun Yuwei systematically organized all the notes, tried recipes, and reflections from her four-week online mindful eating course into her journal, accompanied by simple illustrations and ingredient stickers. She also shared these learning outcomes and the concept of mindful eating with her close friend Zhang Jing and her mother Li Xiulan via WeChat, exchanging insights on healthy eating with them.

events.name: Third Cuihu Lake Power Walk and Inspiration Capture
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei once again came to Cuihu Park for her weekend power walk. The cherry blossoms along the lake were in full, splendid bloom, heralding the deepening of spring. As she walked, gazing at the shimmering lake under the sunset and the continuous stream of visitors, several exceptionally fluid and vivid prose sentences suddenly and unexpectedly surfaced in her mind—about spring, the city, memories, and the passage of time. She immediately slowed her pace, took out her phone, and quickly recorded these "heaven-sent" inspirations in her memo app. This power walk not only provided physical exercise but also sparked precious creative inspiration, reinforcing her belief in the value of this habit.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, ready to enjoy a Saturday of sharing and organizing.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and inspired, exchanges with friends and the gifts of nature enrich the soul.

state.今日运动: 40-minute brisk walk in Cuihu Park

2025-03.daily_overview: On the last Sunday of March, the day was spent in perseverance, affirmation, and exploration. The brisk walks around Cuihu Lake have solidified into an anticipated habit. Her father’s brief words of affirmation provided immense encouragement. Volunteering at the archives allowed her to engage with history from another dimension, leading her to make new plans for health practices in the coming month.

events.name: Plan subsequent health practices
events.description: After waking up in the morning, Sun Yuwei, based on her recent records of "mind-body awareness" and the conclusion of her mindful eating course, meticulously planned a vegetarian-focused diet menu for the next two weeks in the health section of her home study. She also downloaded a new mindfulness meditation app and set an initial practice goal of "at least three times per week, with each session lasting 15 minutes."

events.name: Receiving Father's Approval
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received her father Sun Mingyuan’s response to the preface of her prose. On WeChat, there was only a [thumbs-up] emoji and a brief message: "Read it. It delves deeper than what I felt back then." This affirmation from her father—who was also one of the subjects of her writing—though concise, carried immense weight. It greatly encouraged and comforted Sun Yuwei, significantly boosting her confidence in her creative work.

events.name: Participate in the Oral History Volunteer Program (Phase II)
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei participated in the second phase of the project, which took place at the Municipal Archives. Her task was to assist the staff in sorting and scanning a batch of black-and-white historical photographs depicting the old streets and alleys of Kunming from the 1970s and 1980s. She carefully examined the faint pencil annotations on the back of each photograph, conducted preliminary categorization, and then used a professional flatbed scanner for high-precision digitization. Touching these yellowed photographs, she felt as though she had traveled through time.

events.name: The Fourth Cuihu Lake Power Walk – Recognition of Habit
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei went for her brisk walk around Cuihu Lake as scheduled. After three previous sessions, what was once a plan requiring reminders had now become an activity she naturally looked forward to on weekend afternoons. She skillfully completed the 40-minute brisk walk, clearly feeling a gradual improvement in her physical fitness and the inner tranquility and clarity that followed the exercise. She decided to steadfastly maintain this habit through April and beyond, viewing it as a dual-purpose ritual essential for both personal health management and inspiration gathering.

events.name: Sharing the experience of brisk walking with my mother and making an appointment
events.description: After returning home at noon on Sunday, during lunch, Sun Yuwei shared with her mother Li Xiulan her experiences from maintaining a brisk walking routine at Cuihu Lake for three weeks. She mentioned feeling physically lighter, more energetic, and occasionally experiencing the wonderful sensation of capturing inspiration. Her mother was very supportive of her daughter developing such a healthy and positive lifestyle habit and suggested, "If the weather is good next weekend, I’ll accompany you to Cuihu Lake. We won’t walk briskly—just take a leisurely stroll and chat." Sun Yuwei happily agreed.

events.name: Plan the April Cuihu Lake brisk walking itinerary
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei reflected on the brisk walking habit she had established in March and decided to upgrade it into a more systematic mind-body observation practice in April. She pre-planned her brisk walking sessions at Cuihu Park for each weekend in April (the 5th, 12th, 19th, and 26th) in her planner and designed a dedicated recording template. This template would be used to document her emotional state, energy levels, weather conditions, and any sudden inspirations before and after each brisk walk.

events.name: Check and confirm the savings account.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei logged into her mobile banking app to confirm that the dedicated sub-account she had previously opened for the "Graduation Trip Fund" was in normal status and checked the latest total balance. She was pleased to see that, with her sister's financial support, the savings progress had exceeded 70%.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the unique relaxation of a Sunday and anticipation for the day's arrangements.

结束状态.心情: Firm and fulfilled, habits are consolidated, goals are affirmed, and the next month is filled with plans.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the last day of March, the month concluded with procurement, celebration, challenges, and reflection. Sun Yuwei replenished supplies for her vegetarian plan, celebrated the completion of the first draft with her mother, wrapped up a somewhat challenging vocal lesson, and recorded the subtle changes in her body during the seasonal transition in her journal, bringing a fulfilling March to a close.

events.name: Procurement of Vegetarian Ingredients
events.description: After class in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei visited a fresh food supermarket and a community vegetable store near her home to conduct a bulk purchase for the vegetarian menu she had planned for the next two weeks. She bought a large quantity of fresh leafy greens, fruits, firm tofu, soy products, and some coarse grains, filling the refrigerator to the brim and making material preparations for her healthy diet practice.

events.name: Celebrating the Completion of the First Draft with Mother
events.description: Sun Yuwei told her mother Li Xiulan the news of her father's affirmation, as well as the completion of the first drafts of her graduation thesis and essay collection. Both mother and daughter were delighted and decided to prepare a sumptuous mushroom hotpot at home that evening (using the dried porcini mushrooms bought from the market last time) to celebrate. At the dinner table, they discussed the deeper meaning behind her father's feedback and the directions for further refinement in subsequent revisions.

events.name: Complete the vocal experience class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended her final vocal music trial class. At the end of the session, the teacher organized a simple closing sharing session. When it was her turn, she candidly expressed that she had not developed a strong passion for vocal music as a result, but she sincerely thanked the experience and shared her journey from feeling tense and stiff in the first class to being slightly more relaxed and able to sing along by the final session. This experience of venturing into an unfamiliar field allowed her to experience a completely different learning state and slightly boosted her courage to express herself in front of others. After the class, she sent a message to her yoga partner and recommender, He Lu, sharing her feelings about completing the course.

events.name: Documenting the Physical Sensations of Climate Change
events.description: By late March in Kunming, the weather had noticeably warmed, with daytime temperatures sometimes even feeling a bit sultry. In the "Mind-Body Awareness" section of her journal, Sun Yuwei recorded her body's responses to these climatic changes: whether she felt more prone to fatigue (yes, especially in the afternoon), whether her frequency of thirst had increased (yes), and how her comfort level shifted after switching from thick coats to thin knitwear. She became aware of her body's sensitivity to the environment and reminded herself to stay hydrated and adjust her daily routine appropriately.

起始状态.心情: The routine clarity of Monday, coupled with the nuanced sentiment of month-end reflection.

结束状态.心情: With a sense of fulfillment and a touch of sentiment, solid progress has been made in health, academics, creative endeavors, and family relationships over the past month. There are both plans and anticipation for the upcoming April.

2025-04.daily_overview: At the beginning of the month, Sun Yuwei made plans and preparations for the new month, reviewed the gains from volunteer activities, devoted herself to writing her thesis, and initiated a financial savings plan.

events.name: Review volunteer activities and organize reflections
events.description: Sun Yuwei organized the certificates of appreciation for participating in cultural preservation volunteer activities, recorded inspirations in her journal, reflected on the modern transformation of local culture, shared her insights with her father in the evening, and planned to incorporate them into prose writing.

events.name: Writing the Core Chapters of the Graduation Thesis in the Library
events.description: In the morning at Yunnan University Library, she focused on writing the core chapters of her thesis, organizing literature, and constructing the argumentative framework. The spring sunlight occasionally distracted her, but her mind remained active.

events.name: Establish a Monthly Fixed Deposit for the "Graduation Trip Fund"
events.description: In the afternoon, I set up an automatic transfer of 1500 yuan to the "Graduation Trip Fund" account via mobile banking, scheduled for the 1st of each month. After verification, I confirmed and submitted the transaction.

events.name: First automatic transfer successful
events.description: Upon receiving the SMS notification from the bank confirming the successful transfer, I logged into the app to check the updated balance, feeling reassured and hopeful about the future.

events.name: Record the new financial plan in the journal.
events.description: On the financial page of the journal, record expenses and fixed deposit plans, writing: "Laying the foundation for dreams, applauding execution."

events.name: Received an urgent request from the editor to submit the manuscript, adjusting evening plans accordingly.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received a WeChat message from editor Xu Mingyuan, requesting an article ahead of schedule. She postponed some of her journaling tasks and focused on revising the manuscript until late at night.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a sense of planning for the new month.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled yet somewhat weary, satisfied with completing the plan and meeting the deadlines.

2025-04.daily_overview: A day of exploration and introspection, Sun Yuwei practiced healthy eating, bid farewell to vocal lessons, organized creative inspiration, and prepared for an online meeting to share financial planning.

events.name: Try a vegetarian lunch and practice mindful eating.
events.description: Preparing lunch with mushrooms and tofu, eating at a slower pace, and feeling a reduced burden on the digestive system have led to the decision to adopt mindful eating as a new ritual.

events.name: Organize and Bid Farewell to the Vocal Music Experience
events.description: Organize vocal lesson notes and write reflections in the journal: "Courage is more important than talent; the mindset of daring to try is worth preserving."

events.name: Organize the inspiration from brisk walks around Cuihu Lake for inclusion in the essay collection materials.
events.description: Reviewing the walking records of Cuihu Lake in the journal, it has been decided to use them as the core material for a chapter in the essay collection.

events.name: Supplement and Revise Thesis Chapters
events.description: Supplement and polish the paper in the study, checking the arguments and the fluency of the sentences.

events.name: Get Exhibition Recommendations at the Bookstore
events.description: In the evening, I went to the Mingyuan Bookstore, where the owner Qin Mingyuan recommended the "Narratives on Paper" exhibition. Sun Yuwei noted down the information.

events.name: Sharing the Savings Plan with Sister
events.description: WeChat shared the fixed deposit message with sister Sun Yutong, who gave a like and shared financial management tips.

events.name: Prepare for tomorrow's online topic selection meeting.
events.description: Before going to bed, review the article and organize thoughts and confusions regarding "urban memory and media," compiling them into key questions.

events.name: Experiencing slight soreness in the shoulders and neck after a yoga class.
events.description: I attended the weekly Wednesday yoga class this afternoon. However, due to prolonged sitting while writing yesterday, my shoulders and neck felt somewhat tense, so I performed additional stretches after the class.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to embrace a diverse day

结束状态.心情: Thoughts are abundant, with anticipation for the meeting but slight discomfort in the shoulders and neck.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Thursday, balance physical and mental health, family preparations, and career planning. After a yoga exchange, accompany your mother in preparing items for the Qingming Festival and attend an important online meeting.

events.name: Accompanying mother to prepare items for Qingming tomb-sweeping
events.description: Accompanied my mother Li Xiulan to the flower market to select chrysanthemums and lilies, purchased fruits, pastries, and incense candles at the supermarket, and assisted in organizing items after returning home.

events.name: Online topic selection meeting with the editor
events.description: In the afternoon, a video conference was held with editor Xu Mingyuan to affirm the recent quality of articles and to discuss and finalize a series column plan themed [Urban Memory and Media].

events.name: Summarize the key points from the topic selection meeting and formulate a writing plan.
events.description: After the meeting, record the topic selection direction, key points, and timeline in a notebook to form a writing schedule.

events.name: Late return from an impromptu gathering of friends
events.description: A high school classmate visited unexpectedly in the evening, and we chatted at a café until quite late, discussing childhood anecdotes and recent updates, which led to staying up later than planned.

结束状态.心情: Excited yet slightly fatigued, looking forward to the new creative series.

2025-04.daily_overview: Spent the entire Qingming Festival with family, paying respects to ancestors and sweeping graves in the morning, and gathering for family reunion and conversation in the afternoon. Traditional festivals strengthen family bonds.

events.name: Final adjustments and proofreading of the graduation thesis format
events.description: Before leaving in the morning, I checked the formatting and spelling of the thesis at home to ensure everything was correct before preparing to submit it.

events.name: Family Tomb Sweeping on Qingming Festival
events.description: Driving with my parents to the family cemetery in the suburbs, we cleared weeds, wiped the tombstones, arranged offerings, and burned incense to pay tribute and remember our loved ones.

events.name: Family dinner, sharing updates
events.description: After returning home, her mother prepared Crossing-the-Bridge Rice Noodles and mushroom hotpot, with Sun Yuwei assisting. During dinner, the family discussed academic studies and writing, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Looking through old photos with parents and sharing creative concepts.
events.description: After dinner, we imported the tomb-sweeping photos, flipped through old photo albums to reminisce about the past, shared ideas and confusions about the essay collection, and received encouragement from our parents.

events.name: Weight slightly increased due to overeating during gatherings.
events.description: Having consumed a large amount of food during the holiday gathering, Sun Yuwei recorded her physical sensations in her journal and decided to adjust her diet the following day.

起始状态.心情: Solemn, with remembrance for the ancestors

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, with a slight sense of overeating.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the second day of the Qingming holiday, I submitted my thesis, planned an art exhibition visit, took a brisk walk around Cuihu Lake, and began adjusting my diet.

events.name: Adjust Your Diet to Manage Energy Fluctuations
events.description: Feeling low on energy in the afternoon, I added a snack of nuts and quinoa salad and recorded my body's response.

events.name: Reading through the printed draft of the thesis in the library
events.description: In the morning, I thoroughly read the draft of the paper at the library, checked the logical connections and coherence, and annotated it with colored pens.

events.name: Formally Submitting the Initial Draft of the Graduation Thesis to the Supervisor
events.description: Submit the initial draft of the thesis to supervisor Wu Mingyuan via email, express gratitude, and await feedback.

events.name: Planning a Visit to the "Narratives on Paper" Exhibition
events.description: Check the museum information, decide to visit the exhibition next Tuesday afternoon, and plan the public transportation route.

events.name: Mindful Brisk Walking at Cuihu Park on Weekends
events.description: In the afternoon, I took a 40-minute brisk walk alone at Cuihu Lake, focusing on my breathing and pace, and recorded the baseline of my physical and mental awareness.

events.name: Academic Consultation with Supervisor Regarding New Column Topic
events.description: In the evening, I made an appointment with my supervisor via WeChat for a meeting. Professor Wu affirmed the research topic and provided suggestions.

events.name: Yoga class canceled due to unforeseen circumstances, replaced with home relaxation exercises.
events.description: The originally scheduled afternoon yoga class was canceled due to unexpected household chores, so a 15-minute gentle stretching session was performed at home instead.

起始状态.心情: Relax, the leisurely feeling of a holiday

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief, coupled with a feeling of being well-planned.

2025-04.daily_overview: A day full of surprises: received high praise for my thesis, felt the pressure release, and also started a vocal music experience class, sharing the joy.

events.name: Received highly positive feedback on the paper from the supervisor.
events.description: In the morning, I checked my email and found a message from my supervisor, who highly praised the first draft of my thesis as "excellent" and attached revision suggestions. I felt a sense of relief and accomplishment.

events.name: Share the joy of success with family and friends
events.description: WeChat was used to immediately share the good news with parents, close friend Zhang Jing, and roommate Zhao Xiaowen, expressing gratitude for their support.

events.name: First Vocal Training Experience Class
events.description: In the evening, I went to the music studio to learn basic posture, breath control, and vocal exercises, gradually relaxing to complete the first step.

events.name: Share new experiences with yoga partners after class.
events.description: On the way home, I shared my feelings about the vocal lesson with He Lu via WeChat, and she offered encouragement.

events.name: Develop a Thesis Revision Plan
events.description: Organize the instructor's revision points and formulate a concentrated revision plan in the notebook.

events.name: Weight slightly increased due to overeating snacks out of excitement.
events.description: To celebrate the positive feedback on the paper, I indulged in a few extra flower cakes after dinner, and noted in my journal to be mindful of this.

2025-04.daily_overview: A Day of Artistic Inspiration and Capturing Ideas: Visiting the "Narratives on Paper" Exhibition, Gaining Profound Inspiration and Transforming It into Creative Reflection.

events.name: Adjust Meditation Duration to Address Mental Distractions
events.description: During morning meditation, my thoughts drifted to the manuscript of the essay collection, and I decided to shift this activity to before bedtime to aid sleep.

events.name: Replanning Time After Academic Stress Reduction
events.description: After receiving positive feedback on the paper, I plan to devote more energy to the essay collection, new column, and personal exploration.

events.name: Documenting the First Vocal Lesson Experience
events.description: Record the experience and feelings of vocal lessons in a journal, and paste the flyer as a memento.

events.name: Visit the Kunming Contemporary Art Gallery for an exhibition
events.description: In the afternoon, I took the bus to the art museum, contemplating the perplexity of "media."

events.name: Immersive Visit to the "Narratives on Paper" Exhibition
events.description: Carefully tour the exhibition, marvel at ancient book restoration and handmade papermaking, pause before the plant fiber paper artworks of Yunnan, and experience the narrative of materials.

events.name: Purchase Exhibition Catalogs and Cultural Creative Products
events.description: Purchase exhibition catalogs and postcards for use in journals or as gifts for friends.

events.name: Recording Exhibition Inspiration at a Cafe
events.description: Ordering a brown sugar bubble tea at a café, flipping through photo albums to record reflections on the exhibition, and contemplating new thoughts on "how media shapes memory."

events.name: Share Artistic Experiences with Friends
events.description: In the evening, photos were shared on WeChat with Zhang Jing and Zhao Xiaowen, and they exchanged insights and agreed to visit the exhibition together.

events.name: Equipment Malfunction Affects Evening Writing
events.description: Upon returning home, I discovered that my laptop suddenly went black. I temporarily used my phone to handle emails and postponed some writing tasks.

结束状态.心情: Deeply inspired yet slightly frustrated, equipment issues are affecting progress.

2025-04.daily_overview: Receiving an advance payment incentive on Wednesday boosted economic confidence, while simultaneously advancing academic research and floral arrangement creation.

events.name: Received Notification of Advance Payment for Column Contribution
events.description: In the morning, I received a WeChat notification from editor Xu Mingyuan that an advance payment of 20,000 yuan for the manuscript fee had been arranged and would arrive the next day, which filled me with pleasant surprise and excitement.

events.name: Consulting academic literature in the library
events.description: In the afternoon, I consulted literature related to "Media and Expression" at the library and took reading notes to build a theoretical foundation.

events.name: Go to Dounan Flower Market to select floral materials
events.description: In the evening, I went to the Dounan Flower Market to select floral materials and foliage, and discussed the seasonal characteristics with the florists.

events.name: Create an Ikenobo-style flower arrangement
events.description: In the evening, I spent an hour creating an ikebana arrangement in my home study, focusing on the beauty of lines and spatial balance, and completed a spring-themed work.

events.name: Share works with fellow flower arrangement enthusiast Su Man.
events.description: Share the work photos with Su Man via WeChat, discuss the form and artistic conception online, and arrange to visit the flower market together next time.

events.name: Initial Understanding of Mindfulness Meditation
events.description: Read stress management articles before bed, search for meditation apps, and prepare for the attempt.

events.name: Decreased concentration in yoga class
events.description: During the afternoon yoga class, I felt distracted due to recent multitasking, with lower concentration than usual. Additional breathing exercises were performed after the class.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment abounds, with economic satisfaction but slight physical fatigue from exercise.

events.description: In the journal, review the dietary habits and mindfulness practice experiences over the past ten days, summarize insights, and plan long-term habits.

events.name: Decided to normalize the practice of vegetarianism.
events.description: Through practice, I feel my energy levels are stable and have decided to adopt a "mostly vegetarian on weekdays, flexible on weekends" approach.

events.name: Carefully plan the use of large manuscript fees
events.description: Morning planning for manuscript fees: partially supplement the travel fund, partially upgrade writing equipment, and deposit the remainder in a fixed-term savings account.

events.name: Complete the final version of the paper and submit it to the system.
events.description: In the afternoon, conduct the final proofreading of the thesis, log into the school system to upload the final version of the document, and confirm successful submission.

events.description: WeChat reported the submission message to supervisor Wu Mingyuan and expressed gratitude, to which Professor Wu replied with congratulations.

2025-04.daily_overview: Saturday combines socializing, exploration, and self-care, featuring deep conversations with close friends, trying meditation, and preparing for hiking photography.

events.name: First Attempt at Mindfulness Meditation in the Morning
events.description: After waking up, I followed the app's guidance to complete a 15-minute mindfulness breathing exercise. My thoughts drifted away, but I made an effort to bring them back, feeling a sense of inner calm.

events.name: Decided to continue with the vocal training experience course.
events.description: Upon receiving the course reminder, I decided to proceed with the second session to fulfill my commitment to myself.

events.name: Place an order to upgrade writing equipment
events.description: As a reward, I placed an order for a new lightweight laptop and a silent keyboard, looking forward to a better creative experience.

events.name: Having an in-depth conversation with my close friend Zhang Jing at a bookstore.
events.description: Meet at the corner of Mingyuan Bookstore in the afternoon to share the joy of positive feedback on the paper and the manuscript fee. Zhang Jing shares interesting teaching anecdotes, engaging in a two-hour heartfelt conversation.

events.name: Continuing the Conversation at the Cafe
events.description: Moving from the bookstore to the café, ordering a brown sugar bubble tea, discussing career development and personal growth, and offering emotional support.

events.name: Preparing for Hiking and Photography at the Western Hills
events.description: In the evening, check the phone battery, prepare hiking shoes, snacks, water, and a journal, filled with anticipation.

events.name: Documenting the First Meditation Experience
events.description: Before bed, record in the journal: "Attempted meditation for 15 minutes, thoughts like wind but moments of peace," and attach a blue sticker.

events.name: Mentioning Meditation Attempts to Yoga Partners
events.description: WeChat discussed trying meditation with He Lu, who supported the idea and recommended a meditation channel.

events.name: Arriving late for the yoga class due to being out, the practice session was shortened.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Sunday, put inspiration into practice with a hiking and photography trip to the Western Hills, rediscovering the city and nature through footsteps and the camera lens, embarking on a successful journey of physical and mental exploration.

events.name: First Visit to the Zhuangxin Farmers' Market
events.description: In the morning, I went to the Zhuanxin Farmers' Market to familiarize myself with the environment, learn about seasonal vegetables, and experience the local atmosphere.

events.name: Hiking and Mobile Photography at Xishan Forest Park
events.description: In the afternoon, I went alone to Xishan Forest Park, choosing a less crowded trail. I slowed my pace and used my phone to capture the interplay of light and shadow, the moss, and the shimmering ripples of Dianchi Lake, immersing myself in observation and documentation.

events.name: Screening and Simple Processing of Hiking Photos
events.description: After returning home, import the photos for selection, then crop and adjust the colors to highlight a sense of tranquility.

events.name: Record photography practices in a journal
events.description: Print satisfactory photos and paste them into the journal, write the title "[Measuring with Steps, Observing with the Lens]," and record the weather, route, and reflections.

events.name: Exchange Recent Updates with Fellow Writers
events.description: In the evening, I shared my hiking experiences and progress on manuscript fees with Song Wen via WeChat, discussing the mindset of freelancing.

events.name: Decided to incorporate meditation into the daily schedule
events.description: Based on experimentation, I have decided to practice short meditation sessions 2-3 times a week before bedtime to improve sleep quality.

events.name: Due to the energy expended during hiking, eat more at dinner to replenish energy.
events.description: Feeling hungry after hiking, I consumed more mushrooms and rice than usual for dinner, noting the body's needs.

起始状态.心情: Full of exploratory desire, eager to give it a try.

结束状态.心情: Calm and joyful, physically exhausted yet spiritually fulfilled.

2025-04.daily_overview: A new week begins, continuing vocal training trial classes, organizing hiking photography, updating financial goals, and shifting life's focus toward creative exploration.

events.name: Attend the second vocal experience class
events.description: In the evening, I went to the vocal training institution to practice vocalization and simple pop songs. I felt more relaxed than the first time and experienced a sense of accomplishment from persistence.

events.name: Update Financial Records and Savings Goals
events.description: In the afternoon, I updated the income and expenses in my journal, setting short-term goals for an accelerated travel fund and long-term goals for a career development fund.

events.name: Organize and Share the Photography Achievements of the Western Hills
events.description: Share the hiking photography journal pages with Zhang Jing and Zhao Xiaowen to exchange observations and feel inspired.

events.name: Begin writing a family memory-themed essay
events.description: After the evening class, I began drafting an essay in the study, flipping through the family photo album and conducting a phone interview with my mother to inquire about details.

events.name: Urgently received an emergency revision task for the column.

2025-04.daily_overview: Inspired by urban observation methodologies at the campus photography exhibition, I was motivated to pursue further exploration, simultaneously launched a new column, and made comprehensive preparations for travel planning.

events.name: Visit the "Spring City Impressions" Photography Exhibition on Campus
events.description: In the afternoon, I visited the exhibition hall at Yunnan University to view the black-and-white photographs documenting the old streets and alleys of Kunming. I was captivated by the meticulous observation and narrative perspective of each piece, spending a considerable amount of time lingering before every work.

events.name: Attend the "Rediscovering the City on Foot" Sharing Session
events.description: Listening to the creative philosophy of a senior from the Department of Geography—measuring with footsteps, experiencing with heart and soul the traces of time in ordinary streets and alleys, aligning with the deep-seated desire for inner observation—I was profoundly moved and inspired.

events.name: Focus on the school hiking photography club
events.description: After the sharing session, search for and follow the Hiking Photography Society's official WeChat account to access event information and consider future participation.

events.name: Share the awe of the exhibition with friends
events.description: In the evening, I shared the overwhelming experience with Zhang Jing and Zhao Xiaowen on WeChat, excitedly describing the concepts and discussing the possibilities of urban observation.

events.name: Commencing the Drafting of a New Column Manuscript: "The Warmth of the Old Street"
events.description: Started writing the column manuscript in the home study, organizing field notes from Cuihu Lake and the Old Street, structuring the article framework, and drafting the opening paragraph with a nostalgic tone.

events.name: Research Travel Insurance
events.description: Search online for the necessity of travel insurance, coverage items, and comparisons among insurance companies to prepare for the purchase.

events.name: Due to staying up late yesterday, my energy level is slightly reduced today.
events.description: Due to the urgent revision task the night before, I felt slightly fatigued today and took a 15-minute nap in the afternoon to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the photography exhibition, but feeling somewhat fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Deeply inspired, with an active mind, the seed of urban observation has been activated.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first workday after successfully submitting her graduation thesis, Sun Yuwei returned to her creative work with a relaxed mood. The focus of the day was to complete the first scene of the "Warmth of the Old Street" column, with the creative location chosen at Mingyuan Bookstore, a familiar and inspiring place for her.

events.name: Focus on writing at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore with her laptop and notebook. She settled into her usual seat by the window, ordered a brown sugar pearl milk tea, and opened yesterday’s notes to focus on crafting the scene of "The Soy Milk Shop at Dawn." She meticulously wove into her writing the observations from her earlier walks—the rising steam, the aroma of soybeans, the skilled and seamless coordination of the vendor couple, the brief greetings exchanged among longtime neighbors, and the shifting play of light as the sun began to rise—all in an effort to create a warm and vivid sense of everyday life. Midway through, Qin Mingyuan, the bookstore owner, refilled her hot water, and the two briefly exchanged thoughts on the changes in the old neighborhood.

events.name: Communication with Partners in Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended the group class at the Serenity Yoga Life Studio as usual. She focused on shoulder and neck stretches, and after the class, she shared her recent writing progress and vocal training experiences with her yoga partner He Lu, who encouraged her to maintain a balanced approach.

起始状态.心情: Calm and full of anticipation

结束状态.心情: Full and focused. Having completed the scheduled writing section and yoga, I feel physically relaxed.

2025-04.daily_overview: She encountered a writing block at home in the morning and decisively changed her environment in the afternoon, seeking inspiration through a walk and observation. In the evening, she conducted the final selection and purchase of travel insurance and began preparing for the upcoming material organization. This reflects her flexible approach to challenges and her well-planned nature.

events.name: Encountering Writer's Block and Seeking Inspiration While Writing at Home
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei continued writing the section titled "The Afternoon Tinkerer" at her desk at home. However, her thoughts grew sluggish in the afternoon, and the words felt dry and uninspired. Realizing that sitting idly was futile, she decisively closed her laptop, changed into comfortable flats, and headed alone to Cuihu Park. There, she wandered aimlessly, observing the focused expressions of elderly chess players, the innocent laughter of children at play, and the ripples created by willow branches brushing the water's surface. These vivid everyday scenes gradually eased her tense mind and provided fresh observational material for the passage "The Dusk Chess Game."

events.name: Online Screening and Purchase of Travel Insurance
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei logged into the official websites and mobile banking apps of several insurance companies. Based on her prior research, she compared and ultimately selected a comprehensive travel insurance policy covering accidental injury, emergency medical expenses, and baggage delay. She carefully reviewed the application information, effective date, and exclusions, completed the payment of the 300-yuan premium through online payment, and downloaded and saved the electronic policy.

events.name: Online Communication with the Editor
events.description: In the evening, she sent a message via WeChat to editor Xu Mingyuan, briefly outlining the current progress of the article, its structural conception, and the conceptual difficulties she encountered in the afternoon. Editor Xu promptly replied, affirming her choice of topic for "Old Street Observations" and advising her not to rush the process, suggesting she incorporate more personal reflections. This provided Sun Yuwei with immense encouragement.

events.name: Preparations for Launching the Essay Collection Compilation Work
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei cleared a spacious surface in her study and prepared folders of different colors, sticky labels, and index cards. Looking at these tools, she reflected on her goal of "completing the first draft of her essay collection before graduation," making both physical and mental preparations for the systematic organization of materials over the next few days.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a hint of pre-writing tension.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet with a clear sense of direction. The afternoon walk alleviated anxiety, while purchasing insurance and organizing preparations brought a feeling of control that "things are moving forward."

state.今日运动: Take a walk in Cuihu Park for about 40 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: Friday is the day for preparing the family feast. In the morning, I went shopping for ingredients with my mother, which was filled with the warmth of everyday life. In the afternoon, I efficiently handled routine matters such as follow-up insurance procedures and travel fund savings. By evening, I began the preliminary preparations for the family feast. The rhythm of life is well-balanced, effectively integrating family responsibilities with personal planning.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients for the family banquet with my mother.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei and her mother Li Xiulan went together to a large farmers' market near their home. The spring mushrooms in Kunming had just become available, and the mother and daughter carefully selected fresh porcini mushrooms, termitomyces mushrooms, and green-headed mushrooms. They also bought free-range chicken, vegetables, and authentic hotpot seasoning. As she made her selections, the mother shared tips with her daughter on how to identify the quality of mushrooms and pair them with hotpot ingredients. The two discussed the next day’s menu, filling the air with a warm and lively domestic atmosphere.

events.name: Complete the insurance purchase cycle and monthly savings.
events.description: Upon returning home, Sun Yuwei promptly saved the electronic insurance policy to the cloud and meticulously recorded the purchase details in the "Graduation Trip Preparation" section of her planner. She then logged into her mobile banking app to confirm that the automatic deduction of the 1,500 yuan 'Travel Fund' recurring deposit, scheduled for the first day of each month, had been successfully processed. Seeing the steady growth of her savings account balance, she felt a renewed sense of reassurance about her future travel plans.

events.name: Kitchen Preparations on the Eve of a Family Feast
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei and her mother began bustling in the kitchen, making preliminary preparations for the mushroom hotpot family feast scheduled for the next day. Sun Yuwei was responsible for cleaning and processing the various mushrooms and vegetables purchased in the morning, while her mother prepared the hotpot broth and marinated the meat. Working together in a coordinated manner, the kitchen soon filled with an enticing aroma.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to attend the online writing sharing session.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei noticed that the online writing community was organizing a sharing session and decided to attend on short notice. She exchanged insights on column writing with fellow writer Song Wen, which led to her staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and joyful, looking forward to the weekend family dinner.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and heartwarming. With the procurement and preparations completed, the online sharing session brought fresh inspiration.

2025-04.daily_overview: This was a Saturday rich in content and accomplishments. In the morning, I enjoyed a warm family gathering and shared insights on health. In the afternoon, I efficiently completed the core section of my column at the bookstore. In the evening, I formally initiated the systematic organization of materials for my essay collection. Personal creativity, family relationships, and health management harmoniously intertwined throughout the day.

events.name: A Cozy Weekend Family Mushroom Hot Pot Feast
events.description: At noon, the family of three sat together enjoying a carefully prepared mushroom hotpot. Father Sun Mingyuan praised the flavorful broth and shared new developments from his workplace regarding the protection of local intangible cultural heritage. Mother Li Xiulan inquired with concern about her daughter's experience in vocal lessons and preparations for her graduation thesis defense. Sun Yuwei shared the creative inspiration behind her new column, as well as the positive changes in her body after recently practicing mindful eating and brisk walking, receiving understanding and support from her parents. The atmosphere at the table was warm and harmonious.

events.name: Complete the core writing of the column in the bookstore.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei returned to Mingyuan Bookstore once more. Thanks to her observations at Cuihu Park the day before, her thoughts flowed freely, and she completed the first drafts of both "The Afternoon Tinkerer" and "The Dusk Chess Game" in one go. She skillfully wove into her writing the old man's concentration during the chess game, the quietness of the onlookers, and the shifting light and shadows of dusk. The emotional tone and narrative rhythm of the article gradually became clearer and more substantial.

events.name: Complete the conclusion and initial polishing of the article at home.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, she struck while the iron was hot and composed the concluding paragraph of the article in her study. She skillfully wove together the three scenes—the "soy milk shop," the "tinker," and the "chess game"—to highlight that the "warmth of the old street" lies in those slow, sincere, yet increasingly rare human connections. After completing the first draft, she conducted an initial read-through, correcting obvious grammatical errors and typos.

events.name: Systematically Organize Prose Collection Materials (Initiation)
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei officially commenced the material organization work. She carefully reviewed her handwritten journals from the past year and the draft columns stored on her computer, extracting text fragments related to Kunming's urban memories and personal growth reflections. These excerpts were preliminarily categorized and digitally recorded according to emotional tones such as "nostalgia," "observation," and "reflection." Simultaneously, she began organizing relevant street scenes and bookstore photos from her phone, linking the visual materials with the corresponding text fragments.

events.name: Weekend Fast Walking and Emotional Observation at Cuihu Park
events.description: Before heading to the bookstore in the afternoon, she first went to Cuihu Park for her second brisk walk exercise of the week. Today, she felt her steps were much lighter than at the beginning of the month, and her breathing was more steady. She focused on the rhythm of her body and the vibrant spring scenery around her, which completely soothed the subtle restlessness caused by her creative block in recent days. In her journal, she briefly recorded this dual positive feedback from both her body and emotions.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, looking forward to both family gatherings and creative endeavors.

结束状态.心情: Extremely fulfilling and satisfying. Family time is warm, creative work is progressing smoothly, organizational tasks have commenced, with a sense of multiple achievements overlapping.

state.今日运动: 30-minute brisk walk in Cuihu Park
