2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday marks the day for finalizing the column manuscript and establishing the framework for the essay collection. In the morning, the manuscript was meticulously polished and ultimately submitted, signifying the successful completion of a creative task. In the afternoon, building upon the previous night’s organizational efforts, deeper conceptualization was undertaken to outline a clear blueprint for the long-term creative project.

events.name: Final Polishing and Submission of Column Manuscripts
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei conducted a final read-through and revision of the draft of "The Warmth of the Old Street." She adjusted several paragraph transitions, refined the wording of key sentences, and softly read aloud certain sections to check the flow of the language. After confirming that the article was sincere in emotion, meticulous in observation, and fully aligned with both her own style and the tone of the column, she formally sent the final version, along with a creative statement, to editor Xu Mingyuan via email.

events.name: Determine the Theme and Framework of the Essay Collection "Spring City Chitchat"
events.description: In the afternoon, buoyed by the relief of having submitted her manuscript, she resumed the organizing work from the previous night. Drawing on the preliminarily categorized materials, she engaged in a brainstorming session on the whiteboard in her study. Eventually, she settled on "Personal Dwelling in Urban Transformation" as the core theme for her essay collection. She also drafted four main chapters: "Memories of Streets and Alleys," "Moments in Bookstores," "Scenes of the Four Seasons," and "The Mirror of Introspection," thus constructing a solid framework for the planned book.

events.name: Decided to try a vocal training experience class.
events.description: While browsing her phone in the evening, an advertisement for a short-term adult vocal music trial class caught her attention. Driven by curiosity about self-expression and a willingness to step out of her comfort zone (motivated by INFP's personal growth orientation), she filled out the online registration form and decided to start exploring this new field next week.

events.name: Rest early due to fatigue.
events.description: After several consecutive days of busy work, Sun Yuwei experienced a mild headache and decided to go to bed early to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Calmness infused with the focus of completing the final touches of the manuscript.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and hopeful. The successful submission of the manuscript brought a sense of relief, while the establishment of the essay collection’s framework filled one with anticipation for future creative endeavors.

2025-04.daily_overview: As the new week begins, the daytime is primarily dedicated to deepening the organization of materials for the essay collection and planning its chapters. In the evening, I mustered the courage to attend my first vocal music trial class, which represents an active exploration into an unfamiliar field. Though nervous, it marks an important step forward.

events.name: Deepen the Matching of Chapter Outlines and Materials for the Prose Collection
events.description: During the day, Sun Yuwei worked at home, drafting more detailed content outlines for each chapter of the essay collection, including tentative titles and core ideas for each essay. She meticulously matched the previously categorized text fragments, photographs, and reflections to specific chapters and essays, forming a preliminary creative blueprint. As a result, her work became increasingly organized and systematic.

events.name: First Vocal Experience Class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei, with a hint of nervousness and curiosity, headed to the vocal music studio in the city center. During the introductory class for beginners, the instructor outlined the course objectives and taught basic diaphragmatic breathing techniques along with simple vocal scale exercises. Sun Yuwei followed along diligently, attempting to vocalize in front of strangers for the first time, feeling both a sense of novelty and slight awkwardness. After the class, she pasted the course receipt into her journal and briefly recorded this first attempt at stepping out of her comfort zone.

events.name: Begin a three-day focused writing sprint
events.description: Inspired by the framework of the essay collection, Sun Yuwei decided to focus on writing for three consecutive days starting today, reducing social activities to accumulate draft content for the essay collection.

起始状态.心情: Calm, yet slightly apprehensive about the new experience in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but in a good mood. Having completed the planned tasks and successfully tried new things, there is a small sense of accomplishment.

2025-04.daily_overview: After completing an important manuscript, Sun Yuwei arranged a small day of relaxation and socializing for herself. During the day, she gathered with close friends to share her joy, and in the evening, she brought the preliminary framework of her essay collection to consult her mentor. By connecting her personal creative work with academic guidance, she gained valuable professional insights.

events.name: A Small Gathering with My Best Friend Zhang Jing at a Cafe
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arranged to meet her close friend Zhang Jing at an independent café they often frequented. She excitedly shared with Zhang Jing the good news of having completed and submitted "The Warmth of the Old Street," as well as the progress made in establishing the preliminary framework for her essay collection. Over cups of milk tea, the two shared the new books they had been reading and exchanged ideas for their journaling materials, enjoying a relaxed and pleasant afternoon together.

events.name: Seeking Advice on the Outline of the Essay Collection from Mentor Wu Mingyuan
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei brought the compiled theme, chapter outlines, and partially matched materials for the essay collection to Professor Wu Mingyuan's office at Yunnan University. After carefully reviewing them, Professor Wu highly affirmed the depth of the "Urban Dwelling" theme and provided very professional suggestions and encouragement regarding structural optimization and theoretical support for certain chapters. This greatly boosted Sun Yuwei's confidence in the subsequent creative work.

events.name: Continue the writing sprint and stay up late revising.
events.description: Inspired by her mentor after returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei stayed up late revising the outline of her essay collection until the dead of night, resulting in her going to bed late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and cheerful, looking forward to the gathering with friends.

结束状态.心情: Feeling inspired and warm. The sharing from friends and the recognition from mentors are both important forms of spiritual support, though a slight fatigue lingers after staying up late.

2025-04.daily_overview: Following her mentor's advice, Sun Yuwei stayed at home to calmly revise and refine the detailed plan for her essay collection, transforming it into an actionable roadmap. This was a crucial workday dedicated to turning inspiration and ideas into concrete steps.

events.name: Planning and Formulating a Writing Plan for the Revised Essay Collection
events.description: Throughout the day, Sun Yuwei worked in her home study, meticulously revising and refining the outline of her essay collection based on Professor Wu Mingyuan's suggestions. Subsequently, she developed a detailed writing schedule for the next two months, specifying weekly writing progress goals and compiling a list of locations she plans to visit specifically for inspiration and research—such as particular old neighborhoods, markets, and suburban parks.

events.name: Handle daily writing tasks
events.description: During the break, she checked and replied to the confirmation email from editor Xu Mingyuan regarding the previous manuscript, and handled some scattered inquiries about commissioned articles.

events.name: Minor Annoyances of Spring Allergies
events.description: With increased pollen in Kunming during spring, Sun Yuwei felt her nose itching today and sneezed several times. She realized it might be seasonal allergies and decided to be more cautious when going out to the park later.

events.name: Yoga Class Adjusted Due to Allergies
events.description: In the afternoon, she attended a yoga class, but due to allergic symptoms, she took a break midway, focusing on breathing exercises rather than intense postures.

events.name: Conducting Thematic Reading for a Prose Collection
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei read books and academic articles related to 'urban writing' and 'sense of place' at home, seeking theoretical nourishment and diverse writing perspectives for her essay collection, and took detailed reading notes.

events.name: Organize the Online Inspiration Library
events.description: In the afternoon, she organized the graphic and textual materials collected from online tools such as Douban and flomo regarding Kunming, bookstores, and old streets and alleys, categorizing and archiving them into the material library for the essay collection.

events.name: Listen to music to relax.
events.description: In the evening, with a light drizzle falling, she nestled in the beanbag chair in her room, listening to a favorite independent music album through her headphones, letting her thoughts drift aimlessly and completely relaxing.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to go to the stationery fair.
events.description: In the evening, she came across information about a local stationery market and decided to visit on a whim. She purchased some new materials and unexpectedly ran into Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast, with whom she exchanged insights.

2025-04.daily_overview: Friday evening is a time for family affection and leisure. I had a video call with my sister in Shenzhen, gaining significant emotional and financial support. Afterwards, I planned cultural activities for the weekend and began brainstorming a special birthday gift for my father.

events.name: Video Call with Sister Sun Yutong
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had her weekly video call with her elder sister, Sun Yutong. She shared the good news that her graduation thesis had successfully passed the supervisor's review, as well as the financial relief she experienced after receiving a substantial advance payment for her manuscript. Her sister was genuinely happy for her and sent a 1,888-yuan red envelope via WeChat transfer, with the note "Happy graduation, keep chasing your dreams," offering her younger sister solid support and encouragement.

events.name: Planning Weekend Movie Viewing
events.description: After the call ended, Sun Yuwei browsed through a ticket purchasing app and was captivated by the synopsis of the art film "Spring Passing." She decided to go to the cinema alone on Saturday afternoon to watch it and purchased the ticket in advance.

events.name: Brainstorming birthday gifts for father
events.description: Before going to bed, she remembered her father Sun Mingyuan's upcoming birthday. Considering his approaching retirement and her ongoing collection of essays, she conceived an idea: to create a commemorative album combining old family photos with excerpts from her essays about her father. She began searching for materials in the study and old storage boxes.

events.name: Confirm Monthly Savings
events.description: In the afternoon, she habitually checked her mobile banking and confirmed that another 800 yuan travel savings had been automatically transferred successfully from her royalty account.

events.name: Staying up late due to a gathering
events.description: After talking with my sister in the evening, I chatted online with my fellow writer Song Wen for a while, discussing travel plans, which led to staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, work status remains stable.

结束状态.心情: Warm and joyful. The red envelope and support from her sister made her feel immensely happy, and she was filled with anticipation for the weekend plans.

2025-04.daily_overview: A typical INFP-style artistic weekend. Drawing inspiration from watching a film alone, followed by deep reflection and creative associations in a café using a personal journal; the afternoon also included a brisk weekend walk, along with a positive review of the month's exercise achievements.

events.name: Watching "Springtime in a Small Town" Alone
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the Broadway Cinema near her home and watched the art film "Springtime" alone. The film's themes of the passage of time, memory, and farewell deeply moved her. Throughout the viewing, she was completely immersed in the emotions and reflections evoked by the cinematic narrative.

events.name: Cafe Journal Inspiration Notes
events.description: After the movie, she went to the café next to the cinema and ordered a brown sugar bubble tea. She took out the personal journal she always carried with her and meticulously recorded the classic lines from the film, the memorable scenes, and her reflections on the "traces of time" using colored pens and stickers. She further contemplated how to incorporate this nuanced sense of time into her own prose writing.

events.name: Cui Lake Fast Walking and Summary at the End-of-Month Weekend
events.description: In the morning, she completed her final weekend brisk walk around Cuihu Lake for the month. She distinctly felt that her endurance and stride stability had improved significantly compared to the beginning of the month. In her journal, she specifically compared her condition at the start and end of the month, writing a summary that affirmed the positive physical and mental changes brought about by consistent exercise. She also decided to incorporate brief meditation sessions before and after her brisk walks starting next month.

events.name: Establish a 'Surprise Fund' for Travel
events.description: After returning home, she withdrew the 1,888 yuan red envelope transferred by her sister from WeChat balance and deposited it into the savings account opened for her graduation trip. She specifically labeled it as the "Surprise Fund," planning to use it for unplanned special experiences during the journey.

events.name: Temporarily participating in a flower arrangement workshop
events.description: In the evening, she came across the flower arrangement workshop organized by Su Man and decided to join on a whim to learn new techniques, engaging in an in-depth discussion with Su Man on aesthetic topics.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, ready to enjoy a solitary artistic moment.

结束状态.心情: The heart is rich and serene. The film provided aesthetic enjoyment and food for thought, the sports summary brought a sense of accomplishment, and the flower arrangement workshop added new inspiration.

state.今日运动: 35-minute brisk walk at Cuihu Park, flower arrangement workshop activity

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday's theme was summarization and experimentation. In the evening, a systematic review of the brisk walking habit from April was conducted, with a decision made to optimize and upgrade it. During the day, the second vocal music trial class was attended, continuing the exploration of self-expression.

events.name: Second Vocal Experience Lesson
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended her second vocal lesson. The teacher reinforced breathing techniques and began teaching basic resonance placement. While practicing a simple song segment, she still felt nervous but was slightly more relaxed than during the first lesson, making an effort to focus on the teacher's guidance. After the lesson, she once again recorded her progress and reflections in her journal.

events.name: Monthly Review of Exercise and Mindfulness Habits
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei organized the records of four brisk walks and several mindfulness practices from April. She concluded that exercise effectively alleviates mental fatigue caused by writing, while mindfulness helps soothe anxiety. She wrote a summary, deciding to maintain "brisk walking + brief meditation" as a fixed health ritual for May and considering enrolling in a more regular yoga course to specifically relieve shoulder and neck tension.

events.name: Relax by taking a walk with family.
events.description: In the evening, I took a walk with my parents in the residential area, discussing plans for the May Day holiday and enjoying quality family time.

起始状态.心情: Relax and prepare for the end of one week and the beginning of the next.

结束状态.心情: Rational and composed. Through reviewing past experiences, I have gained a deeper understanding of my physical and mental rhythms, leading to a clearer plan for future health management.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the vocal music classroom takes about 30 minutes, and walking around the residential area takes 20 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: In the new week, facing the fresh pressure brought by the approaching graduation defense, Sun Yuwei took proactive measures by enrolling in a regular yoga class. At the same time, she also embarked on a new column creation, with clear steps ranging from theoretical preparation to on-site observation.

events.name: Inquire and sign up for regular yoga classes
events.description: Faced with increasing pressure from her graduation thesis defense and stiffness in her shoulders and neck due to prolonged desk work, Sun Yuwei proactively reached out to her yoga partner and instructor, He Lu. After detailed communication via WeChat, she confirmed fixed class times for every Wednesday and Saturday afternoon, completed the course registration and payment at the Serenity Yoga Studio, and specifically informed He Lu of her need to alleviate anxiety and physical stiffness.

events.name: Desk Preparation for the New Column "Bookstore Light and Shadow"
events.description: In the morning, she stayed at home to consult books and notes on bookstore culture and spatial aesthetics, accumulating theoretical perspectives and fragments of inspiration for the envisioned column "Bookstore Light and Shadow." She also drafted the core viewpoints and structure of the article.

events.name: Morning Observations at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: In the afternoon, she visited the Mingyuan Bookstore, a place she frequents, for on-site observation. She deliberately chose a time when the sunlight was ample, noting how the morning light moved across the bookshelves and reading area through the glass windows. She observed the quiet state of the few early visitors and briefly exchanged words with the owner, Qin Mingyuan, about the original intent behind the bookstore's lighting design.

events.name: Staying up late to revise the essay collection due to pressure.
events.description: At night, affected by the pressure of her thesis defense, she stayed up late revising sections of her essay collection until the late hours.

起始状态.心情: Slightly stressed (due to graduation-related matters), but highly proactive.

结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly relieved. Signing up for yoga classes is a positive step in coping with stress, and on-site observations have also injected vitality into creative work, but fatigue persists after staying up late.

state.今日运动: It takes about 40 minutes to walk to the bookstore and back.

2025-04.daily_overview: She continued conducting field research for the new column, visiting independent bookstores of various styles for comparative observation. Meanwhile, online vocal lessons also progressed. Despite ongoing challenges, she persevered and completed the courses.

events.name: Comparative Observation of Bookstores with Different Styles
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei visited two other independent bookstores in Kunming, each with a distinct style. She carefully observed and compared their differences in spatial layout and the use of natural light. Using her phone, she captured vivid scenes of readers immersed in books, engaged in conversations, or simply lost in thought under the afternoon sunlight, which served as visual references and detailed material for her writing.

events.name: Third Vocal Experience Lesson
events.description: In the evening, she attended her third online vocal lesson. The instructor taught more complex vocalization techniques and encouraged her to try interacting with other participants during group practice. Although she still felt nervous and shy, she made an effort to complete the exercises and proactively asked the teacher about breath control after the lesson. She realized that she had not fallen in love with vocal music but regarded this as a valuable exercise in courage.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to go hiking in the Western Hills.
events.description: In the morning, driven by the weather and her mood, she spontaneously decided to take a short hike in the West Hill Forest Park, using her phone to photograph the natural scenery and gather material for her collection of essays.

起始状态.心情: I am very interested in the daytime observation itinerary.

结束状态.心情: Full yet slightly weary. The daytime observations and hiking were quite rewarding, while the evening class was a test of patience.

state.今日运动: Walking to visit bookstores takes about 1.5 hours, and hiking in the Western Hills takes 2 hours.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day of April, the morning was spent handling follow-up communications regarding manuscripts, while the afternoon was dedicated to accompanying my mother on a practical grocery shopping trip, preparing for the family meals in May. In the evening, she received a preliminary notice from the university regarding the arrangement of her graduation thesis defense, officially marking the start of the final significant task of her student years.

events.name: Column Manuscript Feedback and Communication
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received an email from editor Xu Mingyuan, who expressed satisfaction with the manuscript "The Warmth of the Old Street" and offered two minor revision suggestions. She promptly completed the revisions and replied, concluding a smooth and efficient collaboration cycle.

events.name: Accompanying mother to purchase ingredients
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei accompanied her mother, Li Xiulan, to the market and supermarket to purchase fresh ingredients for making Cross-Bridge Rice Noodles and Mushroom Hot Pot, such as rice noodles, free-range chicken, various mushrooms, and vegetables. They also took the opportunity to buy some flower cakes, which her mother enjoys. As they shopped, the mother and daughter chatted about daily life and their plans for the May Day holiday.

events.name: Pay Attention to the Graduation Defense Notice
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei saw the preliminary notice and general schedule for the late May graduation thesis defense posted by the academic advisor in the class group chat. She recorded the key dates in her planner and phone calendar, realizing it was time to start preparing her defense presentation.

events.name: First Regular Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, following her newly registered course, she attended her first formal yoga class. Under He Lu's guidance, she focused on her breathing and basic postures. By the end of the session, she felt some relief from the stiffness in her shoulders and neck, and her mood had become much calmer.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, the mindset of month-end reflection

结束状态.心情: Calmness carries a subtle anticipation for next month (the defense month). However, today's yoga class and family time served as an effective buffer, leaving the overall state relaxed and at ease.

state.今日运动: 60-minute yoga class, accompanied mother shopping and walking for approximately one hour.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny
date_attribute.holiday: Labor Day

2025-05.daily_overview: During the Labor Day holiday, Sun Yuwei spent quality time at home with her parents. Through family dinners and in-depth conversations, they strengthened their familial bonds and set a positive tone for the upcoming graduation season.

events.name: Help prepare family lunch
events.description: On the morning of Labor Day, Sun Yuwei and her mother Li Xiulan prepared Crossing-the-Bridge Rice Noodles and Mushroom Hot Pot together in the kitchen. She washed vegetables, set the tableware, and assisted her father Sun Mingyuan in tidying up the living room to create a festive atmosphere.

events.name: Family Lunch Discussion on Future Plans
events.description: At noon, the family of three sat together for a meal. The father shared amusing anecdotes from work, while the mother inquired about her studies and writing. The focus of the discussion was Sun Yuwei’s graduation plans, the progress of her essay collection, and her travel plans. The parents expressed their support, though the mother’s underlying concern for stability began to surface.

events.name: Afternoon Leisure Exchange and Showcase
events.description: After lunch, the family gathered in the living room to enjoy flower cakes and brown sugar bubble tea while chatting casually. Sun Yuwei showed her recent bullet journal and flower arrangement works to her parents, and her father suggested taking a walk in Cuihu Park over the weekend.

events.name: Recording Reflections and Thoughts on Group Dining
events.description: In the evening, after Sun Yuwei voluntarily washed the dishes, she returned to her room and meticulously recorded in her journal the heartwarming moments from the gathering, her parents' advice, and her reflections on future career and life.

events.name: Evening Reading for Relaxation
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei browsed through a collection of essays and listened to some modern pop music to help relax and recharge for the busy days ahead.

起始状态.心情: Relax Expectations

结束状态.心情: Satisfying Warmth

state.今日运动: Light housework (helping prepare lunch)

date_attribute.weather: Partly cloudy
date_attribute.holiday: Labor Day

2025-05.daily_overview: On the second day of the holiday, Sun Yuwei focused on preparing the "Bookstore Light and Shadow" column, communicated progress with the editor, and, encouraged by her close friend, established a morning exercise plan. In the evening, she made a spontaneous decision to relax by listening to an online concert.

events.name: Compile materials and refine the article outline
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei gathered the bookstore observation records, photographs, and compiled literature from the previous days in the study. She refined the content of each section against the outline of "Bookstore Light and Shadow," determining the tone for the introduction, core paragraphs, and conclusion.

events.name: Communicate with Editor Xu Mingyuan about topic selection
events.description: In the afternoon, she communicated via WeChat with Xu Mingyuan, the editor of Cultural Horizon, to briefly report on the topic proposal, core viewpoints, and collected materials, seek preliminary feedback on the article's angle and depth, and confirm the subsequent submission deadline.

events.name: Chatting with best friend Zhang Jing and making an exercise plan
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei was chatting with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat. Zhang Jing shared the positive changes she experienced from consistently running in the morning and suggested that Sun Yuwei also engage in physical activity. Considering her own lack of exercise and the need to improve her posture, Sun Yuwei decided to start brisk walking for 30 minutes at 7:30 every morning in Cuihu Park from May 4th. She also reserved a [Step Trails] section in her journal for this purpose.

events.name: Organizing Journals and Recording Inspiration
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei spent time decorating her journal, recording her reflections and exercise plans for the day, and pasting in some recently collected materials on flower arrangements and bookstores to accumulate inspiration for her creative work.

events.name: Temporarily Listen to an Online Concert
events.description: Before going to bed, she happened to discover that a favorite independent musician was live streaming online and decided to tune in for relaxation, which resulted in staying up half an hour later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Focus with calmness

结束状态.心情: The plan is clear but somewhat exhausting.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Saturday, Sun Yuwei immersed herself in the world of writing and began drafting the initial manuscript of "Bookstore Light and Shadow." In the afternoon, she took time to visit her beloved independent bookstore, seeking inspiration amidst the scent of books and savoring the tranquil moments of the weekend.

events.name: Drafting the Preliminary Manuscript of "Bookstore Light and Shadow"
events.description: From morning until noon, Sun Yuwei worked in her home study, drafting the initial version of her column article "Bookstore Light and Shadow" based on previous observation notes and inspiration from the bookstore. She focused on transforming her inner feelings and reflections into words, constructing the overall framework and emotional tone of the article.

events.name: Visit Mingyuan Bookstore for browsing and exchange
events.description: In the afternoon, she visited her favorite independent bookstore, Mingyuan Bookstore, where she browsed through newly arrived literary magazines and books. She also had a brief conversation with the owner, Qin Mingyuan, gaining some local cultural perspectives to supplement material for her article. By chance, she ran into her university classmate Lin Yue, and the two discussed their post-graduation plans, which extended her stay.

events.name: Evening Journaling and Music Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei organized her observations from the bookstore at home, recorded them in her journal, and listened to some modern pop music to alleviate writing fatigue.

起始状态.心情: A strong creative drive

结束状态.心情: Enriched yet slightly fatigued

2025-05.daily_overview: On Sunday, Sun Yuwei embraced a busy yet fulfilling day: she began a new exercise routine in the morning, revised an article during the day, attended a vocal lesson in the afternoon, and balanced her body and mind through diverse activities.

events.name: First Morning Brisk Walk
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei overcame difficulties and carried out her morning brisk walking plan for the first time. She walked briskly for 30 minutes along the lakeside trail in Cuihu Park, breathing in the fresh morning air and observing elderly people doing morning exercises and water birds on the lake. She felt her body awakened but her muscles sore. After returning home, she recorded the step count and her [successful early rising] mood in her journal.

events.name: Revise the First Draft of "Bookstore Light and Shadow"
events.description: In the morning, she conducted the first round of revisions on the draft completed the previous day, carefully reading the entire text, adjusting the logical order of some paragraphs, and refining sentence expressions to make the article flow more smoothly and present a more unique perspective.

events.name: Third Vocal Experience Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended her third vocal lesson. The instructor guided her to integrate breathing, vocalization, and articulation techniques to practice a short song in its entirety, and began selecting the final piece for recording.

events.name: Evening Organization and Planning
events.description: In the evening, she reviewed the day's activities, recorded insights from her vocal lessons in her journal, and planned her brisk walking and writing schedule for the following week in preparation for her graduation defense. Due to fatigue, she went to bed earlier than usual.

起始状态.心情: Slightly drowsy yet resolutely determined.

结束状态.心情: Achievements abound

2025-05.daily_overview: On the adjusted workday, Sun Yuwei started her day with morning exercise. During the day, she completed article polishing and submitted her thesis. However, at dinner, she had a heated argument with her mother over future plans, experiencing significant emotional turmoil.

events.name: Morning Walk on the Second Day
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei continued her routine of early morning brisk walking. Her body was gradually adapting to the exercise, and she consciously adjusted her breathing rhythm. Noticing the blooming jacaranda trees in the park, she took photos with her phone and added notes about the weather and her thoughts on [seeing the jacaranda trees in bloom] to her journal.

events.name: Final Polishing of the Article
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei made final refinements to "Bookstore Light and Shadow," carefully deliberating over key paragraphs and phrases to ensure genuine emotion and precise language. After completing all revisions, she read through the entire text to confirm its accuracy.

events.name: Submit the final version of the graduation thesis
events.description: On the afternoon, three days before the defense, she submitted the final version of her graduation thesis, which had undergone multiple revisions, to her supervisor Professor Wu Mingyuan for review, and confirmed the final details and precautions for the defense via email and WeChat.

events.name: Dinner Discussion Sparks Conflict
events.description: During dinner in the evening, Li Xiulan, the mother, once again brought up Sun Yuwei's habit of staying up late to write and tentatively inquired about her views on taking the civil service examination. Sun Yuwei's inner insistence on creative freedom clashed intensely with her mother's expectations for a stable life, and her emotions began to simmer.

events.name: Having a fierce argument with mother
events.description: Around 8:30 PM in the living room, a discussion about future plans escalated into a heated argument. Sun Yuwei passionately expressed her determination to pursue a career as a freelance writer, while her mother voiced concerns about her daughter's future financial security and life pressures. Both parties were emotionally charged, and the dispute lasted for approximately half an hour.

events.name: Reflection and Confiding After an Argument
events.description: The argument ended unhappily around 21:00. Sun Yuwei returned to her room, feeling aggrieved and angry, yet also mixed with an understanding of her mother's concerns. She began to reflect on whether her career plan was clear and how to prove her choices to her family. Later, she confided in her close friend Zhang Jing about the conflict via WeChat. Zhang Jing listened patiently and offered advice, which led to Sun Yuwei staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Low spirits and contradictions

2025-05.daily_overview: After a night of calm reflection, Sun Yuwei's relationship with her mother has slightly improved. She maintained her morning exercise routine, completed her vocal training, and formally submitted her column manuscript, gradually regaining emotional balance amidst her busy schedule.

events.name: Morning Walk on the Third Day
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei persisted in brisk walking, making early rising less painful. She encountered her neighbor Auntie Xie exercising at Cuihu Park and exchanged brief greetings; she also noticed a resident cat along her regular route and deliberately stopped to observe it. Her journal entries have formed a fixed format: date, weather, step count, and one small event.

events.name: The Final Preliminary Vocal Course
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei attended the final preparatory session for her vocal experience course. The instructor provided detailed guidance on the selected recording piece, corrected minor issues, and familiarized her with the recording environment through simulated performances, making final preparations for the official recording.

events.name: Submit the manuscript of "Bookstore Light and Shadow"
events.description: In the afternoon, she conducted a final proofread of the manuscript. After confirming its accuracy, she formally sent the manuscript of "Bookstore Light and Shadow" via email to Xu Mingyuan, the editor of *Cultural Horizon*. The email body included a brief explanation of the creative concept.

events.name: Attempts to Ease Mother-Daughter Tensions
events.description: During breakfast, both mother and daughter attempted to ease the tension. Sun Yuwei took the initiative to help her mother prepare the meal, and her mother softened her tone to ask how she had slept the night before. Although the core conflict was not discussed in depth, the strained atmosphere was somewhat alleviated.

events.name: In-depth evening discussion with Zhang Jing
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei continued to confide in her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat about the conflict with her mother. Zhang Jing shared her own experiences in communicating with her parents, encouraged Sun to persist in her passions, and suggested she communicate with her mother in a gentler and more prepared manner. After the conversation, Sun felt somewhat relieved, but she went to bed slightly later due to contemplating her future.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei began systematically organizing her writing income, maintained a morning exercise routine while noticing positive changes, and made final preparations for her graduation defense. Her daily rhythm gradually stabilized amidst pressure and self-discipline.

events.name: Organize and Draft Income Records
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei opened her computer in the study and carefully organized the records of her writing income from the past three months, settlement statements from various platforms, and the publication status of her articles. She created an Excel spreadsheet to calculate her total income, average earnings per article, and primary contributing platforms, aiming to gain a clear understanding of her financial situation.

events.name: Experience Physical Changes Through Morning Brisk Walking
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei persisted with her brisk walk. The park was livelier than usual, and seeing families having picnics lightened her mood. She set a small goal for herself: to walk to a specific pavilion in the park and then turn back, rewarding herself by drawing a smiley face in her journal as encouragement upon completion. She felt more energetic during the day, and the stiffness from prolonged sitting was noticeably reduced.

events.name: Prepare defense materials
events.description: In the afternoon, she reviewed the content of her graduation thesis, prepared her defense presentation and potential questions, ensuring she had a thorough understanding of the core arguments and methodologies of the paper. Due to some pressure, she decided to go to bed early in the evening to conserve her energy.

events.name: Temporary attempt at a new vegetarian recipe failed.
events.description: During dinner, she attempted to cook a new vegetarian dish, but due to poor control of the heat, the flavor turned out mediocre, which slightly dampened her mood. However, she quickly adjusted.

起始状态.心情: Focus and Self-Discipline

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and confident

2025-05.daily_overview: Today marks a highlight in Sun Yuwei's university life: she successfully passed her graduation thesis defense with outstanding results, received high praise from her supervisor, and shared the joy with her family, signifying the successful completion of her academic journey.

events.name: Graduation Thesis Defense
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei conducted her graduation thesis defense in the designated classroom of the School of Literature at Yunnan University. She presented the core arguments and research methodology of her thesis, "The Mountains of Our Fathers: Literary Reconstruction of the Educated Youth Memory," to the defense committee and responded to their questions. The committee unanimously rated her thesis as excellent.

events.name: One-on-one Mentorship and Guidance
events.description: After the defense concluded, Professor Wu Mingyuan, her advisor, specifically asked her to stay behind for a private conversation in the department hallway. Professor Wu congratulated her on her outstanding performance and provided specific suggestions and a recommended reading list regarding the subsequent revisions for her upcoming collection of essays, *Cang’er Xuyu, Fubei de Qunshan* (*Whispers of Cang’er, Mountains of the Fathers*), as well as on how to integrate academic research with freelance writing.

events.name: Sharing Good News with Family
events.description: After the defense, Sun Yuwei promptly shared the news of her excellent evaluation with her parents Sun Mingyuan and Li Xiulan, as well as her elder sister Sun Yutong, via phone call and the family WeChat group. She also conveyed her supervisor's affirmation. All family members felt proud and happy for her.

events.name: Engaging in Rational Communication with Father Regarding Career Planning
events.description: In the evening, she seized an opportunity to have a private conversation with her father, Sun Mingyuan, where she more rationally elaborated on her career plans and aspirations, expressing her desire for her parents' understanding rather than mere support. Although her father still held reservations, he indicated that he would respect his daughter's choice and was willing to mediate between mother and daughter.

events.name: Express gratitude to the mentor and confirm the successful defense.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei sent a message to Professor Wu Mingyuan via WeChat, informing him that she had passed her defense and expressing her gratitude, thereby strengthening their mentor-student friendship. Due to excitement, she went to bed slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Nervous anticipation

结束状态.心情: Excited and proud

2025-05.daily_overview: On the relaxing day after her thesis defense, Sun Yuwei gathered with her close friend to celebrate, received the good news of her manuscript being accepted, and began planning her finances and health to lay the foundation for an independent life after graduation.

events.name: Received the manuscript acceptance notification
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received a reply email from editor Xu Mingyuan, who praised the manuscript for its [unique perspective and sincere emotion] and formally confirmed the acceptance of "Bookstore Light and Shadow." This greatly encouraged her and solidified the collaborative relationship between both parties.

events.name: Morning brisk walking becomes a habit.
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, the brisk morning walk has gradually become part of her daily routine, and she no longer needs to struggle mentally to get out of bed. During today's walk, she listened to a soothing podcast about nature literature through her headphones. After finishing, she bought soybean milk and fried dough sticks from a breakfast stall by the park, feeling that her morning was complete.

events.name: A small gathering to celebrate with close friends Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi.
events.description: In the afternoon, to celebrate the successful defense, Sun Yuwei invited her close friends in Kunming, Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi, for a small gathering at their favorite independent bookstore café. They shared their joy, discussed future plans, and spent a relaxed and pleasant time together, returning home slightly late due to their excited conversation.

events.name: Planning Personal Finance and Investment
events.description: In the evening, to enhance her financial independence, Sun Yuwei searched online and read articles about personal bookkeeping, savings planning, and basic investments. She downloaded a bookkeeping app, gained a preliminary understanding of low-risk financial tools such as money market funds, and planned to set aside a fixed portion of her monthly income for savings.

events.name: Arrange an in-depth conversation with Zhang Jing.
events.description: She contacted Zhang Jing via WeChat to express her desire for an in-depth conversation in the near future. They discussed the schedule and decided to meet at the [Shiguang] Café on the afternoon of May 10th.

events.name: Inviting the Supervisor for a Pre-Graduation Discussion
events.description: Sun Yuwei proactively extended an invitation to her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, via WeChat, hoping to have a candid discussion before graduation after the thesis defense. She suggested meeting at a quiet teahouse near the campus. Professor Wu gladly agreed.

起始状态.心情: Light and pleasant

结束状态.心情: Full of hope

2025-05.daily_overview: On Saturday, Sun Yuwei had a heartfelt conversation with her close friend Zhang Jing, gaining emotional support. Simultaneously, she received her manuscript fee payment and began practicing financial planning. Through exercise, she experienced personal growth, making it a day filled with the warmth of friendship and self-reflection.

events.name: Morning Walk Review and Planning
events.description: At 7:30 a.m., Sun Yuwei completed her final morning brisk walk of the [Initial Adaptation and Persistence Phase]. Reviewing her weekly journal entries, she tallied her total steps and attendance rate (perfect attendance for all seven days) and felt a sense of pride. On a new page of her journal, she wrote down her expectations for the following week: to try different park routes and consider inviting Zhang Jing to join her for a brisk walk over the weekend.

events.name: Go to the cafe to meet with Zhang Jing.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei set out from home and took the bus to the [Time Capsule] Café in the city center. Along the way, she reflected on the topics she would soon share about graduation, career, and family, feeling both anticipation and nervousness.

events.name: In-depth Heart-to-heart Talk with Zhang Jing
events.description: She met with Zhang Jing at the [Time] Café, where they ordered their favorite drinks and settled into a quiet corner for a deep conversation that lasted several hours. They shared their anxieties about graduation season, future career plans, relationships with family, as well as their personal convictions and uncertainties. Drawing from her own experience, Zhang Jing offered practical advice, while Sun Yuwei candidly discussed her disagreements with her mother regarding career choices.

events.name: Exchanging Blessings and Commitments in Personal Planners
events.description: As the conversation drew to a close, Sun Yuwei and Zhang Jing took out their personal notebooks and wrote sincere blessings and words of encouragement in each other's journals. They solemnly pledged that, no matter where life might take them in the future, they would always be each other's first reader and most steadfast supporter.

events.name: Farewell and Aftertaste
events.description: As dusk fell, Sun Yuwei and Zhang Jing embraced and said goodbye at the entrance of the café. She took the bus home, reflecting on their conversation along the way. Her heart felt warmed and supported by the strength of their friendship, giving her a greater sense of certainty about the future.

events.name: Received notification of manuscript fee payment
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received a text message notification on her phone from the bank, informing her that a transfer of 4,500 yuan from the magazine "Cultural Horizon" had been credited to her account. This was the column fee for the previous quarter. She logged into her mobile banking app to verify the details and confirmed that the payment was categorized as income from writing.

events.name: Zhang Jing Introduces the Hiking Photography Activity
events.description: During a heart-to-heart conversation at a café, Zhang Jing introduced Sun Yuwei to the upcoming [Green Lake-Yunnan University Humanities Walk] event organized by the school's hiking photography club and encouraged her to participate. Although Sun Yuwei was somewhat hesitant about outdoor activities, persuaded by Zhang Jing and driven by her interest in photography, she decided to give it a try and began learning about the event details and the items she needed to prepare.

起始状态.心情: Calm Anticipation

结束状态.心情: Warm and steadfast

2025-05.daily_overview: On Sunday, Sun Yuwei completed the recording of a vocal experience class, organized suggestions for her thesis defense, allocated manuscript fees and began saving, while observing nature during her morning exercise. The day was spent balancing creative pursuits with financial management.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walk and Nature Observation
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei engaged in a 30-minute brisk walk in Cuihu Park, with her body having already adapted to the rhythm. Along the way, she observed the focused expression and slow yet powerful movements of an elderly person practicing Tai Chi, as well as the tender new buds sprouting from the willow trees by the lake. She recorded her observations and reflections in the "Walking Traces" column of her journal.

events.name: Final Recording of Vocal Experience Class
events.description: In the morning, during the final session of the vocal experience class, Sun Yuwei, under the guidance of the instructor, fully performed and recorded a segment of the song "So Many People in This World," which she had been practicing for several days. Overcoming her nervousness, she immersed herself emotionally and completed the recording.

events.name: Interacting with Classmates After the Course Ends
events.description: After the course ended, she exchanged WeChat contacts with several classmates she got along well with, agreeing to attend livehouse performances together in the future. She then shared the recorded song clips with her sister Sun Yutong via WeChat.

events.name: Organizing Mentor Suggestions and Planning for the Prose Collection
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei quietly organized and reflected on all the suggestions given during the defense session and by her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, in her home study. She recorded the key points of the suggestions and the recommended reading list in her notebook, and began to preliminarily plan the subsequent revisions for her essay collection, as well as how to integrate academic insights into her future writing work.

events.name: Organizing Insights from Heart-to-Heart Talks and Journal Decoration
events.description: She took time to organize her reflections from the previous day's in-depth conversation with Zhang Jing, carefully embellished the blessings Zhang Jing had written in her journal, and recorded the inspiring insights from their discussion as well as her thoughts on future commitments.

events.name: Allocation of Manuscript Fee Income
events.description: According to the financial plan, Sun Yuwei quickly calculated in her notebook and decided to transfer 3,000 yuan into her savings account, leaving the remaining 1,500 yuan in her current account for living and creative expenses this month.

events.name: Operate transfer and confirm
events.description: On the mobile banking app, she transferred 3,000 yuan from the receiving account to her personal bank account designated for savings and emergencies, entered the password to confirm the transfer. After refreshing the page, she verified that the funds had been safely transferred and received a balance change notification.

events.name: Record Finances and Mood
events.description: She recorded this manuscript fee income and its allocation in her planner and wrote down her feelings: This is her first formal professional income after graduation, which has boosted her confidence in the future of freelance writing.

events.name: Expressing Gratitude to the Mentor
events.description: Sun Yuwei once again expressed her gratitude to Professor Wu Mingyuan via WeChat and sent a group photo taken at the teahouse that day (if one was taken). Professor Wu replied with encouragement and mentioned that she would be welcome to return to the university for future book-sharing events. Both parties agreed to stay in touch.

起始状态.心情: Tranquil Focus

结束状态.心情: Rich and Well-Ordered

2025-05.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei received graduation startup funds from her father, marking a new beginning of financial independence. Concurrently, she reflected on her vocal training journey and continued to maintain her exercise routine, advancing through a day filled with family support and personal introspection.

events.name: Bumped into a neighbor during my morning brisk walk.
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei was power walking in Cuihu Park, and her body had fully adapted. Along the way, she ran into her neighbor Auntie Xie again, and they briefly exchanged pleasantries about the weather and health. Auntie Xie praised her for her consistent exercise and noted that her complexion had improved.

events.name: Receiving Father's Graduation Start-up Fund
events.description: In the evening, while having dinner with her parents at home in Kunming, Sun Mingyuan formally transferred 50,000 yuan as graduation startup funds into Sun Yuwei's personal account via bank transfer, expressing his expectations and support for her future independent life.

events.name: Reviewing the Experience of Vocal Music Study
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei reviewed her brief vocal training experience at home, recording her course notes and reflections in her journal, and backing up the audio files to her computer. She confirmed that this was merely an interesting experiment and not a direction for further in-depth study in the future.

events.name: Preliminary Framework for Planning a Dali Trip
events.description: After receiving the startup funds, Sun Yuwei began to conceptualize the preliminary framework for the Dali cultural tour, including the approximate duration, main activity ideas, and potential expense categories, in preparation for the subsequent detailed planning.

events.name: Staying up late due to sudden writing inspiration.
events.description: Suddenly inspired to write prose before bed, I decided to stay up late to record my thoughts, resulting in going to sleep later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Increased gratitude and sense of responsibility, yet fatigued.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei remotely discussed financial planning with her sister, mapped out future writing directions, exchanged experiences with fellow writers, and prepared a commemorative album for her father's birthday, tightly advancing her day through remote support and creative planning.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walk: Feeling the Changes in Your Body
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei persisted with brisk walking. During her study at Yunnan University Library during the day, she felt her concentration was easier to maintain than before. After returning home in the evening, she organized the scenes of children playing in the park and the sound clips of the city waking up observed over the past few days into written materials for prose creation.

events.name: Video call with sister to discuss financial planning
events.description: In the morning, she held a video call with her sister Sun Yutong in Shenzhen to discuss in detail the financial plan she had drafted. Her sister provided specific operational suggestions and risk warnings regarding low-risk financial products such as time deposits and money market funds.

events.name: Preparing a Birthday Memorial Album for Father
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei privately contacted her mother Li Xiulan and her sister Sun Yutong to inform them about the commemorative album plan, requesting that they each write a birthday greeting card for their father. She communicated with her sister via WeChat and discussed the matter with her mother at home.

events.name: Plan the writing direction for the next six months.
events.description: Based on income analysis and personal interest, she has planned her writing direction for the next six months, setting a goal of completing four column articles and one in-depth cultural essay each month. She has also listed target submission platforms such as "Cultural Horizon" and plans to attempt submitting to more mainstream literary magazines.

events.name: Video communication with fellow writer Song Wen
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a lengthy video call via WeChat with Song Wen, a fellow writer based in Chengdu. She shared her recent plans and her mother's concerns, while Song Wen offered insights on how freelancers can establish stable income streams, manage their time effectively, and address family doubts. He provided her with considerable encouragement and practical advice.

events.name: Outdoor activities cancelled due to rainy weather.
events.description: It drizzled in the afternoon, so she canceled her originally planned outdoor reading session and instead spent time organizing books at home, which led to a slight sense of boredom.

起始状态.心情: Strong planning ability

结束状态.心情: Inspired

2025-05.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei made her first active asset allocation, attended regular yoga classes to relieve stress, and had a heartfelt pre-graduation conversation with her mentor, receiving a precious book as a gift. In one day, she experienced growth in finance, health, and the bond between teacher and student.

events.name: Configure Graduation Startup Funds
events.description: In the morning, on the mobile banking app, the planned incoming 50,000 yuan was allocated as follows: 30,000 yuan was deposited into a one-year fixed-term deposit, 15,000 yuan was used to purchase low-risk money market funds, and the remaining 5,000 yuan was kept in the current account as a reserve for recent expenses.

events.name: Attend Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended the Wednesday afternoon class at the Serenity Yoga Lifestyle Studio. Under the guidance of her yoga partner He Lu, she practiced breathing techniques and basic yoga postures, focusing on relaxing the tense shoulders and neck caused by prolonged sitting and writing. After the class, she felt somewhat more physically relaxed, but a slight discomfort in her back emerged while organizing her belongings.

events.name: Post-class Communication with He Lu
events.description: After the yoga class, He Lu noticed an improvement in her posture and encouraged her to maintain it. The two had a brief chat at a nearby café, catching up on each other's recent updates.

events.name: A Sincere Conversation with Mentor Professor Wu Mingyuan
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei met with Professor Wu Mingyuan at a quiet teahouse near the school. She provided a detailed report on her thesis defense and her preliminary post-graduation plans, such as continuing to work on her collection of essays and embarking on cultural travels, and sincerely expressed her gratitude for her mentor’s guidance over the past four years. Professor Wu acknowledged her talent and hard work, shared his own experiences of literary exploration in his youth, and encouraged her to remain true to her original aspirations.

events.name: Receiving Books from Mentor and Recording Reflections
events.description: At their parting, Professor Wu presented her with a personally signed collection of essays as a keepsake. After bidding farewell to her mentor, Sun Yuwei returned home, carefully stored the gifted book, and recorded the key points from their earnest conversation along with her own reflections in her journal, bringing her university life to a warm and meaningful close.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation

结束状态.心情: Touched and Fulfilled

2025-05.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei refined the travel budget in preparation for the hiking activity, gained creative inspiration from brisk walking in the rain, wrote an article at a bookstore in the afternoon, packed her belongings in the evening, and set off for Dali to embark on the long-awaited graduation trip.

events.name: Record fund allocation and refine travel budget
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei recorded the fund allocation results in her personal journal and detailed the budget for the upcoming Dali cultural trip, reserving travel expenses from the money fund, thereby completing the preliminary establishment of her personal financial management system.

events.name: Preparing for a Hiking Photography Activity
events.description: She prepared for the hiking photography activity by purchasing comfortable hiking shoes and a lightweight backpack. She borrowed a mirrorless camera from a senior member of the photography club and learned its basic operations to ensure she could use it on the day of the event. While organizing her belongings, she experienced a slight increase in back strain and decided to avoid carrying heavy items.

events.name: Advance the Father's Birthday Commemorative Album Project
events.description: Sun Yuwei continued to privately contact her mother and sister to advance the plan for her father's birthday commemorative album. She collected old photos for scanning and digital processing, and purchased scrapbooking materials such as stickers and washi tape to decorate the album.

events.name: Gaining Inspiration from Brisk Walking in the Rain
events.description: During her morning brisk walk, a sudden light rain began to fall. Instead of immediately seeking shelter, she slowed her pace to feel the drizzle and observe the crowd hurriedly taking cover in the park. Upon returning home, she meticulously recorded this [unexpected tranquility] and the diverse scenes of people she had witnessed in her journal. Her anxiety was further alleviated in the rain, and these observations became new material for her prose writing.

events.name: Writing Prose Chapters at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the Mingyuan Bookstore, her frequent haunt, and settled into her familiar corner spot to write a chapter of her essay on the urban landscape of Kunming and the culture of independent bookstores. She observed the readers in the bookstore and the street scenes outside, weaving her immediate impressions into her writing. She also engaged in a brief conversation with the bookstore owner, Qin Mingyuan, to gain some local cultural perspectives.

events.name: Pack up and set off for Dali.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei packed her travel luggage, took her notebook, camera, and other necessary items, and boarded an overnight train to Dali, embarking on her long-awaited graduation trip. Along the way, she reflected on the changes over the past half-month, feeling hopeful about her future creative work and life, though the discomfort in her back reminded her to take care and rest.

起始状态.心情: Busy Anticipation

结束状态.心情: Excited and calm, but with slight back discomfort.

2025-05.daily_overview: At the end of a busy week nearing graduation, Sun Yuwei found her thoughts scattered between travel plans and manuscript work. In the evening, discussing travel arrangements with her roommate filled her with anticipation, though a slight increase in anxiety led to a bit more snacking than usual.

events.name: Initiate preliminary discussion on graduation trip online
events.description: In the evening, after finishing the writing work, I initiated a voice call in the dormitory WeChat group to discuss the trip to Dali, shared the budget ceiling, and discussed the number of days, homestays, and transportation, adopting a Dutch treat approach.

events.name: Finalizing the processing of column manuscripts.
events.description: In the morning, I refined the manuscript on the culture of Kunming Old Street in my home study, adjusting details based on the editor's feedback to ensure it was submitted before the afternoon deadline. Due to the pressure, I ate only lightly.

events.name: Organize recent journal entries and inspiration fragments
events.description: In the afternoon, I organized my journal, pasted reading notes and street scene observations, and sorted out writing clues, but my attention was scattered, occasionally leading to procrastination.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed yet expectant, travel discussions bring warmth, though anxiety is slightly eased.

2025-05.daily_overview: I had a fulfilling weekend by participating in a hiking photography event for the first time, which allowed me to push my limits and gain valuable experiences and materials. However, the muscle soreness after the hike affected my rest at night.

events.name: First time participating in the hiking photography club activity
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by my close friend Zhang Jing, I participated in the "Cuihu-Yunda University Cultural Route" hike. Using a mirrorless camera to capture light and shadow, I expended considerable physical energy but remained mentally invigorated, accumulating creative materials.

events.name: Share Activity Photos and Reflections
events.description: After returning home, I imported the photos for selection and adjustment, then shared them in private chats and the roommate group chat, receiving enthusiastic responses. However, there was noticeable soreness in my legs.

events.name: Discover and Register for Online Writing Workshops
events.description: In the evening, I browsed the official account to register for the online lecture "Fieldwork and Literary Writing," noted down the time, and experienced mild insomnia due to excitement.

events.name: Having dinner with family
events.description: During dinner, we shared interesting stories from the hike, and our parents reminded us to take care of our health, creating a warm family atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and curious, nervous yet looking forward to outdoor activities.

结束状态.心情: Excited and fulfilled, with physical soreness but mental delight, looking forward to the lecture.

2025-06.daily_overview: After encountering a major professional crisis due to the sudden damage of her laptop, Sun Yuwei spent an anxious and passive day. She underwent a psychological shift from feeling helpless on her own to seeking external help. While awaiting the repair results and seeking support from friends, she tentatively decided to replace the device and began to confront the financial risks associated with freelancing.

events.name: Repair and Waiting
events.description: Early in the morning, Sun Yuwei took the damaged laptop to the repair center. The staff informed her that a detailed inspection would take a day. During the wait, she felt restless, worrying both about the lost manuscript data—including a column article nearing its deadline—and the potentially high repair costs. She attempted to continue writing at home using her phone, but her efficiency was extremely low, and a sense of anxiety lingered.

events.name: Apply for Extension and Communicate
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei explained the situation of her computer malfunction to editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat, attaching a photo of the repair center's receipt and requesting a brief extension for the upcoming manuscript deadline. Editor Xu promptly replied, expressing understanding and advising her to prioritize resolving the equipment issue. This brought her some relief, though the pressure of the impending deadline was not entirely alleviated.

events.name: Preliminary Assessment and Inquiry
events.description: Before the afternoon shower arrived, Sun Yuwei sat in her home study, unable to focus. She began searching online for the prices and configurations of new laptops, roughly calculating her savings and the creative reserve fund specifically set aside for the publication of her essay collection. Realizing this might be an expense far beyond her expectations, she felt a preliminary sense of financial pressure.

events.name: Seeking Emotional Support
events.description: As anxiety and a sense of helplessness continued to build up in her heart, Sun Yuwei thought of Song Wen, a fellow freelance writer based in Chengdu, guessing that he might understand such a predicament. After a moment of hesitation, she proactively reached out to Song Wen on WeChat, detailing the incident of her computer malfunction, the potential loss of work progress, and the intense anxiety it had caused, hoping to find some resonance and advice.

events.name: In-depth Communication and Obtaining Advice
events.description: Song Wen quickly replied and proactively initiated a voice call. During the nearly two-hour conversation, Song Wen shared a similar painful experience of losing drafts due to early equipment failures, provided specific file backup solutions (such as recommending reliable cloud storage and suggesting backup frequency), and shared several cost-effective channels for purchasing or repairing computers that she considered worthwhile. Their discussion evolved from specific work crises to the common psychological pressures and self-management challenges faced by freelancers. Song Wen’s optimistic yet pragmatic attitude provided great comfort to Sun Yuwei.

events.name: Maintenance Results and Difficult Decisions
events.description: In the evening, the repair center called to inform that the diagnosis indicated a burnt-out motherboard, with repair costs approaching half the price of a new machine and no guarantee of complete data recovery. Sun Yuwei discussed the matter over the phone with her father, Sun Mingyuan, who, considering work efficiency and long-term usage, suggested purchasing a new computer directly. After some internal struggle and taking into account Song Wen's advice, Sun Yuwei ultimately decided to forgo the repair. She used part of her creative reserve fund and emergency fund, totaling approximately 8,000 yuan, to place an online order for a new laptop.

events.name: Reflection and Preliminary Actions
events.description: After ending the call with Song Wen and placing the order, Sun Yuwei felt significantly relieved. Sitting by the window, she gazed at the rain-washed street and began organizing the practical advice provided by Song Wen. She also reflected on the professional habits (such as the lack of timely backups) and the deficiency in risk awareness that this incident had exposed. She resolved to establish a more comprehensive safeguard system in the future.

events.name: Contacting Roommates to Arrange a Small Gathering
events.description: To pull herself out of depression and with graduation approaching, Sun Yuwei proactively contacted her roommate Zhao Xiaowen, who was also in Kunming, via WeChat. She suggested a small gathering before graduation to share updates and strengthen their friendship. The two happily agreed to meet on June 19 and chose a newly opened cultural and creative café on Wenlin Street, which both found appealing, as the venue.

events.name: Check for updates on online photography courses.
events.description: Before going to bed, she remembered the online photography course she was taking, checked this week's learning topic—Fundamentals of Light and Shadow Application—on her phone, and took brief notes, trying to bring some order back to her life.

events.name: New: Urgent editing revision task received unexpectedly
events.description: In the evening, editor Xu Mingyuan sent a message inquiring about revision suggestions for a column article, which required a prompt reply. Sun Yuwei stayed up until midnight to handle the matter, resulting in a delay in her sleep.

起始状态.心情: Anxiety, helplessness, concern

结束状态.心情: Weary yet somewhat calm, with a sense of relief after making a decision and a faint worry about the future.

2025-06.daily_overview: Upon the arrival of the new computer, Sun Yuwei began the data recovery and resetting process with mixed emotions. The frustration over losing some of her manuscripts intertwined with the hope for improved efficiency brought by the new device, prompting her to take personal financial management more seriously and continue advancing her writing tasks.

events.name: Unboxing and Setting Up a New Computer
events.description: In the morning, the new laptop was delivered by express courier. Sun Yuwei unboxed, powered on, and performed the basic system setup in her home study. Touching the brand-new chassis, she felt both anticipation for the new tool and a pang of regret over the significant expense.

events.name: Attempt data recovery
events.description: She attempted to recover documents from the old hard drive retrieved with assistance from the maintenance center, but unfortunately, the drafts and some materials that had not been backed up in the recent week were permanently lost. Facing the blank documents and the sporadically recovered old files, she felt profound frustration and learned a hard lesson.

events.name: Reinstalling Software and Resuming Work Rhythm
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei reinstalled the writing software, office tools, and necessary professional applications. Although the process was tedious, it gradually helped her detach from the chaos of the previous day and begin rebuilding her work environment.

events.name: Present and Communicate with Family
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei showed her parents the new computer and briefly recounted the incident. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, once again emphasized the importance of backup and work planning, while her mother, Li Xiulan, was more concerned about her emotional state, advising her not to be overly anxious. The family's care made her feel warmth and support.

events.name: Working Late on Manuscripts and Financial Reflections
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei used her new computer to resume working on the overdue column article. During a break, she meticulously recorded the unexpected expenditure of 8,000 yuan, updating the simple financial page in her personal ledger. This crisis prompted her to reflect deeply, leading to a firm resolution to strictly adhere to a monthly budget in the future. She also began earnestly considering the establishment of a more comprehensive equipment reserve fund or researching relevant insurance. On WeChat, she briefly confided in Song Wen about the frustration of losing her data and her experience using the new computer. Song Wen once again expressed empathy and encouraged her to look ahead.

events.name: Handling Supervisor Email Feedback
events.description: Before going to bed, she checked her email and received feedback from her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, on the previously submitted draft chapters of her dissertation. She quickly reviewed the issues pointed out by Professor Wu, such as overly lyrical passages in certain sections and the need to verify historical sources in some places, and planned to focus on making revisions tomorrow.

events.name: Study the Theory of Light and Shadow in Photography
events.description: During the half hour before bedtime, Sun Yuwei systematically studied the fundamental theories of light and shadow application in photography through an online course platform in her home study. This included the impact of light direction, texture, and color temperature on the emotional tone of an image. She also compiled detailed notes in preparation for practical exercises over the weekend.

events.name: New addition: Slight physical discomfort due to staying up late
events.description: Due to staying up late the night before, Sun Yuwei felt slightly dizzy and decided to rest early to recover.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation is tinged with frustration over data loss.

结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued, but the work pace is beginning to return to normal. The sense of financial crisis prompts deeper reflection.
