2025-08.daily_overview: This was the highlight of the trip—meeting Song Wen, a long-time online confidante, in person. Their half-day in-depth conversation, spanning from industry dilemmas to life reflections, from gift exchanges to spiritual resonance, greatly solidified and elevated their friendship, infusing each other with profound emotional and professional support.

events.name: In-depth Meeting with Song Wen at the Cafe
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived early at the "Wuzao" café on Yulin Road and chose a quiet corner by the window. Song Wen arrived punctually, and the two hit it off immediately. From the afternoon until the city lights began to glow, their conversation never ceased: they shared the ups and downs of their freelance writing careers, their confusion about industry competition, and their uncertainties and plans for the future. They exchanged gifts (Sun Yuwei’s flower cakes and washi tape, and Song Wen’s panda bookmark and a collection of essays by a local Chengdu writer). This meeting far surpassed their online exchanges, as body language and eye contact fostered deeper understanding and trust.

events.name: Have dinner together and continue the conversation.
events.description: In the evening, still not wanting to part ways, the two went to a highly recommended skewer hot pot restaurant nearby, led by Song Wen. Amid the lively and spicy atmosphere, they continued their conversation, delving into more everyday topics. Song Wen encouraged Sun Yuwei to stick to her writing style and invited her to consider collaborating on some projects in the future.

events.name: Return to the residence and reflect on the emotions.
events.description: Returning to the hostel in the evening, Sun Yuwei's heart was still racing with excitement. She meticulously recorded every detail of today's meeting in her journal, jotting down many reflections, and sent a message to Song Wen: "I was especially happy today, thank you. It feels like we've known each other for a long time as old friends." Song Wen quickly replied with equally warm words.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit nervous and immensely excited about the upcoming important meeting.

结束状态.心情: Full of energy, emotion, and profound satisfaction, the joy of friendship taking root

state.今日运动: Walking and conversing with friends involve substantial psychomotor activity.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last day of her trip, Sun Yuwei embarked on a solo journey to explore independent bookstores, immersing herself in the search for materials and inspiration. In the evening, she returned with a wealth of discoveries and the warmth of newfound friendships. Late at night, she arrived back at her familiar home in Kunming and began planning a farewell gathering with her college roommates.

events.name: Exploring Independent Bookstores in Chengdu Alone
events.description: Following her pre-planned itinerary, Sun Yuwei visited "Fangsuo" and another independent bookstore specializing in social science books on her own. She lingered for a long time under the grand book gallery of "Fangsuo," experiencing the majestic atmosphere created by the spatial design and book displays. In the smaller bookstore, she briefly exchanged ideas with the owner about their book selection philosophy. She purchased several Taiwanese literary books that are not easily found in Kunming, as well as an academic work on urban space studies.

events.name: Returning to Kunming
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei set out from the youth hostel to Shuangliu Airport and boarded a flight back to Kunming. After the plane landed, she took the airport express bus home. When she arrived home late at night, her parents were already asleep, so she washed up quietly.

events.name: Organizing Travel Experiences and Initiating Dormitory Gatherings
events.description: Though exhausted, Sun Yuwei still unpacked and arranged the books and souvenirs she had brought back from her trip. As she flipped through the photos taken with Song Wen, warmth filled her heart. Thinking that the new semester was approaching and her roommate Zhou Lin would soon leave for Shenzhen, she proposed in their dormitory WeChat group: "Is everyone free this weekend? Xiaowen, Linlin, shall we get together at that newly opened Yunnan creative cuisine restaurant on Wenlin Street? Let's treat it as a farewell for Linlin and also celebrate our last summer vacation." Zhao Xiaowen and Zhou Lin quickly responded and began coordinating their schedules.

events.name: Random Event: Late Night Due to Flight Delay
events.description: The slight delay of the return flight caused Sun Yuwei to arrive home later than expected, disrupting her normal routine.

起始状态.心情: Contentment tinged with a faint melancholy of the journey coming to an end.

结束状态.心情: Fatigue from the journey, yet the heart is filled with new knowledge and old friends, content and serene.

2025-08.daily_overview: After returning from her trip, Sun Yuwei needed to handle tasks such as manuscript revisions and coordinating gatherings. She actively sought external feedback and engaged in in-depth discussions with peers due to writing bottlenecks. In her daily life at home, the sense of openness brought by the journey continued to resonate.

events.name: Method for Recording Communications with Song Wen
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei chatted with Song Wen on WeChat, mentioning her dietary mood diary. Song Wen was very interested and shared his experience of using a mobile app to fragmentarily record emotions and inspirations. The two discussed the pros and cons of paper-based writing versus electronic recording. Sun Yuwei insisted that the slowness and focus of the handwriting process itself serve as a form of healing and reflection, and she decided to continue using a notebook.

events.name: Read through and preliminarily polish the dietary essay
events.description: Sun Yuwei printed out the draft of her completed dietary essay and sat on the bay window in her study, reading through the entire text as a reader would. She circled several slightly verbose sentences, repetitive adjectives, and areas with logical leaps using a red pen. She then proceeded with the first round of revisions on her computer to make the language more concise and fluid.

events.name: Seeking feedback on the manuscript from close friends and peers
events.description: After making revisions, Sun Yuwei sent the draft to her close friend Zhang Jing and fellow writer Song Wen, asking them to provide the most intuitive feedback and suggestions from the perspectives of an ordinary reader and an industry peer, respectively. She specifically mentioned her concerns about balancing "personalization" and "public relevance."

events.name: Confirm and book the dormitory dinner gathering.
events.description: After repeated coordination with Zhao Xiaowen and Zhou Lin in the group chat, it was finally decided to have a dinner gathering this Friday evening (the 15th). Sun Yuwei called to reserve a small private room at the creative cuisine restaurant on Wenlin Street and shared the successful reservation confirmation and address in the group.

events.name: Discussing Writing Block with Song Wen via Voice Communication
events.description: While revising another essay in the evening, Sun Yuwei felt stuck in expressing emotions. She proactively initiated a WeChat voice call with Song Wen, and they talked for nearly an hour. They confided in each other about the common self-doubt and creative bottlenecks in writing, sharing their respective experiences of overcoming such challenges. Song Wen’s empathy and encouragement provided her with new perspectives and strength.

events.name: Random Event: Morning exercise canceled due to hot weather.
events.description: With higher temperatures in the morning, Sun Yuwei decided to skip her morning brisk walk and instead read at home.

起始状态.心情: A slight sense of lethargy after traveling, with accumulated tasks to be handled.

结束状态.心情: Return to tranquility and order after social interactions and problem-solving

2025-08.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei's day is filled with a variety of activities: from a warm appointment with her mother, to detailed observation and inspiration gathering on Wenlin Street; from handling manuscript submissions, to taking practical action to add greenery to her study. She simultaneously progresses in balancing multiple dimensions: maintaining family bonds, advancing work, and fulfilling her personal aesthetic needs.

events.name: Arranging a weekend family activity with my mother.
events.description: During dinner, Mother Li Xiulan suggested, "Weiwei, would you like to go to the market with me on Saturday morning? Then we can cook lunch together, and I'll teach you how to make steamed pot chicken." Sun Yuwei, considering her dietary observations and goal of improving life skills, happily agreed. The mother and daughter arranged to set off at eight o'clock on Saturday morning.

events.name: Observations and Sketches of Wenlin Street by Day and Night
events.description: Sun Yuwei spent most of the day conducting immersive observations on Wenlin Street. During the daytime, she recorded the tranquility of bookstores as they first opened and the scattered learners in cafes. From evening into the night, she observed the gradually increasing flow of people after work and school, the warm glow of bookstore lights, and the performances of street artists. Using her camera and written notes, she captured the changing atmosphere of the neighborhood across different time periods, accumulating a wealth of material.

events.name: Submit column manuscripts and communicate with editors
events.description: In the afternoon, she formally sent the two completed column articles, "The Western Hills After the Rain" and "Day and Night on Wenlin Street," to editor Xu Mingyuan via email, and briefly communicated online regarding layout details and potential publication dates.

events.name: Go to Dounan Flower Market to select green plants for the study.
events.description: Inspired by a trip to the vegetable market with her mother, Sun Yuwei decided to add some greenery to her study. She took the subway to Dounan Flower Market, where, in the vast marketplace, she consulted her florist friend Su Man in real time via WeChat. Ultimately, she selected an elegantly shaped bird's nest fern and a charmingly plump lithops (a type of succulent).

events.name: Place green plants and experience the spatial transformation.
events.description: After bringing the green plants home, Sun Yuwei carefully wiped the leaves and flowerpots. She placed the bird's nest fern on the top shelf of the wooden bookcase beside her desk, where the light was soft, and positioned the lithops pot on the windowsill where it could receive bright, indirect sunlight. Once adjusted, the fresh greenery instantly brought a vibrant vitality to the study. Sitting at her desk, she savored the joy and tranquility brought by this subtle change and casually sketched a simple drawing of the green plants in her notebook.

events.name: Regular Yoga Practice
events.description: In the evening, she attended her yoga class as usual, relaxing the fatigue from the day's busy schedule and observations through breathing and stretching.

起始状态.心情: Calmly planning today's field research and procurement tasks.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and delightful, I have completed multiple plans and feel satisfied with the minor renovation of the study.

state.今日运动: One hour of yoga, approximately two hours of walking for inspiration gathering.

2025-08.daily_overview: This was a fruitful day. The two-week dietary observation officially concluded, with Sun Yuwei completing a profound summary; her morning spent with her mother was filled with the passing down of life skills and warmth; her significant cultural essay was successfully submitted; she began consciously managing her personal finances and calculating travel expenses. Life practice, emotional connection, professional achievement, and financial awareness converged on this day.

events.name: Summary of Two-Week Dietary Mood Diary
events.description: In the afternoon, after flipping through the thick diary, Sun Yuwei used differently colored sticky notes to mark recurring patterns: 1. Anxiety/stress is highly correlated with cravings for high-sugar snacks; 2. When dining with family or friends, signals of pleasure and satiety are clearer, and eating feels more natural; 3. During periods of high physical activity, hunger sensations are genuine and distinct. At the end of the diary, she wrote a one-page summary, with the core conclusion being: compared to mechanically following external rules, it is more important to learn to recognize and respect the body's genuine signals and emotional needs in different situations. Instead of establishing new rules, she decided to carry this "awareness" into her future life.

events.name: Going to the Traditional Market with Mother
events.description: On Saturday morning, Sun Yuwei and her mother, Li Xiulan, walked together to the largest traditional wet market near their home. Her mother acted like a tour guide, introducing the specialties of each stall: the mushrooms here were the freshest, the tofu over there was homemade. Her mother taught her how to check if the mushroom caps were firm and how to judge the freshness of vegetables by their natural fragrance. Encouraged by her mother, Sun Yuwei picked out several types of vegetables and a piece of tender tofu on her own.

events.name: Learn to Cook Homestyle Dishes from Mother
events.description: After returning from the market, instead of taking over all the tasks, the mother involved Sun Yuwei in preparing lunch. She demonstrated how to safely wash and handle mushrooms like the "blue-staining" bolete, personally teaching her knife skills and chopping rhythm. Under her mother's guidance, Sun Yuwei completed her first independently stir-fried dish—garlic-flavored water spinach. Meanwhile, the mother took charge of the more complex steamed pot chicken.

events.name: Family Lunch and Emotional Communication
events.description: During lunch, the family gathered around the table. Father Sun Mingyuan tasted the stir-fried water spinach prepared by Sun Yuwei and gave his approval. Mother shared amusing anecdotes about learning to cook when she first started working. Because she had contributed her own efforts to the meal, Sun Yuwei found it exceptionally delicious. In her diary, she specifically noted the profound sense of satisfaction brought by this "creation and sharing," which felt entirely different from emotional eating.

events.name: Submission of Food Culture Essay
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei formally submitted her finalized essay "Taste Buds of Awareness: A Kunming Girl's Notes on Dietary Transformation" via email to Xu Mingyuan, an editor at Cultural Horizons. In the email, she briefly explained that the article originated from her long-term personal practice and observations.

events.name: Organize Travel Expense Receipts for Chengdu Trip
events.description: She retrieved all the electronic payment record screenshots, flight ticket orders, and a small number of paper receipts from her trip to Chengdu, and began sorting and organizing them to prepare for calculating the total expenses.

events.name: Record life inspirations and consult friends
events.description: While strolling through the vegetable market and seeing the vibrant flowers and vegetables, Sun Yuwei thought her study needed more vitality. In the evening, she consulted Su Man via WeChat. Su Man recommended shade-tolerant and easy-to-care-for plants such as bird's nest fern and rabbit's foot fern, shared maintenance tips, and arranged to visit Dounan together next time to make a selection.

events.name: Random event: Went to bed early due to mild indigestion
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei experienced mild indigestion and decided to retire early to allow her body to recover.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the summary of activities and observations with my mother.

结束状态.心情: A bountiful and fulfilling day, filled with learning, gains, and the warmth of family affection, leaving the heart tranquil and content.

2025-08.daily_overview: At the end of August, Sun Yuwei experienced several closures: the cognitive shift in her observation plan was internalized; her column articles were recognized and she received payment for them; travel expenses were clearly accounted for, achieving a positive financial cycle; and she had a warm yet slightly sentimental farewell dinner with her college roommate. On this day, with concrete data and genuine emotions, she validated and strengthened her confidence in the life of a freelance writer.

events.name: Cognitive Transformation in Internalizing Dietary Observation
events.description: Reviewing her diary summary, Sun Yuwei realized that true healthy eating is not about battling rigid black-and-white rules, but rather learning to coexist harmoniously with her own body and emotions, treating it as part of the pursuit of overall physical and mental balance. This understanding freed her from the previous anxiety of "what to eat," bringing her a greater sense of psychological peace and autonomy.

events.name: Received the manuscript acceptance notice and the manuscript fee
events.description: In the morning, editor Xu Mingyuan replied to the email, notifying her that her article "The Awareness on the Tip of the Tongue" had been accepted and highly praised the depth and uniqueness of the piece. Shortly afterward, her mobile banking app received the August column fee payment from "Cultural Horizon," totaling 3,200 yuan. She confirmed the amount was correct and saved a screenshot.

events.name: Calculate the total expenses for the Chengdu trip
events.description: Based on the receipts she organized yesterday, she detailed the expenses for the Chengdu trip on paper: airfare, accommodation, dining, transportation, shopping, etc. After summing them up, the total came to approximately 1,800 yuan.

events.name: Perform monthly simple bookkeeping
events.description: Sun Yuwei opened her budgeting app and recorded the 3,200 yuan from her writing as "Freelance Writing Income," while logging the 1,800 yuan travel expense under "Cultural Travel—Chengdu." The app-generated monthly income and expenditure chart clearly showed that, after covering this "luxury" cultural trip, her writing income for the month still left a surplus of 1,400 yuan. She noted this result in her journal and added: "Writing is enough to support me in seeing the sights I wish to see. At ease."

events.name: Farewell Dinner with College Roommates
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei went to the creative cuisine restaurant on Wenlin Street to meet up with Zhao Xiaowen and Zhou Lin. The three of them ordered a modified version of Yunnan cuisine and chatted while eating. They shared their respective experiences from the summer break (Sun Yuwei’s column and travels, Zhao Xiaowen’s internship at a publishing house, Zhou Lin’s aspirations and anxieties about Shenzhen), reminisced about amusing moments from their four years as roommates, and also envisioned the future. They made a promise that even if they were far apart, their dormitory group chat should remain lively, and they would try to organize a group trip at least once a year.

events.name: Strolling Farewell on Wenlin Street
events.description: After dinner, the three of them took a stroll along the familiar Wenlin Street, passing by the bookstore and milk tea shop they often visited. At the street corner, they hugged and bid farewell, wishing each other well. Watching Zhou Lin and Zhao Xiaowen walk away, Sun Yuwei felt a touch of sadness at parting, but more than that, she held heartfelt blessings for each other's future and unwavering confidence in the enduring nature of their friendship.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle the finalization of manuscripts and financial matters.

结束状态.心情: Complex yet predominantly positive. There is a sense of reluctance at the departure of a roommate, but even more so, a solid sense of accomplishment stemming from professional recognition and the achievement of financial independence, coupled with a clear confidence in the future.

2025-08.daily_overview: On a typical Saturday, Sun Yuwei spent her day engaging in relaxed social interactions and sharing minor professional achievements, though she stayed up slightly later than usual due to excitement over a published article.

events.name: WeChat appointment with best friend
events.description: In the morning, after finishing her writing tasks for the day in the study, Sun Yuwei sent a WeChat message to her close friend Zhang Jing: [Are you free tomorrow afternoon? Shall we meet at our usual spot? I’d like to talk to you about the article I recently published.] Zhang Jing quickly replied, expressing her anticipation. The two happily agreed to meet the following afternoon at their favorite independent café on Wenlin Street. Sun Yuwei promptly marked the appointment in her phone calendar.

events.name: The article has been officially published.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei received a WeChat notification from Xu Mingyuan, editor of *Cultural Horizon*, informing her that her food essay "Awareness on the Tip of the Tongue: A Kunming Girl's Notes on Dietary Transformation" had been fully promoted across all online platforms. She immediately clicked the link and saw her meticulously crafted words, paired with the fresh images selected by the editor, formally presented to readers. A small yet solid sense of accomplishment welled up inside her.

events.name: Social Sharing and Interaction
events.description: After the article was published, Sun Yuwei shared the link in her social media feed and several close group chats, along with a brief reflection. Soon, she received likes from her parents, congratulations from her close friend Zhang Jing and roommates, and a message from fellow writer Song Wen praising it as [profoundly written!]. She replied with thanks to each one, immersed in the joy of having her work recognized and shared, and excitedly browsed through the comments late into the night.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to stay up late and binge-watch a series.
events.description: In the evening, feeling cheerful, Sun Yuwei spontaneously decided to watch an episode of a long-collected literary drama to relax, which led to staying up half an hour later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the new day.

结束状态.心情: Content and pleased, yet with a slight fatigue from staying up late.

2025-08.daily_overview: This Sunday was dedicated to deep conversations and inner reflection, though the gathering with close friends led to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: In-depth Conversation and Dinner with Best Friend Zhang Jing
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei and Zhang Jing sat by the window at the [Cicada Café] on Wenlin Street. Sun Yuwei shared her feelings and reflections after publishing her article, while Zhang Jing talked about the busyness of the new semester and her hesitation about applying for an in-service postgraduate program. As their conversation deepened, the two ordered signature cakes and milk tea, enjoying a relaxing time together. Sun Yuwei openly expressed her confusion about whether to continue freelance writing or seek a stable job after graduation. Zhang Jing, from a teacher's perspective, analyzed the education industry and encouraged her to explore ways to combine her writing strengths with a stable career. The two confided in each other, analyzed the pros and cons, and agreed to become [witnesses] and [supporters] of each other's life choices. Zhang Jing also gifted her a copy of *General Educational Psychology*, hoping to offer her inspiration from a different perspective.

events.name: Initial Compilation of Summer Practice Report
events.description: After parting ways with Zhang Jing and returning home, Sun Yuwei brewed a cup of tea and settled down in her study. She turned on her computer and began reviewing the entire summer’s work on the [Spring City Footprints] column. She organized the links to all published articles, the backend reading data, and a selection of reader comments, while also flipping through a thick stack of interview notes and photographs. The core framework of a report gradually took shape in her mind, but due to feeling slightly full after the dinner gathering, her efficiency was somewhat lower.

events.name: Sharing Party Photos and Online Interaction
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei carefully selected several photos taken during a recent gathering with her university roommates. After making simple color adjustments using a mobile app, she shared them in the dormitory WeChat group [404 Fairy House]. She wrote: [Suddenly came across the photos from that night. I really miss the times when we chatted and laughed together.] This immediately sparked enthusiastic responses from Liu Jia, Zhao Xiaowen, and Zhou Lin.

events.name: Confirm the yoga classes for next week.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei remembered her health plan and sent a WeChat message to her yoga partner He Lu to confirm that the class times for next Wednesday and Saturday remained unchanged. He Lu replied with an [OK] gesture and shared a link to a newly opened vegetarian restaurant, suggesting they could try it together after class if they had time.

起始状态.心情: Relax, with a slight excitement akin to that before an appointment.

结束状态.心情: Thoughts are complex yet feel understood; friendship and food bring a sense of fulfillment, though there is a slight weight gain.

state.今日运动: Walking (round trip to the café) takes about 40 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Showers turning to clear skies, with fresh air.

2025-08.daily_overview: Monday was spent amidst continuous positive feedback and focused academic efforts, though fatigue set in from staying up late to complete a report.

events.name: Continuously Receiving Article Feedback
events.description: The article "Awareness on the Tip of the Tongue" continues to gain traction. Sun Yuwei noticed more comments from unfamiliar readers on social media, with some sharing their own dietary changes and others admiring her nuanced observations of local culture. Her mother, Li Xiulan, made a special phone call to say that colleagues at her school had also read the article and praised her daughter's writing skills. Editor Xu Mingyuan sent a message stating that the article's performance metrics were strong and encouraging her to continue delving deeper into this style that blends personal experience with cultural reflection.

events.name: Plan future creative directions
events.description: Based on the success and feedback of the article, Sun Yuwei began contemplating the future. She considered expanding this model of [personal transformation practice + cultural observation] to other areas, such as consumption habits and digital life. She jotted down a few vague topic ideas in her notebook and planned to find an opportunity to discuss the possibility of a series column in depth with editor Xu Mingyuan.

events.name: Writing the practice report in the library until late at night.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived at a quiet corner of Yunnan University Library, carrying her laptop and materials. She turned off her phone notifications and immersed herself in writing her practical report. She provided a detailed account of the entire process of the "Spring City Footsteps" column, from topic selection and interviews to writing and publication, with a focus on analyzing how to apply the theories of narratology and sense of place learned in class to specific street interviews. Due to her intense concentration, she worked until the library closed and continued revising the report until the early hours of the morning after returning home.

events.name: Slight headache due to staying up late.
events.description: Late at night, after finishing her report, Sun Yuwei felt a slight headache and decided to rest early to recover.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to engage in work and study.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet filled with a sense of accomplishment, the flow experience brought by report writing satisfied her, but staying up late led to discomfort.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the library

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday revolved around planning, family affection, and academic guidance, with excitement stemming from the mentor's encouragement to stay up late.

events.name: Planning and Reading
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei organized the content of yesterday's conversation with Zhang Jing into the "Life Reflections" section of her journal. She listed Zhang Jing's suggestions regarding part-time graduate studies, her own concerns about freelancing, and the potential hybrid career paths she might explore. Afterward, she opened the book "General Educational Psychology," which Zhang Jing had given her, and read several chapters. Although not directly related to writing, the discussions on learning motivation and cognition unexpectedly provided her with a new perspective to reflect on her own creative process.

events.name: Father extends an invitation for a walk.
events.description: In the afternoon, Father Sun Mingyuan sent a WeChat message: "Weiwei, I've noticed you've been staring at the computer a lot lately. If you're free this weekend, how about joining me for a walk around Cuihu Lake in the evening? The lotus flowers are still in bloom." Sun Yuwei read the message, feeling a warm glow in her heart.

events.name: Reply to Father Confirming the Invitation
events.description: She immediately replied: [Sure, Dad, I'm free on Sunday afternoon. What time should we leave?] The father and daughter quickly settled on leaving home at 4:30 PM on Sunday.

events.name: Discussing the Practice Report with the Supervisor
events.description: As scheduled, Sun Yuwei arrived at Professor Wu Mingyuan’s office in the College of Liberal Arts in the evening. She nervously reported an overview of her summer internship and submitted the first draft of her report. After a quick review, Professor Wu first affirmed her attempt to integrate academic theory with creative practice, [which was highly meaningful]. He then advised, [The theoretical reflection section could be explored more deeply. Don’t stop at ‘applied’; you could discuss how your practice confirms, supplements, or even challenges existing theories.] He also recommended two reference books on [nonfiction writing ethics] and [urban ethnography]. Feeling greatly encouraged, Sun Yuwei returned home and excitedly studied the recommended books late into the night.

起始状态.心情: Calm down, ready to sort out thoughts.

结束状态.心情: Greatly inspired, her mentor's affirmation and guidance gave her a clearer understanding of the connection between academic studies and creative work, leaving her too excited to sleep.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Wednesday, I conducted information gathering and career discussions during the day, and in the evening, I enjoyed a quiet and heartwarming walk with my father around Cuihu Lake, cherishing the precious parent-child bonding time.

events.name: Collect information and communicate with close friends
events.description: During the day, Sun Yuwei searched online for information about the long-term career paths for freelance writers, the operation of self-media platforms, and application details for on-the-job postgraduate programs, particularly in cultural studies and journalism and communication. She compiled several useful links and key points into a document, shared it with Zhang Jing via WeChat, and added a note: [Jing, what do you think about this direction?] The two continued their online discussion about future plans.

events.name: Going to Cuihu Park with My Father
events.description: At half past four in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei and her father Sun Mingyuan set out from home together, walking to the nearby Cuihu Park. On the way, her father asked her how her recent writing work was going.

events.name: Strolling and Conversing by the Lakeside
events.description: In the park, the father and daughter strolled slowly along the lakeside. Unlike the mother, who inquired about every detail, the father was more concerned about her workload and long-term plans. "Don't overwork yourself," the father said. "I've read the articles you wrote—they're quite good, full of thoughtful ideas." Sun Yuwei shared some updates about her column and recounted her previous trip to Chengdu. The father listened quietly, occasionally nodding.

events.name: Enjoying the Sunset and Lotus Flowers Together
events.description: As the sun set in the west, golden sunlight bathed the blooming lotuses on the lake. The park was filled with citizens taking leisurely walks or exercising, creating a tranquil and peaceful atmosphere. The father and daughter paused by a waterside pavilion, gazing at the scene before them. Without exchanging many words, they shared a silent, harmonious sense of calm.

events.name: Returning home from a walk and performing light stretching
events.description: As dusk fell, Sun Yuwei and her father slowly walked home along the path they had taken. After arriving home, she performed some simple leg stretches to alleviate the fatigue from walking.

events.name: Sharing the feelings of walking with my mother
events.description: Upon returning home, mother Li Xiulan had already prepared dinner. At the dinner table, Sun Yuwei proactively mentioned seeing beautiful lotus flowers during her evening walk with her father. Mother listened with a smile and said, "Your father just loves the tranquility there." The family atmosphere was warm and cozy.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful

结束状态.心情: Warm and tranquil, the father's company and the evening scenery soothed the mind.

state.今日运动: I took a walk with my father for about an hour in the evening and did some light stretching after returning home.

2025-08.daily_overview: Thursday focused on wrapping up academic tasks and preparing for the practice of a new lifestyle, staying up late due to cooking attempts.

events.name: Revise and Improve the Practice Report
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei revised the report in her home study based on Professor Wu Mingyuan's feedback. She focused on strengthening the theoretical reflection section, adding analysis on how her interview methods reflected the theory of "thick description" and how the narrative of the article constructed a "sense of place," thereby enhancing the report's academic depth. After adjusting the logic, the overall text reads more smoothly and powerfully.

events.name: Submit Summer Internship Report
events.description: After making the revisions, Sun Yuwei carefully proofread the text for typos and formatting errors. She then logged into Yunnan University's practical teaching management system, uploaded the final version of the report in PDF format, and filled in the necessary information, such as the practical unit and duration. After clicking the [Submit] button, she let out a long sigh of relief—an important summer task was officially completed.

events.name: Inspiration for Vegetarian Cooking Emerges
events.description: While tidying up the room, Sun Yuwei came across several packs of specialty spices and Sichuan peppercorns she had brought back from Chengdu. Recalling the steamed pot chicken that her mother Li Xiulan often made—a dish loved by the whole family—she suddenly had an idea: Could she recreate a [vegetarian version of steamed pot chicken] using locally sourced fresh mushrooms and homemade tofu? This would not only be a fusion of Chengdu flavors but also an attempt to showcase the deliciousness of vegetarian cuisine to her family.

events.name: Purchasing mushrooms and preparing tofu until late into the night.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the vegetable market near her home and carefully selected several seasonal mushrooms, such as termitomyces, boletus, and old man's head. She then visited a grain and oil shop to purchase high-quality soybeans. Upon returning home, she thoroughly washed the soybeans and soaked them in water, planning to make tofu the next morning. In the evening, she studied vegetarian recipes until late, excitedly planning the cooking steps.

events.name: Schedule an appointment with the supervisor to discuss the thesis topic
events.description: As the summer internship has come to an end, the academic year paper needs to be put on the agenda. Sun Yuwei sent an email to her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, briefly explaining her intention to explore the direction of her academic year paper by integrating her urban observation experience from the summer internship. She also requested a meeting for guidance on the afternoon of August 23 (Saturday).

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to complete the report.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed with a touch of anticipation, the completion of the report brought a sense of relief, and there is eagerness to try something new (vegetarian cooking), though staying up late has left a slight weariness.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the market

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday is a day for reaping family recognition and warm affection, with healthy eating habits beginning to show results.

events.name: Decided to enjoy a quiet weekend afternoon.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei gazed at the bright sunshine outside the window and decided not to schedule any outings for tomorrow afternoon. Instead, she would spend a purely leisurely afternoon at home, blending reading, journaling, and music. She checked her journaling supplies box—the washi tapes and stickers were still sufficient—and created a playlist titled [Weekend Immersion] in advance on her music app.

events.name: Making Tofu and Handling Mushrooms
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei used a soy milk maker to grind the soaked soybeans into soy milk, then slowly coagulated it with bittern to form a firm, square block of traditional tofu. In the afternoon, she began carefully washing the various types of mushrooms she had purchased. She set aside some of the higher-quality termite mushrooms for later use, while the remaining mushrooms (including porcini and *Lactarius volemus*) were cut into pieces. These were then placed in a small clay pot with ginger slices and water, simmered over low heat to create a fragrant mushroom broth.

events.name: Cooking "Vegetarian Steamed Pot Chicken"
events.description: As evening fell, the cooking entered its crucial stage. Sun Yuwei cut the homemade tofu into bite-sized pieces and placed them into the family heirloom steam pot along with the prepared whole termite mushrooms and other mushroom chunks. She poured in the prepared mushroom broth, added a small amount of Hanyuan peppercorns brought back from Chengdu and a few goji berries. After covering the pot with its distinctive pointed lid, she placed it over the fire to steam slowly over a low flame. Steam circulated within the pot, condensing into broth that gradually drew out and blended the umami flavors of the ingredients.

events.name: Dinner Sharing and Recognition
events.description: At dinner time, Sun Yuwei brought the steaming [Vegetarian Steamed Pot Chicken] to the table, its broth clear yet rich with a savory aroma. She explained to her parents the inspiration behind the dish and the ingredients used. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, took a sip of the soup first, savored it carefully, and nodded, saying, "Hmm, it's very flavorful, no less delicious than real chicken." Her mother, Li Xiulan, was both surprised and delighted: "Oh my, is this all made with mushrooms? How can the soup be so rich? Weiwei, tell me how you made it!"

events.name: Family relationships are warming up.
events.description: The dinner was exceptionally heartwarming. Not only did Mother inquire in detail about the cooking methods, but she also expressed that the family could try more such vegetarian dishes in the future. Although Father did not say much, he nodded in tacit agreement. Sun Yuwei felt an unprecedented warmth and reassurance as she watched her parents accept and appreciate her creation. For the first time, she felt that her lifestyle choice had received such specific and positive recognition from her family.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely and full of passion for cooking

结束状态.心情: Happy and content, the sense of family support is incredibly strong, and a healthy diet brings a feeling of lightness.

state.今日运动: Light household chores (meal preparation)

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday was busy yet fulfilling, with exercise recovery bringing renewed vitality.

events.name: A Surprise at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: After the rain stopped in the morning, Sun Yuwei wanted to visit Mingyuan Bookstore to seek some inspiration. Upon entering, she noticed that the street-facing display window had been carefully arranged—right in the center was a printed copy of her latest published article, "Awareness on the Tip of the Tongue," surrounded by dried flowers and vintage stationery. The bookstore owner, Qin Mingyuan, walked over with a smile and said, "Xiao Sun, your article is truly well-written. I printed it out to show the neighbors the thoughts of our local young people." The two chatted for quite a while about the discussion in the article regarding food and local culture, and Mr. Qin also recommended an old book about the culinary history of Yunnan.

events.name: Confirm the thesis direction with the supervisor.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived punctually at Professor Wu Mingyuan's office. She presented a comprehensive reflection on her summer internship experience and shared her preliminary ideas for her thesis direction: exploring how urban flâneurs like herself construct a unique sense of place through non-fiction writing. Professor Wu highly approved of this approach, believing that transforming personal creative practice into academic inquiry holds significant value. He offered more specific suggestions: she could focus on a historical district in Kunming (such as Wenlin Street or the area around Green Lake), analyze the differences in spatial narratives in texts by various writers (including herself), and recommended several key works in the fields of cultural geography and urban anthropology.

events.name: Organizing Mentor Suggestions and Planning
events.description: After the meeting with her supervisor, Sun Yuwei did not head home immediately. Instead, she turned into a quiet café on campus. She ordered a cup of honey pomelo tea, and as soon as she sat down, she opened her laptop and notebook, meticulously recording the research topic suggestions, recommended readings, and key discussion points provided by Professor Wu. She made a preliminary plan for the tasks over the next few weeks: first, to thoroughly study the core theoretical books recommended by her supervisor; then, to reorganize the text of her [Spring City Strolls]; and finally, to draft a detailed thesis outline. Her thoughts suddenly became much clearer.

events.name: Evening Brisk Walk at Green Lake
events.description: Before heading home, Sun Yuwei made a last-minute decision to take a brisk walk for half an hour in Cuihu Park, enjoying the fresh air after the rain and feeling her energy restored after the exercise.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to planning a trip to the bookstore for self-improvement.

结束状态.心情: With clear objectives and strong motivation, I am excited about the upcoming academic exploration and feel a sense of pleasure after exercise.

state.今日运动: Walk to and from the bookstore and school, and take a brisk 30-minute walk around Cuihu Lake in the evening.

2025-08.daily_overview: A perfect Sunday that aligns with Sun Yuwei's ideal involves immersing oneself in reading and staying up late.

events.name: Career Retrospection and Internalization of Motivation
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei reflected on the creative journey of the entire August edition of the "Spring City Footsteps" column. She organized photos of the window display at Qin Mingyuan Bookstore, the positive feedback from editors, and the heartwarming reader comments from the backend. These external affirmations were internalized by her as a firm motivation to continue delving deeper into urban observation writing. In her notebook, she wrote: "Writing is not only about expression but also about connection—connecting me with the city and connecting me with others." She then began brainstorming potential topics for September, such as "Variations of Autumn Cuihu Lake."

events.name: Create an immersive afternoon atmosphere
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei carried out the plan she had made the day before. She brewed a pot of osmanthus oolong tea in a glass teapot in the kitchen, its fragrance lingering in the air. Carrying the tea set to the single armchair by the bedroom window, she turned on the Bluetooth speaker, connected it to her phone, and played a pre-selected album by an independent musician. Gentle melodies began to flow through the room. Sunlight filtered softly through the sheer curtains, creating the perfect little corner for solitude.

events.name: Immerse in Reading "The Submarine at Night"
events.description: She nestled into the sofa, opened Chen Chunsheng's "The Submarine in the Night," and soon immersed herself in those magnificent and extraordinary worlds of imagination. From afternoon until evening, she remained almost motionless, embarking on a profound spiritual journey through the words, deeply moved by the author's delicate perception and extraordinary imagination.

events.name: Journal Recording and Creation
events.description: Closing the book, her emotions remained unsettled for a long time. She took out her beloved journal and stationery box, first meticulously writing down her reading reflections with a fountain pen and copying several passages that had deeply moved her soul. Then, she carefully selected Japanese-style washi tapes and botanical specimen stickers to decorate the pages. Finally, she even used a watercolor brush to dip a small amount of paint, gently blending it along the page edges to mimic the soft lavender hues of the evening sky outside the window. The entire creative process was quiet and focused, lasting late into the night.

events.name: Seeking Course Selection Advice from the Advisor
events.description: In the evening, thinking about the upcoming course selection, Sun Yuwei contacted Professor Wu Mingyuan via WeChat. She briefly explained her strong interest in his course [Studies on the Evolution of Modern Chinese Prose] for the next semester, as it directly relates to her plan for creating a prose collection, and sought her advisor's advice. Professor Wu quickly replied, affirming that the course would greatly benefit her theoretical foundation and creative perspective, and revealed that the course would focus on analyzing several contemporary prose writers she admires.

events.name: Propose a Family Movie Night Activity
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei suggested to her parents: "Mom, Dad, how about we watch a movie together this weekend? I found a documentary about traditional Yunnan cuisine, and it seems quite interesting." Her mother, Li Xiulan, was the first to respond, and her father, Sun Mingyuan also nodded in agreement. They tentatively scheduled it for either Friday or Saturday evening.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to a Sunday of your own.

结束状态.心情: With a rich inner world, one feels serene and content, though staying up late brings a slight sense of weariness.

2025-08.daily_overview: Monday focused on transactional wrap-ups and new semester planning, with a cozy family movie night followed by a late bedtime.

events.name: Final Proofreading Practice Report
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei conducted another thorough read-through and proofreading of the submitted summer internship report to ensure there were no overlooked typos or formatting issues. She adjusted the headers and footers, checked the formatting of the references, and confirmed that this was the final version ready for archiving.

events.name: Share the Results with the Editor
events.description: After confirming everything was correct, Sun Yuwei shared the report with editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat. She wrote: "Editor Xu, I have completed my summer internship report. This internship was greatly facilitated by the opportunity provided by the 'Spring City Footprints' column, allowing me to gain a deeper understanding of the entire content creation process. Thank you for your guidance." Editor Xu replied with congratulations and expressed anticipation for her new work in September.

events.name: Research Course Selection for the Next Semester
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei logged into the course selection system of Yunnan University and browsed the list of elective courses for the next semester in the Chinese Department. She focused on reviewing the details of the course titled "Studies on the Evolution of Modern Chinese Prose": 3 credits, taught by Professor Wu Mingyuan, with a syllabus covering the development of prose from the May Fourth Movement to the contemporary era, along with close reading of texts and practical writing sessions. This perfectly met her needs, and she listed it as her top choice.

events.name: Preparing for a Family Movie Night
events.description: In the evening, after clearing the dining table with her mother, Sun Yuwei joined her father in arranging the living room. They adjusted the sofa, drew the curtains, and set up the projector and screen. Sun Yuwei also took care to wash a plate of fruit, brew a pot of Pu'er tea, and arrange the flower cakes her mother had bought on small plates.

events.name: Family movie viewing and discussion until late at night
events.description: Everything was ready. The family of three sat on the sofa and began watching the documentary about Yunnan's culinary culture. Whenever she saw familiar scenes, the mother, Li Xiulan, couldn't help but offer explanations, while the father, Sun Mingyuan, would supplement with historical background knowledge from his perspective. Sun Yuwei listened with great interest, occasionally asking questions. After the documentary ended, they chatted about family stories in a warm atmosphere, not dispersing until quite late.

起始状态.心情: Methodically prepared to handle backlogged matters

结束状态.心情: Warm and relaxing, family activities bring happiness, though staying up late is slightly tiring.

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday's activities revolved around the start of the new semester, with the first attempt at morning running.

events.name: Successful Course Selection
events.description: As soon as the course selection system opened, Sun Yuwei logged in promptly, quickly found the course "Studies on the Evolution of Modern Chinese Prose," and clicked the "Select Course" button. The system indicated that the course selection was successful, and she breathed a sigh of relief. To avoid any unexpected issues, she also selected two backup courses: "Introduction to Folk Literature" and "Creative Writing Workshop."

events.name: First Attempt at Morning Running
events.description: Inspired by her trip to Chengdu, Sun Yuwei decided to try morning jogging. She woke up at 6 a.m., went to Cuihu Park, completed a slow run of approximately 3 kilometers, and enjoyed the solitude of the early morning. However, due to haste, she did not perform adequate stretching.

events.name: Develop a Course Reading Plan
events.description: After her morning run, Sun Yuwei began taking action based on the reference books mentioned in the course syllabus. She first searched the online system of Yunnan University Library and successfully reserved two printed books: "A History of Modern Chinese Prose" and "The Prose Course." She then marked several other e-books or books to purchase on Douban, compiling them into a clear [New Semester Booklist].

events.name: Sharing Course Selection Information with Roommates
events.description: She shared the news of her successful course selection in the dormitory WeChat group. Liu Jia replied that she had also secured a spot in the educational psychology course she wanted to take, while Zhao Xiaowen planned to stay in Kunming for an internship. Zhou Lin was still deliberating over the job offer from Shenzhen. Everyone exchanged their plans for the new semester.

events.name: Recording Family Memory Inspiration
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei browsed through her journal and recorded the story fragment about the old Kunming snack "Governor Shaomai" that her mother mentioned during the family movie night and conversation. She realized that these family oral histories themselves are valuable local cultural materials.

起始状态.心情: Positive, with a touch of nervousness akin to that before rushing to register for classes or morning runs.

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of successfully achieving goals, the anticipation for the new semester, and feeling energetic after morning jogging but with slight discomfort in the calves.

2025-08.daily_overview: Address morning running injuries and adjust the exercise plan on Wednesday.

events.name: Manage mild soreness in the right calf muscle.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei felt a slight soreness and tightness in the muscles of her right calf, recalling that it was caused by insufficient stretching after her morning run the previous day. She decided to rest for the day, avoid strenuous exercise, and performed gentle stretching along with a warm compress.

events.name: Borrowing Course Books from the Library
events.description: In the afternoon, after the discomfort in her calf had eased, Sun Yuwei went to the library of Yunnan University to retrieve the books she had reserved the previous day: *A History of Modern Chinese Prose* and *The Prose Course*. She skimmed the prefaces and tables of contents in the reading room, gaining a preliminary understanding of the course structure.

events.name: Procurement of Healthy Ingredients
events.description: After leaving the library, she went to a large chain bookstore in the city center and purchased a copy of "A Beginner's Guide to Vegetarian Recipes." She then visited a supermarket and a farmers' market to buy plant-based ingredients such as quinoa and chickpeas.

events.name: Draw the September schedule and make adjustments
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei sat at her desk drawing up a September schedule. Based on her injury experience, she adjusted her morning run frequency to twice a week and emphasized the importance of post-exercise stretching. The table was drawn clearly and neatly.

起始状态.心情: Motivated to take action, but slightly irritated by discomfort in the calves.

结束状态.心情: Enrichment, planning confidence derived from a structured lifestyle, and enhanced health awareness through injury management.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, I will conduct systematic organization and decluttering at home, and begin exploring urban corner photography.

events.name: Plan the Digital Archives
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei decided to systematically organize her scattered works. She first contemplated and established a classification system for the archive: a three-tier categorization based on publication platforms, article types, and creation years. She then compiled a list of all her published articles.

events.name: Begin collecting and organizing works
events.description: After planning, she began to take action. She retrieved the original manuscript from her computer folder, dug out the revision exchanges with the editor from her email and WeChat chat records, and downloaded the final versions of the articles from the backend of various publishing platforms. She initially gathered these materials into a main folder named [Writing Archives-2025.08].

events.name: Clearing away snacks to create a distraction-free environment
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei organized her desk drawers and the snack cabinet at home, packing up all the unhealthy snacks. Some were given to her neighbor Auntie Xie, while the rest were disposed of. Looking at the now-empty snack area, she felt as though a significant obstacle had been removed.

events.name: Start Urban Corner Photography Exploration
events.description: In the evening, as the rain ceased, Sun Yuwei took her portable camera and went out to search for the subtle yet resilient traces of life in the streets and alleys of Kunming, such as moss on walls and wildflowers in abandoned corners. She captured several photographs, gathering material for the "Forgotten Corners of the City" column.

events.name: Gain New Column Inspiration
events.description: After the photoshoot, while browsing a photography book on urban ecology at Mingyuan Bookstore, she became even more convinced of this column theme. She immediately jotted down the inspiration in her notebook.

结束状态.心情: The sense of order brought by tidying up intertwines with the excitement of new inspiration.

events.name: Establish a system for creating an archive of works

Following the predefined classification system, she sorted the articles and manuscripts into their respective subfolders. She also created individual record documents for each article, filling in the metadata.

events.name: Continue Urban Corner Photography Exploration
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei went out again, focusing on the ancient neighborhoods near Cuihu Park to capture autumn leaves and architectural details, accumulating more material for her column.

events.name: Attempting to Prepare Healthy Meals and Receiving Support
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei followed a newly purchased recipe to prepare quinoa vegetable salad and plain hummus. She invited her mother, Li Xiulan, to taste the dishes together. Her mother expressed support for her dietary adjustment plan.

events.name: Working overnight to organize archives due to job requirements.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei devoted herself to organizing the archives, completing the backup and resume update until quite late.

events.name: Afternoon Yoga Class Resumes

events.name: Arranged with yoga partner to explore new studios.
events.description: After class, Sun Yuwei and He Lu agreed to visit the newly opened vegetarian restaurant after class next Wednesday, and they exchanged insights on healthy eating.

events.name: Organizing Meeting Notes and Planning

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last day of August, I spent the day with morning runs, planning, and preparations, maintaining a positive and steady state.

events.name: Morning run attempt successful
events.description: At 7 a.m., Sun Yuwei got up and went to Cuihu Park, where she completed a 3–4 kilometer jog. She focused on maintaining a steady pace and proper breathing, enjoying the solitude of the early morning. After the exercise, she felt energized and performed thorough stretches.

events.name: Communication on Royalty Settlement and Refinement of September Planning
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei communicated with editor Xu Mingyuan about the settlement process for the August manuscript fees, and the editor informed her that the payment is expected to be credited within a week. At home, she refined the specific topics and fieldwork schedule for the "Autumn in Kunming" series of articles.

events.name: Purchase new journaling supplies

events.name: Preparing for the September Schedule
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei organized the new stationery into her pencil case and wrote on the first page of her new journal: "September, meet a better version of myself." She checked the items needed for the start of school the next day, set the alarm clock in advance, and ensured a regular routine.

2025-09.daily_overview: The senior year commenced in the crisp autumn. Sun Yuwei returned to campus with new plans, switching to a compact dual-track mode of "academics + writing," and kicked off September with a deliberate "healthy start" ritual. On the same day, her mother Li Xiulan also returned to campus to resume teaching, synchronizing the family rhythm back to the routine of the academic semester.

events.name: Morning Health Kickstart with Vegetarian Breakfast
events.description: Sun Yuwei deliberately woke up half an hour earlier than usual and unrolled her yoga mat in the living room bathed in morning light. She practiced 15 minutes of Hatha yoga, focusing on her breath and simple asanas to awaken her body. Afterward, she carefully prepared an exquisitely plated vegetarian breakfast for herself: oatmeal topped with local blueberries and a few walnut slices, paired with a cup of hot soy milk. She then recorded this in the "Healthy Living" section of her journal.

events.name: Registration for the New Semester and Course Planning
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei walked to Yunnan University. The campus was bustling with the unique vibrancy of a new semester. She collected the detailed course schedule for the term at the College of Liberal Arts office, carefully reviewed the timings of compulsory and elective courses, and silently planned the allocation of time for writing articles and papers in her mind.

events.name: Initial Exploration of the Library and Drafting of the Writing Plan
events.description: After a simple vegetarian lunch at the cafeteria, Sun Yuwei went to the library and deliberately chose a quiet seat by the window. She first read the introductory literature for the first course of the new semester, "Modern Prose Studies," and then opened her notebook to outline a preliminary writing timeline for September based on the course schedule and confirmed column assignments, ensuring that her academic and professional commitments would not conflict.

events.name: Organizing Summer Status and Family Dinner
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei first organized the books she had read during the summer vacation and the collected scrapbooking materials, symbolically clearing space for her "creative mind." Then, using the remaining mushrooms and leafy greens from the refrigerator, she cooked herself a light vegetable soup for dinner. After the meal, she meticulously recorded her reflections from the first day in her scrapbook, highlighting the two key phrases: "maintain the rhythm" and "focus on the present."

events.name: Prepare the Outline for Tomorrow's Supervisor Meeting
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei sat at her desk and systematically organized the scattered thoughts in her mind about her senior year. She listed several tentative directions for her thesis topic (such as "The Literary Imagery of Kunming's Old Streets and Alleys"), questions about course selection for the semester, and concerns about balancing freelance writing with academic research. This allowed her to prepare a clear discussion outline for the meeting with her mentor, Wu Mingyuan, the following day.

起始状态.心情: Calmness carries a subtle anticipation for new beginnings, tinged with a hint of tension toward the demanding schedule ahead.

结束状态.心情: Full and orderly. Through planning and documentation, a preliminary sense of control over the new semester has been established, alleviating tension.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today marks a pivotal day in establishing a rhythm. In the early morning, Sun Yuwei solidified her tentative morning run into a regular habit. During the day, an in-depth discussion with her advisor outlined a clear blueprint for her senior year studies. In the evening, the support from her family provided a warm footnote to it all.

events.name: The morning running routine has been officially established.
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Sun Yuwei changed into her sportswear and headed to Cuihu Park for the first time with the mindset of following a "fixed schedule" rather than just "giving it a try." She jogged slowly along the lakeside, feeling the morning chill gradually dissipate as her body generated warmth. For the first time, she used a fitness app to record her activity, completing a 3-kilometer jog. While stretching afterward, she looked at the data on the app, and a sense of fulfillment from "forming a habit" welled up inside her.

events.name: Plan the Senior Year Academic Schedule with Supervisor Wu Mingyuan
events.description: In the literature department's office, filled with stacks of books, Sun Yuwei engaged in an hour-long, in-depth conversation with her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan. She presented her prepared outline, and after listening patiently, Professor Wu suggested that her academic year paper could focus on "the writing of a sense of place in the urban transformation of Kunming." He also recommended several core theoretical works. Furthermore, he encouraged Sun Yuwei to elevate her observations of local culture from her column writing to the level of academic reflection. This guidance revealed the possibility of integrating the two pursuits and greatly boosted her confidence.

events.name: Summarizing Meeting Key Points and Formulating Action Plans
events.description: After the meeting, Sun Yuwei did not leave the school immediately. Instead, she sat down in the library's lounge area and promptly compiled the meeting highlights, the confirmed thesis direction, the booklist recommended by Professor Wu, and the required courses into electronic notes while the details were still fresh in her mind. She also drafted a preliminary action plan for the next four weeks, balancing both the collection of research materials and the writing of her thesis.

events.name: Sharing Academic Plans with Parents
events.description: In the evening, the family of three had dinner together. Sun Yuwei shared in detail the insights gained from her meeting with her mentor and the direction she had decided on for her senior year. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, nodded frequently as he listened, while her mother, Li Xiulan, inquired with concern about the academic pressure and expressed that the family would fully support her studies and creative endeavors. The affirmation from her family made her feel deeply reassured.

events.name: Archiving Last Month's Work and Initiating New Topics
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei organized all the August draft manuscripts, email correspondences, and income records in the study. Subsequently, she sent a brief thank-you email to editor Xu Mingyuan, confirming the previous cooperation agreement, and began preliminary online research for the first topic mentioned during the meeting, "Phenological Notes of Kunming in Autumn."

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, carrying a slight sense of excitement about implementing the new plan.

结束状态.心情: Filled with motivation and clarity. The academic framework is in place, family support is solid, and the path ahead feels clear.

2025-09.daily_overview: Progressing steadily through regular classes and writing assignments. The morning literature theory class brought inspiration, the afternoon yoga session served as routine maintenance for body and mind, and the focused writing at night allowed her to enter a state of flow. Due to the pressure of writing deadlines, she stayed up slightly later tonight.

events.name: Attend a Literary Theory Course
events.description: The morning's "Contemporary Literary Criticism Theory" class delved deeply into the content, with the professor mentioning the theory of "Space and Memory," which resonated precisely with the theme of her planned column and the direction of her thesis. Sun Yuwei jotted down several key concepts in the margins of her textbook, intending to conduct further research after class.

events.name: Communication in Regular Yoga Classes
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived punctually at the Serenity Yoga Life Studio. Under the guidance of Coach He Lu, she focused particularly on postures designed to alleviate shoulder and neck issues caused by prolonged sitting. After the class, the two sat for a while at the vegetarian café next to the studio. Sun Yuwei shared her experiences adapting to the new semester, while He recommended a tremella mushroom soup recipe suitable for nourishing dryness in autumn.

events.name: Conceive and draft the initial manuscript for the column
events.description: In the evening, only a desk lamp was lit in the study at home. Drawing inspiration from the day’s classroom discussions and her recent observations of the city, Sun Yuwei began writing her column piece titled "The Forgotten Corners of the City." She attempted to capture the complex emotions of silence, decay, and renewal in the old industrial district with delicate strokes of her pen, focusing on transforming her personal experiences into empathetic prose.

events.name: Working overnight to meet the deadline.
events.description: Inspired by a sudden burst of creativity, Sun Yuwei decided to write a bit longer and unknowingly passed her usual bedtime. She completed most of the first draft but felt somewhat fatigued, planning to rest earlier tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to embrace a day of structured learning.

结束状态.心情: A sense of satisfaction tinged with slight fatigue after focused work. The first draft is mostly complete, with an interesting connection emerging between theoretical knowledge and creative practice.

events.name: Morning jog and listening to podcasts during breakfast
events.description: On her second scheduled morning run, Sun Yuwei felt a bit more at ease than the day before. While running, she listened to a podcast about urban history through her earphones, gathering background knowledge for her creative work. During breakfast, she continued listening and jotted down useful points in her notebook.

events.name: Collecting Literature Materials for Academic Year Thesis
events.description: According to Professor Wu's reading list, Sun Yuwei spent the morning at the school library and the electronic reading room. She searched for Chinese literature on "sense of place" and "urban anthropology," preliminarily downloaded over ten related papers, and began organizing them in a folder named "Thesis Material Repository."

events.name: Revise and Finalize the Column Article
events.description: In the afternoon, she returned home and meticulously revised the draft from the previous night. She rearranged the order of several paragraphs to enhance logical progression, trimmed overly personal digressions, and added an association inspired by a historical photograph, thereby enriching the cultural depth of the article.

events.name: Submission of Manuscript and Follow-up Planning
events.description: In the evening, after thoroughly reviewing the entire text to ensure its accuracy, Sun Yuwei sent the manuscript titled "Moss and Rails: A Silent Walk Through an Old Industrial District" via email to editor Xu Mingyuan. In the email, she briefly explained her creative intentions and inquired about the timeline for subsequent feedback. Once the email was successfully sent, she felt a wave of relief and promptly checked off one of her core tasks for the week in her planner.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and clear on tasks

结束状态.心情: Feeling both relieved and accomplished. A task has been successfully completed, and academic preparations have also gotten off to a good start.

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday passed with unexpected twists. The main writing task was completed, seeds of interest quietly sprouted while browsing, plans for preparing a holiday surprise for my mother began to take shape, and a computer malfunction brought an unplanned trouble, leading to anxiety and a temporary change in diet.

events.name: Confirmation of Manuscript Submission and Initial Feedback
events.description: Upon receiving the automatic reply from Editor Xu and the brief confirmation email stating "Received, feedback will be provided early next week," Sun Yuwei felt somewhat reassured, knowing that the manuscript had entered the review process.

events.name: Encountering Inspiration: Planning a Visit to an Old Industrial District
events.description: During her lunch break, while browsing Douban, Sun Yuwei was drawn to a photo album titled "Urban Ruins Aesthetics." One of the photographs bore a striking resemblance to an old factory area on the outskirts of Kunming that she had heard about before. Instantly, she felt a strong urge to experience the place firsthand. She began earnestly searching for the specific location, transportation options, and historical background of the area, deciding to embark on a weekend trip—without a camera—solely for the purpose of pure observation and personal reflection.

events.name: Planning a Teacher's Day Surprise
events.description: Thinking of the upcoming Teachers' Day, Sun Yuwei, combining her mother Li Xiulan's preferences with her own skills in flower arrangement and scrapbooking, initially decided to handcraft an Ikenobo-style bouquet and design a unique thank-you card. She began searching for bouquet inspiration on Pinterest.

events.name: The laptop suddenly malfunctioned.
events.description: As evening approached and she prepared to start writing some casual essays, Sun Yuwei's laptop suddenly went black and could not be restarted despite repeated attempts. She checked the power supply and outlets, but to no avail, leading her to initially conclude it was a hardware issue. This left her somewhat anxious, as the laptop contained many writing materials and resources that had not been backed up. Following the advice of her father, Sun Mingyuan, she contacted the official after-sales service and scheduled an inspection for the following day.

events.name: Anxiety Eating
events.description: Frustrated by a computer malfunction, Sun Yuwei changed her dinner plans at the last minute and ordered takeout brown sugar bubble tea and flower cakes as emotional comfort, resulting in the intake of extra calories.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a touch of leisure due to the completion of the main tasks.

结束状态.心情: Slightly vexed and concerned. The excitement of exploration is dampened by the inconvenience caused by computer malfunctions and potential data risks, while a loss of control over diet adds to the sense of guilt.

2025-09.daily_overview: A Saturday filled with exploration and family warmth. The morning was a solitary yet profound spiritual journey, satisfying the INFP's thirst for inner experiences; the evening was a moment of sharing creative vegetarian dishes with family, where a healthy lifestyle naturally blended into the family setting, though weekend meals were slightly more indulgent.

events.name: A Solitary Visit to the Site of an Old Industrial District
events.description: After a simple breakfast, Sun Yuwei took a bus to the outskirts of the city. More than an hour later, she stepped alone into the quiet, abandoned factory area. It was empty, with only the sound of wind whistling through broken windows and the sight of wild grass growing unchecked. She slowed her pace, touching the mottled brick walls with her hands, deciphering the faded slogans, and observing the symbiotic relationship between rusted machinery and resilient plants. She did not take any photos, instead using all her senses to absorb the tranquility and the weight of time, feeling a strange sense of peace and fulfillment within.

events.name: Return Journey and Inner Reflection
events.description: In the afternoon, she took the bus back to the city. On the return journey, she remained immersed in the atmosphere of that space. Unlike usual, she did not scroll through her phone but simply gazed at the passing street scenes outside the window, allowing the sights and feelings from earlier to slowly settle in her mind.

events.name: Preparing a Creative All-Vegetarian Dinner for the Family
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei suggested to her parents that they try a fully vegetarian dinner. She personally prepared the meal, simmering fresh Russula virescens and various mushrooms to create a vegetarian broth as the base for "Crossing the Bridge Rice Noodles," and also stir-fried seasonal vegetables. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, praised the mushroom soup highly, while her mother, Li Xiulan, was pleased to see her daughter's commitment to healthy eating. The dinner atmosphere was warm and pleasant, but Sun Yuwei, in high spirits, ended up having an extra bowl.

events.name: Initial Record of Visit Impressions
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei used keywords and brief sentences to jot down on a spare notebook the most touching moments and images from her daytime visit (such as "dandelions on the railway tracks" and "the shape of peeling red wall paint"), to prevent forgetting the details, and planned to organize them into her journal in detail the next day.

起始状态.心情: Filled with curiosity and slight nervousness towards the exploration of the unknown.

结束状态.心情: Rich and serene. The solitary explorations of the day bring profound spiritual fulfillment, while the warmth of family provides a sense of belonging, creating a complex and full emotional experience.

state.今日运动: Approximately 2-hour walking exploration in the suburban old industrial district
