2025-09.daily_overview: A rainy Sunday spent handling miscellaneous tasks and online communication. The computer repair brought unexpected expenses, while preliminary discussions with the editor lent greater structure to professional collaboration. Transforming yesterday's experiences into journal entries completed a perfect personal archive, as weekend meals continued to increase slightly.

events.name: Laptop Repair Service
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by her father, Sun Yuwei took her computer to the after-sales service center. After inspection, it was determined to be a motherboard malfunction requiring part replacement. The repair cost exceeded her expectations, representing a significant unplanned expense. She paid the fee and felt relieved that most of her important files had been backed up to the cloud.

events.name: Warm-up communication with editor Xu Mingyuan regarding the manuscript.
events.description: In the afternoon, she proactively contacted editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat. After briefly discussing the creative background of the submitted manuscript (mentioning the inspiration from the on-site visit), she politely inquired about the approximate timeframe for feedback. Editor Xu replied that he had already reviewed it preliminarily and found it promising, agreeing to have a detailed phone conversation on Monday.

events.name: Record the visitation experience in detail in the notebook.
events.description: Without the computer, Sun Yuwei found herself better able to focus on pen and paper. She opened her journal and used two full pages to document yesterday's visit to the old industrial district. Not only did she describe in detail the sensory experiences and inner emotions, but she also painted partial sketches of the rusted railway tracks and the textures of the walls with watercolors, and attached the bus ticket stubs. The process itself felt like both a revisit and a creative endeavor.

events.name: Reading and Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, curled up on the sofa, Yuwei read a lighthearted Japanese essay while listening to the rain outside, allowing the weekend to come to a close in relaxation. She began to realize that evenings without a computer could also be quite peaceful, though she did snack on some treats as a form of leisure.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit lazy and slightly down due to computer malfunction and rainy weather.

结束状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of relief. The miscellaneous tasks have been completed, journaling brings a sense of satisfaction, and communication with the editor is also reassuring.

2025-09.daily_overview: The new week commenced with efficient professional collaboration. The in-depth communication with the editor in the morning provided her with valuable insights, further clarifying her career path. The afternoon session kept pace with cutting-edge developments. In the evening, she made substantial preparations for the Mother's Day surprise, though the continuous workload brought about a slight sense of pressure.

events.name: Conduct in-depth communication with editor Xu Mingyuan regarding the manuscript.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei had a video call lasting about 40 minutes with editor Xu Mingyuan via Tencent Meeting. Editor Xu highly praised the article for its unique perspective and refined writing style. By sharing his screen, he provided detailed suggestions for revision section by section, such as strengthening the logical transition in certain parts and simplifying some adjectives. What excited her even more was that Editor Xu proactively proposed the concept of the "Autumn in Kunming" series, inviting her to jointly plan the manuscripts for the next two months. This marked her transition from a single-article contributor to a more stable collaborative partner.

events.name: Cultural Studies Course
events.description: In the afternoon elective course "Cultural Research Methodology," techniques for field research and in-depth interviews were introduced. Sun Yuwei listened with particular attentiveness, feeling that these methods could be useful for future non-fiction writing and academic papers.

events.name: Go to the Dounan Flower Market to select floral materials.
events.description: After school, Sun Yuwei took the subway directly to the Dounan Flower Market. Amidst the dazzling array of flowers, she carefully selected seasonal floral materials for Ikenobo-style flower arrangement (such as small chrysanthemums and Nandina domestica berries), as well as a bouquet of carnations and lilies suitable as a gift for her mother. She also purchased handmade cards and specialty paper to prepare thank-you cards.

events.name: Start planning the autumn column series
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei began preliminary planning for the "Autumn in Kunming" series, listing several potential themes such as ginkgo, osmanthus, and autumn rain. She also contemplated how to integrate academic research into the project, which led to her staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat nervous about the morning communication meeting, but more so looking forward to it.

结束状态.心情: Feeling inspired and open-minded, yet slightly fatigued. Positive professional feedback and long-term planning have filled her with motivation, and the process of preparing a gift for her mother has also been filled with joy.

2025-09.daily_overview: A day focused on revising and implementing plans. The morning run brought a clear mind for polishing the manuscript. During the day, revisions were efficiently completed based on feedback, and reservations were made for tomorrow evening's family celebration, though stress led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Morning Run and Conceptual Revision
events.description: While on her morning run, Sun Yuwei repeatedly pondered Editor Xu's revision suggestions in her mind. The crisp air kept her thoughts clear, and by the latter half of her run, she had already formed a clear idea of how to adjust the article's structure.

events.name: Revise the manuscript based on editorial feedback
events.description: After retrieving her repaired computer, Sun Yuwei spent the entire morning focused on revising the manuscript. Following the suggestions, she strengthened the logical progression of the article from "personal reflections" to "universal insights," trimmed redundant descriptions, and made the language more concise and impactful. After completing the revisions and reading through the piece once more, she felt the article had indeed been elevated to a higher level.

events.name: Submit the revised draft and make a restaurant reservation.
events.description: In the afternoon, she sent the revised manuscript to Xu Mingyuan once again, briefly outlining the main revisions in the email. Following that, she called to reserve a small private room at a restaurant renowned for its tranquil ambiance and authentic mushroom hotpot for tomorrow evening. She also discreetly coordinated with her father, Sun Mingyuan, to ensure the surprise would proceed smoothly.

events.name: Video call with cousin Shen Wei
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a video call with her cousin Shen Wei in Hangzhou, sharing her recent career progress and stress. Shen Wei encouraged her to persist in writing and discussed some financial management ideas to help alleviate her anxiety.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, ready to devote to work.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed. The manuscript revisions have been highly completed, the celebration arrangements for tomorrow evening are already in place, and social support has alleviated the pressure.

2025-09.daily_overview: A day filled with warmth, surprises, and multiple intertwined roles. I was both a grateful daughter and an invited reader representative, as well as an explorer drawn to outdoor activities. The celebration of Teachers' Day became a recharging station for family affection, while the gathering led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Final Confirmation of Manuscript Receipt and Bookstore Invitation
events.description: In the morning, she received an email from Editor Xu, who expressed satisfaction with the revised manuscript and confirmed its usability. At the same time, she received a WeChat message from Qin Mingyuan, the owner of Mingyuan Bookstore, inviting her to serve as a reader representative and deliver a five-minute speech at a small-scale book-sharing session next week, sharing insights about a collection of essays on the customs and scenery of Yunnan. She felt both honored and somewhat nervous but agreed to the invitation.

events.name: Offering Teacher's Day blessings to mother
events.description: When her mother returned home for a midday break, Sun Yuwei presented her with a hand-arranged bouquet in the Ikenobo style and a handwritten card. The card was filled with gratitude for her mother's guidance and admiration for her work as a teacher. Deeply moved, Li Xiulan embraced her daughter, her eyes slightly moist.

events.name: Register for the Hiking Photography Field Trip Activity
events.description: In the afternoon, she saw a recruitment notice for a weekend hiking and photography event in the suburbs on a local cultural and artistic community platform she frequently followed. Recalling her "aspiration yet inability" to engage in outdoor activities and her recent interest in photography, she mustered the courage to sign up and began preparing her equipment checklist.

events.name: Family Mushroom Hot Pot Celebration Dinner
events.description: In the evening, the family of three arrived at the reserved restaurant. Father Sun Mingyuan was the first to raise his glass to thank his wife for her contributions to the family, while Sun Yuwei shared anecdotes about several interesting teachers at the university, making her mother laugh heartily. The steaming mushroom hotpot was incredibly delicious, and the family chatted happily as they ate, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere. Sun Yuwei used her phone to capture a photo of her parents clinking glasses with smiling faces, and she ate a little more than usual to celebrate.

起始状态.心情: Filled with festive anticipation, ready to create surprises.

结束状态.心情: Warm, joyful, and full of energy. The warmth of family provides strong emotional support, while new invitations and activities bring anticipation.

events.name: Exchanging insights with fellow writer Song Wen
events.description: Sun Yuwei shared the entire process of communication and revisions with Editor Xu on WeChat with Song Wen in Chengdu, specifically mentioning the new perspective brought by the "series planning." Song Wen shared her similar collaboration experiences on other platforms, and the two exchanged views on how to improve collaboration efficiency with editors.

events.name: Organizing Family Videos for Teacher's Day
events.description: She exported the photos taken during last night's dinner, selected a few particularly heartwarming ones, saved them into an electronic album named 'Family Memories,' and set one as her phone wallpaper. Reflecting on the atmosphere of that moment, she felt a sense of inner fulfillment.

events.name: Ikenobo Autumn Theme Practice
events.description: With no classes in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei practiced Ikenobo flower arrangement in her home study. Using the floral materials she purchased yesterday, she attempted to convey the theme of "the solitude and abundance of autumn." She spent nearly two hours repeatedly adjusting the angles and heights of the branches, a process that required immense patience and concentration, serving as a form of aesthetic meditation for her.

events.name: Outline a Speech for a Bookstore Sharing Session
events.description: In the evening, she began preparing for Mr. Qin's invitation. She selected Wang Zengqi's *The Plants and Trees of the Human World* (Yunnan Chapter) as the book to share and started drafting a brief speech outline around the theme of "the nostalgic flavor in ordinary scenes." She contemplated how to integrate her reading experience with her observations of Kunming.

起始状态.心情: Serene, carrying the lingering warmth from yesterday.

结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilling. Completed an aesthetic exercise and a meaningful 'lesson preparation', feeling that I am making steady progress.

2025-09.daily_overview: Social life is experiencing a minor surge. The afternoon flower arrangement exchange was a deep aesthetic dialogue with like-minded enthusiasts; the evening hiking and photography gathering allowed her to open up for the first time within an interest-based community, fostering a new sense of belonging. A heartwarming family proposal has set the stage for anticipation tomorrow, while her weight remains stable.

events.name: Share floral arrangements and communicate with Su Man
events.description: Sun Yuwei took photos of her flower arrangement from different angles and shared them with fellow enthusiast Su Man via WeChat. Su Man promptly replied, and the two engaged in an in-depth discussion about the piece's line aesthetics, color gradation, and how to better convey the concept of "wabi-sabi" through the use of withered branches. Su Man also shared a small tip on securing heavy branches.

events.name: First Hiking Photography Community Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei arrived at a quiet café and met with five or six fellow hiking photography enthusiasts. Everyone took turns sharing photos they had taken over the past two weeks with autumn themes. Summoning her courage, Sun Yuwei presented several photos she had captured with her phone in an old industrial area, explaining her feelings at the time and her compositional ideas. A seasoned enthusiast praised her perspective of "the sense of life amidst ruins" and suggested she could experiment with different lighting times. She listened attentively to everyone’s feedback, feeling an unprecedented sense of relaxation and engagement within this small circle connected by shared interests.

events.name: Record Meeting Insights and Inspirations
events.description: After the gathering, Sun Yuwei didn't head home immediately. Instead, she stayed a while longer at the café, quickly jotting down in her notebook the photography tips she had just heard, the impressive works she had seen, and the new inspirations that had sparked in her mind (such as "trying to capture lotus leaves in the morning mist of Cuihu Lake").

events.name: Father suggested a family weekend walk.
events.description: After returning home, Sun Mingyuan proposed after dinner that the family take a walk in Cuihu Park the next morning, as the weather was expected to be pleasant. Sun Yuwei and her mother readily agreed, and they decided to set off at nine o’clock. This simple suggestion filled her with a sense of ordinary anticipation for the day ahead.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit of pre-social nervousness about the evening gathering, but more than that, there's curiosity.

结束状态.心情: Excited and fulfilled. Community interactions bring fresh perspectives and a strong sense of belonging, while family planning adds a warm undertone.

2025-09.daily_overview: A perfectly balanced autumn Saturday that harmoniously blended family time with personal solitude. The morning family walk was simple and heartwarming, while the afternoon spent at the bookstore was tranquil and rewarding. Preparations for the speech progressed steadily, and body weight showed a slight decrease due to a light diet.

events.name: A Family Stroll in Cuihu Park
events.description: At nine o'clock in the morning, the family of three set out on time from home and walked to Cuihu Park. The autumn sun was warm, and the lake shimmered with sparkling ripples. They strolled slowly along the lakeside. Mother Li Xiulan shared amusing stories from the recent start of the school year, while father Sun Mingyuan pointed at the newly constructed buildings in the distance and reflected on the changes in the city. Sun Yuwei held her mother's arm, savoring this leisurely and wordlessly intimate moment.

events.name: Tasting Flower Pastry and Returning Home
events.description: After the walk, Sun Mingyuan bought three freshly baked rose cakes from the old-fashioned stall at the park entrance. The family ate as they walked, with the flaky pastry crumbling and the rose filling sweet and fragrant. They strolled home leisurely, continuing to chat about everyday matters.

events.name: Mingyuan Bookstore Reading and Conceptualization
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore. She ordered a cup of hot milk tea and settled into her familiar corner, beginning to read a collection of essays on mindful living. The bookstore owner, Qin Mingyuan, came over to greet her and handed her a newly arrived pictorial guide titled "Appreciation of Classic Works of Japanese Ikenobo Flower Arrangement," saying, "I thought you might like this." She gratefully accepted it. In this familiar and tranquil environment, she successfully completed the preliminary outline for her upcoming column article, "Phenological Notes of Kunming in Autumn: The Ginkgo Chapter."

events.name: Simulation Exercise Sharing Session Speech
events.description: At home in the evening, Sun Yuwei practiced her speech for the next day's sharing session in front of the mirror. She deliberately slowed down her pace and practiced making eye contact with imaginary listeners at key moments. Although she still felt a bit nervous, her fluency improved significantly after repeated practice.

起始状态.心情: Relax, looking forward to family activities.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful and joyful. The warmth of family and the sense of fulfillment from solitude intertwine, leaving the heart both content and steady.

2025-09.daily_overview: A day of challenging oneself, embracing nature, and connecting with the community. Participating in a group hiking and sketching trip for the first time, I went from initial physical exhaustion to ultimately gaining beautiful scenery and friendship. This was not only a test of physical endurance but also a substantial expansion of my social circle, though I unfortunately sprained my ankle along the way.

events.name: Participate in a suburban hiking photography excursion
events.description: After gathering in the early morning, Sun Yuwei and more than ten fellow enthusiasts took a chartered bus to a hiking trail section in the Western Hills. The initial steep climb quickly left her breathless, with her heart pounding like a drum, forcing her to stop frequently for breaks. Her companions on the trip (including several she had previously met at the café) were very friendly, consistently slowing their pace to encourage her and sharing tips on adjusting breathing and stride.

events.name: Arriving at the Observation Deck and Photography Creation
events.description: With everyone's encouragement and anticipation, Sun Yuwei gritted her teeth and persevered, finally reaching a viewing platform with the group that overlooked Dianchi Lake and the city of Kunming. As the magnificent scenery unfolded before them, all exhaustion was replaced by awe and a sense of accomplishment. She took out her camera and, following the example of other photography enthusiasts, searched for angles to capture the shimmering waves of Dianchi Lake and the silhouettes of the distant mountains. She also sketched a few quick strokes in her notebook.

events.name: Sprained ankle while descending the mountain
events.description: During the descent, due to the uneven mountain path, Sun Yuwei accidentally sprained her left ankle, experiencing slight swelling and pain at the time. She immediately rested and applied ice, then slowly made her way down the mountain with the help of her companions.

events.name: Return Trip Communication and Community Building
events.description: Despite their injuries, everyone chatted as they walked, sharing their professions and hobbies. Sun Yuwei discovered that there was a plant enthusiast in the group who could name many of the wildflowers along the roadside. On the return bus ride, everyone passed around their proud photos of the day, creating a lively atmosphere. The organizer proposed setting up a regular activity group, and Sun Yuwei joined without hesitation.

events.name: Dealing with Sprains and Reflections
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei immediately applied ice to her ankle and rested. In her journal, she meticulously documented the hiking trip and the injury, reflected on the importance of physical training, and planned to suspend high-intensity exercise for several days.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation for the unknown activity, mingled with concerns about one's physical fitness.

结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted yet exceptionally fulfilled and exhilarated, with a slight undercurrent of pain. The sense of achievement from overcoming difficulties, the awe-inspiring beauty of the scenery, and the new social connections all contribute to a powerful positive feedback.

state.今日运动: Approximately 4-hour suburban mountain hiking (including breaks and photography), suspended after ankle sprain.

2025-09.daily_overview: After the passion-filled weekend, a return to rational reflection and planning. From calmly reviewing the fluctuations in financial accounts, to deepening aesthetic reflections through flower arrangement practice, and then to conducting solid literature preparation for academic research—this reflects the multifaceted balance of a creator, learner, and life manager, all while recovering from a foot injury and experiencing a slight weight gain.

events.name: Calmly Review Your Regular Fund Investment Account
events.description: On the scheduled investment deduction date, Sun Yuwei logged into the financial management app. Faced with the paper losses caused by recent market fluctuations, she did not panic. Instead, she recalled that she had chosen this index fund for its long-term growth potential. She revisited the product description and her investment notes, reinforcing her belief that "dollar-cost averaging smooths out volatility and focuses on the long term," which helped her maintain a calm mindset.

events.name: Learn the fundamentals of asset allocation
events.description: During her lunch break, she read a popular science article on her phone about the "Pyramid of Conservative Personal Asset Allocation," learning the general proportional relationships among emergency funds, insurance, fixed-income assets, and equity assets. This led her to reflect on whether her current portfolio, which is almost entirely composed of equity assets (funds), is too aggressive.

events.name: Managing Foot Injury Recovery
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei consulted her yoga partner He Lu for recovery advice regarding her ankle sprain. He Lu recommended some gentle stretching exercises and rest techniques. Consequently, she paused her daily workouts to focus on recovery.

events.name: Conducting In-Depth Literature Research for Academic Year Papers
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei went to the electronic reading room of the university library. Following Professor Wu's suggestion and her own research interests, she systematically searched for core journal papers related to "urban memory" and "place identity," downloaded over twenty articles, and created a detailed literature index categorized by theoretical frameworks, case studies, and other classifications, laying a solid foundation for her research proposal.

events.name: Having a Simple Conversation with Parents about Financial Management Views
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei mentioned that she had read some financial planning articles that day and asked her parents about their views on the family’s conservative approach to financial management. Her father, Sun Mingyuan, believed that "stability comes first," while her mother said, "don’t touch what you don’t understand." Sun Yuwei understood the family’s stance, but she also felt a subtle sense that she might need to explore a slightly more growth-oriented and youth-appropriate allocation within the broader conservative framework.

起始状态.心情: Physically slightly fatigued and in pain (ankle sprain), but mentally restored to calm, ready to embrace the new week.

结束状态.心情: Rational, substantial, and well-planned. Beneficial reflections and progress have been made across the three dimensions of finance, health, and academics. The foot injury is in the process of recovery, and life is unfolding in an orderly manner under one's own control.

state.今日运动: Rest (due to ankle sprain)

2025-09.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Sun Yuwei was adjusting to the new semester. Due to a mild left ankle sprain that is still recovering, her physical activities were limited. She primarily focused on theoretical reading and planning creative materials, while also exploring ways to improve her physical fitness.

events.name: Finalizing a weekend gathering with roommates
events.description: During the lunch break, Sun Yuwei contacted Zhao Xiaowen via WeChat and confirmed that both of them were available the following afternoon. They discussed several potential cafes online and eventually chose a new shop named "Corner Space," located in the city center and known for its plant-themed decor and tranquil ambiance. They briefly chatted about their recent experiences since the start of the semester. Sun Yuwei mentioned her recent writing topics and the recovery of her foot injury, while Zhao Xiaowen shared her initial experiences from her internship.

events.name: Search for physical fitness improvement courses
events.description: Inspired by this month's goals of hiking photography and healthy living, Sun Yuwei utilized her break time after completing morning classes to search online for beginner-friendly introductory hiking courses. However, considering her foot injury, she decided to first focus on low-intensity activities such as brisk walking.

events.name: Immersive Reading and Note-Taking
events.description: After class in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to a quiet corner of Yunnan University Library, where she concentrated on reading the classic work of urban anthropology, *Place and Placelessness*. She read slowly, taking detailed notes in her theoretical notebook, with particular emphasis on highlighting discussions about "sense of place" and annotating how they resonated with the old streets and alleys of Kunming.

events.name: Evening Online Light Socializing
events.description: After returning to the dormitory in the evening, Sun Yuwei washed up and chatted briefly with her roommates Zhao Xiaowen and Zhou Lin in the dormitory WeChat group. She shared some interesting anecdotes from her day at the library and went to bed early due to slight discomfort from a foot injury.

events.name: Foot Injury Recovery Record
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei examined her left ankle. The swelling had subsided, but there was still slight soreness. She decided to continue avoiding high-intensity exercise and to engage in light stretching instead.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with academic pressure and slight ankle discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Enriched yet fatigued, finding fulfillment in the inspiration gained from reading, with a foot injury affecting exercise plans.

2025-09.daily_overview: Wednesday afternoon is reserved for rest and socializing. I had a pleasant coffee catch-up with my close friend Zhao Xiaowen, but stayed up a bit late in the evening due to a video call with my sister. My weight increased slightly due to the desserts enjoyed during the gathering.

events.name: Afternoon Conversations at the Café
events.description: At two o'clock in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei and Zhao Xiaowen met at the "Corner Café." They each ordered their favorite drinks, with Sun Yuwei choosing a brown sugar pearl milk tea and trying a piece of cake. The two shared updates on their lives, laughing frequently, and Sun Yuwei mentioned that her foot injury had improved and she planned to resume exercising.

events.name: Browsing in Cultural and Creative Shops and Gift-Giving
events.description: After finishing their coffee, the two visited a small cultural and creative shop next to the café. Zhao Xiaowen picked out several rolls of plant-patterned washi tape as gifts for Sun Yuwei to use in her journaling, which deeply moved Sun Yuwei.

events.name: Evening Farewell and Online Reminiscence
events.description: As evening fell, the two bid farewell and headed home. That night, Sun Yuwei shared her feelings about the gathering and photos of the adhesive tape in the dormitory WeChat group, allowing everyone to reminisce about the relaxed moments.

events.name: Video chatting with my sister
events.description: At nine o'clock in the evening, Sun Yuwei had a video chat with her sister Sun Yutong in Shenzhen, discussing their National Day travel plans to Dali and recent creative progress. Her sister encouraged her to persist in writing, and the conversation lasted until quite late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and looking forward to the afternoon gathering.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and warm, friendship brings a sense of fulfillment, though there is slight fatigue from staying up late.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Thursday, Sun Yuwei's routine was disrupted by a computer malfunction. From anxiously sending it for repair to resolving the issue, she handled a minor crisis. Due to the stress, she stayed up late, and her weight slightly decreased as a result of irregular eating habits.

events.name: The morning jogging plan has been canceled due to unforeseen circumstances.
events.description: Sun Yuwei had originally planned to go for a morning run, but upon waking up, she felt fatigued and noticed the unfavorable weather conditions. She decided to reschedule the run to the weekend and instead focus on her all-day writing plan.

events.name: The writing computer suddenly malfunctioned.
events.description: Around 9 a.m., Sun Yuwei was preparing to draft an article when she discovered her laptop wouldn't turn on. A sense of anxiety spread as she worried about losing unsaved drafts and materials.

events.name: Seeking Help and Advice from Father
events.description: Sun Yuwei sought help from her father Sun Mingyuan, who calmly suggested taking it to a computer repair shop near the residential area. She followed his advice.

events.name: Sending the Computer for Repair and the Anxious Wait
events.description: Sun Yuwei took her computer to the repair shop. The clerk registered her information and asked her to go home and wait for a call. She returned home with unease.

events.name: Upon receiving the repair notice, a weight was lifted from my mind.
events.description: Around three in the afternoon, the repair shop called to inform Sun Yuwei that there was a minor issue with poor contact in the motherboard's power module, but the hard drive data was safe. She breathed a sigh of relief and agreed to proceed with the repair.

events.name: Retrieving the Computer and Paying the Fees
events.description: Retrieve the repaired computer after one hour, confirm that everything is functioning properly, pay the repair fee, and be relieved that the crisis has been resolved.

events.name: Reflection and Cultivating Backup Habits
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei deeply realized the importance of backups and promptly copied important data to an external hard drive while setting up automatic cloud synchronization for backup.

events.name: Records of Insomnia Due to Stress
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei felt stressed due to daytime anxiety and unfinished work, resulting in light sleep, and decided to adjust her schedule the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, slightly drowsy and concerned about computer malfunctions.

结束状态.心情: Relieved yet weary, grateful that the crisis has been resolved, and determined to improve work habits.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Friday, Sun Yuwei got back on track, devoting herself fully to the preparations for her essay collection. She systematically organized materials, conducted academic research, and planned travel itineraries. Due to prolonged sitting, she experienced shoulder and neck soreness and stayed up working late into the night.

events.name: Systematically organize creative materials
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei browsed through her journal and notes from the past year in her home study, categorizing scattered materials by location and emotion, and listing keywords such as "abandonment and renewal" and "traces of time."

events.name: Academic Database Searching and Reading
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei accessed databases such as CNKI at the Yunnan University Library, searching for keywords like "sense of place" and "urban memory writing." She downloaded and read relevant papers, organizing them into note-taking software.

events.name: Preliminary Planning of Dali Travel Itinerary
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei turned on her computer to search for travel guides to Dali, focusing on non-mainstream cycling routes and cultural attractions to gather information for her National Day field trip.

events.name: Integrate and revise the draft of existing chapters
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei integrated the previously written draft chapters, adjusted the paragraph order to unify the writing style, and revised the issues pointed out by her supervisor and editor, working late into the night to complete a preliminary coherent manuscript.

events.name: Relief of Neck and Shoulder Pain
events.description: Due to prolonged writing, Sun Yuwei experienced slight soreness in her shoulders and neck. She performed simple office shoulder-opening stretches and decided to increase her exercise routine tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Focus and determination to make up for the progress delayed yesterday.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, satisfied with the clear planning and progress, experiencing discomfort in the shoulders and neck.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Saturday, Sun Yuwei engaged in various activities. In the morning, she organized materials. In the afternoon, she attended a yoga class. In the evening, she completed her speech for the bookstore sharing session and received a manuscript acceptance notification, transitioning from tension to relief.

events.name: Preparing Materials for Journal Creation
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei tidied up her desk, gathered the receipts, photos, and notes from this month, and planned to create a Sunday scrapbook themed "Footprints of September" to collage her memories.

events.name: Attend a yoga class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the Jingxin Yoga Life Studio to attend the weekly Saturday group yoga class, focusing on core strength and flexibility. Her foot injury had largely recovered, and after the class, she exchanged insights with her partner He Lu.

events.name: Preparing for a Bookstore Sharing Session Speech
events.description: After her yoga class, Sun Yuwei felt unsettled as she prepared for her speech at the Mingyuan Bookstore sharing session that evening, reviewing her five-minute talk on the collection of essays about Yunnan's scenery and culture.

events.name: Arrive at the bookstore early to familiarize yourself with the environment.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei arrived at the bookstore half an hour early, exchanging greetings with Mr. Qin and early-arriving book club members to acclimate to the atmosphere.

events.name: Complete the first public speech
events.description: After the sharing session began, Sun Yuwei took the stage to speak. Initially nervous, she gradually immersed herself in the content. When discussing how "the subtle beauty of local places" had moved her and connected to her writing on urban memories, she received applause.

events.name: Brief exchange after the meeting
events.description: After the speech, fellow flower arranging enthusiast Su Man praised her for speaking well. Mr. Qin smiled encouragingly and engaged in a brief exchange with the book club members about Kunming's culture.

events.name: Received Notification of Column Manuscript Acceptance
events.description: When I returned home in the evening and checked my mailbox, I received a column manuscript acceptance notice from editor Xu Mingyuan, which clearly stated the remuneration standards. I felt delighted to receive this recognition.

events.name: Review hiking materials to seek inspiration
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei reviewed the photos and written fragments from the hike, sensing the emotional tone to seek inspiration for tomorrow's creation.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a subtle tension about the evening's activities.

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief and increased confidence intertwine with the ease of completing the challenge and the joy of receiving the admission notice.

2025-09.daily_overview: Sunday is Sun Yuwei's designated "recharge day." In the morning, she immerses herself in creating her bullet journal, enjoys solitude while reading novels in the afternoon, and unwinds in the evening while reviewing her speaking confidence. Her weight has slightly decreased due to her light diet.

events.name: Immersive Journal Creation
events.description: On Sunday morning, Sun Yuwei meticulously trimmed last week's hiking photos, pasted tickets, and decorated them with colored tape and markers, completing several pages of a visually rich scrapbook. The process was therapeutic.

events.name: Simple Lunch and Brief Rest
events.description: It was already past noon after finishing the journal. Sun Yuwei ordered cross-bridge rice noodles for delivery and, after the meal, lay on the sofa scrolling through her phone and listening to music to relax.

events.name: Immersive Afternoon Reading
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei nestled on the bedroom sofa reading the Japanese novel *Rokumeikan*, enjoying a quiet moment alone as the autumn sunlight filtered through the curtains.

events.name: Jot down reading reflections
events.description: When reading passages that moved her, Sun Yuwei would jot down fragmented reflections or copy sentences in her notebook, using them as seeds for future essays.

events.name: A Pleasant Evening and Relaxation
events.description: After finishing the novel in the evening, Sun Yuwei made herself a cup of brown sugar bubble tea and leaned against the window, reflecting on the day's accomplishments in recharging herself. She then took a photo of her planner alongside the book and sent it to her close friend Zhang Jing.

events.name: Reviewing the Speech to Boost Confidence
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei reflected on her speech at the bookstore last night, feeling that the process was not intimidating and that she had received positive feedback, which gave her more confidence in expressing herself in small circles in the future.

events.name: Refine the Dali Itinerary Framework
events.description: Before going to bed, she opened the Dali travel guide document and, in keeping with the reading atmosphere, outlined a daily itinerary framework in her notebook, marking Jizhao Temple, Erhai Lake Corridor, and bookstores.

events.name: Take a short walk to relax.
events.description: During a break in her afternoon reading, Sun Yuwei took a brief 15-minute stroll in the neighborhood garden near her home, enjoying the autumn breeze.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to a leisurely Sunday.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, tranquil, and content, with the spiritual world being nourished.

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Sun Yuwei attempted to improve her physical fitness through morning runs, completed a column submission, and began drafting the opening of a core chapter for her essay collection. However, the high-intensity tasks brought about stress, leading her to try mindfulness breathing for adjustment.

events.name: Attempting Morning Jogs and Submitting Manuscripts
events.description: In the early morning, Sun Yuwei arrived at the sports ground of Yunnan University. Due to her foot injury recovery, she attempted a 30-minute exercise combining brisk walking and short sprints, feeling mentally refreshed afterward. After her morning classes, she submitted her column article "The Taste of Vegetarian Cuisine in Kunming's Autumn" to editor Xu Mingyuan in the study room, along with a cover letter explaining how changes in her healthy lifestyle have influenced her writing perspective.

events.name: Concentrate on Creating Chapter Openings
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei began drafting the first chapter of her essay collection in her home study. Using prose language, she depicted the scene of a childhood rice noodle shop at a street corner, opening an entry point where urban space intertwines with personal memory, and completed an initial draft of approximately one thousand words.

events.name: First Attempt at Using Mindful Breathing to Cope with Anxiety
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei felt anxious and distracted, worrying about the quality of her manuscript and the progress of her studies. She attempted the diaphragmatic breathing technique taught by her yoga partner He Lu, practicing slow and deep breaths.

events.name: Progress in Online Communication with Editors
events.description: After submitting her work, Sun Yuwei briefly discussed her recent writing plans with editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat, and the editor encouraged her to continue exploring health-related themes.

起始状态.心情: Determined to attempt change, carrying the plan for the new week.

结束状态.心情: There is a sense of accomplishment after creation, but it is diluted by academic pressure, accompanied by slight anxiety, and attempts are being made to adjust with new methods.

2025-09.daily_overview: Tuesday continued as an intensive creative day, with Sun Yuwei completing the core argument section of her essay collection chapter. In the evening, she practiced mindful breathing and engaged in in-depth discussions with fellow book enthusiasts. Her weight showed a slight decrease due to her consistent adherence to healthy habits.

events.name: Writing the Core Section of the Chapter
events.description: Sun Yuwei is writing the core argument section of the chapter in her home study. Drawing on her experiences from visiting old industrial districts, theoretical reflections, and the theme of Kunming's transformation between the old and the new, she explores the tension between "disappearance" and "preservation," completing a preliminary draft of approximately one thousand words.

events.name: Morning Running Exercise
events.description: In the early morning, Sun Yuwei jogged for 35 minutes in Cuihu Park, adopting a slow-paced running mode based on her condition, covering a distance of approximately 3 kilometers. The APP recording indicated an improvement in her cardiorespiratory endurance.

events.name: Continue with evening breathing exercises
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Sun Yuwei practiced abdominal breathing exercises, though her attention occasionally drifted to unfinished work. The practice felt somewhat unpolished, but she persisted.

events.name: Engage in in-depth theoretical exchanges with fellow book enthusiasts
events.description: Before practicing breathing, Sun Yuwei communicated via WeChat with her book club friend Yang Xiao in Chengdu, sharing insights on urban anthropology and creative dilemmas. Yang Xiao provided case studies of writers and theoretical perspectives, discussing "how literature constructs place."

events.name: Made a temporary decision to adjust the diet.
events.description: Busy with creative work at noon, Sun Yuwei had a simple salad. In the evening, she made mushroom soup to replenish energy, adhering to the practice of intuitive eating.

起始状态.心情: Continuing yesterday's creative state, but feeling slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: After completing the core part, my thoughts became chaotic. Through communication, I gained inspiration, but during breathing exercises, my mind remained unsettled.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Sun Yuwei completed the first draft of the core chapter of her essay collection in rainy weather, preparing for a meeting with her supervisor and finalizing travel arrangements for Dali. In the afternoon, she attended a yoga class to relax.

events.name: Complete the initial draft and integration of chapters
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei completed the final section of the chapter "The Folds of Urban Memory," conducted a preliminary integration and thorough read-through of all content (approximately three thousand words), adjusted paragraphs, polished transitions, and felt a sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Preparing an Outline for Discussion with the Supervisor
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei prepared a detailed discussion outline in the study room of the School of Literature at Yunnan University, clearly identifying the core issues she hoped to discuss with her supervisor, Wu Mingyuan, such as the application of theories and their integration with her academic year paper.

events.name: Attend a yoga class
events.description: After the afternoon class, Sun Yuwei went to the Serenity Yoga Life Studio to attend the weekly Wednesday group yoga session, focusing on mindfulness breathing and flexibility exercises, which effectively alleviated academic stress.

events.name: Book round-trip bullet train tickets to Dali
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei opened the 12306 APP to book train tickets for the afternoon of September 30 from Kunming to Dali and the afternoon of October 4 from Dali back to Kunming, and successfully received the tickets.

events.name: Book a Characteristic Homestay in Dali Ancient City
events.description: Then, browse homestays in Dali Ancient Town on a travel app, and book a courtyard homestay in Bai ethnic style, paying special attention to the desk and lighting to ensure a suitable writing space.

起始状态.心情: Determined to complete the finishing work, with a slight sense of urgency to accomplish the task.

结束状态.心情: A sense of ease and satisfaction upon reaching a milestone, with anticipation for travel and mentor meetings.

2025-09.daily_overview: Thursday was a day of both gains and planning for Sun Yuwei. After her morning run, she revised the initial draft, received payment for her manuscript, and settled her income. A deep discussion with her mentor clarified her creative direction, further strengthening her professional confidence.

events.name: Morning Run and Thorough Revision of the First Draft
events.description: In the early morning, Sun Yuwei jogged for 30 minutes in Cuihu Park and felt well. After the morning class, she thoroughly read the initial draft of the chapter in the library, using a pen to mark areas with unclear logic and proceeding with the first round of revisions.

events.name: Recording and Settling Royalties from Other Platforms
events.description: During the lunch break, Sun Yuwei logged into the backend of the content contribution public account to record the scattered manuscript fees for the month, noting them down on the financial page of her personal planner.

events.name: Received notification of payment for the manuscript fee from Cultural Horizon
events.description: In the afternoon, I received a text message notification from the bank confirming that the manuscript fee for "Cultural Horizon" had been transferred and the amount was consistent.

events.name: Summarize Monthly Writing Income
events.description: Sun Yuwei verified the details of the royalty payments received, added them to the royalties from other platforms to calculate her total income for the month, and felt delighted that the total amount exceeded expectations.

events.name: Allocate funds
events.description: She allocated a portion of the funds proportionally to her daily expense account, while the remainder was retained in the savings account as a reserve.

events.name: Journal records income and reflections.
events.description: In the evening, update the income details and allocations on the financial page of the journal, and write down reflections to encourage continued balance between creative pursuits and academic studies.

events.name: Sharing Joy with Parents
events.description: During dinner, I mentioned to my parents that my manuscript fees were quite good. My father nodded in approval, while my mother praised me and reminded me not to overwork myself. The encouragement from my family felt warm and supportive.

events.name: Discussing the Integration of Creative Work and Academic Research with the Supervisor
events.description: After the afternoon class, Sun Yuwei went to Professor Wu Mingyuan's office to elaborate on her idea of documenting the cultural changes in Kunming through literary writing. She proposed the possibility of combining a collection of essays with her academic year paper. Her supervisor affirmed the idea and offered suggestions.

events.name: Summarize Meeting Points and Formulate Plans
events.description: After returning home, Sun Yuwei recorded the mentor's suggestions, preliminarily drafted the framework of the "creative research" plan, and clarified the direction for future reading and investigation.

events.name: Adjustment of Late Sleep Due to Excitement
events.description: Excited by the evening talks, Sun Yuwei went to bed a bit later but used mindful breathing to help herself fall asleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for an important conversation.

结束状态.心情: Inspiring and full of hope, with a clear path for integrating career and academics, and financial gains adding confidence.

events.name: Reading "The Image of the City" and Reflections
events.description: In the afternoon, with no classes scheduled, Sun Yuwei was in the reading area of Mingyuan Bookstore, studying Kevin Lynch’s *The Image of the City*. She took notes while reflecting on the cognitive map and literary representation of Kunming in relation to the five elements of urban perception.

events.name: Hiking Photography Community Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei gathered with fellow hiking and photography enthusiasts at a photography-themed café, taking turns to share recent works. Her photos capturing the interplay of light and shadow in an old industrial area drew attention. One member proposed organizing a suburban hiking and photography outing in mid-to-late October, which Sun Yuwei looked forward to with anticipation.

events.name: Outline Theoretical Framework
events.description: After returning home from the gathering, Sun Yuwei reviewed her notes on *Place and Placelessness*, *The Image of the City*, and related academic papers, forming a preliminary outline titled "Application of the Sense of Place Theory in Creative Work," and marked questions that required further consultation.

events.name: Eat more during temporary gatherings.
events.description: At the gathering, Sun Yuwei tried the café's new cake and milk tea, consuming extra calories, and decided to adjust her diet tomorrow.

events.name: Evening Walk for Relaxation
events.description: On her way home after the gathering, Sun Yuwei took a 30-minute walk near her residential area to aid digestion and reflect on the community event.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Saturday, Sun Yuwei practiced flower arrangement, organized her health insights, submitted the first draft to her mentor, addressed financial overspending and adjusted the budget, packed for a trip, and attended a yoga class in the afternoon.

events.name: Practicing Ikenobo Flower Arrangement and Organizing Health Insights
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei practiced Ikenobo flower arrangement at home, using osmanthus, green bamboo, and ferns to cultivate mindfulness by focusing on the balance of the floral materials. Later, she organized her journal to reflect on the changes in her healthy lifestyle over the past month, noting observations such as increased concentration during morning runs, and set a goal for October: "Consolidate habits and try community hiking."

events.name: Submit the initial draft of the chapter to the supervisor
events.description: At noon, Sun Yuwei sent the initial draft of the chapter to her supervisor Wu Mingyuan via email, along with a creative explanation and points of confusion, earnestly requesting feedback and guidance.

events.name: Monthly account reconciliation reveals overspending.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei was summarizing the income and expenses for the month in the accounting software and found an overspending due to an unplanned computer repair expense, which left her somewhat concerned.

events.name: Adjust the budget for late September and October
events.description: After reviewing the budget, she found that the maintenance expenses had encroached upon the allocations for "entertainment and dining out" and "book purchases." Consequently, she decided to cancel all dining-out plans for the remaining three days, suspend non-essential shopping, and reduce the book-buying budget for October.

events.name: Recording Insights from Financial Events
events.description: Write down reflections on the journaling page: "Unexpected expenses are inevitable. Adjust the budget promptly to control their impact, and consider setting up an emergency reserve fund account."

events.name: Attend a yoga class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to the Serenity Yoga Life Studio to attend the weekly Saturday yoga class, focusing on core strength and stability, and practiced mindful breathing after the session.

events.name: Organizing the Study and Creating an Inspiration Corner
events.description: After the yoga class, Sun Yuwei organized the books and magazines in the study, placed the floral arrangement on the windowsill, and printed hiking photography photos to decorate the inspiration corkboard corner.

events.name: Packing Preparation for Dali Travel
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei began checking her camera equipment, packing her journal, writing utensils, laptop, and clothing, and making a list of travel essentials.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, weekend slow-paced vibe

结束状态.心情: The sense of fulfillment after completing multiple tasks, satisfaction with the newly refreshed corner of the study, and anticipation for the upcoming trip.

2025-09.daily_overview: Every Sunday, Sun Yuwei meets with her close friends Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi for their monthly gathering, where they share life updates and plan to visit an exhibition next month. In the morning, they go for a jog, though Sun Yuwei's weight has increased due to the delicious food enjoyed during their gatherings.

events.name: Morning Running Exercise
events.description: In the early morning, Sun Yuwei jogged for 40 minutes at Cuihu Park, alternating between slow running and brisk walking, covering a distance of approximately 4 kilometers. The app recording indicated an improvement in cardiorespiratory endurance.

events.name: Monthly Girls' Gathering
events.description: At noon, Sun Yuwei gathered with Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi at the vegetarian creative restaurant "Pushi," where they enjoyed exquisite vegetarian dishes and shared updates on their lives. Sun Yuwei discussed her insights on healthy habits, Zhang Jing shared amusing anecdotes from her classes, and Sisi recommended an ethnic minority textile art exhibition, inviting them to visit it together next month.

events.name: Visiting a Cultural and Creative Market
events.description: After the meal, the three of them strolled through the cultural and creative market near the restaurant. Sun Yuwei admired the items but restrained her urge to shop, purchasing only a postcard.

events.name: Review Monthly Fitness and Health Data
events.description: After returning home from the gathering, Sun Yuwei opened the sports and fitness app on the sofa to review her morning running and yoga data for September. She felt satisfied with her consistent exercise habits and reflected on how to integrate them into her graduation season life.

events.name: Sharing travel plans with my best friend
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a video call with Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi to share the detailed itinerary for their trip to Dali, including Jizhao Nunnery, cycling routes, and homestays. They agreed to share their experiences after returning from the trip.

events.name: Adjustments made due to excessive eating at the gathering
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei experienced slight bloating due to overeating at lunch and decided to have a light meal and increase exercise the next day.

起始状态.心情: Joyful, looking forward to the gathering with close friends.

结束状态.心情: Warmth and joy following social fulfillment, brimming with excitement and anticipation for the journey.

2025-09.daily_overview: A final push before the Monday holiday: Sun Yuwei summarized health practice sharing, communicated new ideas with the editor, started new writing in the inspiration corner, completed travel packing, and intensified exercise resulting in a slight weight loss.

events.name: Summarize and Share Health Lifestyle Experiences
events.description: After the morning class, Sun Yuwei summarized her September health practices, organizing vegetarian recipes, morning jogging insights, and mindfulness breathing experiences into her journal. She shared these with her close friend Zhang Jing and yoga partner He Lu via WeChat, receiving encouragement in return.

events.name: Communicating New Ideas with the Editor
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei communicated via WeChat with editor Xu Mingyuan, sharing new ideas on integrating academic reflections into column essays. The editor encouraged her to try drafting a sample and discussed the new direction of "Urban Micro-Observations."

events.name: Start a new writing in the Inspiration Corner
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei sat down in the inspiration corner of her study. Surrounded by flowers on the windowsill, a fragrant corkboard, and photographs, she felt her concentration sharpen. She opened a new document and began writing an essay to record the process of creating the inspiration corner and its impact on her mood and environment.

events.name: Brisk Walking Exercise
events.description: During the afternoon break, Sun Yuwei took a 20-minute brisk walk near her home to aid digestion and alleviate pre-travel anxiety.

events.name: Complete the final packing for the trip.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei packed clothing, equipment, tools, and medicine into her suitcase and backpack according to the checklist. She repeatedly checked the camera battery, documents, and tickets to ensure nothing was left behind.

events.name: Light Meal Adjustment
events.description: To balance the intake from yesterday's gathering, Sun Yuwei consumed only salads and fruits throughout the day, adhering to intuitive eating.

起始状态.心情: The excitement before the holiday intertwines with the busyness of wrapping up work.

结束状态.心情: Everything is ready, bringing a sense of steadiness and ease, and there is a full anticipation for tomorrow's journey.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the last day of September, Sun Yuwei shared her insights on mindful breathing in the morning. In the afternoon, she encountered inspiring books during her reading session at Mingyuan Bookstore. In the evening, she discussed holiday arrangements with her parents, followed by a morning run and mindful breathing practice. She maintained a stable state, achieving a healthy conclusion to the day.

events.name: Morning Running Exercise
events.description: In the early morning, Sun Yuwei jogged for 45 minutes in Cuihu Park, covering a distance of approximately 4.5 kilometers in a slow-paced mode. She focused on maintaining a steady breathing rhythm and proper warm-up, optimizing her exercise performance and leaving her feeling energetic.

events.name: Sharing Insights on Mindful Breathing
events.description: In the dormitory in the morning, Sun Yuwei chatted with her roommate Zhao Xiaowen about academic stress. She proactively shared her insights on mindfulness breathing exercises, demonstrated diaphragmatic breathing techniques, and suggested trying them when feeling anxious to boost self-confidence.

events.name: Inspirational Reading at Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: After lunch, Sun Yuwei went to Mingyuan Bookstore, browsed the natural culture bookshelf, and discovered an old book titled "The Passage of Time in Flora: Essays on Urban Plant Illustrations." She sat by the window to peruse it, jotting down captivating sentences and sketching quick plant drawings, all while drawing connections to the plants she had seen on the streets of Kunming.

events.name: Communication with the Bookstore Owner
events.description: Bookstore owner Qin Mingyuan brought over hot tea, and the two briefly exchanged thoughts on topics such as urban ecology and the vitality of wild grasses and flowers. Mr. Qin recommended a book on native plants of Yunnan.

events.name: Book Purchase and Homeward Journey Conceptualization
events.description: Sun Yuwei purchased the old book, and Shopkeeper Qin carefully wrapped it. On the bus ride home, she reflected on the insights gained from reading and began to conceive the initial draft of a new essay titled "Plants Outside the Window, Time Within."

events.name: Recording Inspiration and Preliminary Concepts
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei transcribed her inspiration into her creative material notebook, marked chapters for her new book, and created a new document to write the article title and the main ideas of the core paragraphs.

events.name: Communicating with Parents about Holiday Arrangements
events.description: In the evening, I communicated with my parents about departing for Dali tomorrow afternoon, proposed participating in the preparation of the midday holiday meal, and discussed the division of household chores for the family's homemade mushroom hotpot menu.

events.name: Mindful Breathing and Reflection Before Sleep
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei practiced ten minutes of mindful breathing, finding it easier to quiet her mind compared to a week ago. Reflecting on the progress in her creative life this month—completing the first draft of a chapter, solidifying healthy habits, expanding her social circle, advancing her relationship with her mentor, and planning for travel—she felt fulfilled and at peace. With anticipation for October, she drifted off to sleep.

起始状态.心情: Tranquility, a sense of ease before the holiday.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, content, and full of anticipation, taking delight in the harvest of September, my heart has already flown to Dali.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of the National Day holiday, Sun Yuwei started October with a morning run and actively participated in family festive activities, experiencing a shift in roles.

events.name: Implement the October Morning Running Plan
events.description: Jogging 3 kilometers in Cuihu Park in the early morning, focusing on breathing and pace, infuses a positive sense of ritual for the new month.

events.name: Accompanying mother to purchase holiday ingredients
events.description: Accompanied my mother to the farmers' market to purchase ingredients for mushroom hot pot and Cross-Bridge Rice Noodles, learning selection techniques and experiencing the warmth of family time.

events.name: Collaborating with Mother to Prepare a Family Feast
events.description: At home, mushrooms were washed, dipping sauces were prepared, the mother simmered the soup base, and the father lent a hand, filling the kitchen with delightful aromas and cheerful laughter.

events.name: Shared National Day Family Luncheon
events.description: The family enjoyed a mushroom hot pot and cross-bridge rice noodles, chatting about their National Day experiences and interesting stories from the old town, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Take the initiative to clean up after meals.
events.description: Let your parents rest, wash the dishes yourself, and experience the sense of fulfillment that comes from sharing responsibilities.

events.name: Afternoon Family Chat Time
events.description: Drinking tea and watching TV with parents, discussing academic progress and writing developments, the relationship becomes more natural and in-depth.

events.name: Prepare a simple dinner and record it in the journal.
events.description: Heat up the leftovers, and in the evening, record the day's reflections and changes in mindset in the journal.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with anticipation

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, heartwarming, and rewarding

2025-10.daily_overview: On the second day of the National Day holiday, Sun Yuwei signed up for a community cultural project and reviewed her travel materials, infusing new depth into her creative work.

events.name: Learn About and Register for the Old Streets Oral History Project
events.description: Upon learning about the project from my father, I proactively contacted the person in charge and registered online. After reading the materials, I became excited about the concept of urban memory.

events.name: Review the interview materials on old streets and alleys, and distill the core creative elements.
events.description: Review past interview recordings and transcripts to extract personal memory details of urban changes, and annotate points of emotional interweaving.

events.name: Handle daily correspondence emails
events.description: Replying to the progress report email, communicating new topic ideas with editor Xu Mingyuan, maintaining a moderate work pace.

events.name: Listen to mother's suggestion about organizing the photo album.
events.description: Mother suggested sorting through the old photo albums tomorrow, and Sun Yuwei readily agreed, looking forward to connecting family and urban memories.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to revise the column manuscript.
events.description: Received editorial feedback requiring urgent revisions to a manuscript, worked late into the night until early morning, resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, leisurely

结束状态.心情: Tired yet filled with a sense of discovery

2025-10.daily_overview: On the third day of the holiday, Sun Yuwei went for a morning run to observe daily life, further developed the concept for her photography exhibition, and sorted through the family photo album with her mother, strengthening their mother-daughter bond.

events.name: Morning Run in the Community with Integrated Observation
events.description: During a morning run through the community streets, I slowed down to observe the daily scenes of vendors, students, and others, feeling a peaceful connection with life.

events.name: Drafting Preliminary Curatorial Statement for Photography Exhibition
events.description: Crafting the curatorial statement for the "Strolling Through Spring City" exhibition, explaining the presentation of poetic scenes on Kunming's streets from the perspective of young wanderers.

events.name: Compilation of Fragmented Urban Observation Notes
events.description: Compile urban observations from notebooks and memos, and integrate them with oral history materials to develop a multidimensional creative concept.

events.name: Assist mother in preparing the album and tidying up the environment.
events.description: Cleaning the desk with my mother, preparing soft cloths, mobile phones, and other tools to create a nostalgic working environment.

events.name: Looking through the family photo album with my mother
events.description: Flipping through the photo album, my mother recounts stories from my infancy and my sister's childhood, as memories come flooding back like a tide.

events.name: Recreate meaningful family photos
events.description: Using a mobile phone to rephotograph special photos, documenting the year, event, and maternal emotions, is regarded as a micro oral history.

events.name: The Mother-Daughter Tea Gathering at the End of the Tidying-Up
events.description: Brewing Pu'er tea and chatting, transitioning from past anecdotes to future prospects, deepens the communication between mother and daughter.

events.name: Nighttime Creation of Family Memories Integration
events.description: Import photos into the computer for categorization, and contemplate how to incorporate family memories into a collection of essays or a column.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for a fulfilling day

结束状态.心情: Warm, nostalgic, with a sense of solidity and inspiration

2025-10.daily_overview: In the middle of the National Day holiday, Sun Yuwei went shopping with her mother for Mid-Autumn Festival ingredients. In the afternoon, she immersed herself in reading at Mingyuan Bookstore, gathering inspiration for her creative work.

events.name: Purchasing Mid-Autumn Festival Ingredients with Mother
events.description: Go to supermarkets and farmers' markets to purchase ingredients for making flower cakes and mooncakes, discuss fillings, and experience the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Plan an afternoon trip to the bookstore.
events.description: After completing the writing work, I decided to go to Mingyuan Bookstore to plan the reading direction of urban spatial aesthetics.

events.name: Go to Mingyuan Bookstore
events.description: Take the bus to the bookstore, listen to light music while observing the street scenes, and look forward to the reading time.

events.name: Immersive Reading and Inspiration Capture
events.description: Read the illustrated collection on the changes of Kunming's old streets and alleys, and record the touching sentences and creative inspirations.

events.name: A Brief Conversation with Bookstore Owner Uncle Qin
events.description: Qin Shu shared personal memories over tea, while Sun Yuwei expressed a desire to document what is fading away, feeling understood.

events.name: Leave the bookstore with inspiration
events.description: Closing the book, incorporating the concept of "sense of place" into the creative plan, and leaving the nourishing space.

events.name: Reflection and Contemplation on the Journey Home
events.description: Reflecting on urban transformation and memory on the way home, laying the groundwork for future collaboration with Uncle Qin.

events.name: Received an invitation to the Life Festival event.
events.description: Received an invitation to share vegetarian bento boxes at the "Kunming Life Festival," with preliminary communication on the event overview.

events.name: Sharing Family Memories Online with My Sister
events.description: Video chatted with my sister to share the process of organizing photo albums, sent old photos, reminisced about childhood, and agreed to have a call during the Mid-Autumn Festival.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to try a new milk tea shop.
events.description: On my way home, I passed by a newly opened milk tea shop and tried their brown sugar pearl milk tea. Though feeling a bit guilty, I enjoyed a moment of relaxation.

结束状态.心情: Spiritually abundant, inspirationally full, with serene joy

2025-10.daily_overview: Sun Yuwei embarked on an independent travel journey, taking a train to Dali. The reading and observations during the trip marked a shift in travel patterns toward a "work-integrated" model.

events.name: Reading and Conceptualizing During Train Journeys
events.description: Reading books about Dali culture on the train, contemplating the themes of "Light and Shadow" and "Silence" for fieldwork, as well as the preservation of traditions.

events.name: Arrived in Dali and checked into the homestay.
events.description: Check into a quiet homestay on the edge of the ancient town, organize the camera, journal, and other items, and prepare for creative work.

events.name: An Evening Stroll Through Dali Ancient Town
events.description: Stroll through tranquil alleyways, observing walls and wooden doors under the sunset, watching residents chat, capturing the interplay of light and shadow, and recording sensory details.

events.name: Nighttime Organization and Planning
events.description: Under the courtyard lights, I sorted through my observations, planned tomorrow's cycling trip around Erhai Lake, informed my family of my safety, and then retired early to rest.

events.name: Mild gastrointestinal discomfort
events.description: Due to changes in diet during travel, I experienced mild gastrointestinal discomfort in the evening and went to bed early to recover.

结束状态.心情: Calm, observant, and full of creative anticipation.

2025-10.daily_overview: During the Mid-Autumn Festival, Sun Yuwei went cycling in Dali to gather inspiration, collecting a wealth of material and integrating travel with creation through personal experience.

events.name: Cycling and Fieldwork along the Erhai Lake Ecological Corridor
events.description: Riding along Erhai Lake in the early morning, capturing the lake surface, Cangshan Mountain, waterbirds, and villages, with journal entries recording reflections such as "the sound of wind passing through the woods."

events.name: Midday Rest and Observation in Xizhou Ancient Town
events.description: In Xizhou, savor the flaky pastry and cold chicken rice noodles, while leisurely strolling to observe the Bai ethnic residences and the tourism atmosphere.

events.name: Continue cycling to Haise Park in the afternoon.
events.description: Cycled to Haishe Park, sat down to organize notes and photos, sketched to capture the interplay of light and shadow, legs aching but heart full.

events.name: Night Running at Green Lake After Returning to Kunming
events.description: After returning to Kunming in the evening, I went for a night run in Cuihu Park, where I conceived fragments of prose under the moonlight, connecting Dali and Kunming.

events.name: Video Call with Family During Mid-Autumn Festival
events.description: After a night run, I video-called my parents to share my cycling achievements and feel the support from my family.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and highly motivated to create

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted but mentally exhilarated and fulfilled.

events.name: Mid-Autumn Festival Reunion Dinner

events.name: Moon Viewing on the Balcony and Family Night Conversations

2025-10.daily_overview: A day filled with "connections": morning jog greetings, finalizing a photography exhibition collaboration, scheduling a gathering with close friends, and signing up for a stationery market. Social bonds are advancing.

events.name: I ran into my neighbor Auntie Xie during my morning jog.
events.description: While jogging in the neighborhood garden in the morning, I ran into Auntie Xie. We exchanged pleasantries about the weather and health, and she praised my perseverance, which made me feel a sense of warmth.

events.name: Plan the autumn-themed column manuscript
events.description: After class, conceptualize the framework for the manuscript "The Autumn Flavor of Kunming" and gather festival-related materials.

events.name: Finalized the photography exhibition plan with Mr. Qin Mingyuan.
events.description: At Mingyuan Bookstore, we discussed with Proprietor Qin, presented our works and concepts. Proprietor Qin agreed to provide the exhibition venue for December, confirming the scale and schedule.

events.name: Made plans with my best friend to meet up over the weekend.
events.description: WeChat has arranged a gathering with Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi at a café this Sunday to share good news.

events.name: Register for the Stationery and Planner Market
events.description: In the evening, I saw the market recruitment notice, registered, submitted photos of my journal works, and paid the stall fee.

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement.
events.description: Due to the confirmation of the photography exhibition and anticipation for the gathering, I rested a bit later in the evening and relaxed by reading.

结束状态.心情: Excited, inspired, filled with joy and anticipation

events.name: Going to a cafe to meet up with a close female friend.

events.name: The End of the Gathering and Its Aftertaste

events.name: Due to slightly excessive eating and drinking at the gathering.

events.name: Observational Morning Run
events.description: In the early morning at Cuihu Park, I slowed down my jogging pace to observe the expressions and strides of runners from different age groups, conducting a dynamic "figure sketching" exercise.

events.name: Organize academic issues and prepare for meeting with supervisor.

events.name: Optimize the recipe and conduct a second trial.

2025-10.daily_overview: After her morning run in the rain, Sun Yuwei officially began preparations for the photography exhibition, refined the speech for the sharing event, and conceptualized a practice-integrated thesis, advancing toward becoming a multidimensional cultural creator.

events.name: A New Experience of Morning Running in the Rain
events.description: A light drizzle fell during the morning run. I enjoyed running in the rain, as the water washed away fatigue and distracting thoughts, leaving my mind refreshed and clear.

events.name: Adjust the morning jog route for creative observation.
events.description: Decide to adjust the subsequent morning running route to pass by Mingyuan Bookstore and Xunjin Street to capture dynamic perspective footage.

events.name: Borrowing the reference literature recommended by the supervisor
events.description: After the morning class, I borrowed books such as "Sense of Place and Literary Writing," which helped clarify the structure of my paper.

events.name: Drafting an Explanation Script for Sharing Activities
events.description: In the afternoon, draft a sharing and explanation script for vegetarian bento boxes, incorporating key techniques and considerations of "seasonal eating," and compile the final list.

events.name: Attend a yoga class
events.description: In the afternoon, I attended a yoga class where the instructor, He Lu, shared shoulder and neck stretching exercises. After the class, we exchanged thoughts on reading, achieving both physical and mental relaxation.

events.name: Preliminary Conceptualization of a Thesis Topic Integrating Theory and Practice
events.description: In the evening, I conceived the thesis topic "Literary Writing and Visual Representation of Local Memory: A Case Study of Contemporary Kunming Prose and Photography," and drafted the research approach.

events.name: Stayed up late due to project preparations.
events.description: To refine the details of the photography exhibition and sharing event, I worked late into the evening but maintained mindful breathing to aid sleep.
