2025-11.daily_overview: A day of reaping results and launching new projects. The long-standing issue of manuscript fees was finally resolved satisfactorily, prompting Sun Yuwei to immediately establish more standardized work guidelines. Simultaneously, she officially commenced preparations for her stationery market booth and made a significant payment for the production of photography exhibition works, advancing multiple plans in parallel.

events.name: Receiving Overdue Manuscript Fees and an Apology
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received an email from the finance staff of the 'Prism' platform, apologizing for the delayed payment and confirming that the full manuscript fee of 1,500 yuan had been transferred. Shortly after, a bank deposit notification arrived via text message. At the same time, the assigned editor also sent a brief apology via WeChat. The issue was resolved with unexpectedly smooth efficiency.

events.name: Establish a "Submission Cooperation Archive" system
events.description: While breathing a sigh of relief, Sun Yuwei still felt a lingering fear. She immediately created a folder on her computer titled "Submission Collaboration Archive" and established a core principle: for any future collaborations, regardless of the amount involved, key terms (such as payment, deadlines, and copyright) must be confirmed in writing via email. She archived all materials related to the "Prism" incident as the first case and began organizing past records from collaborations with other platforms.

events.name: Determine the Theme and Inventory List for the Planner Market Booth
events.description: In the afternoon, she began to meticulously plan her stationery market stall. She set the theme as 'Flowing Poetry of Daily Life,' aiming to convey the idea of capturing the beauty of ordinary life through journaling. She compiled a detailed list: four different types of journals to display (travel, reading, flower arranging, and daily life), merchandise planned for sale (specialty washi tape samples, vintage stamps, and Yunnan floral-themed sticky notes), as well as decorative materials (tablecloth, wooden shelves, and small vases).

events.name: Payment for the production of photography exhibition works
events.description: This was a key expenditure for the month. Sun Yuwei visited the previously selected professional studio to finalize with the technicians the micro-printing paper (art matte paper), color standards, and the style of the minimalist wood-grain mounting frames for 55 photographic works. After receiving the detailed bill of 3,200 yuan, she carefully reviewed it and then completed the payment via mobile banking. This expense made her more tangibly aware of the cost and weight of materializing her creative work.

events.name: Planning Historical Chapter Research for the Essay Collection
events.description: In the evening, she organized the chapter outlines on the history of western Yunnan from her essay collection, clarified the specific historical points and ethnic migration routes that required further verification, listed the names of several local chronicles and academic monographs to be consulted, and planned to visit the provincial library the next day.

events.name: Staying Up Late to Celebrate the Resolution of Manuscript Fees
events.description: To celebrate receiving her manuscript payment, Sun Yuwei stayed up a bit later chatting with her family and sharing the joy with friends online, which delayed her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: I feel slightly uneasy about the matter of the manuscript fee, but overall remain calm.

结束状态.心情: A mix of emotions intertwines: the relief and sense of accomplishment from resolving financial disputes, the "sting" and determination of paying a large expense, and the busyness and anticipation of launching new projects (such as markets and research).

state.今日运动: Walking to the studio and handling miscellaneous tasks, approximately 5,000 steps.

2025-11.daily_overview: A day immersed in the collision between archival materials and inspiration. Sun Yuwei conducted an efficient research session at the provincial library, infusing her essay collection with solid historical support. The chance encounter and exchange with fellow book enthusiasts, along with the lessons learned from the manuscript fee incident, have further advanced her progress on her professional path.

events.name: Sharing Rights Protection Experiences and Expressing Gratitude
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei shared the good news of the payment arrival via WeChat with editor Xu Mingyuan and her colleague Song Wen, expressing her gratitude once again for their crucial guidance. She compiled her experience of handling the matter, including the process, timeline, and key takeaways, into a brief electronic note and shared it with Song Wen as material for their "Writer Mutual Assistance Database."

events.name: Historical Data Research of the Provincial Library
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei arrived at the Local Literature Reading Room of Yunnan Provincial Library. Following a prepared list, she borrowed materials such as "A Collection of Ancient Lost Books of Dali" and "A Study of the Migration History of Ethnic Groups in Western Yunnan." Immersed in the archival documents, she meticulously recorded details about the tea-horse road post stations and several major historical migration waves, using both her phone to take photographs and a notebook for handwritten notes. These substantial historical materials will significantly enhance the cultural depth of her prose.

events.name: Encountered book enthusiast Yang Xiao and engaged in conversation
events.description: At noon in the library lounge, she unexpectedly met Yang Xiao, an online book friend who works as an editor in Chengdu. Yang happened to be back in Kunming to visit family and conduct research. The two greeted each other with pleasant surprise and engaged in a brief yet in-depth discussion on topics such as sources for researching Western Yunnan culture and how to translate academic materials into literary forms. Yang also recommended two relevant collections of modern prose.

events.name: Continuous Research and Preliminary Organization
events.description: She continued her research in the afternoon until the library closed. After leaving, she settled into a quiet café nearby, reviewing the notes she had taken throughout the day. She began categorizing them under preliminary themes such as "roads," "crowds," and "products," and marked the historical fragments that most moved her and sparked her literary imagination.

events.name: First Round Screening of Photography Exhibition Entries
events.description: In the evening, though somewhat fatigued, she still turned on her computer and began the first round of preliminary screening of the vast collection of street photography, eliminating those that were blurry, repetitive, or clearly did not align with the theme of "Footsteps in Spring City." This was a physically demanding task that required both patience and an aesthetic eye.

events.name: Stayed up late due to excitement from research.
events.description: The library research provided Sun Yuwei with a wealth of new knowledge, which stimulated her thinking. She continued organizing her notes into the evening, resulting in a later bedtime.

起始状态.心情: With clear learning objectives and a strong thirst for knowledge

结束状态.心情: Intellectually satisfied yet physically somewhat fatigued, the intake of a substantial amount of new knowledge brings a sense of fulfillment, and the unexpected encounter with fellow book enthusiasts is an added delight.

2025-11.daily_overview: The day when various plans entered the substantive preparation stage. Sun Yuwei submitted the final artwork files for the photography exhibition, began meticulously selecting and preparing display samples for the stationery market, and procured materials for the "commercialization" segment of the booth, experiencing the trivialities and joys of bringing creativity to life.

events.name: Submit Photography Exhibition Entry Files
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei organized the electronic files of the photography works, which had undergone the first round of selection and basic color correction, into folders as required and submitted them to the printing and framing studio. She reconfirmed the delivery time with the person in charge via phone, feeling even more excited about the physical presentation of the exhibition.

events.name: Personal Reflections on the Royalty Incident
events.description: During the midday break, she reflected alone on the entire royalty incident. From the initial anxious waiting, to proactively seeking help, organizing evidence, sending formal letters, and finally reaching a resolution. She regarded this experience as a significant "rite of passage" in her freelance career, writing in her journal: "Creation requires an emotional heart, but protecting creation requires a rational mind. Both are indispensable."

events.name: Selection and Preparation of Market Journal Samples
events.description: The main task for the afternoon was preparing the market stall. She spread out all her journals from the past two years, flipping through them page by page, using colorful sticky notes to mark the "shareable" highlights—pages documenting travel experiences, flower arrangement practices, reading reflections, and more. For sections involving private emotions, she carefully covered them with adhesive stickers in matching colors, preserving both her privacy and the overall aesthetic appeal.

events.name: Procurement of Market Supplies and Exchange of Small Change
events.description: Afterwards, she went to the stationery wholesale market to purchase materials such as kraft paper gift bags, thin hemp rope, and small minimalist packaging boxes, adding a sense of ceremony to the sold products. She then went to the bank to exchange hundreds of dollars in small bills of various denominations for unexpected needs. These trivial preparatory tasks gave her a genuine sense of the reality of "setting up a stall."

events.name: Research Materials on Electronic Archiving
events.description: In the evening, she imported the photos of literature she had taken at the library the previous day into her computer. She then organized and supplemented the annotations by cross-referencing her handwritten notes, creating a digital repository of materials. She discovered that, after a day of reflection, those historical details began to form intriguing connections with her personal emotional memories in her mind.

events.name: Body stiffness from prolonged sitting while preparing materials
events.description: Sitting for long periods while selecting planners and purchasing materials caused Sun Yuwei's shoulders and neck to become somewhat stiff, so she performed brief stretches to relieve the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Calm, facing multiple execution tasks, with clear thinking.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, the advancement of preparatory work brings a tangible sense of progress.

state.今日运动: Out for shopping on foot, approximately 4,500 steps, followed by brief stretching.

2025-11.daily_overview: A day dedicated to seeking professional guidance and refining project plans. Sun Yuwei consulted her mentor Wu Mingyuan on both the manuscript of her essay collection and the proposal for her photography exhibition, gaining valuable academic and curatorial advice. Meanwhile, the layout design for her stationery market stall has also taken shape with a concrete draft.

events.name: Draw a sketch of the stationery market booth layout.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei used an iPad to draw a detailed sketch of the booth layout based on the 1.2-meter-long table dimensions provided by the organizer. She planned to use an off-white linen tablecloth as the base, with staggered wooden display stands on the left side to showcase selected bullet journals (opened to marked pages). In the center, she would place a vintage wooden box containing tapes and stamps, while the right side would feature a small "inspiration corner" with a vase holding a few seasonal daisies. She also compiled a list of materials to bring.

events.name: Formally establish personal financial guidelines.
events.description: After handling the payment incident, Sun Yuwei formally wrote in the "Work Guidelines" section of her notebook: "Do not begin substantive creation before receiving an advance payment or confirming the contract." She also added a "Financial Notes" page to record each payment transaction and the credit status of collaborators, aiming to systematically mitigate the risk of bad debts.

events.name: Visiting Mentor Wu Mingyuan to Seek Advice on the Essay Collection
events.description: In the afternoon, she brought the printed manuscript containing most of the completed chapters of her essay collection to visit her mentor, Wu Mingyuan, at the School of Literature of Yunnan University. Professor Wu spent nearly two hours carefully reading the manuscript, praising the delicacy of her writing and the sincerity of her emotions. At the same time, he offered suggestions for structural adjustments and pointed out that certain historical chapters required more solid research support, which aligned with her plans to conduct research at the library.

events.name: Reporting Research Findings to the Mentor
events.description: After finishing the discussion on the manuscript, she took the opportunity to report to Professor Wu on the research findings from her visit to the provincial library the day before yesterday. She also sought her mentor's advice on how to transform rigid historical materials into warm literary narratives. Professor Wu commended her diligence and recommended a book on "Narrative Strategies in Nonfiction Writing."

events.name: Seeking the supervisor's opinion on the photography exhibition proposal
events.description: Before parting, Sun Yuwei briefly introduced to Professor Wu the photography exhibition "Footsteps in Spring City" she was preparing, presenting several representative works from the preliminary selection along with the thematic statement. From a cultural studies perspective, Professor Wu affirmed her choice of subject and the narrative quality of some of the works, suggesting that she could consider adding brief prose-poem style captions to some of the photographs.

events.name: Stayed up excitedly revising due to the supervisor's suggestion.
events.description: In the evening, inspired by her mentor's suggestion, Sun Yuwei was struck by a burst of inspiration and stayed up late revising the chapters of her essay collection, delaying her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the exchange with the mentor, feeling slightly nervous.

结束状态.心情: She benefited greatly, as her supervisor's affirmation and suggestions gave her clearer direction and greater confidence.

state.今日运动: Walking to school and moving around on campus amounts to approximately 4,000 steps.

2025-11.daily_overview: A day of final preparations for the weekend market. Sun Yuwei and her best friend Zhang Jing finalized the stall layout plan and division of tasks, meticulously created price tags and information cards, and packed all materials into boxes. Everything is ready, just waiting for the opening tomorrow.

events.name: Producing Price Tags and Description Cards
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei used pre-cut beige cardstock and handwritten fonts to create uniformly styled price tags for various products. She also wrote brief 'creative inspiration cards' for several particularly representative notebooks (such as the Dali Meditation Record and the Ikenobo Ikebana Special Edition), allowing visitors to quickly understand the stories behind the works.

events.name: Finalized the decoration details with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arranged to meet Zhang Jing at their usual independent bookstore café. She presented the booth layout sketch, prepared materials, and price tags. From a customer's perspective, Zhang Jing offered some minor suggestions, such as placing the most appealing notebook at the visual center and arranging easily sellable small items in accessible locations. The two finally confirmed the setup process and division of responsibilities (Zhang Jing was in charge of customer service and cashier assistance).

events.name: Final Inventory and Material Packing
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei conducted a final inventory. She sorted five selected notebooks, various stationery peripherals, packaging materials, price tag instruction cards, a change box, a payment QR code, business cards, as well as a tablecloth and decorative vases into two large storage boxes, labeling each box accordingly. After verifying everything was correct, she sent a WeChat message to Zhang Jing: "Everything is ready, see you tomorrow!" Her mood was both nervous and excited.

events.name: Fine Selection and Adjustment of Works for the Photography Exhibition
events.description: During breaks in preparing market materials, she took time to conduct a second round of meticulous selection for the photography exhibition works. Inspired by her mentor's suggestions, she paid greater attention to the narrative coherence and emotional depth between the photographs. Using image editing software, she performed detailed adjustments to the brightness, contrast, and color of the dozens of initially selected works.

events.name: Weight gain due to stress-induced eating.
events.description: The stress of preparing for the market led her to eat more snacks during dinner, resulting in a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a busy excitement for the upcoming weekend event.

结束状态.心情: The steadiness and anticipation after being fully prepared, filled with curiosity and a touch of apprehension about tomorrow's market experience.

2025-11.daily_overview: A Saturday of breaking through personal barriers, gaining resonance, and forging friendships. Accompanied by her close friend Zhang Jing, Sun Yuwei publicly shared her private bullet journal world for the first time. Through sincere exchanges with fellow enthusiasts, she not only overcame her initial shyness but also gained valuable recognition and made new friends.

events.name: Handwritten Journal Market Stall Setup and Opening
events.description: Early in the morning, Sun Yuwei and Zhang Jing arrived at the "Shiguang" Cultural and Creative Park with their supply boxes. Following the plan, the two quickly set up their stall. The beige tablecloth, wooden racks, dried flowers, and carefully arranged notebooks made their "Flowing Daily Poetry" stall stand out as particularly fresh and artistic among the many others. At first, Sun Yuwei felt a bit reserved, standing behind the stall and hesitating to actively greet customers.

events.name: The Communication Process from Tension to Enjoyment
events.description: With Zhang Jing's warm introduction and encouragement, Sun Yuwei gradually relaxed. When the first visitor stopped by and curiously asked about the collage technique on a certain page of her journal, she naturally began to explain. Soon, more and more enthusiasts were drawn in, and they exchanged experiences on using different journal brands, tips for documenting travels, and how to overcome "blank page anxiety." Sun Yuwei realized that the joy of sharing the creative process far outweighed the unease of exposing her privacy.

events.name: Receiving Positive Feedback and Adding New Friends
events.description: A girl who also enjoys Ikenobo flower arrangement praised Sun Yuwei's method of incorporating ikebana works into her journal. They exchanged WeChat contacts and agreed to visit the Dounan Flower Market together next time. Throughout the morning, the stall was quite popular, selling many tape samples and memo pads. More importantly, Sun Yuwei received many sincere compliments on her aesthetic sense and recording style.

events.name: Post-market Gathering and Debriefing
events.description: After the afternoon market concluded, Sun Yuwei, Zhang Jing, and Chen Sisi, who had arrived later, gathered for a small get-together at a café in the cultural and creative park. Sun Yuwei excitedly shared her experiences and gains from the day, expressing gratitude for the encouragement and support of her two close friends. They flipped through the new journal pages Sun Yuwei had recorded at the market ("Market Chronicles"), laughing continuously. This experience made Sun Yuwei feel that her connection with her hobbies and her bonds with her friends had deepened further.

events.name: Adjusting Sleep Schedule Due to Fatigue from Activities
events.description: The market activities consumed a great deal of energy, leaving Sun Yuwei feeling exhausted in the evening, yet her mood was exhilarated. She postponed her bedtime to organize her thoughts.

起始状态.心情: Waking up early brings some drowsiness, but more so, it brings nervousness and excitement for the unknown challenges ahead.

结束状态.心情: Extremely fulfilling, joyful yet slightly fatigued, with a profound sense of warmth from being understood and recognized, confidence significantly enhanced, yet a lingering feeling of pressure remains.

state.今日运动: Standing, walking, and arranging items at the market all day involves a high level of physical activity, amounting to approximately 8,000 steps.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was a relaxed yet fulfilling Sunday. After the excitement and fatigue of her first public sharing at the Cuihu Handmade Journal Market yesterday, Sun Yuwei spent most of the day organizing and reflecting at home, transforming her external experiences into inner growth. In the afternoon, she also went out and took the first concrete step toward her upcoming photography exhibition.

events.name: Morning Gentle Indoor Yoga
events.description: After getting up, Sun Yuwei followed an online video in the living room for a 20-minute morning awakening yoga session, focusing on joint mobility and keeping warm, to maintain her exercise routine and cope with recent work pressure.

events.name: Organize market materials and establish online connections
events.description: After yoga, she sat at her desk and took out the physical materials collected from the market, such as flyers, business cards, specialty tapes, and stickers, sorting and archiving them by category into a dedicated scrapbook storage box. Subsequently, she sent friend requests via WeChat to several local scrapbook enthusiasts she had connected with at the market.

events.name: Handling part of the online writing tasks
events.description: Around ten in the morning, she logged into her email and found a manuscript urgently requiring revision sent by Xu Mingyuan, the editor of *Cultural Horizon*. Utilizing her focused morning hours, she completed the initial polishing and structural adjustments of the manuscript and replied to the editor via email.

events.name: Plan the content for journal entries
events.description: After lunch, Sun Yuwei brewed a cup of brown sugar bubble tea, opened a blank journal, and lightly sketched the layout of yesterday's market with a pencil, contemplating how to recreate that mood through a combination of collage and text.

events.name: Go to Mingyuan Bookstore to discuss the photography exhibition.
events.description: At three o'clock in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei brought her initial ideas to the independent bookstore "Mingyuan Bookstore," which she frequented. She elaborated in detail to the owner, Qin Mingyuan, on the concept of the small-scale photography exhibition titled "Footsteps in Spring City." Mr. Qin gladly agreed to provide the inner wall of the bookstore as the exhibition space, and the two of them held preliminary discussions on the details of the exhibition.

events.name: Evening Reading and Relaxation
events.description: After dinner, Sun Yuwei selected a collection of essays recommended by Professor Wu Mingyuan, nestled into the sofa to read, allowing her overactive thoughts to gradually settle down.

起始状态.心情: Full but slightly weary, carrying the lingering excitement from yesterday's market.

结束状态.心情: Calm and content, with clear progress made on the photography exhibition, I feel reassured.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of light indoor yoga

2025-11.daily_overview: As the new week begins, Sun Yuwei resumes her dual identity as both a student and a writer. Today, she divides her energy into two halves: one dedicated to deep introspection, using her journal to record and process the unique experiences of the weekend; the other focused on advancing her academic studies and professional tasks, striving to strike a balance between creativity and scholarship.

events.name: In-Depth Documentation of the Handwritten Journal Market Experience
events.description: Having no classes in the morning, Sun Yuwei spent a full two hours creating her journal. She carefully selected tapes and stickers, collaged ticket stubs and fragments of business cards, and recorded with delicate words the nervousness in front of the stall and the joy of exchanging ideas with fellow enthusiasts.

events.name: Online Communication with Fellow New Journal Enthusiasts
events.description: Before her lunch break, she noticed that several bullet journal enthusiasts she had added yesterday had accepted her friend requests. She proactively initiated conversations, briefly shared their respective bullet journal styles, and agreed to visit local creative markets together if the opportunity arises in the future.

events.name: Organize the framework of the academic year paper and contact the supervisor
events.description: In the afternoon, she spread out the literature and notes on "urban writing" that she had recently consulted in the study, preliminarily outlined the core arguments and chapter structure of her thesis, and drafted an email to her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, to report on her progress.

events.name: Seeking Feedback on Photography Work from the Editor
events.description: In the evening, she selected five most representative photographic proofs from her computer and sent them along with the curatorial statement to editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat, hoping to obtain professional feedback.

events.name: Extended Reflections on Journaling
events.description: Before going to bed at night, she opened her journal again and added a reflection on "sharing" and "connection," comparing the experience of sharing her private journal at the market with her previous quiet visits to photography exhibitions.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to rush-write a prose draft.
events.description: Inspired by a sudden burst of creativity, she stayed up until the early hours of the morning revising the chapter on the old streets of Kunming in her essay collection, attempting to incorporate a more personal narrative, which led to a delay in her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to embark on a week of diverse tasks

结束状态.心情: The mind is abundant yet slightly weary, shifting between documentation, social interactions, academic pursuits, and creative consultations—busy yet methodical.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day focused on academic progress. Sun Yuwei formally submitted her meticulously prepared research proposal to her supervisor, marking a significant milestone in her academic tasks, though she felt somewhat fatigued from staying up late.

events.name: Send Paper Progress Email
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei reviewed the email she had written to her supervisor the previous night once again. After confirming that the ideas were clearly expressed, she clicked send, delivering the phased results and feeling a temporary sense of relief.

events.name: University Courses and Library Research
events.description: There were two required professional courses in the afternoon. After class, I went to the school library and borrowed two reference books on a theoretical difficulty mentioned in the email to take home for detailed reading.

events.name: Handling Freelance Correspondence
events.description: After returning home, I checked the submission email inbox, replied to two inquiries from small cultural platforms regarding commissioned articles, politely declined an urgent writing request, and accepted another column invitation about "urban independent bookstores."

events.name: Organize the work material library for the photography exhibition
events.description: After dinner, I opened the folder named "Footsteps in Spring City" on my computer and began systematically browsing and categorizing the photos of Kunming I had taken over the past two years, creating subfolders based on themes.

events.name: Adjusting Bedtime Due to Fatigue
events.description: Feeling the fatigue from staying up late the previous night, she decided to go to bed early, skipping her evening reading and opting for 10 minutes of mindful breathing before an early rest.

起始状态.心情: With a touch of anticipation and unease, awaiting academic feedback, yet feeling somewhat physically fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Having completed the assigned tasks, the psychological pressure has slightly eased, but I am still contemplating the direction of my thesis. After resting, my energy will be restored.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day of receiving feedback and clarifying direction. The supervisor's email reply opened up a new, more personalized perspective for Sun Yuwei's thesis; meanwhile, fueled by this momentum, she has preliminarily completed the selection of works for the photography exhibition. Substantial progress has been made on both fronts.

events.name: Received the supervisor's email reply and adjusted the research direction of the paper.
events.description: Checking her email in the early morning, Sun Yuwei saw a reply from her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, who affirmed her work and suggested integrating theoretical discussions with her personal photography practice. Using her own images of Kunming as vivid case studies would provide a clear breakthrough for her.

events.name: Select and finalize the list of works for the photography exhibition
events.description: Inspired by my mentor's suggestion, I spent the entire afternoon immersed in the final selection of photos for "Strolling Through the Spring City," reflecting on the stories and emotions behind each image. Ultimately, I finalized 22 works and drafted their titles and descriptions.

events.name: Evening Call with Mother Li Xiulan
events.description: When talking on the phone with her mother in the evening, she excitedly shared her advisor's suggestions and the confirmation of her photography exhibition works. Her mother was delighted for her and reminded her to get enough rest.

events.name: Online Webinar Registration
events.description: While browsing Douban before bed, I came across an announcement for an online seminar titled "Urban Memory and Literary Writing." After confirming the relevance of the theme, I immediately registered for it.

events.name: Staying up late for an impromptu gathering with friends
events.description: My close friend Zhang Jing paid an unexpected visit, and the two of us chatted in the living room about recent updates and interesting stories from the stationery market until late at night, which delayed our bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation tinged with a hint of nervousness.

结束状态.心情: Feeling invigorated and clear-minded, the mentor's affirmation and the project's progress have brought a strong sense of accomplishment and motivation, leaving me in a pleasant mood after social interactions.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day marked by efficient output and proactive planning. Sun Yuwei focused on writing in the morning, transforming new ideas for her paper into written form. In the afternoon, she arranged a series of upcoming social and learning activities, laying the groundwork for the days ahead.

events.name: Focus on writing the core chapters of the paper.
events.description: Utilizing the uninterrupted block of time in the morning, I turned off communication software and devoted myself wholeheartedly to writing the thesis. By analyzing the theoretical framework in relation to my carefully selected photographic case studies, I completed the initial draft of the newly planned core chapter.

events.name: Schedule a University Roommate Reunion
events.description: During the lunch break, I contacted my roommate Zhao Xiaowen via WeChat to confirm that both of us are available tomorrow afternoon, and we agreed to meet at the "Wheatfield Bookstore Café" on Wenlin Street.

events.name: Received a lecture recommendation from the supervisor.
events.description: In the afternoon, I went to the office of my supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, for our weekly academic discussion. Professor Wu recommended the lecture titled "Local Memory and Literary Representation" at the College of Liberal Arts the day after tomorrow. Sun Yuwei carefully noted down the information.

events.name: Conceptualize the layout sketch for the photography exhibition.
events.description: In the evening, I took out paper and pen to conceptualize the exhibition wall layout by referring to the final artwork list, considering the size coordination, tonal transitions, and narrative flow between the works, and sketched a simple layout plan.

events.name: Start the Advanced Online Writing Course
events.description: In the evening, I logged into the three-day online advanced writing course I had registered for, studied the first module on narrative techniques, and took notes.

起始状态.心情: Clear objective, prepared for intensive text-based work

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and productive, the thesis is progressing smoothly, with anticipation for future lectures and gatherings.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today, Sun Yuwei's life alternated between practical preparations and warm social interactions. In the morning, she handled the production of key materials for the photography exhibition, while in the afternoon, she engaged in a heartfelt conversation with a close friend, alleviating the anxieties of the graduation season.

events.name: Deliver photography works to the printing shop for production
events.description: In the morning, I brought a USB drive containing high-definition files of 22 final artworks to a professional printing shop. I communicated in detail with the staff regarding the printing dimensions, matte art paper material, and minimalist wooden frame mounting requirements, and paid a deposit.

events.name: A Small Gathering with University Roommate Zhao Xiaowen at a Cafe
events.description: In the afternoon, I met Zhao Xiaowen at the "Wheatfield Bookstore Café." We shared amusing stories from our internships, discussed the progress of the photography exhibition, and talked about the challenges in compiling the essay collection. As we flipped through our university journals, laughter filled the air. We made a pact to meet up every month after graduation.

events.name: Keep a journal and plan family gatherings.
events.description: After the gathering, I pasted the café receipt in my home journal and wrote about cherishing friendship. I then contacted my mother, Li Xiulan, to suggest a family dinner on Sunday evening and offered to help prepare the mushroom hot pot.

events.name: Notes on Seminar Insights and Thesis Planning
events.description: In the evening, record in the journal the process of communicating with the supervisor and the breakthroughs in thesis writing from the previous days, and clarify the specific plan for revising and improving the thesis in the next stage.

events.name: Temporary video call with high school classmate Li Haoran
events.description: I had a video call with my high school classmate Li Haoran, who is currently in Shenzhen, before going to bed. We talked about recent updates and industry insights, and the conversation went so in-depth that it lasted until late at night, causing me to stay up late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and joyful, looking forward to meeting friends and the arrival of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Her heart is warm and full, and the support of friendship makes her feel deeply at ease, though she feels somewhat fatigued after socializing.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was a day for gathering inspiration and confirming details. In the morning, Sun Yuwei conducted a site survey for the photography exhibition, while in the afternoon, she immersed herself in a high-quality academic lecture, bravely asked questions, and gained valuable insights.

events.name: Conduct on-site measurements of the exhibition space with Qin Mingyuan.
events.description: In the morning, I returned to Mingyuan Bookstore with a tape measure and notebook. Together with Manager Qin, we measured the dimensions of the wall planned for the exhibition, assessed the lighting conditions, and analyzed customer flow paths. We also discussed the hanging height and spacing of the artworks, as well as the placement of auxiliary spotlights.

events.name: Attending Academic Lectures and Asking Questions
events.description: In the afternoon, I arrived early at the lecture hall of the School of Literature at Yunnan University to attend the lecture titled "Local Memory and Literary Representation." During the Q&A session, I mustered the courage to ask the scholar about "how personalized narratives can carry collective memory" and received an insightful response.

events.name: Exchange insights with mentors and classmates
events.description: After the lecture, she encountered her mentor Professor Wu Mingyuan and her roommate Zhao Xiaowen outside the venue. Professor Wu affirmed her proactive thinking, and she shared her insights from the lecture with Xiaowen.

events.name: Organizing Lecture Notes and Their Connection to Creative Work
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, I immediately sat down at my desk, opened my journal and computer, reorganized the lecture notes, connected the core ideas with essays and academic papers, and recorded new inspirations.

events.name: Final Confirmation of Exhibition Materials
events.description: Before going to bed, confirm the production progress of the works with the printing shop via WeChat, and verify the design and production party for text materials such as exhibition labels and introductory panels with Mr. Qin.

events.name: Continue Online Writing Course
events.description: I took some time to study the second module of the online advanced writing course, focusing on character development techniques, and completed a simple exercise.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed and focused, ready to embrace a fulfilling day.

结束状态.心情: Mentally exhilarated and filled with academic and creative inspiration, the body is weary but the mind is exceptionally active.

state.今日运动: Approximately 40 minutes on foot (round trip between the university and the bookstore)

2025-11.daily_overview: This was a Sunday filled with the warmth of home and family affection. Sun Yuwei temporarily set aside her books and joined her mother in the kitchen, preparing a table of hometown flavors. During the cozy family gathering, she shared updates on her recent work and creative progress.

events.name: Purchase ingredients for a family dinner gathering
events.description: In the morning, I accompanied my mother Li Xiulan to the bustling vegetable market near our home, where we carefully selected a variety of fresh mushrooms such as porcini and termitomyces, along with hot pot ingredients. We also bought freshly baked flower cakes.

events.name: Assist mother in preparing dinner.
events.description: In the afternoon, I helped my mother in the kitchen by washing mushrooms and preparing side dishes. She shared her secret to making mushroom soup, and the atmosphere was warm as we chatted.

events.name: Writing Exhibition Work Descriptions and Foreword
events.description: During the intervals of simmering soup, I returned to the study to write brief descriptions for each of the 22 photographic works and conceptualize the exhibition preface, followed by simple typesetting using design software.

events.name: Family Dinner and Photography Exhibition Sharing
events.description: In the evening, the whole family gathered around the dining table and connected via video call with Sun Yutong, who was in Shenzhen, to enjoy a mushroom hotpot. Sun Yuwei used a tablet to display some photos of the framed artworks, sharing the exhibition plans and interesting stories from the notebook market.

events.name: Post-meal Conversation and Cleanup
events.description: After dinner, she helped her mother clear the dishes. Her mother reminded her to take breaks while setting up the exhibition, and her father added suggestions for managing crowd flow at the venue.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to dining out.
events.description: After enjoying a substantial dinner, her weight increased slightly, but she decided to adjust it through subsequent exercise.

起始状态.心情: Relax, anticipate, and prepare to enjoy family time.

结束状态.心情: Warm, happy, deeply surrounded by the love and support of family, and filled with inner strength.

state.今日运动: Household chores (Procurement, Kitchen assistance)

2025-11.daily_overview: Monday began with the patter of autumn rain. After recharging over the weekend, Sun Yuwei returned to her daily routine, tackling some backlogged online work and making final preparations in documentation and coordination for the upcoming intensive exhibition setup week.

events.name: Complete and submit the column manuscript
events.description: In the morning, I focused on completing the column article about "Independent Bookstores in the City." Drawing from my frequent visits to places like Mingyuan Bookstore, I wrote it fluently and with emotion before sending it to the editor.

events.name: Deliver the exhibition tag design draft to the printing shop.
events.description: After the rain let up a bit, I went out to deliver the designed exhibition labels and preface layout files to the printing shop, confirming the matte hard cardstock material and font effects.

events.name: Revise the prose manuscript based on inspiration from the lecture
events.description: In the afternoon, open the prose collection document, locate the article about memories of Kunming's old streets, adjust the narrative perspective based on insights from the lecture, and incorporate broader historical context clues.

events.name: Participate in Cultural Seminars Online
events.description: Log in to the online seminar "Urban Memory and Literary Writing" on time in the evening, participate as an audience member, and record useful information in electronic notes.

events.name: Contact yoga partner He Lu
events.description: Feeling stiffness in the shoulders and neck before bed, I sent a WeChat message to my yoga partner He Lu to inquire about class availability for next week. He Lu replied that there were still spots available for the Wednesday class.

events.name: Complete the online writing course
events.description: Completed the final module of the online advanced writing course, summarized narrative structure techniques, and submitted the final assignment.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight inertia typical of Monday mornings.

结束状态.心情: Steady progress was made, completing numerous trivial yet necessary tasks, laying the groundwork for the upcoming sprint.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day of broadening horizons. A lengthy conversation with her cousin opened up a new world of diverse creative values for Sun Yuwei. Meanwhile, the physical works for the photography exhibition were also ready.

events.name: Retrieve the developed and framed photographic works
events.description: In the morning, after receiving a call from the printing shop, I went to pick up the item. Seeing the work meticulously printed and mounted in a wooden frame, transformed into a tangible object, I felt a surge of excitement and a sense of accomplishment. After carefully inspecting it, I transported it home for temporary storage.

events.name: Discussing Content Commercialization with Cousin Shen Wei
events.description: In the afternoon, I had a long video call with my cousin Shen Wei, who works in brand planning in Hangzhou. I shared my confusion about creative work and making a living. Shen Wei pointed out that the chapters in the essay collection about the history and cultural features of western Yunnan could be transformed into a brand story library for high-end cultural tourism projects or serve as the core inspiration for cultural and creative products.

events.name: Outline the Commercialization Plan
events.description: After the call, feeling inspired, I created a new document on my computer to record the key points of the conversation, list the themes in the prose that may have commercial potential, and begin preliminary thoughts on content formats and collaboration directions.

events.name: Sign up for yoga classes
events.description: In the evening, I inquired about and signed up for a one-month session card course at "Serenity Yoga Life Studio" via WeChat. I placed an online order for a new yoga mat and practice attire, determined to start regular practice from next month.

events.name: Weight loss due to excitement
events.description: Due to project advancement and expanded thinking, appetite is generally average, with a slight decrease in body weight.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, because I'm going to pick up the finished work.

结束状态.心情: Excited and filled with myriad thoughts, there is both the joy of seeing the work materialize and the awe of having new perspectives opened up, along with a wealth of imagination for the future.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Sun Yuwei systematized the business inspiration sparked the previous day by drafting an outline of the proposal. Meanwhile, she also attended a yoga class and engaged in a relaxed conversation with her partner afterward.

events.name: Draft the Outline of "Commercial Cooperation Plan for Prose Collection Content"
events.description: In the morning, systematically organize thoughts, draft the proposal outline, and clarify the core content themes that can be provided, various content formats, as well as the anticipated market value and potential types of collaborators.

events.name: Send the proposal outline to the cousin for feedback.
events.description: After completing the draft outline, send it to my cousin Shen Wei via WeChat to thank her for yesterday's inspiration and to seek preliminary feedback from a professional market perspective.

events.name: Attend yoga classes and make new friends
events.description: In the afternoon, I brought a new yoga mat and attended He Lu's yoga class for the first time. The session focused on breathing and basic poses. After the practice, the tension in my shoulders and neck was relieved. He Lu introduced me to the other participants.

events.name: Evening Organization and Reading
events.description: With no work in the evening, I organized the books and materials in the study, then read the collection of essays on urban photography gifted by Qin Mingyuan, ending the day in tranquility.

events.name: Try the treadmill at the community gym.
events.description: After the yoga class, I stopped by the community gym to try a 20-minute slow jog on the treadmill, adapting to the rhythm of indoor exercise in preparation for winter workouts.

起始状态.心情: Calm down, prepare to transform inspiration into concrete text.

结束状态.心情: Body relaxed, mind clear. Having completed a challenging conceptual task and released stress through exercise, the state is balanced.

Sun Yuwei collected all the completed items and took the initiative to meet with the bookstore owner, hoping to listen to the senior's experience one last time before the exhibition setup.

events.name: Retrieve all exhibition materials and conduct inspections.
events.description: In the morning, I collected all the completed exhibition labels and introductory panels from the printing shop. After returning home, I laid out all the materials on the floor for a final comprehensive inspection, verifying the correspondence between the artworks and their labels, and checking for any flaws in the mounting.

events.name: Contact Qin Mingyuan to schedule a pre-exhibition discussion.
events.description: Looking at the "hard work" scattered all over the floor, a hint of nervousness arose amid the excitement. I contacted Qin Mingyuan via WeChat, hoping to seek further advice on the details. Uncle Qin gladly agreed and scheduled a meeting for the following afternoon.

events.name: Handling academic affairs
events.description: In the afternoon, log into the school system to review and record the requirements for the final course assignments, and reply to Professor Wu Mingyuan's email regarding the revisions of the thesis chapters.

events.name: Prepare simple tools for exhibition setup
events.description: After dinner, locate the canvas bag and check the exhibition tools that may be needed, such as a tape measure, level, and damage-free nails, then place them inside to prepare for tomorrow's exhibition setup.

events.name: Weight gain due to slight increase in stress
events.description: As the exhibition approaches, stress-induced eating has increased, leading to a slight weight gain.

结束状态.心情: Amid the sense of steadiness from having everything prepared, there lingers a slight nervousness about the crucial steps to be taken tomorrow.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was the "reassurance" day before the exhibition setup. Sun Yuwei gained valuable practical experience and spiritual encouragement from the bookstore owner and released an exhibition preview online. Meanwhile, the persistent physical fatigue made her determined to put her exercise plan on the agenda.

events.name: Announcing an Exhibition on Social Media Platforms
events.description: In the morning, a preview for the "Strolling Through Spring City" photography exhibition was posted on platforms such as my WeChat official account and Douban diary, accompanied by preview images of the works, an explanation of the exhibition theme, and details regarding the time and location.

events.name: In-depth pre-exhibition discussion with Qin Mingyuan
events.description: In the afternoon, I arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore as scheduled and explained the exhibition layout plan and uncertainties in detail to Uncle Qin. He shared practical details such as using lighting to highlight the texture of the works and setting up viewing routes, and also offered literary suggestions regarding the arrangement of the pieces.

events.name: Books Received and Spiritual Encouragement
events.description: At the end of their conversation, Qin Mingyuan presented a thin volume on the philosophy of space and imagery, remarking that the exhibition setup marks the beginning of a dialogue between the artwork, the space, and the viewers. This gesture provided Sun Yuwei with immense spiritual support.

events.name: Return home to organize notes and make a firm decision to try morning runs.
events.description: After returning home, I recorded Uncle Qin's suggestions in the exhibition notes, which brought me a sense of reassurance. While writing in the evening, I experienced soreness in my shoulders and neck. After reviewing the precautions for beginner morning runners, I resolved to start attempting morning runs two to three times a week from December 1st.

events.name: Going to bed early due to temporary physical discomfort
events.description: Due to consecutive days of fatigue, I experienced a slight headache and decided to rest early. After practicing mindful breathing, I went to bed ahead of schedule.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, but full of anticipation.

结束状态.心情: Confidence has greatly increased, with deep gratitude (towards Uncle Qin), and a firm determination to adopt new healthy habits, though there is slight physical discomfort.

state.今日运动: Approximately 30 minutes on foot (round trip to the bookstore).

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning partly cloudy in the afternoon.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was an intensive day for exhibition setup mobilization. Sun Yuwei completed all preliminary invitation tasks and conducted a final on-site confirmation with Mr. Qin in the afternoon, clearing all obstacles for the major project scheduled for the following day.

events.name: Sending Exhibition Invitations to Friends and Family
events.description: Throughout the morning, personalized exhibition invitations were sent via WeChat to family members, close friends, university classmates, roommates, mentors, editors, and others, sharing the opening time and location, and requesting their assistance in promotion.

events.name: Final confirmation with Qin Mingyuan before exhibition setup
events.description: In the afternoon, I conducted the final on-site confirmation with Qin Mingyuan at the bookstore before the exhibition setup. We verified the wall dimensions, made minor adjustments to the hanging positions of some artworks, planned the movement routes for the setup personnel and the placement areas for tools tomorrow. Mr. Qin confirmed that the spotlight equipment had been properly adjusted.

events.name: Final check of the work and materials
events.description: After confirming the venue, recheck all artworks and materials to ensure nothing is missing or damaged, and place the tools needed for tomorrow into the backpack.

events.name: Prepare a brief opening speech
events.description: In the quiet of the evening, I sat down at my computer to draft a brief opening speech, hoping to sincerely express gratitude and share the original intention of viewing the city through the lens.

events.name: Confirm with my close friend Zhang Jing about tomorrow's assistance matters.
events.description: Before going to bed, I called my close friend Zhang Jing to confirm that she will come early tomorrow to help with the exhibition setup. Having a good friend's support brings a sense of reassurance.

起始状态.心情: Busy yet organized, entering a state of "pre-battle" preparation.

结束状态.心情: Everything is ready, and the calmness arrives with immense anticipation for tomorrow and a touch of solemnity before the ceremony begins.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was a day when dreams became reality. With the invaluable help of her friends, Sun Yuwei completed all the preparations for the "Strolling Through Spring City" photography exhibition. As she stood alone in the center of the space surrounded by her own works, the long-term efforts crystallized into genuine emotion.

events.name: Final Inventory and Task Allocation Before Exhibition Setup
events.description: At nine in the morning, Sun Yuwei, Qin Mingyuan, along with their helpful friend Zhang Jing and roommate Zhao Xiaowen, gathered at Mingyuan Bookstore to inventory all the artworks and materials. Sun Yuwei explained the exhibition layout plan and assigned tasks: Boss Qin and Zhang Jing were responsible for hanging the works, Xiaowen would pass the tools, and Sun Yuwei would serve as the overall coordinator.

events.name: Joint Hanging and Debugging of Artworks
events.description: The exhibition setup proceeded in a tense yet orderly manner. Each time a piece was hung, Sun Yuwei would carefully examine its placement, level, and relationship with adjacent works, making fine adjustments to achieve optimal visual balance and narrative coherence. Qin Mingyuan operated the spotlights to illuminate the works, while Sun Yuwei observed the lighting effects and made further adjustments accordingly.

events.name: The Touching Moment of Completing the Exhibition Setup
events.description: Around three in the afternoon, all the work was completed. Her friends left temporarily, and Sun Yuwei stood alone in the exhibition area, looking around. Those familiar street corners and light and shadow were now displayed within the cultural space, transformed from private folders into a public visual narrative. A wave of emotion washed over her, and her eyes grew moist.

events.name: Thank You Afternoon Tea for Friends
events.description: To express gratitude for everyone's hard work and assistance, I treated everyone to afternoon tea at a quiet café near the bookstore. We enjoyed desserts, shared amusing stories about the exhibition setup, and looked forward to the opening of the exhibition tomorrow, creating a pleasant and warm atmosphere.

events.name: Final Inspection and Opening Preparation
events.description: In the evening, I returned to the bookstore for the final pre-opening inspection: confirming that the exhibition labels were correct, the lighting was stable, and the visitor flow routes were clear. I also memorized the opening speech and sent a WeChat reminder to my family and important guests about the opening time the following day.

events.name: Evening Gentle Stretching
events.description: Perform 10 minutes of light stretching before sleep to alleviate fatigue from exhibition setup work and conserve energy for tomorrow's opening.

起始状态.心情: Both excited and solemn, as if welcoming an important ceremony.

结束状态.心情: A profound sense of accomplishment intertwines with deep emotion—exhausted yet spiritually fulfilled. Witnessing one's creation fully materialized and placed within an ideal space fills the heart with strength and tranquility.

state.今日运动: Exhibition setup labor (continuous standing, walking, light lifting) approximately 5 hours, with 10 minutes of light stretching in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: In Kunming during winter, mornings are cold while afternoons are warmed by gentle sunshine.

2025-12.daily_overview: This was a busy and expectant day, marking the commencement and public presentation of Sun Yuwei's multiple personal projects. The photography exhibition entered its final sprint of installation, while a systematic plan for revising the essay collection was also initiated. Most importantly, she mustered the courage to begin implementing her morning running plan aimed at improving posture. Although the initial attempt was challenging, she took a solid first step.

events.name: Installation of the "Strolling Through Spring City" Photography Exhibition
events.description: In the morning, with the assistance of bookstore owner Qin Mingyuan, Sun Yuwei carefully transported the pre-mounted photography works to Mingyuan Bookstore. Following the design plan previously agreed upon with Mr. Qin, she arranged the works of different themes in an orderly yet varied manner on specific walls of the bookstore. At the entrance of the exhibition area, she placed a thoughtfully designed exhibition description and a blank visitor comment book. Sunlight streamed through the bookstore’s floor-to-ceiling windows, casting a warm glow over these works that captured fleeting moments of the city.

events.name: Communicate with the mentor to formulate a revision plan for the essay collection.
events.description: In the quiet atmosphere of the study that afternoon, Sun Yuwei took out the notes from her meeting with her mentor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, the previous week. She carefully reviewed the revision suggestions her mentor had provided for the essay collection *Cang’er Xuyu, Fubei de Qunshan* (Whispers of Cang’er, Mountains of the Fathers). Combining these with her own reflections on literary quality and narrative structure, she drew a detailed revision plan timeline on an A4 sheet of paper. Using pens of different colors, she marked the key writing points for the remaining chapters, sections requiring additional research, and the estimated completion dates. She felt her goals had become much clearer.

events.name: Overcome inertia and start your first morning run.
events.description: At half past six in the morning, the alarm clock rang. Despite the warmth of the bed, Sun Yuwei, adhering to the determination she had made the night before, changed into her sportswear and braved the winter chill to arrive at Cuihu Park. On her first attempt, her physical stamina fell far short of her expectations. After jogging slowly for less than ten minutes, she was already panting heavily and had to switch to brisk walking. The cold air stung slightly as it entered her lungs, but she persisted and completed the planned route around the lake. Along the way, she observed the serene scenes of mist hovering over the lake and elderly people practicing Tai Chi during their morning exercise. In her phone's memo app, she noted, "The morning wind is biting, but the world awakening at dawn feels gentle."

events.name: Preparations for the Photography Exhibition Opening Salon
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei returned to Mingyuan Bookstore once again to make final preparations for the opening salon scheduled for 7 p.m. She checked the projection equipment, transferred her brief speech and the PowerPoint presentation introducing the background of her works to the computer, and verified the list of invited friends, relatives, and regular customers with the owner, Mr. Qin. She felt a bit nervous, but more than that, she was filled with anticipation for sharing her works. Before the salon began, she also made a special trip to a nearby flower shop to buy a small bouquet of holly, which she placed at the bookstore's front desk to add a touch of warmth to the evening.

events.name: Successfully held the opening salon
events.description: At seven in the evening, the opening salon for the "Strolling Through Spring City" photography exhibition began on time. The modest reading area of the bookstore was filled with supportive parents, close friends Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi, several university classmates, and some familiar regular patrons. Standing before her own works, Sun Yuwei introduced the origin of the exhibition's theme, "Measuring Spring City with Footsteps," with a hint of shyness but genuine sincerity. She also shared brief stories and the emotions behind several of her core photographs. During the interactive session, the audience participated enthusiastically, creating a warm and lively atmosphere that provided her with immense encouragement.

起始状态.心情: Nervous, expectant, and somewhat weary, feeling the pressure of the multiple tasks awaiting the new day, yet the determination has been set.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and content, the completion of the morning run and the successful hosting of the salon brought a sense of double achievement. Though physically tired, the spirit was invigorated.

state.今日运动: Morning run (jogging + brisk walking) for approximately 30 minutes

2025-12.daily_overview: After the social climax of yesterday, Sun Yuwei entered a day of intense focus and immersion in her creative work today. She secluded herself in her study, concentrating on tackling the final stronghold of her essay collection, engaging in a dialogue with the Kunming old streets from her memory within the world of words. It was a quiet yet highly productive day of output.

events.name: Conquer the Final Chapter of the Prose Collection
events.description: Sun Yuwei spent nearly the entire day hunched over her desk. Following the revision plan, she focused intently on writing the final two unfinished chapters of her essay collection. One chapter was about the old bookstore on Wenlin Street from her childhood memories, while the other centered on the emerging community of independent bookstores in present-day Kunming. She poured into these chapters her observations from her usual bookstore visits, her exchanges with bookstore owner Qin Mingyuan, and her reflections on the value of handwritten works. The tapping of her keyboard was accompanied by the occasional chirping of birds outside the window, and it was not until evening that she drew a temporary conclusion to these two chapters.

events.name: Compilation of Feedback from the First Day of the Exhibition
events.description: During a break from writing, Sun Yuwei opened WeChat and saw the encouraging messages from friends after last night's salon, as well as the likes on her Moments. She deliberately scrolled through the discussions in her close friends' group chat, noting their favorable comments on certain photos in the "Exhibition Notes" section of her journal. This immediate positive feedback injected a bit of energy into her ongoing creative work.

events.name: Recharge your body, pause your morning run.
events.description: Considering the high level of physical activity yesterday and the late bedtime, Sun Yuwei decided to skip her morning run today to allow her body to rest fully. She woke up half an hour later than usual and had a simple breakfast prepared by her mother at home. Feeling a slight soreness in her muscles, she recognized it as proof of yesterday's exercise. She realized that building a habit requires a balance of effort and relaxation, rather than relentless exertion.

events.name: Adjusting sleep schedule by going to bed early due to fatigue.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei felt physically exhausted and decided to go to bed early to restore her energy. She canceled her scheduled reading time, performed a simple bedtime routine, and went to sleep at 22:50 to recharge for the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight weariness from yesterday's excitement, ready to enter a state of deep work.

结束状态.心情: Amidst the calmness lies a sense of relief from completing the task, with a solid feeling of "phase completion" filling the heart.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day of balancing multiple roles. Sun Yuwei made her first attempt to incorporate yoga into her daily routine, marking a new health goal. Simultaneously, she thoroughly prepared for an online seminar, showcasing her professionalism as both a student and a creator. Additionally, she began taking steps to present her creative work to a broader audience. Various tasks intertwined, yet all progressed in an orderly manner.

events.name: First Experience with a Yoga Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei arrived at the Jingxin Yoga Life Studio to attend the Wednesday beginner class she had booked. Under the gentle guidance of the instructor, she somewhat clumsily learned basic poses such as Mountain Pose and Cat-Cow Pose, as well as diaphragmatic breathing techniques. During the class, she met He Lu, who was also a beginner practicing beside her. The two exchanged a smile, acknowledging each other. By the end of the session, she felt an unfamiliar stretch in her body and, inexplicably, a much greater sense of calm.

events.name: Prepare for the online seminar in advance
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei received a participation link and a resource package for an online cultural seminar. She downloaded the speaker profiles and recommended reference materials in advance. Focusing on the theme "Individual Narratives in the Digital Age" and drawing from her ongoing collection of prose essays, she outlined several preliminary thoughts and potential questions in her notebook. This prepared approach filled her with anticipation rather than anxiety for the evening's session.

events.name: Final Review and Submission Preparation for Prose Collection Manuscripts
events.description: After returning home from her evening yoga class, Sun Yuwei compiled the electronic drafts of all chapters of her essay collection, conducted a final thorough read-through and basic proofreading, corrected several typos, and made slight adjustments to the transitions and coherence of certain paragraphs. Subsequently, she drafted a concise and compelling synopsis along with a clear table of contents, and outlined the key points for communicating with Xu Mingyuan, the editor of *Cultural Horizon*: how to position this essay collection, which is filled with personal memories and urban observations.

events.name: Persist in morning running and adapt to the process.
events.description: In the early morning, the alarm clock rang once again. Lingering soreness in her body made her hesitate for a few seconds, but thinking of her goal of "twice a week," she still got up and headed to Cuihu Lake. Today's combination of running and walking felt smoother than the first day, at least allowing her to run for a longer stretch. She began to take notice of the red-billed gulls skimming over the water and captured a photo of the pavilion at the center of the lake bathed in the morning light with her phone.

events.name: Working overnight to prepare materials for the seminar.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei stayed up until 23:20 to refine her questions for the seminar, which made it slightly difficult for her to get up early the next morning.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit curious and nervous about the new thing (yoga), while handling several upcoming matters in an orderly manner.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, I tried new activities and also advanced important matters, feeling that life is expanding in a positive direction.

state.今日运动: Morning jog for about 25 minutes, yoga class for 60 minutes.

2025-12.daily_overview: This was a landmark day. Sun Yuwei officially took the first step toward bringing her personal work to the publishing market. The moment she sent the email was filled with a mix of anticipation, nervousness, and a sense of relief. Other routine tasks revolved around maintaining the already launched project (the photography exhibition) and planning new family interactions.

events.name: Formally send out the publishing intention email
events.description: In the afternoon, in her study, Sun Yuwei took a deep breath and began formally drafting the email to editor Xu Mingyuan. Using a respectful and sincere tone, she introduced the creative intent and distinctive features of "Whispers of Cang'er, Mountains of Our Fathers," attaching the synopsis, table of contents, and two selected sample chapters she had prepared the day before. She carefully reviewed the wording of the email body and the accuracy of the attachments, hovering the cursor over the 'Send' button for a moment before finally clicking it. As the notification sound for a successfully sent email chimed, she felt a temporary sense of relief, as if a weight had been lifted from her heart, and began awaiting fate's response.

events.name: Daily Maintenance of Photography Exhibition
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei stopped by Mingyuan Bookstore on her way. Like a dedicated curator, she checked that the photography pieces were securely hung, gently wiped the dust off the glass of the frames with a soft cloth, and tidied up the somewhat disorganized promotional brochures. Seeing a few more comments from unfamiliar visitors in the guestbook, she felt a warm glow in her heart.

events.name: Made an appointment with my father for a weekend walk.
events.description: During dinner, Sun Yuwei suggested to her father Sun Mingyuan that they take a morning walk together at Cuihu Park this weekend. Her father was somewhat surprised but readily agreed. Sun Yuwei secretly planned to use this opportunity to discuss her creative work with her father and also listen to his life stories.

events.name: Restorative Morning Exercise
events.description: Considering the consecutive physical activities and yesterday's yoga session, Sun Yuwei opted for a gentler morning exercise routine today. She engaged in a 40-minute brisk walk at Cuihu Park, focusing on body movement and observation rather than pushing for a run. The overcast weather lent a solemn and distinctive charm to the trees by the lake.

events.name: Received preliminary feedback from the editor, feeling emotional fluctuations.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received a brief reply from Editor Xu, indicating that the email had been received and would be reviewed in detail within a few days. This left her feeling slightly anxious, but she made an effort to remain calm.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a faint undercurrent of anxiety akin to waiting for an important email reply.

结束状态.心情: Release and anticipation coexist. An important step has been taken, and attention can now be temporarily shifted to other matters.

state.今日运动: A 40-minute brisk walk in the morning

2025-12.daily_overview: Today was a day filled with dense information and abundant gains. From the morning's inspiration to in-depth communication with industry professionals during the day, and then to positive professional feedback in the evening, Sun Yuwei made significant progress and gained clear guidance in multiple dimensions, including personal growth, career development, and health management.

events.name: Discovering Writing Inspiration During Morning Runs
events.description: In the early morning, Cuihu Lake was shrouded in a thin mist. Elderly people practicing morning exercises moved through the gentle motions of Tai Chi, while faint sounds of bustling activity began to emerge from the morning market. Sun Yuwei slowed her pace during her jog, suddenly struck by these scenes brimming with the essence of daily life. She stopped and quickly jotted down in her phone's memo the line, "The misty lake resembles an ink wash painting, the rising sounds of the market are the pulse of human life," along with fragments of inspiration about "the rhythm of a city awakening." She began to realize that morning jogging was not just exercise but also a moving inspiration collector.

events.name: Received positive feedback from the editor
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei received a reply email from editor Xu Mingyuan! In the email, Editor Xu affirmed the literary quality and unique urban perspective of the essay collection and suggested further detailed discussions via WeChat. Subsequently, their communication shifted from email to WeChat, allowing for more immediate and in-depth exchanges. Editor Xu provided professional market positioning suggestions, explored the possibility of serializing parts of the content in the online column of *Cultural Horizon*, and recommended that she prepare a brief market analysis report. This far exceeded Sun Yuwei's expectations of merely "receiving a reply."

events.name: Participate in an online cultural seminar
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei logged into the online meeting on time. She listened attentively to the scholars' presentations and, during the Q&A session, mustered the courage to raise her question in written form regarding "how personalized urban writing can avoid falling into self-centered emotions." She received an insightful response from the speaker and diligently took notes.

events.name: Consulting with my sister about financial tools.
events.description: During her lunch break, Sun Yuwei contacted her sister Sun Yutong in Shenzhen via WeChat video call. She consulted her sister, who works in the internet industry, about suitable accounting apps for freelancers and discussed how to integrate the scattered financial records from her personal notebook with electronic tools to develop a more systematic management habit. Her sister recommended several apps and shared tips on how to use them.

events.name: Develop a follow-up action plan
events.description: After concluding her communication with Editor Xu, Sun Yuwei felt a surge of enthusiasm. She immediately created a new document on her computer, listing Editor Xu’s key feedback points and suggested action items—such as preparing a market analysis report and selecting chapters for serialization—and drafted a preliminary follow-up plan for the upcoming week. She felt as though a clearer light had been lit on her professional path.

events.name: Visit the mentor to seek professional advice.
events.description: In the late afternoon, Sun Yuwei went to Yunnan University and had a meeting in the office of her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan. She reported to her supervisor the encouraging progress made in her communication with the editor and sought advice on preparing "non-purely literary" tasks such as market analysis reports, as well as professional considerations to note when engaging in publishing collaborations for the first time. Professor Wu offered encouragement and provided very specific guidance, which gave her greater confidence.

起始状态.心情: Calm, looking forward to the multiple communications that will take place throughout the day.

结束状态.心情: Excited, hopeful, and packed with information. A critical breakthrough has been achieved in career development, bringing unprecedented clarity and confidence about the future direction.
