2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday was spent amidst multiple moments of "success." The emerging effectiveness of the morning running routine brought personal satisfaction; the heartwarming opening of the photography exhibition earned social recognition; the profound commitment made with my father deepened familial bonds; and the regular yoga sessions reinforced the health plan. It was a day of reaping rewards, feeling supported, and experiencing love.

events.name: A full week of morning runs, and a sense of accomplishment begins to emerge.
events.description: When she woke up in the morning, Sun Yuwei was pleasantly surprised to find that she no longer needed an intense internal struggle. A week of persistence seemed to have allowed her body to adapt to this rhythm. Today’s jog by Cuihu Lake felt noticeably easier, with smoother breathing and a longer distance she could sustain. After returning home, she marked a small star on the "Habit Tracker" page of her journal to record the success of the week, feeling a deep and lasting sense of accomplishment in her heart.

events.name: "Footsteps in Spring City" Photography Exhibition Warmly Opens
events.description: At three o'clock in the afternoon, the Mingyuan Bookstore welcomed the official opening moment of the exhibition. In addition to friends and family, there were also some art enthusiasts who had learned about the event through the official WeChat account. Sun Yuwei delivered a brief and sincere speech, expressing gratitude for the support of her parents, Mr. Qin, and all her friends. She also shared the dual meaning of the theme "Strolling Through Spring City," which for her represented both a physical journey and a spiritual exploration. The atmosphere on-site was warm, with continuous applause.

events.name: Saturday Yoga Class Partner Communication
events.description: The afternoon yoga class was Sun Yuwei's second session of the week. This time, she coordinated more smoothly with He Lu. The class focused on deep stretching and relaxation, and afterward, the two of them went to a quiet café nearby. Sun Yuwei shared with He Lu her experience of sticking to morning runs for a week. He Lu affirmed her efforts and, from a yoga perspective, advised her to pay attention to post-run stretching, encouraging her to combine the two forms of exercise to better improve her posture and alleviate anxiety.

events.name: Finalizing the details of tomorrow's walk with my father.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei confirmed the plan with her father for an early morning walk at Cuihu Lake the next day. She checked the weather forecast to ensure it would be sunny and prepared comfortable clothes and sports shoes for both herself and her father in advance, placing them by the door to avoid any rush the next morning.

events.name: Received an interview invitation from local media
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei received a call from an editor of a local cultural life public account. The editor mentioned having visited the exhibition and being deeply moved, expressing a desire to schedule an interview with her. This unexpected recognition filled her with both pleasant surprise and a touch of apprehension. They agreed to meet at the bookstore the following week.

events.name: Dinner with friends after the exhibition opening
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei dined with several university classmates at a nearby restaurant to celebrate the successful exhibition. The consumption of a substantial amount of food resulted in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: A sense of ease and joy intertwines with the weekend's relaxation and anticipation for the opening event.

结束状态.心情: Happy and fulfilled. Surrounded by love (from family and friends), recognized by the outside world (through exhibitions and interviews), and seeing initial success in self-management, my heart is filled with gratitude and strength.

2025-12.daily_overview: This Sunday was filled with profound emotional exchanges and cultural contemplation. From the early morning heart-to-heart conversation with her father by the lake, bridging the generational gap, to the afternoon sharing of the stories behind her works with the audience at the bookstore, and then to the sincere family dialogue about literature and heritage in the evening, Sun Yuwei gained deeper insights into family, creation, and personal identity through the interplay of "output" and "input."

events.name: Morning Heart-to-Heart with Father at Cuihu Lake
events.description: In the early morning, the father and daughter took the first bus to Cuihu Park. The air was chilly yet fresh. Walking along the lakeside, Sun Yuwei proactively brought up the creative bottleneck she was facing in writing her essay collection. Her father then recounted his experiences as an educated youth sent to the countryside in his youth—stories about the land, the collective, and individual destinies that Sun Yuwei had never heard before. He expressed his understanding and support for her choice to pursue a career as a freelance writer, while gently reminding her to pay attention to practical planning. For the first time, he also shared his vague thoughts about his upcoming retirement life. This walk elevated their relationship beyond daily care, fostering a deeper spiritual understanding between them.

events.name: Exhibition Small-scale Guided Tour Sharing Session
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei conducted a small guided tour and sharing session at Mingyuan Bookstore for several visitors who had come specifically for the event. Following the theme of "Unchanging Warmth in Urban Transformation," she provided an in-depth explanation of the stories and personal observations behind several works photographed in old streets, alleys, and traditional markets. The audience listened attentively and raised many thought-provoking questions, with the exchange lasting nearly two hours.

events.name: Family Mushroom Hot Pot and Literary Reading Session
events.description: The dinner was a mushroom hotpot meticulously prepared by her mother, Li Xiulan. At the table, Sun Yuwei shared the good news about the audience feedback from her photography exhibition and the media interview invitations she had received. After the meal, she took the initiative to read aloud two chapters from her essay collection—"Grandma's Sewing Basket" and "Father's Bookshelf"—for her parents. Her parents listened attentively. After hearing the readings, her father’s eyes grew slightly moist, and he nodded silently. Her mother, from the perspective of a Chinese language teacher, pointed out a few adjectives that could be refined and praised one passage describing a scent as "exceptionally vivid."

events.name: Recording Insights from Heart-to-Heart Talks and Family Stories
events.description: In the still of the night, Sun Yuwei opened her journal under the desk lamp. She meticulously recorded the key points from her morning conversation with her father, the fragments of stories he shared, as well as her parents' reactions and comments during dinner. She felt that the roots of her creativity had delved deeper into the soil of her family through this exchange.

events.name: Plan the floral arrangement practice for next week.
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei remembered that she wanted to practice Ikenobo flower arrangement next week. She briefly sketched out a practice direction themed "Winter Solitude" in her notebook and listed the general floral materials she might need, such as pine branches and winterberries, planning to visit the flower market tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: I feel a bit nervous about having an in-depth conversation with my father, but more than that, I am filled with anticipation.

结束状态.心情: Deep and warm. Deeply moved by the understanding and support of the family, I have gained a more concrete understanding of "inheritance" and "expression," feeling a profound sense of security and a creative mission in my heart.

state.今日运动: Walked around Cuihu Lake with my father for about an hour.

2025-12.daily_overview: As the new week begins, Sun Yuwei's life returns to a balanced track of creation, study, and personal interests. She engages in preliminary communication for publishing matters, immerses herself in the aesthetic world of floral art, and shares progress with peers and mentors while seeking guidance. This reflects her proactive approach to integrating personal interests with professional development.

events.name: Communicating with the Editor about New Chapters
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei briefly communicated with editor Xu Mingyuan via WeChat regarding the general content and style of several chapters from the essay collection suitable for serialization. She listened to Editor Xu's preliminary suggestions on "how to adapt to the rhythm of online reading" to ensure the direction of subsequent revisions was correct.

events.name: Accepting an interview with a local official account
events.description: That afternoon, as scheduled, Sun Yuwei accepted an interview from a local cultural lifestyle public account at Mingyuan Bookstore. The reporter engaged in nearly an hour of conversation with her, focusing on topics such as her personal growth, the inspiration behind her work "Footsteps in Spring City," and her observations on Kunming's urban culture. After the interview, the reporter referred to her as "a gentle chronicler measuring Spring City with her footsteps," a title that left her both shy and delighted.

events.name: Procurement of Winter Floral Materials at Dounan Flower Market
events.description: After the interview, Sun Yuwei took the subway to Dounan Flower Market. Following her plan from the previous night, she carefully selected elegantly shaped pine branches, holly adorned with red berries, several branches of budding wintersweet, and complemented them with some ferns. The familiar stall owner warmly taught her how to care for the pine branches to keep them green for longer.

events.name: Create an "Winter Solitude" Themed Floral Arrangement
events.description: Upon returning home, she cleared a space in the living room to set up a workbench. After bathing and changing clothes, she settled her mind and began creating according to the techniques of the Ikenobo school. Focusing on the delineation of lines, the use of negative space, and the evocation of artistic conception, she spent over an hour completing an ikebana piece titled "Winter Solitude," aiming to express the vitality concealed within the silence of winter.

events.name: Share floral arrangement works with fellow enthusiasts
events.description: After completing her creation, Sun Yuwei took several photos of the work from different angles with her phone. After adjusting the lighting, she sent them via WeChat to her floral arrangement enthusiast friend Su Man, along with a reflection on her creative process, asking for her opinion. Su Man quickly replied, offering professional and detailed praise and suggestions from the perspectives of color coordination and spatial composition.

events.name: Instructor for Organizing and Sharing Seminar Insights
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei compiled the key notes, insights gained, and her extended reflections from the online cultural seminar she attended last week into a clear document. She sent it via email to her mentor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, and scheduled a brief online discussion, hoping to incorporate these cutting-edge ideas into her academic year paper.

events.name: Encountering technical issues when starting to use a bookkeeping app
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attempted to use the budgeting app recommended by her sister but encountered synchronization issues, which left her feeling slightly frustrated. She decided to address the matter the next day.

起始状态.心情: The usual slight fatigue of Monday was alleviated by interviews and floral arrangement plans, bringing a sense of calm as work resumed.

结束状态.心情: Tranquil and fulfilling. Having completed the planned creative work (flower arrangement) and exchanges (interviews, sharing), a day spent in the company of aesthetics and ideas is deeply satisfying.

2025-12.daily_overview: Rainy days are suitable for focused indoor work, but Sun Yuwei felt slightly down due to the weather and issues with her accounting app. She adjusted her plan, focusing on preparing for the meeting with her supervisor and alleviating stress through social interaction.

events.name: Systematically organize and prepare materials for the meeting with the supervisor.
events.description: A drizzling winter rain fell outside the window. Sun Yuwei spent the entire day in her study, first carefully reading through the latest revision of her academic year paper and marking the arguments that still raised doubts. Next, she selected three chapters from the essay collection *Cang’er Xuyu: The Mountains of Our Fathers* that were most closely related to her paper’s theme, "Personal Memory and Place Writing," and printed them out. Finally, she wrote a clear list of questions on a sticky note, including how to transform the emotional experiences from creative work into an academic analytical framework and how to address potential perspective conflicts arising from the dual roles of "scholar" and "author," preparing to seek guidance from Professor Wu tomorrow.

events.name: Check the Exhibition Guestbook
events.description: While going out for lunch at noon, Sun Yuwei stopped by Mingyuan Bookstore to take shelter from the rain and checked the guestbook for the photography exhibition. Many more heartwarming messages had been added, with one visitor writing, "In your lens, I saw the Kunming I had overlooked." She took photos of these feedbacks for her records. The rain, much like these words, gently soaked into her heart.

events.name: Indoor Gentle Exercises
events.description: Unable to run outdoors in the morning due to the rainy weather, Sun Yuwei practiced a 20-minute gentle yoga session at home by following a video on her phone, focusing mainly on stretching and breathing exercises to maintain the continuity of her physical activity.

events.name: Cancelled the scheduled exercise due to low mood.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei felt down due to the rainy weather and issues with the bookkeeping app, deciding to cancel additional exercise and only engage in light activities.

events.name: Video chatting with close friends to relieve stress.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a video call with her close friend Zhang Jing, sharing recent pressures and confusions, gaining emotional support, and feeling better.

起始状态.心情: The rainy weather brings a sense of slight laziness and tranquility, suitable for deep contemplation, though accompanied by some emotional fluctuations.

结束状态.心情: The sense of steadiness and anticipation after thorough preparation alleviated low spirits through social interaction.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today marks a pivotal point in the week. The in-depth meeting with the mentor in the morning charted a path for integrating academic pursuits with creative endeavors. The afternoon was dedicated to handling the "infrastructure" development of financial and health management. In the evening, efforts were directed toward planning year-end social and professional sharing activities. Sun Yuwei has made solid progress across all aspects of life.

events.name: In-Depth Meeting with the Mentor: Clarifying the Path of the "Scholar-Creator"
events.description: In Professor Wu Mingyuan's office, Sun Yuwei delivered an in-depth presentation that lasted nearly two hours. She showcased the progress of her thesis and the chapters of her essay collection, while also raising questions from her prepared list. Professor Wu highly commended her approach of integrating personal creative practice with academic research, suggesting that she could incorporate the essay collection as a "case study" section in her thesis, delving into the writing strategies of "memory carriers" (such as old objects and street scenes) within it. This conversation helped her break down the barriers between her academic studies and professional pursuits, clarifying a viable path as a "scholar-creator."

events.name: Download a trial version of the accounting app.
events.description: When she returned home in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei recalled her sister's suggestion and downloaded a well-reviewed budgeting app on her phone. She spent some time familiarizing herself with its basic functions, such as setting up income and expense categories, budget reminders, and so on. She also tried recording a few of her expenses from the day, planning to start using the app officially from next month.

events.name: Feeling Physical and Mental Changes in Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: During the afternoon yoga class, Sun Yuwei felt more engaged than in the previous two sessions. She was able to perform some poses more accurately, and after the class, she clearly felt the tension in her shoulders and neck ease, and her mood became more peaceful. She began to personally experience the promise of regular exercise in improving posture and alleviating anxiety coming to fruition.

events.name: Finalizing year-end get-together plans with my best friend.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei, in the WeChat group "Three Beauties of Spring City" (with Zhang Jing and Chen Sisi), discussed with the others and finally set the date for the year-end gathering of close friends on December 14th (Saturday). The location was chosen at a newly opened, highly praised independent café near Green Lake.

events.name: Plan the content for the online sharing session
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei received an invitation to an annual sharing session from an online writing community, requiring her to prepare a ten-minute audio presentation. She began brainstorming the topic and decided to combine her experiences from the past year—balancing academics, writing, and organizing exhibitions—to share insights on "how to turn personal interests into sustainable creative projects." She then listed several key points in her phone's memo app.

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei was excited about the successful meeting with her supervisor and stayed up until 23:10 to plan her follow-up actions.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a sense of solemnity about the upcoming important meeting, but well-prepared and with a calm mindset.

结束状态.心情: Suddenly enlightened and highly motivated. The mentor's guidance was like a key, opening up new horizons; other life matters are also progressing steadily, making everything feel under control.

2025-12.daily_overview: After receiving crucial guidance yesterday, Sun Yuwei has now entered a phase of digestion, absorption, and detailed implementation. In a familiar environment, she organizes her thoughts, develops a comprehensive plan, and shares her creative achievements with peers in a relaxed and enjoyable manner, savoring the resonance from the professional community.

events.name: Developing a detailed work plan in the corner of the bookstore.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei brought her notebook to her usual corner at Mingyuan Bookstore. Based on the discussion notes from her meeting with Professor Wu the previous day, she systematically outlined the key points for revising her thesis (such as adding a theoretical framework and deepening case analyses), as well as the sections in her essay collection that required simultaneous revisions. She created a detailed daily work plan for the next two weeks, breaking down the overarching goals into manageable smaller tasks.

events.name: Inviting Su Man to Appreciate the Photography Exhibition Together
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei invited Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast, to view the exhibition at the bookstore. As they admired the photographs, the two engaged in a quiet exchange. From the perspective of a floral artist, Su Man offered professional praise for several works with exquisite composition and harmonious color schemes, noting that the handling of light and shadow in one piece "resembles the concept of 'negative space' in the Ikenobo school." Sun Yuwei, in turn, opened her notebook to show the botanical notes she had recorded while photographing these scenes. Two souls with a shared passion for aesthetics found delightful resonance before the artworks.

events.name: Adjust the writing outline according to new ideas
events.description: In the evening, following Professor Wu's suggestions and inspired by her conversation with Su Man, Sun Yuwei opened the document containing the outline of her essay collection on her computer. She adjusted the structure of some chapters, strengthened the thread of "memory carriers," and began conceptualizing a new column article. The article focuses on the theme of "vanishing traditional crafts in the old streets and alleys of Kunming," which she intends to use as material for a future submission to *Cultural Horizon*.

events.name: Writer's block, temporarily going to a café to seek inspiration.
events.description: In the afternoon, while adjusting the outline, Sun Yuwei encountered a bottleneck and made an impromptu decision to go to a newly opened café for a change of environment, which sparked some inspiration.

起始状态.心情: Clear and organized, ready to transform yesterday's inspiration into concrete action plans.

结束状态.心情: Steady and pleasant. The implementation of plans brings a sense of reassurance, while exchanges with like-minded individuals provide additional spiritual enjoyment and inspiration.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday was a day for immersive work, but Sun Yuwei had to stay up late to complete an urgent editing task that came up unexpectedly, resulting in insufficient sleep and a slight weight gain.

events.name: First-Round Refinement of Draft Essay Collection
events.description: Sun Yuwei set a goal for herself: to complete the final revisions of the first four chapters of her essay collection today. She read through the text word by word, like a meticulous craftsman, adjusting sentences that lacked fluency, replacing mediocre adjectives, and adding more vivid descriptive details where necessary (such as the steam and aroma from the old street's soybean milk stall). It was a slow and painstaking task that required immense patience, but she found joy in it.

events.name: Preparing a Speech for a Book Club
events.description: During a break from her meticulous work, she refreshed her mind by revisiting the essay collection *Details of the South*, which was to be discussed at tomorrow's book club. She organized her reading notes and reflections, jotting down several points and questions she wanted to share on sticky notes, hoping to spark engaging discussions.

events.name: Drafting an Online Sharing Session Speech
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei began formally drafting the detailed script for the online sharing session. With the theme "Interest as the Anchor, Projects as the Boat," she drew on her photography exhibition and essay collection projects to explain how to set goals, manage time, and integrate resources. After completing the initial draft, she practiced several times by recording herself on her phone, adjusting her pace and emphasis to ensure the content was substantial and could be fully presented within ten minutes.

events.name: Stayed up late to meet the urgent editing deadline.
events.description: Late at night, Sun Yuwei received an urgent revision request from editor Xu Mingyuan, requiring adjustments to a chapter of the essay collection. She stayed up until 23:30 to complete the task, consuming snacks to stay alert, which led to weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Focused and composed, ready to tackle a day of intensive desk work.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet exceptionally fulfilled. Having completed several tasks requiring deep concentration, seeing the more refined text after revisions and the finalized drafts, the sense of accomplishment offsets the physical fatigue.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday unfolds at a leisurely pace, rich with cultural undertones. The morning is dedicated to handling scattered yet necessary reading and shopping tasks. The afternoon is fully immersed in a bookstore reading club, engaging in intellectual exchanges with fellow book enthusiasts. The evening is spent making warm preparations for tomorrow's gathering with close friends. It is a day of absorbing knowledge, exchanging ideas, and nurturing emotions.

events.name: Selecting books at the bookstore, planning book review writing
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore and lingered in front of the "Urban Culture" bookshelf. Based on the recent thematic focus of *Cultural Horizon* and her personal interests, she selected a newly arrived book titled *Urban Memory and Spatial Narrative*. After a brief exchange with the store owner, Mr. Qin, she decided to purchase the book and planned to dedicate time the following day to read it and write a book review.

events.name: Participate in a book club and engage in in-depth discussions
events.description: The afternoon book club focused on "Details of the South." During the discussion, Sun Yuwei shared her reflections on the book's depiction of "damp nostalgia" and raised questions about the boundary between authenticity and literary quality in prose, sparking a lively debate among the participants. After the meeting, she continued the conversation for quite some time with Mr. Qin and several like-minded book club members, and even received a recommendation from Mr. Qin for a lesser-known literary magazine.

events.name: Preparing a year-end small gift for my best friend
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei organized her bookshelf at home and carefully selected two essay collections she had recently read, both filled with planner-style notes and annotations in the margins. One was for Zhang Jing, and the other for Chen Sisi. She also placed a handwritten card in each book, expressing gratitude for their friendship over the past year and offering New Year's blessings. This gift not only carried the imprint of her personal interests but was also filled with heartfelt sincerity.

events.name: Saturday Yoga and Bookstore Stroll
events.description: After the afternoon yoga class, Sun Yuwei and He Lu did not head straight home. Instead, they took a detour to browse another small independent bookstore. With the calmness brought by yoga, browsing books became an even more relaxing and enjoyable leisure activity.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and open, looking forward to the intellectual exchange in the afternoon and the warm preparations in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and fulfilling. The intellectual stimulation from the book club and the thoughtful process of preparing gifts both bring warmth and satisfaction to the heart.

2025-12.daily_overview: This Sunday was filled with profound emotional connections and family cultural moments. The daytime was dedicated to unreserved growth sharing and mutual nurturing with close friends; the evening featured sincere conversations and emotional resonance within the family regarding literary heritage. Sun Yuwei gained immense spiritual support and forward momentum from these intimate relationships.

events.name: Year-end gathering with close friends at a café
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei, Zhang Jing, and Chen Sisi met at the newly opened independent café "Corner Nook" by Cuihu Lake. Zhang Jing brought handmade greeting cards from the children in her class, while Chen Sisi shared information about an upcoming young artists' exhibition at the gallery. The three sipped on specialty rose lattes and engaged in a deep conversation about their personal growth over the past year, career-related uncertainties, and future plans. Sun Yuwei candidly shared her self-doubt during the creation of her essay collection, the relief she felt upon its completion, and her hesitation about whether to pursue writing full-time in the future. She received sincere feedback, encouragement, and advice from different perspectives from her close friends.

events.name: Reflecting and Contemplating Alone by the Green Lake
events.description: After the gathering, Sun Yuwei did not return home immediately. Instead, she took a solitary walk by the side of Emerald Lake. The winter sunlight shimmered on the lake's surface, creating a sparkling effect. Reflecting on the earlier conversation, she felt the understanding and support from her close friends warm her like sunlight, reducing her fear of future uncertainties and giving her more courage to face what lies ahead.

events.name: Family Mushroom Hot Pot and Literary Reading Night
events.description: Dinner was a sumptuous mushroom hotpot prepared by Mother. During the meal, Sun Yuwei shared the ongoing positive reception of her photography exhibition and amusing anecdotes from media interviews. After dinner, she took out the manuscript of her essay collection and read aloud to her parents the chapters on "Family Migration" and "Father's Silent Love." Her parents listened with exceptional attentiveness. After hearing the chapters, her father, Sun Mingyuan, remained silent for a long while before finally saying with reddened eyes, "It's written very truthfully and well." For the first time, he proactively mentioned that he had also begun thinking about organizing old photos and diaries. Meanwhile, her mother, Li Xiulan, offered several suggestions from a professional perspective to make the emotional expression more subtle and powerful.

events.name: Recording Reflections on Gatherings and Family Conversations
events.description: Late at night, Sun Yuwei carefully documented in her journal the photos from the café gathering, the greeting cards she had received, and the details of her parents’ reactions that evening, along with her own surging emotions. She felt herself being steadily uplifted by both friendship and familial love.

events.name: Small-scale sharing at the exhibition site
events.description: In the late afternoon, Sun Yuwei gave an impromptu small-scale sharing session at the Mingyuan Bookstore for several exhibition visitors, focusing on interpreting several works about "urban tinkerers" (such as cobblers and knife sharpeners), and discussing with the audience the significance of "slow craftsmanship" in a fast-paced era.

起始状态.心情: Expectation, warmth, ready to open one's heart to the closest ones.

结束状态.心情: Deeply moved, immensely fulfilled, and brimming with strength. The profound recognition and emotional support from both her best friend and family are treasures that no achievement can rival, filling her heart with a sense of security and the courage to move forward.

2025-12.daily_overview: The new week begins with systematic review, planning, and focused output. Sun Yuwei has officially established a personal financial record system, completed the writing and submission of her first formal book review, and sought new inspiration for the revision of her essay collection at the end of the year. Life management, professional output, and creative exploration proceed in parallel.

events.name: Activate a bookkeeping app to establish a financial system.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei officially began using a bookkeeping app. She entered all her income (a manuscript fee) and expenses (transportation, book purchases, dining, etc.) up to December item by item, and set up simple categories. Meanwhile, in the "Financial Notes" section of her journal, she summarized and wrote down two personal principles she decided to follow: the "Project Advance Payment Principle" (negotiating partial prepayment when accepting writing projects) and "Monthly Financial Review," initially forming the framework of her financial awareness.

events.name: Immersive Reading and Writing Book Reviews
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei began to focus on reading *Urban Memory and Spatial Narrative*, which she had purchased the day before, in her home study. As she read, she jotted down key points and insights in her notebook. The reading session lasted the entire afternoon. After finishing the last page, she took a short break and then started drafting a book review on her computer. Drawing on her observations of Kunming and her experience as a writer, she composed a review of approximately 1,500 words titled "When the City Becomes a Readable Text." In it, she analyzed the book's academic value and its inspiration for general readers, followed by careful revisions and polishing.

events.name: Submit a book review and communicate with the editor
events.description: After finalizing the book review, Sun Yuwei submitted it via email to Xu Mingyuan, an editor at Cultural Horizon, and briefly informed him on WeChat. This was her first attempt at writing and submitting a book review article, marking a small step toward a broader writing field.

events.name: Go to the bookstore to seek inspiration for writing.
events.description: In the evening, feeling somewhat stuck while revising her essay collection, Sun Yuwei decided to change her surroundings. She went to Mingyuan Bookstore and browsed through several excellent essay collections of the same genre without a specific purpose, seeking inspiration for language and structure from others' writings. Noticing her thoughtful expression, Mr. Qin, the shop owner, softly inquired about her situation. The two briefly exchanged insights on "writing rhythm."

events.name: Organize the Year-End Gathering Handbook
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei meticulously decorated a new page of her journal with photos from yesterday's gathering at the café with her close friends, handwritten cards, and scattered reflections, using tape and colored pens. Accompanied by written notes, she completed a ritualistic record of this precious gathering.

起始状态.心情: The usual Monday mindset of organizing and restarting, with the determination to implement new plans (financial) and complete new tasks (book reviews).

结束状态.心情: Calm and productive. Successfully produced new work (a book review) and launched a personal management system (bookkeeping). Although there were creative bottlenecks, they were addressed by proactively seeking change (visiting a bookstore). Overall, the state is positive and steady.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for online sharing and inspiration exchange. Sun Yuwei participated in an online creator sharing session, actively interacted with other writers, and immersed herself in the enriching sense of intellectual exchange. During work breaks, she also engaged in conceptualizing her collection of prose manuscripts.

events.name: Waking Up and Morning Running
events.description: At 7:00 in the morning, Sun Yuwei woke up in her bedroom at home in Kunming. She turned off the alarm clock, did some simple stretches, and then went to the community gym for a 30-minute morning run on the indoor treadmill to maintain her exercise routine while listening to podcasts for inspiration.

events.name: Breakfast and Information Browsing
events.description: After returning home and taking a shower, she had breakfast with her mother Li Xiulan, consisting of hot milk and flower cakes. While eating, she browsed news and social media feeds on her phone, which is her primary way of obtaining information from the outside world every day.

events.name: Check manuscript progress
events.description: After breakfast, Sun Yuwei returned to her study, turned on the computer, and checked the progress document for her essay collection "Whispers of Cang'er: The Mountains of Our Fathers." She reviewed the revisions from the previous night, organized her thoughts for the online sharing session in the afternoon, and jotted down key insights on balancing academic studies with creative writing in her notebook.

events.name: Online Sharing Session Preparation
events.description: Before the afternoon sharing session began, Sun Yuwei logged into the designated online meeting platform in advance. She carefully tested the audio and imaging quality of the microphone and camera, and checked the stability of the internet connection. Subsequently, she familiarized herself with the platform's operational interface, such as screen sharing and chat functions, to ensure a smooth presentation process. She entered the virtual waiting room 10 minutes early, browsed through the personal introductions of other presenters, adjusted her breathing, and silently rehearsed the outline of her presentation in her mind.

events.name: Conduct an online sharing session
events.description: In the sub-forum on "How Young Creators Balance Studies, Hobbies, and Career Exploration," Sun Yuwei delivered a ten-minute speech according to the agenda. Drawing on her personal experience as both a student and a freelance writer, she vividly shared insights on how to utilize fragmented time for inspiration collection, how to transform classroom learning into creative nourishment, and how to turn personal interests (such as journaling and flower arranging) into professional content. Her presentation was smooth and natural, earning praise from the host and positive feedback from the audience in the chat area.

events.name: Online Communication and Sharing
events.description: After the sharing session concluded, Sun Yuwei did not leave immediately. She engaged in preliminary discussions with several aspiring writers who had expressed interest in her presentation in the conference chat area, patiently answering their questions about submission channels and time management for beginners. Subsequently, she received inquiries or collaboration proposals from several peers via private messages. She also shared her recent reading insights from a particular book and her experience in writing book reviews in an online reading community and in a chat group she shares with her fellow writer, Song Wen. Together, they looked forward to the editor's feedback.

events.name: Engage in in-depth discussions with peers
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei engaged in a more in-depth online discussion with her fellow writer Song Wen. They exchanged views on the topic of "turning personal interests into professional pursuits" mentioned during the sharing session. Song Wen shared her experience in Chengdu of combining food exploration with urban cultural writing, while Sun Yuwei mentioned her photography exhibition. The two also discussed their recent creative plans and agreed to review each other's initial drafts.

events.name: Dinner and Family Time
events.description: Dinner was a home-cooked Yunnan meal shared with her parents. Her mother, Li Xiulan, inquired with concern about her sharing session during the day. Sun Yuwei briefly summarized a few points, while her father, Sun Mingyuan, listened nearby, occasionally nodding in agreement. After the meal, she helped clear the dishes.

events.name: Journaling and Bedtime Reading
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei turned on the desk lamp in the study, opened her notebook, and briefly recorded her reflections from the online sharing session she attended that day, along with information about new colleagues she had met. Afterward, she leaned against the headboard and read a collection of essays for about half an hour to cultivate a sense of language for the next day's writing. Around 23:30, she turned off the light and went to sleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the sharing session.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and fulfilled through the exchange of ideas.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for planning and reflection. Sun Yuwei had an important video call with her cousin regarding career planning, which provided new inspiration. She also maintained her yoga practice and conducted a systematic review of the previous day's sharing session, further broadening her perspective.

events.name: Morning Jogging and Inspiration Collection
events.description: At 7:15 in the morning, Sun Yuwei finished her morning run at Cuihu Park in Kunming. The winter morning air was crisp, with a thin layer of mist hanging over the lake, and the park was full of vitality as people exercised. While jogging, she observed the changing play of light and shadow, with fragments of sentences about "cities and memories" occasionally flashing through her mind.

events.name: Breakfast and Reading
events.description: After returning home, Sun Yuwei took a hot shower and had breakfast with her parents. Following the meal, she brewed a cup of brown sugar pearl milk tea and spent some time in the study flipping through a literary magazine she had received the day before, focusing particularly on a critical essay about local writing.

events.name: Contact cousin to schedule a call.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei contacted her cousin Shen Wei, who works in Hangzhou, via WeChat to arrange a video call for the following evening. She had already organized her recent career-related doubts—particularly regarding the direction of "cultural content planner" mentioned in her year-end summary—and listed some key questions in her phone's memo.

events.name: Post-Event Review and Documentation of the Sharing Session
events.description: Sun Yuwei spent the morning reviewing and organizing the recording and chat logs from yesterday's online sharing session. She added the insightful points made by other speakers on "creator brand building," as well as her own impromptu yet well-received remarks, to her notebook. She conducted a review of the session, reflecting on areas for improvement in language organization, time management, and interaction techniques. Additionally, she categorized and archived the contact information of several new peers she had met into her contact list.

events.name: Video call with cousin to discuss career planning
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei had a nearly hour-long video call with her cousin Shen Wei. She detailed the "cultural content planner" direction mentioned in her year-end summary and expressed her conflict between wanting to delve deeper into writing while also hoping for a broader platform. Drawing on her experience as a brand planner at an advertising agency, Shen Wei analyzed various possibilities for combining content creation with commercial planning. She encouraged Sun Yuwei to explore cross-disciplinary collaborations with local cultural institutions, independent brands, or art spaces in Kunming—such as writing narrative texts for small exhibitions or participating in the planning of urban cultural events. Shen Wei also reminded her to start paying attention to family financial security planning.

events.name: Wednesday Yoga Class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei attended her weekly Wednesday yoga class as scheduled. Although the afternoon brainstorming session had left her somewhat fatigued and tempted to skip the class, she overcame her inertia, changed into her yoga attire, and headed out. During the class, she focused on the connection between her breath and body, striving to quiet her mind. After the session, she recorded her practice reflections in her journal, noting that her body felt stretched but her mind remained slightly tense.

events.name: Summary of Call Points and Reflections
events.description: After returning home from her yoga class, Sun Yuwei meticulously organized the key points discussed during the video call and Shen Wei’s suggestions into the "Career Exploration" section of her journal. Integrating her core interests—writing, flower arrangement, and cultural observation—she conducted a preliminary reflection on how the direction of "cultural content planning" could be organically combined with her identity as an "author." She also noted down several possible entry points.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, with the vitality of a morning run

结束状态.心情: Clear and inspired, excited about future possibilities.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a focused workday. Sun Yuwei has dedicated her primary efforts to two core tasks: maintaining the ongoing photography exhibition and meticulously revising her collection of essays using the "reading aloud" method. The work is substantial and well-organized.

events.name: Morning Run and Breakfast
events.description: Sun Yuwei maintained her morning jogging routine and completed her run at Cuihu Park at 7:10. After returning home, she had breakfast with her parents, during which they briefly discussed the weather and their respective plans for the day.

events.name: Routine Maintenance of Photography Exhibition
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei returned to Mingyuan Bookstore. The exhibition had been ongoing for several days. She carefully inspected the hanging condition of each photographic work, gently wiping the glass of the frames with a soft cloth. Meanwhile, based on her observations of visitors' lingering time and some feedback from the guestbook over the past few days, she made slight adjustments to the placement of two sets of works and the angle of the supplementary lighting on the side. These adjustments aimed to enhance the comfort of the viewing flow.

events.name: View Editing Feedback
events.description: During her lunch break, Sun Yuwei checked her email on her laptop in the bookstore's café area. She received a brief reply from editor Xu Mingyuan regarding the book review she had submitted a few days earlier. He acknowledged the perspective of the article and provided two suggestions for detail revisions. She immediately marked the changes on the original manuscript.

events.name: Read through the manuscript to check the structure
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Sun Yuwei gently closed the study door and entered the "critical phase" of revising her essay collection. She printed out the manuscript and read it aloud from beginning to end at a pace and volume akin to recitation. This process allowed her to step out of the author's perspective and adopt the viewpoint of a discerning reader. She keenly noticed that the transition between two chapters was slightly abrupt and that the frequency of a recurring motif needed adjustment. She marked these areas with sticky notes of different colors.

events.name: Organizing Career Planning Thoughts
events.description: In the evening, she further refined the key points recorded after yesterday's video discussion with her cousin Shen Wei. Rather than merely listing suggestions, she integrated them with the local cultural ecosystem of Kunming—such as ongoing photography exhibitions, independent bookstores, and art galleries she frequents—to preliminarily conceive several micro-project ideas that concretize "cultural content planning." These were noted on the inspiration page of her journal.

events.name: Dinner and Relaxation
events.description: For dinner, Mother prepared mushroom fried rice, which was exceptionally delicious. After the meal, Sun Yuwei did not start working immediately. Instead, she watched some TV programs in the living room with her mother and chatted about the interesting happenings at school during the final exam period.

events.name: Editing Book Review Manuscripts
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei spent about 40 minutes revising the book review manuscript based on the feedback from editor Xu Mingyuan. She refined two descriptions to make them more precise and compelling, then sent the revised version back.

起始状态.心情: Steady, ready to handle multiple tasks

结束状态.心情: The sense of fulfillment after focused work has provided a clearer direction for revising the manuscript.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day of inspiration and efficient creation. A routine morning run around Green Lake unexpectedly sparked an excellent essay topic. Sun Yuwei promptly captured the idea and swiftly expanded it into a full piece, demonstrating remarkable efficiency in writing and feeling deeply satisfied with the creative process.

events.name: Morning Run with Inspiration Flowing
events.description: At 7 a.m., Sun Yuwei went for her morning run in Cuihu Park as usual. The morning mist over the lake drifted slowly under the rising sun, while rays of light filtered through the treetops, casting dappled shadows on the path. Several elderly people were practicing Tai Chi by the lakeside, their movements slow and rhythmic. As she observed the scene, the theme for an essay on "City Morning Light and Personal Memory" suddenly crystallized with striking clarity in her mind—the morning mist, like the blurred boundaries of time, and the morning exercisers, as vivid footnotes to the city's daily renewal. How did all this intertwine with the morning memories of individual growth? She immediately slowed her pace.

events.name: Rushing Home to Record Inspiration
events.description: The inspiration surged forth so powerfully that Sun Yuwei, fearing it might vanish in an instant, immediately halted her run and almost jogged back home at a brisk pace. Rushing into her study, she quickly retrieved her ever-present inspiration notebook and pen from the desk drawer. Without bothering to sit down, she stood there, hastily and somewhat messily jotting down the core images, keywords, emotional undertones, and a few possible paragraph structures that flashed through her mind.

events.name: Expand Inspiration into a Complete Text
events.description: After jotting down the core inspiration, she remained deeply engrossed, her excitement still simmering. She opened the writing software on her computer and began expanding on the clues from her notebook. She focused on depicting the hazy texture of the morning mist, how the light gradually dispersed the fog, and the memories it evoked of waiting for sunrise in her childhood home’s courtyard before heading to school. Words flowed like a spring, and after about an hour, a roughly 500-word, emotionally rich and imagery-laden prose fragment was completed.

events.name: Archiving and Journal Recording
events.description: After finishing the fragment, Sun Yuwei saved it to a dedicated folder titled ‘Supplementary Materials for the Essay Collection *Whispers of Cang’er*,’ naming and archiving it under the classification ‘Natural Imagery—Urban Memory—Morning.’ Simultaneously, in the ‘Creative Log’ section of her notebook, she briefly recorded the time, location, and core content of this burst of inspiration in an excited tone, and drew a small sun symbol.

events.name: Breakfast and Sharing
events.description: It was only then that she felt hungry and went to eat her breakfast, which had long gone cold. Throughout the entire morning, she remained immersed in the joy and slight excitement that followed her creative work.

events.name: Continue editing the manuscript
events.description: In the afternoon, leveraging her favorable condition, she continued to advance the revision of the main manuscript for the essay collection, focusing on addressing the structural issues marked during yesterday's reading session and rewriting the transitional paragraphs of one chapter.

events.name: Consulting the Supervisor
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei sent a newly written prose fragment titled "Morning Mist and Memory" to her mentor, Professor Wu Mingyuan via WeChat. Along with the text, she included a brief note explaining the origin of her inspiration and sincerely sought advice on the deeper application of imagery and how to better structure such personalized narratives.

events.name: Dinner and Leisure
events.description: During dinner, she shared with her parents the joy of capturing inspiration during the day. After listening, her father Sun Mingyuan thoughtfully remarked, "It seems there are benefits to getting up early for a run." After the meal, Sun Yuwei did not continue working; instead, she listened to some of her favorite indie music for a while to relax her mind.

起始状态.心情: Fresh, with anticipation for the morning run

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and excited, delighted by the unexpected creative gains.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today was a day for wrapping up projects and connecting with family. As a day off, Sun Yuwei primarily handled the closing tasks for the photography exhibition, attended a yoga class with a festive atmosphere, and had an in-depth discussion with her cousin about family financial planning, maintaining a well-paced rhythm throughout.

events.name: The Languor of a Weekend Morning
events.description: Since it was Saturday, Sun Yuwei got up a bit later than usual, not rising until around 8 o'clock. She enjoyed a morning free from the rush of an alarm clock, lingering in bed for a while and browsing news and public account articles on her phone.

events.name: Breakfast and Reading at Home
events.description: Mother prepared a sumptuous breakfast, including Cross-Bridge Rice Noodles. Sun Yuwei enjoyed it slowly, then brewed a cup of tea and sat on a chair on the balcony. Basking in the warm sunlight, she read the literary magazine she hadn’t finished the day before.

events.name: Systematically Organize Audience Comments
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei arrived at Mingyuan Bookstore. As the exhibition was nearing its end, she collected all two guestbooks placed in the exhibition hall. In the afternoon, she sat down in a quiet corner of the bookstore and spent several hours systematically reading every page of the guestbooks. She categorized and summarized the entries in her notebook under classifications such as "praise and encouragement," "empathy and resonance," "questions and suggestions," and "simple name signings." From these, she extracted the themes that most interested the audience and the most valuable suggestions, laying a solid foundation of materials for preparing the exhibition summary report.

events.name: The photography exhibition has officially concluded.
events.description: Before closing in the evening, Sun Yuwei and the bookstore owner Qin Mingyuan carefully took down all the photographic works displayed on the wall, wrapping and packing them meticulously with prepared soft paper and bubble wrap. At the same time, they also organized exhibition labels, promotional materials, and other items. The owner, Mr. Qin, expressed his gratitude for the wonderful exhibition she had brought, while Sun Yuwei sincerely thanked the bookstore for providing a valuable platform and support.

events.name: Christmas-Themed Yoga Class
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei participated in a special yoga class themed around relaxation and gratitude. The yoga studio was adorned with small Christmas decorations, creating a warm atmosphere. During the meditation session, the instructor guided everyone to reflect on the achievements of the past year. After the class, she and her yoga partner He Lu exchanged prepared small gifts—Sun Yuwei gifted a collection of essays, while He Lu reciprocated with a box of scented candles. The two agreed to meet again in next week's class.

events.name: Discussing Family Finances with My Cousin
events.description: After returning home from her yoga class, Sun Yuwei had a video call with her cousin Shen Wei, who works in Hangzhou. In addition to catching up on each other's recent lives, they delved into the family financial planning that Shen Wei had mentioned during their last conversation. Her cousin shared her specific experience in arranging supplementary medical insurance and accident insurance for their parents, including the companies she chose and her rationale behind selecting those products. She also suggested that Sun Yuwei could start learning about this area to prepare in advance for the family's financial security. This topic greatly inspired Sun Yuwei, making her realize that this is also part of adult responsibilities.

events.name: Staying Up Late and Snacking
events.description: After the call ended, Sun Yuwei felt a bit hungry, had some snacks, and ended up going to bed late.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the leisure of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Enriched with a touch of wistfulness (as the exhibition concludes), while feeling inspired by new knowledge (financial planning).

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for in-depth review and planning. Sun Yuwei handled multiple summary tasks simultaneously on Sunday: meticulously verifying her annual finances, preparing the final review for the photography exhibition project, and engaging in productive discussions with the bookstore owner about future collaborations, shifting her mindset between reflection and forward-thinking.

events.name: Breakfast and Housework on Days Off
events.description: On Sunday morning, Sun Yuwei woke up naturally. After getting up, she helped her mother prepare a simple breakfast and tidied the living room.

events.name: Annual Financial Data Verification
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei opened her computer in the study and launched her frequently used bookkeeping software and fund app. She meticulously reviewed every entry of her manuscript income, living and study expenses, fixed fund investment records, and the transaction history of her "Equipment Emergency Fund" since 2025. She organized the data into clear monthly comparison charts and written summaries, contemplating how to present her financial planning achievements and personal growth to her parents in a clear and structured manner that evening.

events.name: Preliminary Exploration of Cooperation Opportunities
events.description: During her lunch break, Sun Yuwei began searching online for information about local cultural institutions, independent brands, or small art spaces in Kunming, following her cousin Shen Wei's advice on "cultural content planning." She browsed the official websites and social media accounts of several organizations and drafted a brief inquiry email template introducing herself (as a student, freelance writer, and someone who had recently completed a photography exhibition) and expressing her interest in collaboration. However, she did not send it immediately, planning to refine it further.

events.name: Yoga Practice
events.description: In the afternoon, she followed an online video to complete a 30-minute gentle yoga session at home, aiming to alleviate the shoulder and neck stiffness caused by prolonged sitting in the morning.

events.name: Preparation for Photography Exhibition Project Review
events.description: After yoga, Sun Yuwei systematically organized all relevant materials for the "Footsteps in Spring City" photography exhibition in her home study. This included her observation notes on visitor traffic, categorized summaries from the guestbook, screenshots of scattered media coverage she had collected, and on-site photos taken during the exhibition. She identified several core highlights and areas for improvement, preparing her analytical perspectives and speaking outline for the formal debriefing meeting with Mr. Qin the following day.

events.name: Conduct a formal debriefing meeting with the bookstore owner.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei held a formal project review meeting with Qin Mingyuan, the owner of Mingyuan Bookstore, in the café area of the establishment. She systematically reported on the audience feedback analysis of the exhibition, the limited media response, and the phenomena she observed on-site. Mr. Qin also shared his observations as the venue provider and the changes in the bookstore's customer flow data. Together, they summarized the project's successes (such as the theme's relevance to the local community and the creation of a warm, interactive atmosphere) and shortcomings (such as the potential for broader pre-event promotion). More importantly, they explored possibilities for future collaboration, with Mr. Qin even proposing to invite Sun Yuwei as the bookstore's "special cultural observer" to participate in planning next year's series of cultural activities.

events.name: Expressing Gratitude to Family and Friends
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Sun Yuwei sent messages via WeChat to express her gratitude to Qin Mingyuan, her close friend Zhang Jing, Chen Sisi, her college roommate Zhao Xiaowen, and her family members for their support and assistance during the exhibition, thanking them for their companionship and encouragement.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to handle multiple summary tasks.

结束状态.心情: Open and hopeful, reflection brings a sense of accomplishment, and the potential for future collaboration is inspiring.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for refinement and preparation. Sun Yuwei focused on structural adjustments to the manuscript of her essay collection to enhance its rhythm. She also made appointments and preparations for the family year-end meeting scheduled for the following day, while developing preliminary ideas for future cultural collaborations.

events.name: Morning Run and Breakfast
events.description: Sun Yuwei resumed her weekday morning jogging routine, completing her exercise at Cuihu Park at 7 a.m. The clear morning light reminded her of the creative inspiration she had a few days ago. After returning home, she had breakfast with her parents.

events.name: Adjust the structure of the manuscript
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei began making significant adjustments to the manuscript of the essay collection on her computer, addressing structural issues she had identified during her thorough reading two days prior. She rearranged the order of two chapters to create a more natural progression of emotional flow, and rewrote the openings and conclusions of three paragraphs to enhance the overall rhythm and cohesion of the text. This task required a holistic perspective and patience, and she immersed herself in it completely.

events.name: Schedule a Family Meeting
events.description: After lunch, Sun Yuwei arranged with her parents to hold a family year-end meeting after dinner the following day, briefly informing them that the meeting would focus on her annual financial report and planning. She checked in advance whether the family laptop and projector were functional and copied the presentation slides and chart files onto a USB drive for backup.

events.name: Editing Manuscript Details
events.description: In the afternoon, she continued editing the manuscript, refining some descriptive details on the basis of structural adjustments to make the language more concise.

events.name: Draft Future Cooperation Framework
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei compiled the key points discussed during her meeting with Qin Mingyuan the previous day, along with her preliminary ideas for a joint exhibition or series of cultural salons on "Imaging Records of Kunming's Old Streets," into a concise meeting summary and project proposal document. She intended to share it later with editor Xu Mingyuan to seek his feedback.

events.name: Dinner and Relaxation
events.description: During dinner, her mother Li Xiulan asked with concern how her manuscript revisions were going, to which Sun Yuwei replied, "I'm working through the final critical parts." After the meal, she accompanied her father in the living room to watch the news for a while.

起始状态.心情: Focus, with clear objectives

结束状态.心情: The sense of steady progress brings both nervousness and anticipation for tomorrow's family meeting.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day of receiving recognition and planning for the future. Sun Yuwei successfully passed her family's "Adult Responsibility Assessment," earning her parents' complete trust in financial matters. Meanwhile, for the first time in her life, she earned income through her photography work and established a "Creative Fund," marking a solid step toward transforming her hobby into a sustainable career.

events.name: Waking Up and Final Preparations
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Sun Yuwei felt somewhat nervous about the family meeting scheduled for the evening. She used the time before breakfast to rehearse the reporting process and her prepared remarks once again, ensuring the data was accurate and her delivery was clear.

events.name: Breakfast and Daily Life
events.description: While having breakfast with her parents, the atmosphere was as usual, but Sun Yuwei could sense a subtle, shared sense of anticipation. After the meal, she went to the study as usual for her daily reading and writing.

events.name: Editing a Manuscript
events.description: In the morning, she continued to perform the final polishing of the essay collection, primarily addressing issues related to the fluency of certain sentences.

events.name: Annual Family Financial Report
events.description: After dinner, the family meeting officially commenced in the living room. Sun Yuwei connected the projector and presented detailed charts of the financial data from the past year to her parents. She clearly explained the various sources of her manuscript fee income, the composition and rationale behind each living and learning expense, the long-term planning concept of regular fund investments, as well as the reasons for establishing the "Equipment Emergency Fund" and its current balance. The entire presentation was well-organized, delivered with sincerity and confidence.

events.name: Received high recognition from parents.
events.description: After listening to the report, Sun Mingyuan, the father, showed a gratified smile on his face. He mentioned the expectations and concerns he had when giving his daughter the 50,000 yuan "test question" at the beginning of the year, and stated that the answer she provided far exceeded his expectations, fully demonstrating her planning ability and sense of responsibility, which made him feel very reassured. Mother Li Xiulan also had tears welling up in her eyes, expressing her pride and support for her daughter, while urging her to continue working hard and also take care of her health. The family atmosphere was warm and harmonious, and Sun Yuwei felt an unprecedented sense of trust and understanding.

events.name: Prepare Christmas gifts
events.description: After the meeting, in high spirits, Sun Yuwei prepared Christmas gifts for her close friends in the study. She carefully selected several essay collections suited to each person's personality, wrapped them meticulously with beautiful wrapping paper and ribbons bought from a cultural and creative store, and attached handwritten cards to each gift.

events.name: Share project insights with the editor
events.description: She shared a comprehensive review of the photography exhibition and potential future collaboration plans with Mingyuan Bookstore via email with her long-term editor Xu Mingyuan. This was presented as an important professional practice case, and she inquired whether there were relevant column topics that could be further developed.

events.name: Received revenue from the photography exhibition
events.description: Before going to bed, Sun Yuwei received a notification from her mobile banking app about a transfer from Mingyuan Bookstore, which included the venue support fee and postcard sales commission, totaling 1,500 yuan. This marked the first time in her life she had earned direct income from her photography work, making it particularly meaningful. She carefully verified the amount, which matched the oral agreement she had previously made with Mr. Qin.

events.name: Establish a "Creative Fund"
events.description: With a sense of excitement, Sun Yuwei created a dedicated electronic savings account or label named "Creative Fund" within her frequently used payment app. She solemnly transferred the entire 1,500 yuan she had just received into it, adding a note: "First income from the Footsteps in Spring City Photography Exhibition." This marked the possibility of her hobby beginning to transform into sustainable funding for a career.

events.name: Share the Joy
events.description: She shared the good news via WeChat with her mother Li Xiulan, close friend Zhang Jing, and fellow writer Song Wen. They briefly discussed potential future uses for this "Creative Fund," such as upgrading equipment, enrolling in courses, or setting it aside as travel savings.

events.name: The Significance of Journaling
events.description: Finally, Sun Yuwei solemnly recorded this day in her journal: the gaining of family trust and the arrival of her first creative income. She began to outline the management principles and priority uses of the 【Creative Fund】, her heart filled with anticipation for the future.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, but well-prepared.

结束状态.心情: Immense joy, relief, and a sense of accomplishment, feeling profoundly recognized and empowered for the future.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is the Care and Planning Day on Christmas Eve. Sun Yuwei shared the joy of growth with her sister who lives far away, completed a year-end self-care ritual through yoga, and proactively began taking on the responsibility of researching financial security for her family, demonstrating a more mature mindset.

events.name: Waking Up and Leisurely Mornings
events.description: After the excitement of the previous day, Sun Yuwei woke up feeling cheerful and relaxed. As it was Christmas Eve, a hint of festive atmosphere could already be felt on the streets and in the community. She got up and washed up at a leisurely pace.

events.name: Video Sharing with Sister
events.description: After breakfast, Sun Yuwei had a video call via WeChat with her elder sister Sun Yutong, who was far away in Shenzhen. She excitedly shared her parents' high recognition of her financial report, as well as receiving her first photography income and establishing a "Creative Fund." Her sister was also genuinely happy for her, praising her by saying she had "truly grown up." The two also chatted about her sister's year-end work situation in Shenzhen and made preliminary plans for their family reunion during the Spring Festival.

events.name: Reading and Writing
events.description: After the call, Sun Yuwei dealt with some scattered email replies in the study and read the feedback email from her mentor, Wu Mingyuan, regarding the prose excerpt titled "Morning Mist" she had sent a few days earlier. Professor Wu acknowledged the keenness of her imagery capture and offered a specific suggestion for structural development, which Sun Yuwei carefully noted down.

events.name: Christmas Eve Yoga Ceremony
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei attended a special Christmas Eve class held at the yoga studio. The class focused on relaxation and gratitude, with the instructor guiding participants through meditation to reflect on their growth and achievements over the past year, accompanied by soothing music and candlelight. During the meditation, Sun Yuwei clearly visualized her personal transformation from the beginning to the end of the year, which strengthened her resolve to make yoga a long-term health habit. After the class, she exchanged "Merry Christmas Eve" greetings with He Lu.

events.name: Research on Household Insurance Products
events.description: In the evening, inspired by her cousin Shen Wei and encouraged by her family's trust, Sun Yuwei began to proactively research family financial security. Using her computer and phone, she spent several hours carefully comparing online several medical supplementary insurance and accident insurance products suitable for middle-aged and elderly parents. She focused on coverage, premium costs, the convenience of the claims process, and online user reviews, and created a detailed comparative analysis and notes in an electronic document, preliminarily narrowing down two or three options.

events.name: Family Christmas Eve Dinner
events.description: Although it wasn't a grand festival, Mother Li Xiulan still prepared a more sumptuous dinner than usual, including Sun Yuwei's favorite mushroom hotpot. The family of three sat around the table, enjoying a warm Christmas Eve dinner together, and Father even opened a small bottle of red wine, which was a rare treat.

起始状态.心情: Continuing yesterday's joy, peaceful and warm.

结束状态.心情: Steadfast and responsible, one finds growth in caring for others and planning for the future.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for warm socializing and leisurely entertainment. Amid the Christmas atmosphere, Sun Yuwei spent the daytime planning her financial goals for the new year, while in the evening, she enjoyed delicious food, exchanged gifts, and engaged in deep conversations with her close friends. Recharging through intimate friendships, she also discovered cultural and artistic activities that piqued her interest.

events.name: Plan New Year's Financial Goals
events.description: In the morning, encouraged by her parents' trust and the establishment of the [Creative Fund], Sun Yuwei began planning her financial goals for 2026. Based on her 2025 income and expenditure data and new income expectations (writing assignments + potential cultural projects), she revised her monthly budget, increased the proportion of mandatory savings, and planned to raise the fixed investment amount for the [Creative Fund]. She also specifically allocated a portion of the budget to support her goal of "domestic cultural travel."

events.name: Organize Insurance Recommendation Documentation
events.description: In the morning, she compiled the insurance product information she had researched the previous night, along with comparative analyses and her preliminary recommendations, into a clear and easy-to-understand electronic document. She added charts and product links to it, hoping that this document would help her parents intuitively grasp the differences between various insurance options and prepare them for the upcoming family discussion.

events.name: Discovering Information on Cultural and Artistic Activities
events.description: During her lunch break, Sun Yuwei was browsing a local culture-focused WeChat public account and Douban Events when she came across a piece of information: an independent documentary titled *Memories of Spring City* would have a limited screening this weekend at a niche art cinema in Kunming's Old Street. The film, which focuses on the oral history of Kunming's urban transformation, immediately caught her attention, and she decided to make time to see it over the weekend.

events.name: Christmas Besties Dinner Party
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei met with her close friend Chen Sisi and her college roommate Zhao Xiaowen at a cozy Yunnan restaurant adorned with Christmas decorations. They ordered a mushroom hotpot and several other specialty dishes, enjoying the meal heartily. During the dinner, the three shared updates on their lives, work-related concerns, and reading insights from the past month, with laughter filling the air. They also exchanged Christmas gifts they had prepared for each other. Sun Yuwei received a beautifully illustrated flower arrangement guidebook and a set of new washi tapes for her journal, which delighted her greatly.

events.name: Visiting independent bookstores and chatting in cafes
events.description: After dinner, the three of them, still not ready to part ways, decided to visit a familiar independent bookstore nearby called "The Age of Paper." Inside, they browsed through newly arrived books and cultural and creative products. Later, they ordered three cups of warm brown sugar bubble tea at the bookstore's attached café and found a quiet corner to continue their conversation. Their topics ranged from recent exhibitions to future career plans, and they lingered until past nine o'clock in the evening before reluctantly heading home.

events.name: Return Home to Organize and Document
events.description: After returning home, Sun Yuwei carefully put away the gifts she had received and transferred the photos taken during dinner and at the bookstore to her computer. She sketched a simple scene of tonight's gathering in her journal and recorded the warm feelings it brought. Afterwards, she sent messages to Chen Sisi and Zhao Xiaowen, thanking them for their wonderful company.

起始状态.心情: Feeling light and cheerful, looking forward to the evening gathering.

结束状态.心情: Warm and joyful, fully nourished by friendship and the festive atmosphere.
