2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for wrapping things up and expressing gratitude. Sun Yuwei conducted a final round of meticulous proofreading for the essay collection and carefully selected New Year gifts for her parents, paying for them with her own earnings from writing. Through these actions, she conveyed her appreciation while also making plans for a movie outing over the weekend.

events.name: Morning Run and Breakfast
events.description: I resumed my morning jogging routine and completed my final run of the week at Cuihu Park. After returning home, I had breakfast with my parents. My mother mentioned that with the Chinese New Year approaching, the house needs a thorough cleaning.

events.name: Final Proofreading of the Essay Collection
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei entered the final sprint stage of the essay collection "Cang'er Xuyu: The Mountains of Our Fathers"—final proofreading. She conducted a last round of meticulous proofreading, checking word by word and sentence by sentence, correcting three subtle typos and several instances of improper punctuation usage. Next, she standardized the font, font size, paragraph spacing, and header and footer formats throughout the book, ultimately generating a neatly formatted electronic final draft ready for review. Looking at the complete document, she breathed a long sigh of relief.

events.name: Swimming Experience
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei visited the community swimming pool to try swimming as a new exploration of indoor winter sports. She completed 30 minutes of freestyle swimming, and although her technique was still unpolished, she enjoyed the sense of relaxation in the water and plans to incorporate it into her routine in the future.

events.name: Selecting New Year Gifts for Parents
events.description: After swimming, Sun Yuwei made a special trip to a well-known time-honored shop in Kunming. Using the income she earned from writing articles, she carefully selected New Year gifts for her parents. Knowing that her father, Sun Mingyuan, enjoys drinking tea, she chose a high-quality purple clay teapot set. For her mother, Li Xiulan, she picked a soft and warm cashmere scarf in a light gray shade, her mother’s favorite color. When paying, she felt a deep sense of pride and gratitude.

events.name: Plan Weekend Movie Viewing
events.description: On her way home, she checked the mobile map to confirm the specific location and public transportation route to the niche art cinema located in the old street that she planned to visit over the weekend. Subsequently, she purchased a ticket online for the film "Memories of Spring City" on Saturday afternoon. She also made sure to check whether her notebook and pen were in her bag, planning to jot down inspirations after the screening.

events.name: Editing Scattered Manuscripts
events.description: In the evening, she worked on a short book review that she had previously agreed to contribute, revised it, and sent it out.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the determination to accomplish an important task.

结束状态.心情: Feeling gratified and satisfied, I have completed the manuscript and swimming experience, and also prepared heartfelt gifts for my parents.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning jogging, 30 minutes of swimming

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for artistic inspiration and idea gathering. Over the weekend, after her yoga class, Sun Yuwei went alone to watch a touching independent documentary. After the viewing, she not only recorded a wealth of inspiration but also encountered like-minded viewers and engaged in brief conversations, gaining a great deal from the experience.

events.name: Weekend Lazy Mornings and Reading
events.description: On Saturday morning, Sun Yuwei enjoyed sleeping in. After getting up, she read a collection of essays about urban strolling while having breakfast.

events.name: End-of-Month Yoga Course Summary
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei attended the final Saturday yoga class of the month. After the session, she briefly summarized her practice experiences from the past month with her yoga partner He Lu. Both felt that their physical flexibility and mental state had improved through consistent practice. They agreed to continue practicing together next month, and He Lu also recommended a new meditation app to her.

events.name: Go to the Old Street Cinema.
events.description: In the afternoon, Sun Yuwei took a bus to the niche art cinema located in Kunming Old Street. She arrived an hour early and leisurely strolled through the old alleys surrounding the cinema, observing the historic buildings, small street-side shops, and passersby. She immersed herself in the slow, nostalgic atmosphere, which stood in stark contrast to modern commercial districts, allowing her to build anticipation for the film.

events.name: Watch "Memories of Spring City"
events.description: The film began on time. This independent documentary, through the oral accounts of several longtime Kunming residents and the interweaving of black-and-white and color footage, narrates the transformations in the city's streets and alleys, lifestyle habits, and human relationships over the decades. The vanishing street scenes and the sparkle in the elders' eyes as they recounted past events deeply moved Sun Yuwei, giving her a more intuitive and profound emotional resonance with the theme of "urban memory," which she had long been exploring in her writing.

events.name: Cafés Record Inspiration
events.description: After the film, Sun Yuwei, feeling deeply stirred, went to the cafe attached to the cinema, ordered a hot Americano, and sat down in a corner. She immediately took out the notebook and pen she always carried with her, quickly jotting down fragments of inspiration sparked by the movie: a few vivid visual images, a direct quote from an interviewee that moved her to tears, and thoughts on how to weave her own family memories into a broader narrative of urban transformation.

events.name: Brief Communication with Unfamiliar Audiences
events.description: While taking notes, Sun Yuwei noticed a young woman sitting nearby, who also appeared to be attending the movie alone, writing something in her notebook with a focused expression. Summoning her courage, Sun Yuwei softly asked, "Did you just watch 'Memories of Spring City' as well?" The woman looked up and nodded with a smile. The two briefly exchanged their thoughts on the film, both expressing how deeply moved they were by it, and shared their respective memories of Kunming. Though their conversation lasted less than ten minutes, this fleeting connection based on a shared cultural experience left Sun Yuwei feeling a sense of warmth.

events.name: Return Journey and Conceptualization
events.description: When leaving the café and starting the return journey, dusk was already approaching. Sun Yuwei remained immersed in the emotions and reflections stirred by the film. On the bus, gazing at the flowing city nightscape outside the window, she began contemplating how to transform this profound cinematic experience, along with the encounter with a stranger, into material for future essays or columns.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the afternoon movie.

结束状态.心情: Abundant in inspiration and rich in inner life, one is moved by art and the subtle connections between people.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is the day for procurement preparations. Sun Yuwei purchased new materials and notebooks for the upcoming year-end bullet journal creation, filled with a sense of ritual to welcome the new year. In the evening, she had preliminary discussions with her parents about insurance plans, and her suggestions were taken seriously.

events.name: Morning Run and Family Breakfast
events.description: On Sunday morning, Sun Yuwei still went for her morning run. After returning home, the whole family had breakfast together, and her father mentioned that he would be meeting an old colleague over the weekend.

events.name: Procurement Journal Creation Materials
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei made a special trip to her favorite independent bookstore and several cultural and creative shops to purchase supplies for her year-end "big project" of creating a handcrafted journal. She carefully selected new colored pens, a set of stickers themed around Yunnan flowers, several rolls of washi tape with different textures, and bought a minimalist-designed 2026 journal she had long admired. Carrying these "ammunitions" home, she felt full of anticipation for her New Year's record-keeping.

events.name: Editing a Manuscript
events.description: In the afternoon, she attempted to incorporate some inspirations she had recorded after watching the film yesterday into the relevant chapters of the essay collection, making minor additions and revisions.

events.name: Early bedtime for mild colds.
events.description: In the evening, Sun Yuwei felt a slight sore throat and fatigue, possibly due to a mild cold. She decided to rest early and canceled her other scheduled plans.

events.name: Discuss insurance plans with parents.
events.description: During a family dinner, Sun Yuwei presented the prepared insurance plan analysis document to her parents. She explained in detail her thought process for comparing different products, as well as the respective advantages, disadvantages, and applicability of the two or three shortlisted options she had selected. Her parents listened very attentively to her analysis, with her father inquiring about some details in the coverage terms, while her mother was more concerned about the convenience of the claims process. The discussion atmosphere was rational and open. Her parents indicated they would give it further consideration and praised her for being "thoughtful."

起始状态.心情: Lighthearted, with a small sense of pleasure from shopping and completing plans.

结束状态.心情: I feel gratified and accomplished that my research and suggestions have been taken seriously by my family, though I am slightly fatigued due to physical discomfort.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is a day for reflection and organization. As the year draws to a close, Sun Yuwei systematically sorted through her phone photo albums, casual notes, and other materials from the entire year, making thorough content preparations for tomorrow's year-end journal creation. Her work was meticulous and well-organized.

events.name: Morning Run and Breakfast
events.description: On Monday morning, Sun Yuwei finished her morning jog at Cuihu Park. The weather was somewhat overcast, but she felt refreshed after the run. While having breakfast at home, her mother reminded her to sort out the clothes that needed to be washed before the end of the year.

events.name: Annual Material Screening and Organization
events.description: For most of the morning and afternoon, Sun Yuwei stayed in the study, engaged in a "massive project" that was full of joy: organizing life materials for the year 2025. She browsed through her phone’s photo album from start to finish, selecting photos of commemorative value—the interplay of light and shadow during morning runs at Cuihu Lake, moments of setting up a photography exhibition, family portraits, delicious meals shared with friends, flower arrangement creations, and travel scenery. At the same time, she also reviewed the notebooks filled with essays recorded throughout the year and the accumulated tickets (movie tickets, exhibition passes, café receipts), setting aside or photographing the content worth pasting into her journal.

events.name: Classification and Preliminary Planning
events.description: She initially categorized the selected materials into sections such as "Healthy Habits," "Creative Projects," "Family Time," "Friendship Gatherings," "City Exploration," and "Inspiration Moments." She also roughly sketched out the layouts for several sections she planned to create in her journal for the next day.

events.name: Final Proofreading of the Manuscript
events.description: In the evening, she conducted a final proofread of the final draft of the prose collection, confirming there were no basic errors, and updated the document's revision date.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to commence systematic organization.

结束状态.心情: Well-organized and substantial, it has amassed a rich arsenal of "ammunition" for tomorrow's creative endeavors.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today marks a milestone and a day of bidding farewell to the old while ushering in the new. Sun Yuwei has officially completed the first draft of her essay collection and sent it to her supervisor and editor, achieving her core annual goal. Following this, through the ritualistic creation of her year-end journal, she fondly reflected on the year 2025 and clearly outlined new aspirations for 2026.

events.name: Completed the first draft of the essay collection.
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei finalized the last punctuation mark for her essay collection *Cang'er Xuyu: The Mountains of Our Fathers* in her study and saved the final version. This draft, approximately eighty thousand words in length, represented a year of her dedicated effort. She brewed herself a rich cup of brown sugar bubble tea, and amid the fragrant sweetness, she solemnly wrote in the diary page of her notebook: "December 30, 2025, 10:23 a.m. The first draft of *Cang'er Xuyu* is completed. A milestone achieved." Between the lines, a sense of accomplishment and relief was palpable.

events.name: Seeking guidance by submitting the initial draft
events.description: Subsequently, she sent the complete electronic manuscript via email to her supervisor, Professor Wu Mingyuan, and her long-term collaborating editor, Xu Mingyuan. In the postscript, she sincerely expressed her gratitude and clarified that this was a preliminary draft, earnestly requesting valuable critiques and guidance from both professors from the perspectives of academia and publishing. The moment she clicked the "send" button, she felt she had taken a significant step closer to her identity as an "author."

events.name: Year-End Handwritten Journal Creation (Retrospective)
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Sun Yuwei embarked on the ritualistic creation of her year-end journal. On the final blank page of her 2025 journal, she turned on the desk lamp and played soothing light music. Using the photos, notes, and receipts she had organized the day before, along with newly purchased colored pens, stickers, and washi tape, she meticulously decorated the pages to record the most significant growth moments of the year: the health improvements from consistently practicing morning runs and yoga, the entire process from planning to execution of the photography exhibition "Footsteps in Spring City," the new level of understanding achieved with her parents through financial reporting, the excitement of establishing a "Creative Fund," and countless warm daily moments of reading, writing, and gathering with friends. Each page was vibrant with colors and rich in both text and images, serving as a heartfelt tribute to her own year.

events.name: New Year's Planner Planning (Outlook)
events.description: After completing her review of 2025, she opened a brand-new 2026 planner. On the title page and the planning pages at the beginning, she began brainstorming and sketching out sections for her goals for the new year. She designed a "Cultural Project Inspiration Collection" column to record potential ideas for future curations or collaborations; established a "Monthly City Exploration Walk" plan, requiring herself to purposefully explore at least one neighborhood in Kunming each month; and wrote down the "Advanced Ikenobo Ikebana Study Plan with Su Man," reserving space to track her progress. She jotted down her initial action ideas, her heart filled with clear anticipation for the coming year of 2026.

起始状态.心情: Filled with anticipation for completing an important task and a hint of nervousness

结束状态.心情: A profound sense of achievement and a clear vision for the future bring inner richness and steadfastness as we bid farewell to the old and welcome the new.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is the Annual Review and Mindful New Year's Day. On the last day of 2025, Sun Yuwei systematically conducted a month-end financial review, solidified the accumulation rules for the [Creative Fund], and participated in a New Year's Eve yoga mindfulness session, welcoming the arrival of the new year with peace and hope during meditation.

events.name: Waking Up and Year-End Organization
events.description: On the last day of 2025, Sun Yuwei woke up with a sense of calm after accomplishing many significant tasks. After getting up, she began organizing her desk and bookshelf, archiving materials from the past year to create a clean and refreshed space for the work of the new year.

events.name: End-of-Month Financial Review
events.description: In the morning, Sun Yuwei opened her computer in the study and initiated her monthly financial review process. She began by meticulously checking and recording all income for December, including the manuscript fee from the *Cultural Horizon* magazine and the 1,500 yuan revenue from the photography exhibition, ensuring the data in the accounting software was accurate.

events.name: Analyze Expenditures and Adjust Budget
events.description: Next, she conducted a detailed review of her expenditures for the month, covering categories such as books, floral materials, café socializing, and gift purchases, analyzing the amounts spent in each category. She discovered that due to Christmas gatherings and purchasing materials for her planner, her non-essential spending had slightly exceeded the budget for the month. Consequently, she decided to tighten the budget in these areas for the following month.

events.name: Inject capital into the [Creative Fund]
events.description: Then, following her self-imposed rule of "allocating 20% of manuscript income to the [Creative Fund]," she calculated 20% of her December manuscript earnings and transferred the amount via mobile banking into the [Creative Fund] electronic account. In the remarks section, she noted, "December manuscript income fixed deposit, to support future micro-documentary filming equipment rental." Seeing the fund balance increase once again, she felt reassured.

events.name: Financial Summary Recorded in a Journal
events.description: After completing all data operations, she wrote a summary of this month-end review in the "Financial Log" section of her notebook: including the impressive income in December due to the photography exhibition, the need to slightly control expenses, the accumulation of the [Creation Fund] to a level sufficient to support a small creative project, and preliminary ideas for more refined financial management in 2026.

events.name: Sharing Plan with Fellow Flower Arrangement Enthusiasts
events.description: In the afternoon, she contacted Su Man, a fellow flower arrangement enthusiast, via WeChat. She shared the "Ikenobo Flower Arrangement Advanced Learning Plan" she had written in her New Year's journal and asked Su Man if she was interested in finding suitable courses together or scheduling regular practice sessions. Su Man quickly replied, expressing great interest, and the two agreed to discuss the details further after the New Year.

events.name: New Year's Eve Yoga Meditation Class
events.description: On New Year's Eve, Sun Yuwei chose not to join the lively celebrations. Instead, she attended a special "New Year's Mindful Meditation" session held at a yoga studio. In the quiet, dimly lit classroom, accompanied by the soothing sounds of singing bowls and guided instructions, she engaged in an extended deep meditation. She reflected on the gains and losses of the past year, released her burdens, and set positive intentions for the new year with a clear and peaceful mind. The session concluded just before the midnight bell rang. Walking home in a serene and harmonious atmosphere, she felt filled with inner peace and hope.

events.name: Celebrating New Year's Eve at Home
events.description: Upon returning home, her parents were still in the living room watching television, waiting to ring in the New Year. She sat with them for a while, sipped a glass of warm water, and as the cheers of the New Year countdown echoed from the TV, they exchanged "Happy New Year" wishes. Afterward, she retreated to her quiet study, glanced at the serene night outside the window, and then washed up and retired for the night. In a manner that best aligned with her inner rhythm, she brought 2025 to a perfect close.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the composure of having completed the annual summary.

结束状态.心情: Tranquil, fulfilling, and full of hope, we welcome the new year with inner peace and clarity.

state.今日运动: Yoga Meditation Class 1.5 Hours
